title: Rory McIlroy suffers astonishing Irish Open collapse on home soil as fans in Northern Ireland are left in disbelief
creator: David Facey
content: RORY MCILORY suffered more heartbreak on home soil as he gifted the Irish Open title to Rasmus Hojgaard. As the 54-hole leader at Royal County Down, McIlroy seemed destined to make up for the misery of missing the cut the last time the Irish Open was held here in 2015. But he ended up suffering the same fate at the 2019 Open up the coast at Portrush. It all seemed to be going to plan as McIlroy found himself two shots clear with four holes to play. The world No3 revived painful memories of his US Open defeat at the hands of Bryson DeChambeau four months earlier as two clumsy bogeys saw his hopes perish. McIlroy birdied the other two - but with Hojgaard finishing with a hat-trick of birdies, the Northern Irishman came up one stroke short. READ MORE GOLF NEWS His huge army of fans were left stunned and shaking their heads in disbelief, emotions shared by McIlroy. The home hero had a chance to force a playoff. Two brilliant shots at the par-five closing hole left him with a ten-footer for the eagle that would have matched Hojgaard’s nine under-par total. In previous years, you would have put good money on McIlroy making that putt and finishing the job in overtime. Most read in Golf But ten years without adding to the four Majors he won before the age of 25 have eroded McIlroy’s confidence. So it was no surprise when his ball burned the hole but refused to drop, with a two-under-par 69 condemning him to yet another near miss. The win is huge for Dane Hojgaard as he now joins his...

title: Автогол Литвинова помешал «Спартаку» обыграть махачкалинское «Динамо» в РПЛ
creator: RT на русском
content: Махачкалинское «Динамо» сыграло вничью со «Спартаком» в матче восьмого тура Российской премьер-лиги (РПЛ). Игра завершилась со счётом 1:1. На 20-й минуте счёт открыл Манфред Угальде. На 36-й минуте в свои ворота забил полузащитник красно-белых Руслан Литвинов. На 90-й минуте команда из Махачкалы осталась в меньшинстве после удаления Хуссема Мрезига. «Динамо» набрало девять очков и занимает девятое место в турнирной таблице чемпионата страны. У «Спартака» 15 очков и пятая позиция. Ранее «Акрон» победил «Химки» в матче восьмого тура РПЛ.

title: I’m married with kids & work NHS hours, I need a break so want an affair with colleague – I know I can get away with it
creator: Leanne Hall
content: A WOMAN leading a stressful, albeit normal life, has revealed how she's considering having an affair to spice things up. The anonymous married mum -of-two revealed she knew she could get away with it easily and wondered if it was worth it. She said she loved her husband and they had a great relationship but couldn't get over the attraction of her co-worker. The mum said: "I am married mum-of-two with a loving DH (husband) and great life. "I work part time for the NHS and work long hours with colleagues. I fancy one of them very much. "He has already tested the waters to see if I'd be open to have a date." READ MORE ON RELATIONSHIPS The woman added that she wasn't sure what to do but knew she would be up for having one or two nights of fun with her colleague. She continued: "Although it could happen at work I don't want to be caught and sacked. "My entire career and home life ruined." She went on to say she could easily bring him back to her families home while her husband was at work and the kids were at school. Most read in Fabulous Plus, she revealed the pair often had compatible days off so it would be easy to find time. Finishing the post, she wrote: "I also feel guilty for considering it and wished I hadn't," but it didn't stop her from planning it to happen. The post which was shared to Mumsnet soon went viral with hundreds of comments. People were quick to slam the mum for thinking about the affair and potentially ruining her family. title: Corrie star lets slip how Gail Platt leaves soap after 50 years in devastating twist
creator: staronline@reachplc.com (Joe Crutchley)
content: A favourite has seemingly dropped a massive spoiler about Gail Platt's much-anticipated exit plot. Earlier this year, fans were gobsmacked to hear that Helen Worth, who plays Gail, is bowing out of the soap after an epic 50-year stint. The showrunners have been tight-lipped but promised a tear-jerker of a send-off for the character. The buzz around Weatherfield was that Gail's dramatic departure would be part of a "major" new chapter for the Platt clan. There was chatter about her ex, Martin Platt (played by Sean Wilson), popping back onto the scene. Despite filming his bits, he had to ditch the cobbles due to 'personal reasons. '. But now, it seems a Corrie cast member might've accidentally spilled the beans on how Gail will say her goodbyes and it's set to shake things up. Dee-Dee Bailey portrayer Channique Sterling-Brown posted a cheeky behind-the-scenes glimpse on her Instagram Story, reports .Caught in the act of a late-night shoot, Channique snapped the iconic street, joking: "Nothing like a night shoot to make you regret dancing until 2am," paired with a teary-eyed emoji. But eagle-eyed fans spotted something telling in the pic Gail's gaff, No. 8 , flaunting an estate agent's sign, hinting the house is hitting the market. Currently, the pad houses Gail's son David Platt, his missus Shona, and their kids Max and Lily. Meanwhile, Gail's other offspring, Nick Tilsley and Sarah Platt, are all settled in their own places with their little ones. Helen, the soap legend, has...

title: Patriots rookie Ja'Lynn Polk catches first touchdown vs. Seahawks
content: FOXBOROUGH, Mass. -- New England Patriots rookie receiver Ja'Lynn Polk caught a 5-yard touchdown pass from quarterback Jacoby Brissett with 4:56 remaining in the first quarter of their home opener against the Seattle Seahawks , and then was gifted the football as a present by veteran receiver K.J. Osborn . After Polk caught the fastball from Brissett, Osborn pretended to wrap the football before handing it to Polk to commemorate his first career NFL touchdown. FIRST @NFL TOUCHDOWN JA'LYNN POLK!!!!! @jpolk_22 | @JBrissett12 pic.twitter.com/loEvUOB7H9 The play gave the Patriots a 7-0 lead. Polk, the second-round pick from the University of Washington (No. 37 overall), had played 35 snaps in the Patriots' season-opening win, and coach Jerod Mayo said he would have an expanded role in Week 2. Polk was on the field for the team's first 11 offensive snaps.

title: L.A. Dodgers at Atlanta Braves: How to watch Sunday Night Baseball for FREE
content: The Atlanta Braves will go for a sweep Sunday evening when they welcome the Los Angeles Dodgers to Truist Park. It has been a profitable series so far for the Braves, who have beaten the Dodgers by scores of 6-2 and 10-1 while shutting down star Shohei Ohtani. Sunday’s game will start at 7 p.m. EDT and air on ESPN and ESPN Deportes, which you can live stream on ESPN+ , fubo TV (FREE trial), Sling TV (discount) and DirecTV Stream (FREE trial and discount). The Dodgers will start Walker Buehler (1-5, 5.95 ERA, 1.64 WHIP, 49 strikeouts) and the Braves will hand the ball to Charlie Morton (8-8, 4.11 ERA, 1.31 WHIP, 155 strikeouts). With the win on Saturday, Atlanta moved to a season-high 14 games over .500 and pulled even with the Mets for the final NL wild-card spot. “These last couple of nights, this is what we’ve expected from ourselves,” pitcher Chris Sale told The Associated Press. “We knew what this series means and it’s been a good couple of games for us.” Atlanta scored six runs in the sixth inning on Saturday, which featured Matt Olson’s bases-loaded double and RBIs from Whit Merrifield and Michael Harris II. Olson also opened the scoring for Atlanta in the first with an RBI double that scored Harris, who had reached on a single. Olson finished with four RBIs on 2-of-4 hitting. “When we hit like that, we’re capable of a lot,” Braves manager Brian Snitker told The Associated Press. “You just kind of get cautiously optimistic that we’re going to get on a run because we’re...

title: Saints Derek Carr hits Rashid Shaheed with 70-yard TD; lead Cowboys
content: DALLAS -- New Orleans Saints wide receiver Rashid Shaheed made his presence known last week after Derek Carr hit him for a 59-yard touchdown. He took one snap against the Cowboys (1-0) on Sunday to prove he's going to be one of the Saints' go-to guys with a 70-yard TD score. Now that's a dot from @derekcarrqb 🎯 📺: #NOvsDAL on FOX 📱: https://t.co/waVpO909ge pic.twitter.com/sHcWVnMEtl The Saints were leading 7-3 after an Alvin Kamara touchdown run on the first drive. Shaheed had clear separation from the start of his route on the first play of the Saints' second drive. Carr's pass went 50 yards in the air with Shaheed easily going into the end zone to put New Orleans up 14-3. Shaheed's touchdown catch was the longest the Cowboys have allowed since a 73-yarder by Seattle Seahawks wide receiver DK Metcalf in Week 13 last year. According to ESPN Stats & Info, it was the deepest passing touchdown -- 50 air yards -- allowed by the Cowboys since a 2012 game against Washington. The longest play the Cowboys allowed in their Week 1 win over the Cleveland Browns was a 29-yarder.

title: Hojgaard charges past Rory for Irish Open title
content: NEWCASTLE, Northern Ireland -- Rasmus Hojgaard birdied his last three holes Sunday for a 6-under 65 to win the Irish Open and hand Rory McIlroy another dose of disappointment before a raucous gallery at Royal County Down. McIlroy had a two-shot lead on the back nine until Hojgaard put together a stunning charge down the stretch to win for the fifth time on the European tour and deny McIlroy a victory in his home country. "Unfortunately, I'm getting used to it this year," McIlroy said. "Hopefully, the tide is going to turn pretty soon, and I can turn all these close calls into victories." McIlroy had a pair of bogeys on the closing four holes that allowed Hojgaard, playing two groups in front of him, to charge to victory in stunning fashion. The 23-year-old Dane got up-and-down from a bunker for birdie on the short par-4 16th, he holed a bunker shot for birdie on the 17th to take the lead, and then blasted out of the rough onto the front edge of the green for a two-putt birdie on the par-5 18th. Hojgaard, who started the final round three shots behind McIlroy, finished on 9-under 275. "I had a number today that I was trying to reach, and that was 8 [under]. Obviously, coming in and finishing on 9 was gold," he said. It was another tough ending for McIlroy, who has three wins this year but lost the U.S. Open when he missed a pair of short par putts on the last three holes at Pinehurst No. 2, and had a late charge at the Olympics derailed by a wedge that went into the water....

title: SCOTUS Chief Justice Sidelined Alito Days After Flag Scandal
creator: Corbin Bolies
content: Supreme Court Chief Justice John Roberts sidelined one of the most conservative members of the high court on a pending case just days after his wife seemingly shared support for the “Stop the Steal” movement, according to a new report. Roberts had initially asked Justice Samuel Alito to write the majority opinion in Fischer v. United States , a case that alleged the government went too far when it charged Jan. 6 rioters with obstruction of a federal proceeding, according to The New York Times . Then came the Times’ May 16 report on his wife Martha-Ann Alito ’s aggrieved decision to fly an upside-down U.S. flag—an emblem of the “Stop the Steal” movement, and propagated by some Jan. 6 rioters—outside their home in Virginia back in 2021, less than two weeks after the Capitol attack. Four days later, on May 20, Roberts informed the court that he would write the majority opinion after all, according to the Times. To switch authors on an opinion without a shift in the decision was unusual, experts told the newspaper. So was Roberts’ decision to take on yet another case for himself; he had written seven cases during the court’s most recent term, five of them among its most consequential rulings. That 6-3 majority, split mostly along ideological lines, ruled the government must prove a defendant impaired specific elements of an official proceeding and it cannot apply the statute so broadly. It is unclear if the episodes were linked, and the justices did not respond to the Times ’...

title: Giants kicker Graham Gano suffers new injury on opening play vs. Commanders
creator: Ryan Dunleavy
content: One disaster was negated, but another remained in place for the Giants. Kicker Graham Gano, who entered Sunday’s game with a groin injury, injured his hamstring trying to chase down the Commanders’ Austin Ekeler on a 98-yard kickoff return touchdown to start the game. A holding penalty took Ekeler’s points off the board for the time being – the Commanders later settled for a field goal – but did not create a time warp. In other words, the Giants still lost Gano and had to turn to punter Jamie Gillan, who was 1-for-2 on field goals in his career, to pull double duty. Sure enough, Gillan missed his first kick – a PAT after the Giants took a first-quarter 6-3 lead. Follow The Post’s live updates from Giants vs. Commanders Whether Gano was more susceptible to a hamstring injury because he was running with a groin injury is up for debate. But it was an easily preventable mess that felt a lot like déjà vu for the Giants. Gano was added to the injury report after Saturday’s walkthrough, but the Giants chose not to elevate rookie Jude McAtamney from the practice squad as an insurance policy or to handle kickoffs and lessen Gano’s workload. Just last week, the Giants turned to an injured Gunner Olszewski to return punts even after he looked hobbled returning from a groin injury in training camp. Olszewski re-injured his groin during pre-game warmups, and receiver Darius Slayton fumbled a punt return when he was forced into a role that he has practiced for years but rarely needs to...

title: CTP yarın Lefkoşa'da eylem yapıyor
content: Ana Muhalefet Cumhuriyetçi Türk Partisi ( CTP ), "eğitimde yaratılan kaosu ve çocukların eğitim hakkının gasp edilmesini" protesto için yarın sabah Lefkoşa'da Başbakanlık ışıklarında eylem yapacağını açıkladı. CTP Genel Başkanı Tufan Erhürman ve milletvekillerinin de katılacağı eylem saat 7.30'da başlayacak. Konuyla ilgili açıklamada, ülkede her alanda kaos yaratan hükümetin şimdi de kurultay hesaplarıyla çocukların eğitim hakkını gasp ettiği savunuldu Açıklamada "İlköğretimde iki yüz kırk öğretmen açığı yaratılmış ve bu açığı kapatmak için çare olarak gördükleri partizanlıkla 'geçici öğretmen' atama meselesi kurultay kaygılarıyla başarılamamıştır. Ortaöğretimde iki yüz otuzun üzerinde olan öğretmen ihtiyacı göz ardı edilmiştir" denildi "ÖĞRETMENİN İTİBARSIZLAŞTIRILMASINA TEŞVİK OLUNMUŞTUR" Bilimsel bir çalışma yapılmadan “öğretmen tasarrufu” politikası izlendiği denilen açıklama şöyle devam etti: "Birçok alanda öğretmen istihdamı yapılmazken birçok alanda da ders yükü altında ezilen, pedagojiden yoksun, çağdışı ortamlarda görev yapmaya yollanan öğretmenin, meslek itibarları ayaklar altına alınmaya çalışılmıştır. Öğretmenin itibarsızlaştırılmasına teşvik olunmuştur. Kamu okullarında kalite yerle bir edilmiş, eğitimde fırsat eşitsizliği derinleşmiştir. title: Donald Trump Says He Hates Taylor Swift
content: Less than a week after 's endorsement of Vice President for president, wrote in a social media post on Sunday that he hates the singer. In a Sunday post on Truth Social, his social media platform, the former president, in an all-caps message, wrote: "I HATE TAYLOR SWIFT!" On Tuesday, Trump, the presidential nominee, faced off with Harris, the Democratic presidential nominee, on the News in Philadelphia for the first time as the two clashed over several important issues like abortion, the economy and immigration. Shortly after the debate, Swift, whose fanbase spans generations and crosses party lines, made tidal waves in the political arena with an endorsement of Harris and a targeted push for voter registration. In an post, in which Swift did not directly attack Trump, , praising her as "a steady-handed, gifted leader" who could accomplish more by leading with "calm and not chaos." She signed the message with "Childless Cat Lady" and included a photograph of herself holding her cat, in an apparent reference to comments that Ohio Senator , the Republican vice-presidential nominee, made in 2021, when he described leading as " ." In 2020, Swift endorsed President and Harris in the election that saw the duo victorious over Trump. Since her endorsement of Harris, conservative critics have continued to take aim at the singer and downplay her impact on the political landscape. has reached out to a spokesperson for Swift via email for comment. title: Servette und Luzern scheitern, Basel zittert sich weiter
creator: Agentur sda
content: Schaffhausen siegte gegen Servette 2:1, Aarau schlug Luzern 1:0 und Basel zog den Kopf dank eines 1:0 nach Verlängerung aus der Schlinge. Zu Beginn der Partie in Schaffhausen nahm alles den erwarteten Verlauf. Der Favorit aus Genf ging durch Jérémy Guillemenot früh in Führung. Erst nach der Pause fand das Heimteam besser ins Spiel. Doch es bedurfte der gütigen Mithilfe der Westschweizer, um das Team von Ciriaco Sforza wieder zurück in die Partie zu holen. Erst lenkte Goalie Joel Mall eine scharfe Hereingabe von Gabriele De Donno ans Bein von Yoan Severin, von wo aus der Ball ins Netz kullerte. Dann wurde Guillemenot nach einer Stunde und einer Schwalbe mit der zweiten Verwarnung des Feldes verwiesen - ein harter Entscheid von Schiedsrichter Anojen Kanagasingam. In der Folge hatten beide Mannschaften Chancen auf den Siegtreffer. Marc Giger sorgte fünf Minuten vor dem Ende per Kopf für das umjubelte 2:1 des Underdogs und damit für die grosse Überraschung. Mit Luzern erwischte es am Sonntagnachmittag gleich die zweite Mannschaft aus der Super League. Die tragische Figur war ausgerechnet Donat Rrudhani, der von 2019 bis 2022 beim FC Aarau unter Vertrag stand. In der 70. Minute sah der 25-jährige Luzerner nach einem Foul die Gelb-Rote Karte und erwies seinem Team damit einen Bärendienst. Der in der zweiten Halbzeit besser in die Partie findende Unterklassige erhielt durch den Platzverweis weiteren Aufschwung und nutzte die nummerische Überzahl acht Minuten vor dem...

title: Strictly star in tears in ‘vulnerable’ picture hours after launch show

content: Strictly Come Dancing star Gorka Marquez has been showered with support from his colleagues and loved ones after he was left in tears. title: McIlroy meltdown on 17 costs him Irish Open play-off chance
Here's why these military jets flew over Massachusetts on Sunday
content: Did you see or hear military jets zooming low over parts of Massachusetts on Sunday afternoon? The four military jets flew in formation as part of the celebration of the first game of the season at Gillette Stadium, where the New England Patriots are hosting the Seattle Seahawks. According to a social media post from the Walpole Police Department, the flyover was conducted by the 104th Fighter Wing, a unit of the Massachusetts Air National Guard. "If you notice the low flying aircraft, there is no cause for alarm," police warned ahead of the game.

title: Erstwhile heart of Tamil cinema and theatre
content: Long walks on arterial roads at Mandaveli and Santhome, now a luxury, was my favourite pastime as a school student. I got updated on the latest film songs through speakers in tea shops that blared all along the arterial roads of Santhome during the early 1970s as I walked to school in the area along with friends. Red-coloured MTC buses then used to resemble school buses, with students clad in different uniforms travelling to Santhome that was dotted with schools. I am still in touch with my ‘bus-mates’ such as celebrated newsreader Shobhana Ravi and Justice Aruna Jagadeesan. New phase After college education at Stella Maris College, I shifted to Ratnam Street in the undivided Royapettah after marriage to S. Kannappan, son of film producer A.L. Srinivasan, in 1975. (Mr. Srinivasan was the elder brother of lyricist Kannadasan). As I hailed from a bureaucrat’s family, it was a complete shift for me. Royapettah, from which Gopalapuram was carved in the late 1970s, was the soul of Chennai’s film and drama industry. The neighbourhood was the hotspot for actors, producers, drama artists, theatre owners, and film financiers. Royapettah-Ratnam Street, Dr. Besant Road, Thandavarayan Street, and Shanmugam Street were home to many film personalities. The roads in Royapettah used to be bustling with drama troupes such as TKS Nataka Sabha, N.S. Krishnan Nataka Mandram, and that of S.V. Sahasranamam. Many of the troupes had boarding for about 100 people, be it actors, musicians, and...

title: Kim Kardashian makes rare comment about daughter North's 'learning difference'
creator: Beatriz Colon
content: Kim Kardashian is getting candid about raising a child with a learning "difference." In support of her good friend Lauren Sánchez , fiancée of Amazon founder Jeff Bezos , and who recently published a children's book inspired by her own struggles with dyslexia, the Skims founder shared a relatable post seemingly referring to her daughter North's dyslexia. In addition to North, 12, the reality star also shares kids Saint, eight, Chicago, six, and Psalm, four, with ex-husband Kanye "Ye" West . Over the weekend, Kim took to her Instagram Stories and reposted a video of Lauren's from her recent appearance on The View to promote her book The Fly Who Flew to Space, in which she grew emotional speaking about her experience going through school not knowing about her dyslexia, and it being the reason why things like reading and writing were so hard for her. Kim then wrote: "I'm reposting this not [because] she's my friend and I love her," but rather: "Because every mom who has struggled with their kids with dyslexia or any learning difference needs to hear that it will be okay." Though the mom-of-four hasn't previously shared much about raising a child with a learning difficulty, last year, North announced during a TikTok live that she had dyslexia. Kim however cut her off from saying too much, noting: "You are just saying way too much. I purposely don't talk about stuff that you are going through." title: In Gujarat, PM Modi to meet beneficiaries of Centre's solar power scheme
content: NEW DELHI: Prime Minister Narendra Modi will visit the Vavol area of Gandhinagar on Monday to meet beneficiaries of the PM Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana, reported news agency ANI. PM Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana is a recently launched scheme, which is designed to provide free electricity through rooftop solar installations to over one crore households across India. Jagshibhai Suthar, a local beneficiary, expressed his excitement, saying, "We are very happy that PM Modi is coming here. Our home now has free electricity through this scheme, and it has made a big difference in our lives." Earlier in the day, PM Modi was warmly welcomed at Ahmedabad Airport as he began his visit to Gujarat , where he will take part in the Global Renewable Energy Investor's Meet and launch several development projects worth over ₹8,000 crore. The Prime Minister shared his plans on social media platform X, stating, "After memorable programs in Jharkhand, I landed in Ahmedabad a short while ago. I will be attending various programs in Gandhinagar and Ahmedabad on September 16." He further added, "In the morning, I will interact with beneficiaries of PM Surya Ghar Muft Bijli Yojana, and later, I will participate in the 4th Global Renewable Energy Investor's Meet and Expo at Mahatma Mandir." PM Modi also mentioned, "In the afternoon, I will inaugurate and lay the foundation stone for a series of development works worth over ₹8,000 crore. These projects cover energy, roads, housing, and much more." The...

title: ഓണാഘോഷത്തിനിടെ ബൈക്ക് ഇടിച്ചുകയറി; കണ്ടുനിന്നയാൾക്ക് ദാരുണാന്ത്യം
creator: അന്വേഷണം ലേഖകൻ
content: തിരുവനന്തപുരം: മംഗലപുരം ശാസ്തവട്ടത്ത് മൂന്നുപേര്‍ സഞ്ചരിച്ച ബൈക്ക് ഓണാഘോഷപരിപാടിയിലേക്ക് ഇടിച്ചുകയറി ഒരു മരണം. പരിപാടി കണ്ടുകൊണ്ടിരുന്ന ശാസ്തവട്ടം സ്വദേശി സിജു (43) ആണ് മരിച്ചത്. ബൈക്കിടിച്ച് ദൂരെയ്ക്ക് തെറിച്ചു വീണ ഷൈജുവിനെ ഗുരുതര പരിക്കുകളോടെ മെഡിക്കൽ കോളേജിൽ പ്രവേശിപ്പിച്ചെങ്കിലും ആറരയോടെ മരിച്ചു. ബൈക്കോടിച്ചിരുന്ന പെരുങ്ങുഴി സ്വദേശി റോഷൻ രാജിനും ഗുരുതര പരിക്കുണ്ട്. ശാസ്തവട്ടത്തെ ക്ലബ്ബിന്‍റെ ഓണാഘോഷ പരിപാടി കാണാനെത്തിയ ആളാണ് മരിച്ചത്. മൂന്ന് പേർ കയറിയ ബൈക് ആണ് ആഘോഷം കാണാനെത്തിയവരുടെ ഇടയിലേക്ക് ഇടിച്ചുകയറിയത്. ബൈക്കിലുണ്ടായിരുന്നവര്‍ മദ്യലഹരിയിലായിരുന്നോ എന്ന് പോലീസ് അന്വേഷിച്ചുവരികയാണ്. കഴക്കൂട്ടം പോലീസ് നരഹത്യക്ക് കേസെടുത്തു. മൂവരേയും വൈദ്യപരിശോധന നടത്തും.

title: FLAŞ... FLAŞ. NARİN'İN AMCASI GAZİANTEP'E NEDEN DEVAMLI GELİYORDU? Narin’in amcası Gaziantep’te hangi eskort kadınlarla görüştü
content: Amca Salim Güran’ın ifadesinde hayat kadınları ve eskortlarla sık sık görüştüğü için telefon kayıtlarını düzenli olarak sildiğini öne sürdü. Bunun üzerine telefon kayıtlarının inceleme altına alındığı, iddialara göre Muhmar Amca Salim Güran en çok Gaziantep’teki birçok eskort kadınlarla görüştüğünü ve Gaziantep’in ünlü barlarına gelerek eğlenceye katıldığı öne sürüldü. ESKORT KADINLARIN ÇOĞU GAZİANTEP’TEN Amca Salim Güran’ın verdiği ifadelerde eskort kadınlarla görüşmelerini sildiğini ve telefonun silinmesinin bundan kaynaklandığını belirttildiği iddia edildi. Bunun yanı sıra amca Salim Güran, Gaziantep’te bir çok eskort kadınlarla biraraya geldiğini ve bu eskort kadınlarınında telefonlarının incelendiği öne sürüldü. AMCA SALİM GÜRAN NE DEMİŞTİ? "HAYAT KADINLARIYLA GÖRÜŞTÜĞÜM İÇİN SÜREKLİ SİLERİM" Amca Salim Güran dün gece geç saatlere kadar soruşturmayı yürüten 3 savcı tarafından yeniden çapraz sorguya alındı. Amca 2 Eylül günü tutuklandığı ifadesinde olduğu gibi hiçbir suçlamayı kabul etmedi. İtirafçı Nevzat Bahtiyar’a yeğeninin cesedini vermediğini söyledi. Savcıların HTS analizlerinin olay günü Narin’in kaybolduğu saatler ve Nevzat Bahtiyar’ın ifadeleriyle bire bir uyumlu olduğunu sorması üzerine amca, “HTS analizleri yanlıştır” dedi. Amca ilk ifadesinde, telefonundaki tüm arama kayıtlarını ve yazışmaları telefon hafızasının dolması nedeniyle sildiğini belirtmişti. Gece...

title: مقتدى الصدر يصدر بيانا "هاما" حول فتاوى تحريم الاحتفال بالمولد النبوي الشريف
content: وجاء في بيان نشره حساب مقتدى الصدر على منصة "إكس": "أشرقت الأرض بنور ربها وعم الضياء، وانتشر الهدى في الأرض وشع البهاء، واستبشر الملائك وابتهج الأنبياء، وأُنزل القرآن بآياته وجاء الرجاء، وانكسر الشيطان واندثر البلاء، فلا الكفر والنفاق له فينا بقاء، فبحبه وبعشقه يُنال الشفاء. وبحظر حفل المولد جفاء"، على حد تعبيره. وأضاف البيان: "فيا أمة محمد رسول الله وخاتم الأنبياء، احتفلوا بما يرضي الله بمولده وبالهدي والكتاب وبالإيمان والإسلام وبالكمال وبالسلام وبالأخلاق". وتابع الصدر في بيانه: "فبمولده تحتفل الملائكة والأنبياء والرسل، فلا تصغوا لمن ينعق بتحريمه، فيوم ولادته.. ليس يوم وفاته، لكن بعض الفرق الشاذة أرادت ذلك كذبا وزورا لتمحو ذكر رسولنا، ولتمحو البهجة والبهاء والكمال والسلام والإسلام. فوالله لن يستطيعوا محو ذكره ولن يطفئوا نوره ولو كره الناصبون له العداء.."، على حد وصفه. وختم الصدر قائلا: "إلا تنصروه فقد نصره الله إذ أخرجه الذين جحدوا حقه (فردا وحيدا) بلا معين ولا ناصر، فانصروه تنتصروا"، على حد قوله. جدير بالذكر أن دار الإفتاء المصرية كانت قد أوضحت فتواها حول الاحتفال بالمولد النبوي الشريف. وجاء في منشور لها كتبته في حساباتها على مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي: "الاحتفال بمولده (النبي محمد).. هو الاحتفاء به، والاحتفاء به أمر مقطوع بمشروعيته، لأنه أصل الأصول ودعامتها الأولى، وقد درج سلفنا الصالح منذ القرنين الرابع والخامس الهجريين على الاحتفال بمولد الرسول.. بإحياء ليلة المولد بشتى أنواع القربات من إطعام الطعام وتلاوة القرآن والأذكار وإنشاد الأشعار والمدائح". من جهته، حذر خطيب المسجد النبوي في السعودية الشيخ علي الحذيفي، في خطبة الجمعة...

title: Commuters, vendors of S.R.P. Koil Street face hardship due to drain work
content: Commuters and vendors on S.R.P. Koil Street (North) at Thiru Vi Ka Nagar are facing hardship owing to traffic congestion caused by dug-up roads. The roads have been dug up for the extension of the storm water drains. The street, one of the busiest stretches connecting Thiru Vi Ka Nagar to Paper Mills Road, is lined with shops, restaurants, and street vendors. However, the condition of the road has been inconveniencing vendors and commuters. Murugan, a flower-vendor, says, “It is one of the busiest roads in the city. We used to have plenty of customers every day. But, owing to the poor condition of the road and traffic congestion, the number has drastically fallen.” ‘Expedite the work’ The owner of a nearby stationery shop urges the Greater Chennai Corporation to expedite the work. He adds, “The condition of the road is affecting our business and we also have to deal with a foul smell and mosquitoes.” As many shops have lost their direct access to the road because of the work, the civic body has built a temporary bridge-way to connect them to main roads. Many shops have been severely impacted. The shop owners believe that customers would rather visit more accessible locations than taking a difficult route. Shanthi (name changed), a fruit-vendor, says, “This is the season of festivals, and we usually look forward to it for good business. But we have not earned as much as we expected this year.” People prefer less congested and safer roads, she adds. Another problem is the...

title: Saints whipping up on Cowboys 21-6
content: One of the biggest surprises of the young season is happening at AT&T Stadium as the Saints are dominating the Cowboys in a place the Cowboys have a 16-game home winning streak in the regular season. The Saints have 220 yards, and Derek Carr has 192 passing yards and two touchdowns. New Orleans leads 21-6, with scoring plays of 5, 70 and 57 yards. Rashid Shaheed caught a 70-yard touchdown pass from Carr, and Alvin Kamara has the other two touchdowns. He scored on a 5-yard run and caught a 70-yard pass from Carr. The Cowboys have scored on both of their possessions, but only Brandon Aubrey field goals of 52 and 38 yards.

Authorities arrest a relative of the King of Jordan and 3 others for $1M insider-trading plot
creator: Associated Press
content: MIAMI (AP) — Authorities charged four men, including a relative of the King of Jordan, for conspiring to make insider stock trades on a business acquired by one of South Florida’s major publicly held companies, MasTec. Federico Nannini, 26; his father, Mauro Nannini, 63; and two of his friends, Alejandro Thermiotis, 26; and Francisco Tonarely, 25, were arrested Friday and charged in a federal indictment with one count of conspiracy to commit securities fraud and 24 related offenses, Thermiotis is the King of Jordan's relative. Thermiotis’ brother, Jameel, married King Abdulla’s daughter, Princess Iman, last year. The Jordanian Royal Palace did not respond to a request for comment. According to the indictment from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of Florida, the four defendants shared confidential information within a close circle of family and friends, and used it to buy shares at a lower price and then turn a $1 million profit after the information became public. The Securities and Exchange Commission also filed a parallel civil lawsuit against them in Miami federal court. All four had their first court appearances on Friday. Federal authorities said the alleged scheme began in June 2022 when Federico Nannini, a consultant, began advising MasTec on its planned acquisition of Indiana-based Infrastructure and Energy Alternatives. MasTec is an engineering and construction company based in Coral Gables, Florida, that provides infrastructure services for the...

title: Зеленский признал, что не может вооружить 4 из 14 необходимых бригад ВСУ
creator: RT на русском
content: Несмотря на западные пакеты военной помощи, украинские власти не способны вооружить четыре из 14 необходимых бригад ВСУ. Об этом заявил в интервью CNN Владимир Зеленский, когда журналисты спросили у него, почему после принятия крупного пакета помощи от США и поставок из Европы у Киева нет достаточного количества вооружения. Зеленский объяснил проблемы с оснащением армии тем, что западная помощь очень медленно идёт на Украину. «Нам нужно 14 бригад Мы не оснастили даже четырёх», — заявил он. Ранее Зеленский сказал, что Украина не получила от США разрешение на удары вглубь России.

title: Meet Tiktok star Beth Alexandra
creator: Shirin Ghayad
content: BETH Alexandra is taking the social media world by storm with her captivating blend of nostalgia and humour. From her viral TikTok skits to high-profile brand collaborations, discover how this Scottish creator is redefining digital content and making waves across social media. Beth Alexandra is a TikTok , Instagram , and YouTube content creator. Hailing from Ayrshire , Scotland , Beth was born on March 11, 2002, and has quickly made a name for herself in the social media world. Her TikTok account, @bbethalexandra, boasts over 719,000 followers. Early Career and Rise to Fame Beth’s journey on TikTok began in April 2020, with a debut video that humorously addressed her extensive hoodie collection. read more on influencer This initial post set the tone for her content. Her early success was marked by engaging skits and acting performances that resonated with a broad audience. Beth’s breakthrough moment came in early 2021 with her viral skit titled “YOUTUBERS IN 2012 BE LIKE,” which garnered over 1 million views. This viral success was important in boosting her visibility and expanding her follower base. Most read in Showbiz Her content is characterised by its light-hearted and clever takes on daily life and popular trends, reflecting her unique approach to engaging with her audience. title: Jeremy Clarkson claims he, James May and Richard Hammond were 'mostly smashed' during filming of their final episode of The Grand Tour
content: Jeremy Clarkson claims he, James May and Richard Hammond were 'mostly smashed' during filming of their final episode of The Grand Tour By Ryan Prosser Published: 18:30 BST, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 19:03 BST, 15 September 2024 e-mail View comments Jeremy Clarkson has revealed that he and co-stars Richard Hammond and James May were 'mostly smashed' while filming the last episode of The Grand Tour. The veteran TV presenter made the comments at a Q&A after a premiere screening of The Grand Tour: One For The Road, which looks set to be the last ever motoring programme hosted by the trio. The ticket-only screening took place at the Who Wants to be A Millionaire host's new pub The Farmer's Dog in the Cotswolds on Friday night. During a Q&A following the premiere, Clarkson told the crowd how he and his co-stars were 'mostly smashed' during filming but 'hopefully nobody will notice'. He also claimed to have filled a third of a cargo plane with beer after failing to fill it with crew and filming equipment. title: Woman found murdered in Visakhapatnam
content: A 28-year-old woman was found dead under suspicious circumstances in her house at Nakkavanipalem area under MVP police station limits here on Sunday. She is suspected to have been killed by her husband. As per the primary investigation, the police suspect that her husband has committed the crime as he suspected her fidelity. The deceased was identified as Ch. Saloni (28), who was working as a supervisor in a hotel. Saloni was married to Ch. Daniyalu in 2018. Daniyalu is working as a videographer. As per the MVP police, Daniyalu might have used a pillow and smothered Saloni to death. After the crime, the suspect has fled the spot. MVP police registered a case. Further investigation is on. Published - September 15, 2024 11:24 pm IST Copy link Email Facebook Twitter Telegram LinkedIn WhatsApp Reddit

title: Mūšio lauke atsirado visą griaunanti galia. „Tai yra ginklas, sugebėjęs pakeisti situaciją fronte“ (Video)
content: Socialiniuose tinkluose paskelbtas , patvirtinantis, kad ukrainiečiai vis dar naudoja haubicas „Krab“. Tai lenkiškas ginklas. Trumpa filmuota medžiaga buvo paskelbta oficialiame Ukrainos gynybos ministerijos profilyje X tinkle. Joje buvo pabrėžta, kad „krabai“ vis dar reikalingi kaip kariuomenės gynėjai, atremiant įsibrovėlius. 🇵🇱-made Krab 155-mm self-propelled howitzer in action 🔥 📹: „ “ įmonės gaminama įranga yra panaši į kitą NATO šalyse naudojamą artileriją. 155 mm sviediniai yra standartiniai, kurie naudojami Aljanso šalyse. „Krab“, kaip ir vokiška PzH 2000, turi 52 kalibro pabūklą. Mažiausias šūvio atstumas yra 5 km. Didžiausias atstumas, kurį gali pasiekti iš lenkiškos haubicos šaudomi sviediniai, yra maždaug 40 km. Konstrukcija pritaikyta standartiniams ir sviediniams su dujų generatoriais (pastarieji įveikia didesnį atstumą). Abiejuose yra 9 kg TNT. Lenkiškos haubicos – tai mašinos, daug kartų girtos Ukrainos karių ir politikų. Ukrainos ambasadorius Lenkijoje Vasylis Zwarychas 2023 metais pareiškė, kad „Krab“ yra ginklas, . Jais daug kartų kovota fronto linijoje, įskaitant Bachmutą ir Avdijivką. Gamintojas deklaruoja, kad „Krab“ asfaltuotais keliais gali įsibėgėti iki 60 km/val., tačiau Ukrainos kariai tvirtina, kad iš tiesų pasiekia dar didesnį – iki 70 km/val. Šios nuvažiuojamas atstumas su vienu degalų papildymu yra maždaug 400 km.

title: „Jie rengė ukrainiečių kankinimus.“ Rusijos gvardijai išmušė atpildo valanda (Foto)
content: Tai Ukrainos Gynybos ministerijos Vyriausiosios žvalgybos valdybos spaudos tarnyba. Rugsėjo 11 d. Jekaterinburge nugriaudėjo sprogimas prie karinio dalinio, kuriame yra įsikūrę Rusijos gvardijos kariai. Sabotažui buvo panaudotas 6 kg svorio sprogmuo, kuris buvo pastatytas šalia patikros punkto. Ukrainos Gynybos ministerijos Vyriausioji žvalgybos valdyba atliko operaciją bendradarbiaudama su „pogrindžio, veikiančio prieš Putino režimą valstybės agresorės teritorijoje, atstovais“. Rusijos žiniasklaida pranešė, kad sprogimas Jekaterinburge įvyko apie 6 valandą ryto. Po kelių minučių į įvykio vietą atvyko policija ir greitoji medicinos pagalba. Netoli sprogimo vietos yra karinis dalinys Nr. 3728, kuriame įsikūręs 214-asis atskirasis Rusijos gvardijos ryšių batalionas.

title: Reikia greito sprendimo. „Informacija skubiai perduota Aljanso būstinei“
content: Apie tai pranešė – sakė V. Kasčiūnas. Pasak ministro, aptikus NATO oro erdvę pažeidžiančio bepiločio orlaivio grėsmę, informacija apie tai turėtų būti skubiai perduota Aljanso būstinei. Tuomet NATO būstinė turi įvertinti situaciją ir nustatyti, ar yra pakankamai įrodymų, kad tai priešo bepilotis orlaivis, o ne koks nors kitas dingęs lėktuvas. Ir tada, pasak KAM vadovo, i dėl oro policijos orlaivių dislokavimo. , – sakė Lietuvos pareigūnas. Šeštadienį, rugsėjo 7 d., Rytų Latvijoje nukrito Rusijos karinis bepilotis orlaivis. Dronas į Latvijos oro erdvę skrido iš Baltarusijos teritorijos. NATO pareiškė neturinti informacijos, kad Rusijos bepiločio orlaivio nukritimas Latvijos teritorijoje buvo tyčinis.

title: Tai viena didžiausių Europos saugyklų. „Per 3000 šarvuočių.“ Į Ukrainą netrukus gali pajudėti gigantiškos pajėgos
content: Italija, kad ir kaip būtų keista tai sakyti, pagal vieną karinės doktrinos bruožą yra panaši į Rusiją. Kai karinė technika pasensta ir yra pakeičiama nauja, tos senos mašinos netampa metalo laužu. Jos nugula karinės technikos saugykloje, nes ką gali žinoti. Ukraina įrodė, kad tos senos mašinos yra tinkamos karui ir gali būti gyvybiškai svarbios išgyvenimui. Kitos Europos šalys seną techniką išardo ir išlydo, o Italija ją sandėliuoja. Ten – „Leopard 1“ tankai, savaeigės haubicos M109L, šarvuoti pėstininkų transporteriai M113 ir daug kitų mašinų, kurias Ukraina jau naudoja. Ukraina pažįsta šias mašinas ir net tos, kurios neveikia, galėtų naudoti kaip atsarginių dalių donorus. Ta technika galbūt nėra tinkama naudojimui iš karto, bet reikia nepamiršti, kad daug Ukrainos technikos nėra tinkama naudojimui. Ji genda, yra apgadinama mūšiuose. Viskas yra remontuojama ir prižiūrima. Būtų gerai į šią sistemą įtraukti daugiau mašinų, kurių turi Italija. Ir Italija jų nenaudoja. „Leopard 1A5“ tankai tikriausiai yra arti to norimos technikos sąrašo viršaus. Ukraina turi kelias dešimtis šių tankų. Tai – praeitos kartos mašinos su 105 mm graižtviniais pabūklais (dabartinis NATO standartas yra 120 mm). Tačiau „Leopard 1A5“ yra labai mobilūs, taiklūs, patikimi ir gali būti naudojami kaip savaeigė artilerija. – jie nėra daug senesni už „Leopard 1A5“. Kalbant apie artileriją, Ukrainą tikrai domina ir savaeigės...

title: „Kyjivas aiškiai pasakė“ (Video)
content: Zelenskis viešai leido suprasti, kad Ukraina nėra suinteresuota vadinamaisiais Maskvos sąjungininkų „taikos planais“, kuriuos Kinija ir Brazilija bando propaguoti tarptautinėje arenoje. Prezidentas Volodymyras Zelenskis aštriai sukritikavo vadinamąjį Kinijos ir Brazilijos „taikos planą“ užbaigti karą ir pavadino jį „destruktyviu“. Tiesą sakant, tai prorusiška idėja įteisinti Ukrainos teritorijos okupaciją. Be to, anot Ukrainos prezidento, ir nesitarė su Ukraina. Tai Ukrainos prezidentas pareiškė interviu Brazilijos žurnalistams iš leidinio . Zelenskio teigimu, vadinamasis „taikos planas“ yra ne kas kita, kaip politinis pareiškimas ir jame neatsižvelgiama į realią situaciją. , kad jo nedomina tokie Maskvos sąjungininkų dokumentai. Šalies vadovas papasakojo apie pokalbį su Brazilijos prezidentu da Silva, kuriam uždavė klausimą, kodėl Brazilija nusprendė remti Rusiją kare, net nesistengdama būti objektyvi ir nepriklausoma šiuo klausimu. Kartu Zelenskis pabrėžė, kad po gero pokalbio su Brazilijos prezidentu jam susidarė įspūdis, kad jis suprato tikrąją konflikto esmę ir Ukrainos pozicijos filosofiją.

title: [ŽT] „Su tankistų diena!“ Rusija sveikina ukrainiečius
content: Ukrainos tankistų dieną įsilaužėliai atliko sėkmingą operaciją ir įsibrovė į 11 Rusijos įmonių serverius. Tai pranešė . Įmonės, į kurių interneto svetaines buvo įsilaužta, aptarnauja Rusijos Federacijos karinį-pramoninį kompleksą. Tarp jų yra „RosNefteGazInstrument“, „Smartlift“, „CIAS – skaitmeninė informacijos ir analizės sistema“, „VoronežMetal“.

title: Flood risks likely to reduce as mitigation works near completion
content: The long-pending issue of inadequate drain networks and culverts across arterial roads and rail tracks is likely to be resolved this year in several areas of the city as the Greater Chennai Corporation and other agencies are set to complete the construction soon. Residents have been complaining for the past 10 years about flooding near the Police Commissioner Office on E.V.K. Sampath Salai at Vepery. “The culvert across the rail tracks near the Egmore railway station to drain water in the Cooum will be completed next week. This will prevent waterlogging on E.V.K. Sampath Salai and in the other areas of Vepery,” says an official of the Corporation. Push-through culvert ready Similarly, the construction of a push-through culvert at Ganeshapuram, which was delayed for several years, is expected to be completed soon. The work on the drain across the arterial Poonamallee High Road, near Barnaby Road, has been completed. Another drain has been constructed across Anna Salai to prevent flooding on General Patters Road. In 2021, the Corporation shared a list of 25 locations with the Railways, where culverts must be built to prevent flooding of major residential areas near the rail lines. The work was delayed for more than three years in several areas. It is expected to be completed ahead of the onset of the northeast monsoon this year. Similarly, 27 locations in various parts of the city and the suburbs have been identified for construction of culverts by the Highways Department and...

title: [ŽT] „Tiesiai iš filmo „Terminatorius.“ Ukrainoje pasirodė dar neregėtos galios ginkluotė (Video)
content: Ukraina naudoja labai daug dronų. Jie yra pigūs, todėl labai efektyviai pakeičia prieštankinius ginklus ir, kartais, net artilerijos sviedinius. Kai Ukrainos gynėjai išgyveno sunkų sviedinių badą, būtent dronai padėjo išlaikyti gynybos linijas. Tačiau yra viena bėda. Nors tie dronai yra gana pigūs, jei yra vienkartiniai. Iki šiol dauguma tų dronų yra surinkti rankomis, todėl tai nėra neišsenkantis resursas. Bet Ukrainos gynėjai jau rado būdų kaip sukurti labai pavojingą daugkartinį droną. Štai vieno įdomaus drono bandymai: Footage of Ukrainian forces from the Wild Hornets drone group testing an FPV drone armed with a RPG-22 anti-tank rocket launcher. (Yes that is the Terminator 2 theme playing) Beje, bandymo metu fone girdimas filmo „Terminatorius 2“ garso takelis.

title: মূল্যস্ফীতি নিয়ন্ত্রণে দফায় দফায় বাড়বে সুদের হার
creator: Md. Suliman
content: দেশের অর্থনীতিতে স্থিতিশিলতা রক্ষায় সামগ্রিক পরিস্থিতি বিবেচনায় কেন্দ্রীয় ব্যাংকের গৃহিত, বিভিন্ন পদক্ষেপের কথা যুক্তরাষ্ট্রের প্রতিনিধি দলকে জানিয়েছেন গভর্নর ড. আহসান এইচ মনসুর। মূল্যস্ফীতি নিয়ন্ত্রণে সুদের হার দফায় দফায় বৃদ্ধির মাধ্যমে বাজার ভিত্তিক করা হবে বলেও জানানো হয়েছে। বাংলাদেশ ব্যাংকের একাধিক কর্মকর্তা নাম না প্রকাশের শর্তে এ তথ্য নিশ্চিত করেছেন। জানা গেছে, মূল্যস্ফীতি নিয়ন্ত্রণে সংকোচনমূলক মুদ্রানীতি প্রণয়ন, টাকার সরবরাহ হ্রাস, সুদের হার দফায় দফায় বৃদ্ধির মাধ্যমে বাজার ভিত্তিক করা এবং ডলারের বিপরীতে টাকার অবমূল্যয়ন এবং ক্রলিং পদ্ধতিতে ডলারের দর নির্ধারণের বিষয়গুলো জানানো হয়েছে। রোববার (১৫ সেপ্টেম্বর) যুক্তরাষ্ট্রের দক্ষিণ ও মধ্য এশিয়াবিষয়ক সহকারী পররাষ্ট্রমন্ত্রী ডোনাল্ড লু, যুক্তরাষ্ট্রের রাজস্ব দপ্তরের ডেপুটি আন্ডার সেক্রেটারি ব্রেন্ট নেইম্যানের নেতৃত্বে উচ্চপর্যায়ের প্রতিনিধিদলের সঙ্গে বাংলাদেশ ব্যাংকে অনুষ্ঠিত পৃথক বৈঠকে গভর্নর ড আহসান এইচ মনসুর এসব বিষয়ে জানিয়েছেন। বৈঠকের একটি সূত্র জানায়, রিজার্ভ সংরক্ষণে বিপিএম-৬ পদ্ধতি অনুসরন, আন্তর্জাতিক মুদ্রা তহবিলকে (আইএমএফ) ব্যয়যোগে রিজার্ভের (এনআইআর) তথ্য প্রদানের বিষয়ে অবহিত করা হয়েছে। এছাড়া ব্যাংক খাতের সংস্কার, সময়সিমা বেধে দিয়ে খেলাপি আদায়ের মাধ্যমে কারল্য ঘাটতি দুরীকরণ, পরিদর্শনের মাধ্যমে অনিয়ম উদ্ঘাটন, এবং আর্থিক খাতের সুশাসন নিশ্চিত করণের লক্ষ্যে প্রণীত রূপরেখার বিষয়ে তুলে ধরেন গভর্নর। ঢাকায় সফররত বিশ্ব ব্যাংক এবং এশীয়ান ডেভেলপমেন্ট ব্যাংকের (এডিবি) উচ্চ প্রতিনিধি দল ২ দশমিক ২০ বিলিযন ডলারের ঋণ প্রস্তাব করেছে বাংলাদেশকে। এরমধ্যে রয়েছে বিশ্ব ব্যাংকের পলিসি ভিত্তিক ঋণ...

title: উৎপাদনে ফিরল বড়পুকুরিয়া তাপবিদ্যুৎ কেন্দ্রের তৃতীয় ইউনিট
content: ছয়দিন বন্ধ থাকার পর আবারো চালু হলো দিনাজপুরের বড়পুকুরিয়া কয়লাভিত্তিক তাপবিদ্যুৎ কেন্দ্রের ২৭৫ মেগাওয়াট ক্ষমতাসম্পন্ন তৃতীয় ইউনিট। এর মাধ্যমে দেশের উত্তরাঞ্চলে লোডশেডিংয়ের মাত্রা কমে আসবে বলে ধারণা করা হচ্ছে। নতুন ওয়েল পাম্প স্থাপন করে রবিবার দুপুর ১টা ৫৯মিনিট থেকে উৎপাদন শুরু হয়েছে। এ ইউনিটটি ২৭৫ মেগাওয়াট ক্ষমতা সম্পন্ন হলেও দৈনিক ২০০ - ২২০ মেগাওয়াট বিদুৎ উৎপাদিত হচ্ছে। যা জাতীয় গ্রিডে যোগ হচ্ছে। এটি চালু রাখতে দৈনিক ২২০০ - ২৩০০ মেট্রিকটন কয়লা প্রয়োজন হবে। এর আগে গত ৬ সেপ্টেম্বর থেকে ৩য় ইউনিটটি চালু হলেও দুই দিন পর ৯ সেপ্টেম্বর সন্ধ্যায় ওয়েল পাম্প নষ্ট হওয়ার কারণে আবারও উৎপাদন বন্ধ হয়ে যায়। এদিকে গত ১২ সেপ্টেম্বর রাত থেকে ১ নম্বর ইউনিট থেকে বিদ্যুৎ উৎপাদন শুরু করা হয়েছে। এ ইউনিটটি ১২৫ মেগাওয়াট ক্ষমতা সম্পন্ন হলেও , সেটি থেকে প্রতিদিন ৬০ - ৬৫ মেগাওয়াট বিদ্যুৎ উৎপাদন হচ্ছে। যা জাতীয় গ্রিডে যোগ করা হচ্ছে। এটি চালু রাখতে ৮০০ - ৯০০ মেট্রিকটন কয়লা প্রয়োজন হচ্ছে। এতে করে বর্তমানে গড়ে দুটি ইউনিট থেকে ২৮৫ মেগাওয়াট বিদুৎ এই কেন্দ্রটি থেকে জাতীয় গ্রিডে যোগ হচ্ছে। যা উত্তরের লোডশেডিং অনেকাংশে কমে আসবে বলে আশা প্রকাশ করছেন কর্তৃপক্ষ। সংশ্লিষ্ট সূত্রে জানা গেছে , বড়পুকুরিয়া কয়লা ভিত্তিক তাপ বিদ্যুৎ কেন্দ্রর ৫২৫ মেগাওয়াট ক্ষমতা সম্পন্ন বিদুৎ কেন্দ্রটি উৎপাদন কার্যক্রম পরিচালনা করেন চীনা ঠিকাদারি প্রতিষ্ঠান হারবিন ইন্টারন্যাশনাল। ২০২০ সাল থেকে ২৫ সাল পর্যন্ত পাঁচ বছরের চুক্তি মোতাবেক আগামী বছর তাদের মেয়াদ শেষ হবে। বড়পুকুরিয়া কয়লা খনির সরবরাহকৃত কয়লার ওপর নির্ভর করে এই তাপবিদ্যুৎ কেন্দ্রটি। বড়পুকুরিয়া ৫২৫ মেগাওয়াট ক্ষমতা সম্পন্ন বিদুৎ...

title: আসাদুজ্জামান নূর গ্রেপ্তার
content: মিরপুর মডেল থানার দায়ের হওয়া একটি মামলায় সংস্কৃতি বিষয়ক মন্ত্রণালয়ের সাবেক মন্ত্রী ও জনপ্রিয় অভিনেতা আসাদুজ্জামান নূরকে গ্রেপ্তার করেছে পুলিশ। রবিবার রাত সাড়ে ১১ টায় রাজধানীর বেইলি রোডের নওরতন কলোনী থেকে তাকে গ্রেপ্তার করা হয়। বিষয়টি ঢাকা টাইমসকে নিশ্চিত করেন ডিএমপির অতিরিক্ত উপ পুলিশ কমিশনার মো. ওবায়দুর রহমান। ডিএমপি জানায়, আসাদুজ্জামান নূর মিরপুর থানার একটি মামলার এজাহার নামীয় আসামি। দ্বাদশ জাতীয় সংসদ নির্বাচনে আওয়ামী লীগের মনোনয়নে নীলফামারী-২ সদর আসনে পঞ্চমবারের মতো সংসদ সদস্য নির্বাচিত হন বাংলা নাট্য জগতের তুমুল জনপ্রিয় একজন অভিনেতা ‘বাকের ভাই’ খ্যাত আসাদুজ্জামান নূর। তিনি অভিনয় করেছেন চলচ্চিত্রেও। অভিনয়ের পাশাপাশি আসাদুজ্জামান নূর ২০০১ সাল থেকে নীলফামারি-২ আসনের সংসদ সদস্য। আওয়াম লীগ সরকারের তৃতীয় মন্ত্রিসভায় তিনি সংস্কৃতি মন্ত্রী হিসেবে দায়িত্ব পালন করেছেন। (ঢাকাটাইমস/১৫সেপ্টেম্বর/এলএম/এমআর)

title: সুনামগঞ্জে সিগারেট না দেওয়ায় যুবককে হত্যা
content: সিগারেট না দেওয়ায় কথা কাটাকাটির এক পর্যায়ে বাঁশের লাঠি দিয়ে আঘাত করে মোহাম্মদ কুরবার আলী ( ২৭ ) নামে এক যুবককে হত্যা করা হয়েছে। রবিবার দুপুরে সুনামগঞ্জ সদর উপজেলার জাহাঙ্গীরনগর ইউনিয়নের কাইয়ারগাঁও গ্রামে চলতি নদীর তীরে এই ঘটনা ঘটে। নিহত কুরবার আলী সদর উপজেলার কাইয়ারগাঁও গ্রামের ধন মিয়ার ছেলে। তিনি পেশায় একজন নৌ - শ্রমিক। এ ঘটনায় ঘাতক আবেদিনকে ( ২২ ) গ্রেপ্তার করা হয়েছে। সে একই এলাকার পণ্ডিত মিয়ার ছেলে। নিহতের পরিবার ও স্থানীয়রা জানান , নিহত মোহাম্মদ কুরবার আলী খাওয়ার নদীর পাড়ে বসে ছিলেন। এসময় আবেদিন তার কাছে সিগারেট চায়। সিগারেট না দিলে তাদের মধ্যে কথা কাটাকাটি হয়। এক পর্যায়ে আবেদিন বাঁশ দিয়ে কুরবারকে আঘাত করলে সে ঘটনাস্থলেই মারা যায়। ঘটনার সত্যতা নিশ্চিত করেছেন সুনামগঞ্জ সদর থানার অফিসার ইনচার্জ ( ওসি ) মোহাম্মদ আব্দুল আহাদ। ঘাতককে আটক করা হয়েছে বলেও জানান তিনি। ( ঢাকাটাইমস / ১৫সেপ্টেম্বর / পিএস )

title: ড. ইউনূস ও খালেদা জিয়াকে হত্যার হুমকি: শেখ হাসিনার নামে মামলা
content: পদ্মা সেতু উদ্বোধনের আগে তৎকালীন প্রধানমন্ত্রী শেখ হাসিনা কর্তৃক নোবেল বিজয়ী অর্থনীতিবিদ ড. মুহাম্মদ ইউনূস এবং বিএনপি চেয়ারপারসন বেগম খালেদা জিয়াকে হত্যার হুমকি দেওয়ার অভিযোগে চট্টগ্রামে মামলা হয়েছে। রবিবার ( ১৫ সেপ্টেম্বর ) চট্টগ্রামের প্রথম মেট্রোপলিটন ম্যাজিস্ট্রেট জুয়েল দেবের আদালতে মামলাটি করেছেন চট্টগ্রাম নগর ছাত্রদলের সাবেক সহ - সভাপতি সৌরভ প্রিয় পাল। মামলায় অভিযোগ করা হয়, পদ্মা সেতু উদ্বোধনের আগে তৎকালীন প্রধানমন্ত্রী শেখ হাসিনা এক বক্তব্যে বিএনপি চেয়ারপারসন বেগম খালেদা জিয়াকে পদ্মাসেতু থেকে ‘ টুঁস করে ’ ফেলে দেওয়ার হুমকি দেন। এছাড়া অন্তর্বর্তী সরকারের প্রধান উপদেষ্টা নোবেল বিজয়ী অর্থনীতিবিদ ড . মুহম্মদ ইউনূসকে ‘ চুবানি দিয়ে পদ্মা সেতুতে তোলা হবে বলেও হত্যার হুমকির দেওয়া হয়। বাদীর আইনজীবী অ্যাডভোকেট রেজাউল ইসলাম জানিয়েছেন , আদালত মামলা আমলে নিয়ে পুলিশ ব্যুরো অব ইনভেস্টিগেশনকে ( পিবিআই ) তদন্তের নির্দেশ দিয়েছেন। একজন অতিরিক্ত পুলিশ সুপার অথবা সহকারী পুলিশ সুপার পদমর্যাদার কর্মকর্তার মাধ্যমে তদন্ত করে ৩০ দিনের মধ্যে প্রতিবেদন দাখিল করতে বলেছেন আদালত। মামলার বাদী সৌরভ প্রিয় পাল বলেন , দেশনেত্রী বেগম খালেদা জিয়াকে নিয়ে দেওয়া বক্তব্যের মাধ্যমে মূলত শেখ হাসিনা তাকে ( খালেদা জিয়া ) প্রকাশ্যে হত্যার হুমকি দিয়েছিলেন এবং হত্যার জন্য নিজ দলের সন্ত্রাসীদের প্ররোচনা যুগিয়েছেন। গেল ৫ আগস্ট ছাত্র - জনতার গণঅভ্যুত্থানে শেখ হাসিনা পালিয়ে যাবার পর বেগম জিয়াকে হত্যার হুমকি ও প্ররোচনার বিচার চেয়ে আদালতের দ্বারস্থ হয়েছি। পদ্মা সেতু উদ্বোধনের আগে ২০২২ সালের ১৮ মে তৎকালীন প্রধানমন্ত্রী শেখ হাসিনা এক বক্তব্যে বিএনপি চেয়ারপারসন বেগম খালেদা...

title: خبير إيراني يعلق على دلالات استهداف الحوثيين لإسرائيل بصاروخ فرط صوتي
content: وقال مدبر في تصريح لوكالة "ريا نوفوستي": "الطريقة الوحيدة هي أن تقوم الولايات المتحدة وبريطانيا، بإقناع (إسرائيل) بالانسحاب من غزة، ومنع أي اعتداء على الأراضي اللبنانية وعلى وجه الخصوص جنوب لبنان وتوجيه إسرائيل نحو هدنة كاملة، بدلا من خلق التوترات والأزمات في منطقة الشرق الأوسط.. هذه الضربة الحوثية رسالة لا لبس فيها إلى إسرائيل والولايات المتحدة وفرنسا وبريطانيا حول ذلك". وبحسب الخبير، فإن "الضربة التي وجهتها حركة أنصار الله اليوم إلى إسرائيل تعني أن الحركة حققت تقدما تكنولوجيا عالي المخاطر في المجال العسكري"، مشيرا إلى أن "الصاروخ الذي أنتجته القوات الحوثية تمكن من قطع مسافة 2000 كيلومتر إلى إسرائيل دون أن يتم اكتشافه، متجاوزا السفن الأمريكية والبريطانية والفرنسية". ولفت الخبير والمحلل السياسي إلى أن "الصاروخ المستخدم كان صاروخا اختباريا ولم يستخدم في عمليات كبرى"، مشيرا إلى أن "أنصار الله قادرون على الحصول على العديد من الصواريخ الأخرى بالاعتماد على أنفسهم". وفي وقت سابق من اليوم الأحد، أعلن الناطق العسكري باسم حركة "أنصار الله" اليمنية العميد يحيى سريع تنفيذ عملية عسكرية نوعية طالت هدفا عسكريا في يافا بإسرائيل بصاروخ فرط صوتي. وأضاف: "نجح الصاروخ في الوصول إلى هدفه وأخفقت دفاعات العدو في اعتراضه والتصدي له وقطع مسافة 2040 كيلومترا في غضون 11 دقيقة ونصف الدقيقة". في حين قال الجيش الإسرائيلي إن التحقيق الأولي كشف أن الصاروخ الذي أطلقه الحوثيون صباح اليوم على إسرائيل تحطم في الجو. و أصيب 9 إسرائيليين بجروح خلال هربهم فور سماع صافرات الإنذار بحدوث قصف صاروخي على تل أبيب وسط إسرائيل. المصدر: نوفوستي+ RT

title: Popular ex-Patriots star inducted into alma mater’s ring of honor
content: A former Patriots All-Pro wide receiver earned immortality at his alma mater on Saturday. Wes Welker , who had the five best seasons of his NFL career with the Patriots, was inducted into the Texas Tech Ring of Honor on Saturday. Welker was a standout in the Red Raiders’ Air Raid offense in Lubbock and caught 259 passes for 3,069 yards and 21 touchdowns from 2000-03. He’s the FBS career leader in punt return yardage with 1,761 to go with eight touchdowns. In six seasons with the Patriots, Welker led the NFL in receptions three times (2007, 2009, 2011) and had at least 110 catch catches in five of those seasons. He was named to the Pro Bowl five times and was an All-Pro twice. He had 672 catches for 7,459 yards and 37 touchdowns for New England before signing a free-agent contract with Denver. Welker had the unique distinction of playing with Tom Brady, Drew Brees (with the Chargers) and Peyton Manning (with the Broncos), the NFL’s top three quarterbacks in career passing yards. Welker is currently a wide receivers coach with the Miami Dolphins. Because the Dolphins played on Thursday, he was available to attend the ceremony in Texas. More Patriots Content

title: Гендиректор Ford: автопроизводители из КНР представляют угрозу для США
creator: RT на русском
content: Гендиректор американской компании Ford Джим Фарли заявил, что производители электромобилей из Китая представляют «экзистенциальную угрозу» для автомобильной промышленности США. Об этом пишет The Wall Street Journal. Он отметил, что автопроизводители из Китая «движутся со скоростью света», используют искусственный интеллект и другие технологии, отличающийся от тех, что используются в США. Кроме того, за счёт более низких цен, высокотехнологичных возможностей и быстрых обновлений китайские электромобилей становятся всё более популярными в Европе, на Ближнем Востоке и Азии. Ранее газета The Telegraph сообщала, что китайские электромобили приобретают всё большую популярность в мире и имеют шансы вытеснить крупные западные бренды с рынка.

title: Jets star carted off field with injury
content: NASHVILLE, Tenn. – Jets linebacker C.J. Mosley was carted off of the field early in the second quarter of Sunday’s game against the Titans in Tennessee with what the team is calling a foot injury. He is questionable to return. Mosley, 32, was hurt on the first play of the Titans third drive of the game — a play in which the Jets gave up a 15-yard run to Tony Pollard and were given a 15-yard horse-collar penalty from Chuck Clark. BUY JETS TICKETS: STUBHUB , VIVID SEATS , TICKETMASTER Mosley did not make contact with anyone but came up limping while running toward Pollard at the end of the play. Before the next snap, he took a knee to take himself out of the game. Mosley then walked slowly to the sideline and spent several minutes in the medical tent before he gingerly walked to a cart and rode it back to the locker room. He later returned to the sideline. title: Premier League 2024-25: Arteta praises ‘ugly’ Arsenal in crucial North London derby win against Tottenham
content: Arsenal’s growing capacity to win without being at its best, as it did in a hard-fought derby at Tottenham Hotspur on Sunday, could prove the difference as it attempts to finally overhaul Premier League champion Manchester City. Manager Mikel Arteta said his side was rewarded for doing “ugly things” to triumph thanks to yet another goal conceded from a corner by its bitter local rival. Gabriel Magalhaes’ second-half header was enough to secure a crucial 1-0 win over Spurs, marking its third straight north London derby victory away from home. And, having nearly blown a 3-0 lead before clinging on for a 3-2 win in their last meeting in April, Arteta said he saw signs of progress in how the Gunners managed the closing stages. The Arsenal manager said he was far calmer on Sunday “because after 0-3 to 2-3 (in the last game) you say, this cannot happen”. ALSO READ: Premier League - Schar, Barnes inspires Newcastle United to 2-1 comeback win against Wolves He told reporters: “They threw everything at it, they tried today, but I think we looked more composed, better organised and gave very, very little away.” Having lost captain Martin Odegaard to injury and Declan Rice through suspension, with new signing Mikel Merino yet to make his debut due to a fractured shoulder, Arsenal’s makeshift midfield was largely assured against a wasteful Spurs side. Arteta hailed the depth of the team and its ability to grind out results, a quality that was arguably lacking at times in their recent...

title: ‘Yechury emboldened student politics at JNU’
content: About five decades ago, long before he emerged as the stalwart of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), Sitaram Yechury was known for his flamboyance at Jawaharlal Nehru University, Delhi. “He was handsome, charming, flamboyant and most girls fell for him. He was very different – non-partisan and an inclusive leader. He was crucial in laying the foundation for democratising student politics and furthering the business of open debate in JNU. That is how I will remember Sita,” said Shanta Sinha, former chairperson of National Commission for Protection of Child Rights, a JNU alumnus. Remembering Mr. Yechury, Sita for many, here on Sunday were alumni from JNU who either hailed or have worked in the Telugu States. For economist and former member of the Competition Commission of India, Geeta Gouri, the country lost Mr. Yechury at a crucial time, when the need of the hour is a coalition government, rather than “a static one with a dictatorial viewpoint on economics and political science”. “Sita was warm and generous. He taught me about Left movements and how Delhi was, when I joined in ‘73,” she remembered. Former Vice-Chancellor of the University of Allahabad Rajan Harshe remembered Mr. Yechury as a polyglot, “who would speak better Sanskrit than any BJP MP”. Mr. Harshe, who was on the same hostel floor as Mr. Yechury’s for two years at JNU, said that his sustaining the idea of India, “that India belongs to everyone and ‘We, the people of India’” will be a proud remembrance. title: La Niña traerá lluvias en los últimos tres meses del año
creator: Jorge Luis Alguinzones
content: Según Luis Vargas, reconocido meteorólogo, se mantiene la predicción de que el fenómeno de La Niña se manifieste durante este trimestre, el cual históricamente ha resultado en lluvias por encima de la media. El experto ha observado que en las últimas dos semanas las anomalías de temperatura en la superficie del Océano Pacífico ecuatorial, en la Región El Niño 3.4, han estado oscilando en niveles propios de La Niña. Esto se acompaña de vientos Alisios notablemente más intensos de lo habitual, lo que favorece la emergencia de aguas más frías en las capas subsuperficiales. De mantenerse esta tendencia y si se evidencia una interacción efectiva entre el océano y la atmósfera, es probable que La Niña sea oficialmente declarada entre los meses de octubre y noviembre. De acuerdo con el Centro de Predicción Climática de NOAA, existía una probabilidad del 60% de que La Niña se desarrollara en el trimestre junio-julio-agosto de 2024. Vargas subrayó que, en el caso de Venezuela, La Niña ha tendido a generar lluvias por encima de lo habitual, dependiendo de las características climáticas de cada región. Puedes leer: Inameh pronostica un domingo con cielos despejados Hasta ahora, los modelos estacionales han sido coherentes al señalar posibles precipitaciones en el país dentro de un rango normal a ligeramente superior entre noviembre y febrero, según la última información obtenida de dichos modelos. title: Irans junge Generation kämpft weiter für Frauen, Leben, Freiheit
Jordan's king appoints Harvard-educated aide to serve as prime minister
creator: The Canadian Press
content: AMMAN, Jordan (AP) — Jordan’s King Abdullah II on Sunday tapped a longtime aide to serve as the kingdom’s new prime minister. The Royal Court said the king has asked Jafar Hassan, a former planning minister and the current head of Abdullah’s office, to form a new government. Hassan has a Ph.D. in political science from the University of Geneva and a master’s degree in public administration from Harvard University. He will replace the outgoing prime minister, Bisher Al-Khasawneh, whose Cabinet resigned on Sunday in the wake of a parliamentary election. Al-Khasawneh has served since October 2020. Hassan must now cobble together a new Cabinet to confront a series of challenges, including a struggling economy and widespread public anger over . Although Jordan has a peace agreement with Israel, it's home to a large Palestinian population. In last week's parliamentary election, an Islamic party emerged as the largest faction, in part because of the anger over the war in Gaza. In Jordan, a pro-Western monarchy, all power rests with the king. The prime minister and his Cabinet work with the king in setting and implementing policies. The Associated Press

title: Celtic overcome Thistle as Rangers fire six past Spartans
content: Rangers bounced back from a shock early goal by Spartans to power to a 6-1 win and cement their place at the top of the SWPL1. Erin Rennie capitalised on a mix-up at the back by the hosts to slot home past Rangers keeper Victoria Esson. But an immediate reply from summer signing Camile Lafaix allowed Rangers to restore parity, and a quickfire second from the American opened the floodgates. Celtic strolled to a comfortable 3-0 win over city rivals Partick Thistle courtesy of a Shannon McGregor double. Murphy Agnew's powerful strike was bookended by goals in each half from McGregor, who sit fourth in the table with a game in hand over Hearts and Glasgow City. Second-placed Hearts had to wait until the second half to open the scoring against struggling Aberdeen, as Joely Andrews and Georgia Timms found a breakthrough before Sade Adamolekun wrapped up the win. Emily Whelan was the difference maker for City, as they struggled to break down a resolute Motherwell defence to claim victory at K Park. Hibernian bounced back from their derby day beating by Hearts to put six past top flight newcomers Queen's Park. Eilidh Adams claimed a hattrick as Abbie Ferguson, Kathleen McGovern - who had already seen a goal chalked off for offside - and the returning Poppy Lawson also found the net. Chloe Muir grabbed a consolation strike for the visitors. And Dundee United remain bottom and winless in the SWPL after local rivals Montrose snatched a late winner at Links Park. title: حکومت کو بتادیا جلدی کیا ہے بل کو مؤخر کردیں، مولانا عبدالغفور حیدری
creator: aamir
content: اسلام آباد(اُمت نیوز) جمعیت علمائے اسلام کے سیکریٹری جنرل مولانا عبدالغفور حیدری نے حکومتی اتحادیوں کی مجوزہ ترامیم مؤخر ہونے کا عندیہ دیتے ہوئے کہا ہے کہ حکومتی شخصیات کو بتایا ہے ابھی تک ہمارے پاس بل کا مسودہ نہیں ہے، جس کو پڑھے بغیر کیسے ووٹ دیں لہٰذا اس سے مؤخر کردیں۔ جمعیت علمائے اسلام کے رہنما مولانا عبدالغفور حیدری نے میڈیا سے گفتگو میں کہا کہ حکومتی شخصیات ہمارے پاس آئیں، ان سے ہم نے کھل کر کہا کہ آپ کو جلدی ہے لیکن ہمیں ڈرافٹ یا ترمیمی بل نہیں ملا، جب ہم بل کو دیکھیں گے نہیں اور پڑھیں گے نہیں تو کیسے ووٹ دے سکتےہیں۔ ان کا کہنا تھا کہ ہم نے کہا کہ اسی لیے اس بل کو مؤخر کریں تاکہ ہپم اس بل کو پڑھیں اور اپوزیشن کی دیگر جماعتیں بھی اس کو پڑھیں۔ مولانا عبدالغفور حیدری نے کہا کہ اسی دوران پاکستان تحریک انصاف (پی ٹی آئی) کے دوست تشریف لائے اور ان سے بھی یہی بات کی کہ ہم نے حکومت کو کہا ہے جلدی نہ کریں بلکہ ہمیں پڑھنے سوچنے کا موقع دیں تاکہ ہم شرح صدر کے ساتھ کوئی فیصلہ کرسکیں۔ انہوں نے کہا کہ چونکہ اجلاس بلایا گیا تھا اور اجلاس میں سب پہنچ گئے ہیں اور ہمار انتظار ہے تو ہم نے کہا کہ ہم اجلاس میں شریک ہوں گے اور وہاں اپنا مؤقف بالکل کھل کر سامنے رکھیں گے کہ اتنی جلدی کی کیا ضرورت تھی کہ آپ لوگ اس طرح کر رہے ہیں۔ رہنما جمعیت علمائے اسلام نے کہا کہ لہٰذا آپ جلدی کر رہے ہوں تو شاید ہم اس پوزیشن میں نہ ہوں۔

title: Mikel Arteta provides Bukayo Saka injury update following Tottenham scare
content: The 23-year-old was once again instrumental to the Gunners' victory over Ange Postecoglou 's side, as it was his corner that Gabriel Magalhaes nodded home in the second half. Saka has now provided an assist in each of his four Premier League appearances this season, but the England international went down towards the end of the match and could not complete the full 90. Saka was seen shaking his head as he trudged off the pitch to be replaced by 17-year-old Ethan Nwaneri , who contributed to the late defensive effort as Arsenal saw out an incredibly hard-fought win. Arteta was unsurprisingly asked about Saka's condition in his post-match press conference, but he admitted that he is none the wiser about his issue, only that it was severe enough to force him off the field. © Imago "I don't know. I made two changes with the front players and suddenly he's down. I looked at the bench and the options that we had and we had to adapt. I don't know exactly what it is but he could not continue," football.london quotes Arteta as saying. Arsenal were already without a surfeit of experienced first-teamers for Sunday's derby, with all of Martin Odegaard , Oleksandr Zinchenko , Riccardo Calafiori , Kieran Tierney , Takehiro Tomiyasu and Mikel Merino missing alongside the banned Declan Rice . Nwaneri was one of five teenagers on the Arsenal bench as a result, joining Myles Lewis-Skelly , Ayden Heaven , Maldini Kacurri and Ismeal Kabia in the matchday squad, while Tottenham had both Dominic...

title: Here’s how this puppeteer keeps an age-old art alive in Chennai
content: “I simplify subjects that are complex and bring them to life through puppetry,” says Isai Prakash, an artist who has been freely performing with shadow puppets, hand puppets, life-sized puppets, and forum theatres across schools and colleges in Chennai. Isai, along with a collective called Open House based in Perumbakkam, has made it his mission to engage in this one-of-a-kind, age-old form of storytelling. The artists at Open House have been tackling pressing issues like climate change, recycling, women’s safety, and discrimination through the art of puppetry, all without feeling preachy. On stage, a colourful cast of animal puppets, including butterflies, spiders and elephants, bring these topics to life, making them both engaging and approachable for children and members of the public alike. Brainstorming with the team “Our performances are rooted in community stories,” explains Isai, who brings together storytelling, singing, posters, and dialogue in his shows. “The process of my puppetry starts with listening to what schools, colleges, or communities need at the moment — whether about reading books or to be mindful of their surroundings — and I start brainstorming ideas with our team. Even back in school, I wasn’t a star student, but I’d decode, dilute, translate everything through art to understand better. And that’s exactly what I do now,” he says. For over a decade, Isai has been performing free for those in need. “Charging for these shows in schools isn’t the way,”...

title: Liverpool XI vs AC Milan: Predicted lineup, confirmed team news, injury latest for Champions League
creator: Alex Young
content: Federico Chiesa will be hoping to make his Liverpool debut in familiar surroundings as the Reds begin their Champions League campaign at AC Milan . The summer signing failed to make the squad for Saturday's home loss to Nottingham Forest despite training with his new team during the international break. Arne Slot may welcome the idea of giving Chiesa his first minutes in Italy, but the midfielder remains a doubt. Harvey Elliott is out for the foreseeable with a foot injury. Slot has a decision to make in attack, and who partners Mohamed Salah, after Diogo Jota, Luis Diaz, Darwin Nunez and Cody Gakpo all failed to make an impact against Forest. Nunez and Gakpo has been given bit-part roles so far this season, so both could be given an opportunity from the off at San Siro given the tight turnaround between games. Liverpool predicted XI: Alisson; Alexander-Arnold, Konate, Van Dijk, Robertson; Endo, Gravenberch; Salah, Szoboszlai, Gakpo; Nunez Doubts: Chiesa Injured: Elliott Time and date: 8pm on Tuesday, September 17, 2024 Venue: San Siro TV channel: Amazon Prime

title: Red Bull emphasizes the positives in F1 despite a disastrous end to Baku race
creator: Associated Press
content: BAKU, Azerbaijan (AP) — After a race that ended Sunday with and teammate Max Verstappen being overtaken by his title rival Lando Norris, there are still signs of optimism at Red Bull. Norris cut into Verstappen's standings lead, and McLaren took the constructors' championship lead off Red Bull, while Verstappen now hasn't won in seven races. The Dutch driver does, though, seem happier with a car he had and “undrivable” after the last race in Italy. Giving up three points to Norris wasn’t ideal, but Verstappen still has a lead of 59 points and seven rounds remaining. He was optimistic the car was more competitive after Friday practice but said the team made the wrong setup decisions for him in Saturday's qualifying, which also applied to the race. “We learnt a lot. We will try to do better,” Verstappen said. “If we do a better job ourselves, they (McLaren) need to do a perfect job to the end of the year.” And Perez seems to be back. Perez was third for much of the race and was challenging the two Ferraris for second when he and Sainz collided. It showed he could be a factor in the remaining races of the season despite not having been on the podium since April — a run that saw his place in the team being questioned. “The positive thing is the pace is back, the changes to the car seem to have put us back in contention,” Perez said in a team statement Sunday, arguing that he was a contender for the win in Baku. “We need to keep it up with the progress we have made.” Perez...

title: A’ja Wilson spotted with Bam Adebayo after WNBA milestone as dating buzz swirls
creator: Jaclyn Hendricks
content: A’ja Wilson’s milestone week in Indianapolis continued Thursday with a casual outing with a rumored love interest. Shortly after making league history Wednesday by scoring the most points in a single WNBA season, the star Las Vegas Aces center stepped out with the Miami Heat’s Bam Adebayo, whom she’s been linked to since the summer. The twosome was seen walking together in new photos published Sunday by TMZ , which reported Wilson, 28, and Adebayo, 27, “were among a group of people on a stroll down Market Street.” The Fever hosted the Aces in back-to-back contests this week, with Wilson breaking the previous WNBA record for most points recorded in a single season (Jewell Lloyd’s 939 points in 2023) in Las Vegas’ 86-75 win on Wednesday. Wilson reached the milestone in the first half and finished the game with a season total of 956 points, per the Associated Press . “I don’t want to sound cliché when I say this but, I don’t get any of that without every single teammate along the way. I’m so grateful to be able to play with selfless women,” the two-time WNBA champion said. The Aces — who wrapped their Indiana road trip Friday with a 78-74 win over the Fever — appeared to play into the Adebayo buzz on X, captioning a post on Wednesday celebrating Wilson’s achievement, “BAM!” Wilson reacted to the post with a curious gif of her own. The latest Wilson-Adebayo sighting comes days after a separate appearance in South Florida, where the Heat star received a key to Miami-Dade County...

title: Michaela DePrince: Weltbekannte Ballerina stirbt mit 29 Jahren
content: Sie galt als Ausnahmetalent der Ballettszene: Die Tänzerin Michaela DePrince ist mit nur 29 Jahren gestorben, wie ihre Familie in einem Post auf Instagram mittteilte . „Mit Schmerz in unseren Herzen teilen wir den Verlust der Star-Ballerina Michaela Mabinty DePrince, deren Kunst unzählige Herzen berührte“, heißt es. Ihr Geist habe viele inspiriert, der Welt des Balletts und darüber hinaus einen unauslöschlichen Stempel aufgedrückt. Zur Todesursache wurden keine weiteren Angaben gemacht. Bekannt wurde die Ballerina vor allem durch das Musikvideo „Lemonade“ der Sängerin Beyoncé. Doch bis zu zu diesem Erfolg hatte DePrince einen langen Weg zurückzulegen. Ihr Leben glich einer Achterbahnfahrt mit vielen Höhen und Tiefen. Es erzählt die Geschichte einer jungen Frau, die sich von trotz vieler Rückschläge und Startschwierigkeiten nicht unterkriegen ließ und es bis nach oben an die Spitze der Ballettszene schaffte. Vom „Teufelskind“ zur Ballerina Michaela Mabinty DePrince wurde 1995 in Sierra Leone geboren und verlor früh beide Elternteile: Ihr Vater fiel dem Bürgerkrieg zum Opfer, ihre Mutter verhungerte, wie die „Süddeutschen Zeitung“ (SZ) berichtet. Als dreijähriges Kind sei sie in ein Waisenhaus gebracht worden, wo sie aufgrund einer Hautkrankheit wie eine Außenseiterin behandelt wurde. Laut der „Welt“ soll sie deswegen „Teufelskind“ genannten worden sein. 1999 wurden sie und ihre Schwester Mia von einem amerikanischen Paar adoptiert, das sie in jeder Hinsicht...

title: Зеленски бие тревога: Русия напредва в Източна Украйна! Ето защо Украйна търпи загуби
content: Зеленски посочи, че ситуацията в източната част на страната е "много тежка", като добави, че половината от украинските бригади там не са оборудвани Украинските войски страдат от високи загуби поради твърде бавното пристигане на западни оръжия, за да се оборудват въоръжените ни сили както трябва, заяви президентът Володимир Зеленски в интервю пред Си Ен Ен, предаде Ройтерс. Русия печели позиции в някои части на Източна Украйна, включително около Покровск, пише още БТА. Превземането на транспортния възел може да даде възможност на Москва да открие нови линии за нападение. Зеленски посочи, че ситуацията в източната част на страната е "много тежка", като добави, че половината от украинските бригади там не са оборудвани. "Затова губиш много хора. Губиш хора, защото те нямат въоръжени превозни средства ... те нямат артилерия, те нямат артилерийски снаряди", каза Зеленски, говорейки на английски. От Cи Ен Ен съобщиха, че интервюто е било проведено в петък. Зеленски също така каза, оръжията, обещани от САЩ и европейските държави, пристигат много бавно. "Нуждаем се от 14 бригади, за да сме готови. Досега... от тези пакети [с пратки оръжие] не сме оборудвали дори четири", каза той. Съветникът по националната сигурност на Белия дом Джейк Съливан вчера заяви, че Вашингтон работи по "значителна" нова помощ за Украйна. Зеленски трябва да се срещне с президента на САЩ Джо Байдън този месец и ще му представи план за прекратяване на войната. Основните елементи са сигурността и...
