title: Parents Association urges govt. to reconsider deferment of CBSE exam system in A.P.
content: Members of the Parents Association of Andhra Pradesh (PAAP) on September 15 (Sunday) said that the government should reconsider its decision of delaying the implementation of the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE) examination system in the 1,000 State-run schools affiliated to the Central syllabus. In a statement, PAAP State president Narahari Sikharam, secretary G. Eswariah and State honorary president M. Kota Reddy criticised the State’s decision to defer the implementation of CBSE assessments for 10th class in the 1,000 schools and instead shifting the students to the State Secondary School of Examination (SSE) Board for the 2024-25 final assessments. They said that this ‘abrupt decision’ came after four months of the commencement of the new academic year, without considering the impact it could cast on students. Referring to the government’s claim that students are ill-equipped to handle CBSE Board exams since the capacity-building of the teachers is grossly inadequate to prepare them, which made them susceptible to failing the final exams, Mr. Eswaraiah argued that a genuine assessment of the students in SSC exams will bring similar results. “Will the government then cancel the SSC exams too?” he asked. He emphasised preparing students to face global competition, adding that states across the country were adopting the CBSE and ICSE educational systems, as competitive exams are also conducted based on these syllabi. The leaders reiterated that any change made at...

title: चीन के तीसरे एयरक्राफ्ट कैरियर फुजियान से उड़ान भरेंगे स्टील्थ लड़ाकू विमान, J-35 का कर रहा टेस्ट
content: बीजिंग: चीन अपने तीसरे एयरक्राफ्ट कैरियर फुजियान पर तैनात करने के लिए जे-35 स्टील्थ फाइटर जेट का परीक्षण कर रहा है। फुजियान एयरक्राफ्ट कैरियर इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक कैटापुल्ट सिस्टम से लैस है, जो भारी-भरकम विमानों को भी आसानी से टेकऑफ करा सकता है। इसे अमेरिकी एयरक्राफ्ट कैरियर यूएसएस गेराल्ड आर फोर्ड के समकक्ष माना जाता है, हालांकि यह भी समुद्री परीक्षण के दौर से गुजर रहा है। चीन के सरकारी प्रसारक सीसीटीवी के हवाले से सरकारी मीडिया ग्लोबल टाइम्स ने कहा कि इस साल की शुरुआत में चीनी पीपुल्स लिबरेशन आर्मी (पीएलए) नेवी के पहले एयरक्राफ्ट कैरियर लियाओनिंग पर एक नए प्रकार के युद्धक विमान का परीक्षण किया गया था। फुजियान से जे-35 उड़ा रहा चीन रिपोर्ट में यह भी कहा गया कि नया विमान लंबे समय से प्रतीक्षित जे-35 हो सकता है। इसे एफसी-31 के नाम से भी जाना जाता है। यह चीन का नेक्स्ट जेनरेशन कैरियर बेस्ड फाइटर जेट भी है। पाकिस्तान इसी विमान का एक अलग वेरिएंट खरीदने की योजना बना रहा है। हालांकि, चीन ने पाकिस्तान को एफसी-31 बेचने को लेकर अभी तक अपनी मंजूरी नहीं दी है। चीन के पास वर्तमान में दो एयरक्राफ्ट कैरियर हैं, लिओनिंग, जो सोवियत युग के जहाज का एक नया रूप है और दूसरा- शेडोंग, जो 2019 में कमीशन किया गया दूसरा स्वदेशी रूप से निर्मित एयरक्राफ्ट कैरियर है। फुजियान अमेरिका के फोर्ड क्लास के जैसा चीन का तीसरा एयरक्राफ्ट कैरियर फुजियान दोनों एयरक्राफ्ट कैरियर से बड़ा है। फुजियान की विस्थापन क्षमता 80,000 टन है। वर्तमान में इस एयरक्राफ्ट कैरियर का समुद्री परीक्षण चल रहा है। आधिकारिक मीडिया रिपोर्टों में कहा गया है कि यह पहला पूरी तरह से घरेलू रूप से विकसित और निर्मित एयरक्राफ्ट कैरियर है जिसमें...

title: Piastri wins chaotic Baku GP, puts McLaren on top
content: Oscar Piastri won the Azerbaijan Grand Prix and sent McLaren top of the constructors’ standings in a race that finished with a virtual safety car after a penultimate lap collision between Ferrari’s Carlos Sainz and Red Bull ’s Sergio Perez . Ferrari’s pole-sitter Charles Leclerc , who was overtaken by Piastri on the 20th of 51 laps and then battled nose-to-tail before his tyres faded, came second with George Russell inheriting third for Mercedes after the Sainz-Perez collision. Red Bull’s F1 leader Max Verstappen finished fifth, just behind his closest title rival Lando Norris, who started 15th for McLaren and ended up fourth with a bonus point for fastest lap. “That was probably the most stressful afternoon in my life,” said Piastri, after soaking up relentless pressure from Leclerc to take his second career win. Indian driver Kush Maini survived a horrifying crash after he stalled at the start of the feature race in F2, a support race to F1. Maini had nowhere to go at the start as his car’s engine stopped working suddenly. title: Golden State Warriors moving on from Jonathan Kuminga? | Sporting News
creator: Ben Verbrugge
content: With the recent buzz that the Golden State Warriors are in on a potential Jimmy Butler trade , one is left to wonder what this means for Jonathan Kuminga. The Warriors seem reluctant to trade the budding star but also do not seem interested in offering him a max contract. He is a fine young player with the potential to be a great player in the NBA, but the Warriors seem hesitant to crown him as the second piece on a championship team next to Steph Curry. No one outside of the organization knows where the front office stands on the situation, and they may not know internally either. Golden State reportedly reached out to the Los Angeles Lakers to inquire about LeBron James’ availability during last year’s trade deadline, but Draymond Green claims Kuminga would have been a deal breaker. “I said if it’s Kuminga, the answer is no,” Green told Taylor Rooks and Charles Barkley during a broadcast of the All-Star Game. The Warriors were also very close to a sign-and-trade for Paul George this offseason, but again, the franchise was hesitant to let go of Kuminga in any deal with the Clippers. Clearly, Golden State does not believe it is a championship team as currently constructed; otherwise, they would not desperately be looking to add another star player. At the same time, they have made it clear that Kuminga is not going anywhere right now. It is starting to become a puzzling dynamic. On the one hand, the team wants to improve, but they view their only valuable trade piece as...

title: D2 ACFF| La Real passe à travers contre La Calamine : “Sans la bonne mentalité, on va jouer le maintien”
content: Acren-Lessines – La Calamine 0-2 Arbitre : M. Fernandes Barros. Cartes jaunes : Libert, Diaw, Barry, Ndecky, Hungs. Buts : 3e Samray (0-1), 16e Lafalize (0-2). Acren : Vanherreweghe, Diaw (46e Blairon), Barry (46e Garcia Dominguez), Hammond, Vroman (46e Surgeon), Sonko, Afkir, Makoun, Ndecky, Voskrichian, Fernandes. La Calamine : Mignon, Samray, Hubert (67e Cusumano), Lafalize (55e Katunda), Oger (82e Cornet), Libert, Hamoir, Deflandre, Hungs, Mollers, Thielen (67e Belle). Hasard du calendrier, les deux équipes restaient sur le même score. Si la Real s'était imposée 3-0 à Huy, La Calamine avait subi la défaite à Ganshoren. Les locaux étaient donc en quête de confirmation alors que les visiteurs visaient la rédemption. Et c'est la deuxième option qui a pris le dessus. Il ne fallait que trois minutes à Samray pour ouvrir le score de la tête. " Il y a une chose que je ne peux accepter et que je n'accepterai jamais, c'est la mauvaise mentalité avec laquelle tu montes sur un terrain et celle avec laquelle tu abordes le match après une bonne prestation , rageait Jimmy Hempte. Ce n'est pourtant pas faute d'avoir prévenu le groupe durant toute la semaine. Et même d'avoir parlé avec certains individuellement... De mon côté, j'estime avoir réalisé mon job de coach en préparant le groupe au mieux ". On ne peut pas en dire autant des Acrenois qui prennent le numéro 2 par un Houfalize qui devance trop facilement les défenseurs sur un centre au cordeau. Le score...

title: Milan Venezia, partita SPECIALE per Theo Hernandez: traguardo raggiunto DA SOGNO dal francese
creator: Redazione Milannews24
content: Theo Hernandez è stato uno dei protagonisti principali nella vittoria di ieri del Milan . Il francese, infatti, dopo appena due minuti di gioco ha sbloccato la partita. Il match di ieri, però, non è stato speciale per il rossonero solamente per la vittoria. Con il successo di ieri ha ottenuto la sua centesima vittoria in Serie A . Poi, inoltre, Theo è l’unico difensore straniero che ha trovato la rete in ciascuna delle ultime sei stagioni di Serie A.

title: İmamoğlu, Üsteğmen Ayar'ın kabrini ziyaret etti
content: İstanbul Büyükşehir Belediye Başkanı Ekrem İmamoğlu, Irak'ın kuzeyinde teröristlerle çıkan çatışmada şehit olan Piyade Üsteğmen Ömer Fatih Ayar'ın (29) Trabzon'un Köprübaşı ilçesindeki kabrini ziyaret etmek için kente geldi. Ziyaret öncesi Trabzon Havalimanı çıkışında konuşan İmamoğlu, "Aynı aileyiz. Trabzon'da birbirimizi bilen aynı aileyiz. Biliyorsunuz Trabzon'da aileler biraz böyle farklı göçlerle dağılmışlardır. Biz de Akçaabatlıyız ama kökenimiz Köprübaşı. Dolayısıyla Köprübaşı’nda, Maçka'da farklı yerlerde olan İmamoğlu ailesiyle bağımız var. Cenaze günü burada olamamıştım. Şehidimizin babasıyla olan sohbetimde çok hızlı bir şekilde ziyaret edeceğimizi söylemiştim. Sonra o gün, bugünü planladık, yurt dışı programım vardı onu hallettikten sonra gidip taziyemizi yapıp duamızı edeceğiz. Şehitlerimize rahmet diliyoruz, terörü lanetliyoruz ama bir yanıyla da tabii memleketimizin huzur içerisinde olmasını istiyoruz. Umarım hem içeride hem dışarıda memleketimize zarar veren tüm mihraklardan, terör örgütlerinden hep beraber kurtulduğumuz günleri de yaşarız. Bunu diliyorum" ifadelerini kullandı. ‘TRABZON'A DAHA GÜZEL HABERLERLE GELMEYİ DE ÇOK İSTERİM’ Gazi Mustafa Kemal Atatürk'ün Trabzon'a ilk geliş yıl dönümü olduğunu da hatırlatan İmamoğlu, "Güzel bir gün. Hem Trabzon, maç günlerini sever, temaşası yüksek olur. Muhtemelen Trabzon'un her yeri bu coşkuyu yaşıyor. Bugün ayrıca...

title: Football - D2 ACFF: L'Union Hutoise émerge sur le fil face à Verlaine
content: Qui dit derby, dit tension, dit envie de gagner à tout prix. Et c'est pourquoi aucune des deux équipes ne s'est réellement livrée en première mi-temps, le round d'observation ayant pratiquement duré 45 minutes. Néanmoins, les visiteurs sonnent l'alerte durant le temps additionnel avec Yilmaz qui trouve la barre transversale alors qu'il se présentait devant Dengis. Les 22 acteurs rentrent donc aux vestiaires sur ce score nul et vierge, et les 230 spectateurs présents espèrent avoir de quoi se mettre sous la dent dans ce second acte. Chose demandée, chose due, cinq minutes après le coup d'envoi de la seconde période, Vaccaro lance Yilmaz dans la profondeur, l'attaquant rentre sur son pied droit et frappe en force hors de portée du gardien Verlainois. 0-1 pour les visiteurs, la deuxième mi-temps est lancée. La suite du match est assez hachée avec beaucoup de fautes, de cartes jaunes et une échauffourée entre Humblet et Milongi après une faute du Hutois. La possession est en faveur des locaux mais sans réelles occasions jusqu'à la libération. Milongi trouve Jamar d'une passe appuyée, le capitaine remise juste derrière lui pour Stasse qui transforme d'une demi-volée dans le petit filet de Crahay. On joue la 85e et le score est désormais d'un partout. Malheureusement pour les locaux, la joie est de courte durée. Une petite minute plus tard seulement, Yilmaz crucifie Dengis et redonne l'avantage aux siens. Cette folle fin de match ne s'arrête pas là...

title: Стало известно о задержании врио командира погибших бойцов Эрнеста и Гудвина
creator: Маргарита Миронова
content: Врио командира 87-го МСП 1-й бригады 51-й общевойсковой армии был задержан на административной границе Луганской народной республики (ЛНР) военной контрразведкой. Об этом сообщил Telegram -канал «Два майора». В этом подразделении служили погибшие бойцы с позывными Эрнест и Гудвин, профильные операторы БПЛА, которых перевели в штурмовики. По информации канала, полковник Игорь Пузик с позывным Злой попытался сбежать из зоны специальной военной операции через границу с ЛНР. Ранее Министр обороны России Андрей Белоусов поручил разобраться в ситуации с гибелью военных Эрнеста и Гудвина.

title: U velikom broju škola u BiH učenicima još uvijek mobiteli dostupni i tijekom nastave
content: Između 2020. i 2022. došlo je do povećanja vremena koje djeca provode pred ekranima za 52 posto, pokazalo je nedavno istraživanje Odbora za obrazovanje Ujedinjenog Kraljevstva, zbog čega se u ovoj zemlji intenzivno radi na zabrani upotrebe mobitela u školama za učenike mlađe od 16 godina. - Pretjerano korištenje ekrana i pametnih telefona ima jasan negativan učinak na mentalnu i fizičku dobrobit djece i mladih - rekao je predsjednik Odbora Robin Walker. - Bez hitnog djelovanja više će djece biti ugroženo - dodao je. I istraživanja provedena u Bosni i Hercegovini upućuju na činjenicu da djeca provode sve više vremena na mobitelima, a tema zabrane korištenja u školama aktualizira se pred početak svake nove školske godine. Neke škole zabranile Na zabranu korištenja mobitela u školama neke zemlje su se odlučile već prije, dok, kada je riječ o Bosni i Hercegovini, na razini države odnosno entiteta još uvijek ne postoje propisi koji bi to regulirali. Ipak, škole mogu same odlučiti hoće li i u kojoj mjeri za vrijeme boravka u školskom objektu djeca moći koristiti mobitele. Na potpunu zabranu do sada se odlučio tek manji broj škola. Jedan od primjera je i OŠ Čerin u Čitluku, čije je Vijeće roditelja i škole na početku prošle školske godine u suradnji s Učiteljskim vijećem donijelo odluku o zabrani donošenja i upotrebe mobitela u školi. Ako učenik iz opravdanog razloga (bolest ili drugi opravdani razlog) ponese mobitel u školu, dužan...

title: Polisten sürücülere önemli uyarı
content: Polis ten yapılan uyarı şu şekilde: Lefkoşa'da Dr. Fazıl Küçük Bulvarı üzerinde bulunan Atatürk Stadyumu Trafik Işıkları, meydana gelen arıza nedeniyle devre dışı kalmıştır. Arıza giderilinceye kadar kavşak üzerindeki sağa ve sola dönüşler yol ve trafik güvenliği açısından trafik akışına kapatılmış olup, sadece düz geçiş yapılabilecektir. Bahse konu yol güzergahı kullanacak olan sürücülerin yavaş ve dikkatli seyretmeleri ayrıca, trafik işaret ve işaretçilerine uymaları önemle rica olunur.

Mosely left the game with a foot injury and was carted to the locker room. NFL insider Mike Garafolo reported the news on social media. LB CJ Mosley carted to the locker room. title: Vigor Senigallia, vittoria in rimonta. Castelfidardo beffato nel recupero
creator: Marco Cencioni
content: La gioia della Vigor Senigallia, ribaltato l’Avezzano La Vigor Senigallia ribalta l’Avezzano e conquista altri tre punti preziosissimi, di Gabbianelli su rigore e D’Errico le reti della rimonta rossoblu. Al Bianchelli termina 2 a 1, la Vigor a punteggio pieno comanda la classifica con Ancona e Fossombrone. L’Avezzano passa al primo affondo: poco dopo la mezzora di gioco Ferrari arriva per primo sulla respinta di Roberto ed insacca l’1-0. Magi Galluzzi sfiora il pareggio in avvio di ripresa, Mascella il raddoppio. Il pareggio al 76′: Beu crossa in mezzo, Konè si avventa sulla palla ma viene sbilanciato ed è rigore, Gabbianelli lo trasforma e fa 1-1. La Vigor cavalca l’onda dell’entusiasmo, passano due minuti, Alonzi serve l’assist per D’Errico, il fantasista è glaciale a tu per tu con Esposito, 2 a 1. Roberto mette una pezza sul tentativo dell’ex Serie A Vantaggiato e la Vigor Senigallia può godersi la seconda vittoria in campionato. Mister Giuliodori Il Castelfidardo cade ad Isernia e resta a quota zero punti in classifica, in Molise decide l’incontro una rete di Cascio al terzo minuto di recupero. Finisce 1 a 0 per i padroni di casa che riscattano la sconfitta rimediata una settimana prima contro l’Ancona. Giuliodori recupera Nanapere che ha scontato la squalifica, le condizioni del terreno di gioco lasciano a desiderare. L’Isernia va vicina alla segnatura con un colpo di testa di Baba che scheggia il palo. Dopo la girandola di sostituzioni in pieno recupero Cascio...

title: TEPJF deja a Morena y aliados con 82% de las curules del Congreso de Puebla
creator: Mónica Camacho
content: La LXII Legislatura del Congreso local arrancó este 15 de septiembre con una mayoría de la bancada de Morena y sus aliados que concentra a 83 por ciento de las curules, gracias a que el Tribunal Electoral del Poder Judicial de la Federación (TEPJF) devolvió a Morena tres plurinominales y entregó al PVEM una. En tanto, la oposición quedó disminuida a sólo siete representantes populares, lo que equivale al 17 por ciento restante de un total de 41 diputaciones. La bancada de Morena es la más numerosa por concentrar 18 legisladores, a la que le sigue su aliado el PVEM, cuyo grupo parlamentario aumentó de seis a siete integrantes por la resolución del TEPJF del sábado pasado, superando con ello a la fracción opositora del PAN, la cual quedó con seis miembros. La calidad de tercera fuerza legislativa la comparten Acción Nacional y el PT, este último integrante de la conocida Cuarta Transformación (4T), junto con Morena, el PVEM, Nueva Alianza (NA) y Fuerza por México (FxM). En tanto, NA y FxM cuentan con dos diputados cada uno, mientras Movimiento Ciudadano (MC) y el PRI sólo tendrán a un representante popular. Te puede interesar: Publican en el Periódico Oficial de Puebla la reforma al PJF .

title: India audio device market registers remarkable growth, offline sales reach Rs 5,000 crore: GFK
content: NEW DELHI: The Indian audio devices market is growing rapidly, with offline retail sales reaching a moving annual turnover (MAT) of Rs 5,000 crore in June 2024, supported by a rise of 61 percent year-over-year volume increase in the Personal Audio segment ,according to a GFK report. The other factors driving this growth are advancements in immersive sound technologies, improved consumer experiences, and an increasing demand for high-quality audio products in both home and personal categories. Moreover, the Indian audio device market is also aided by the shift towards premiumization in the category as consumers look towards superior quality. The report further stated that Indian consumers seek a cinematic experience and convenient listening with a "massive appetite" for audio devices. "With the evolving entertainment landscape, consumers increasingly seek premium, cinematic audio experiences, making the sector ripe for growth and revenue opportunities," said GFK, an NIQ Company and a leading global market and consumer intelligence firm. Faster growth has been registered by home theater and smart audio even with the compact stereo system dominated market. This demand has also increased by the rise of new content formats such as podcasts and audio series. "The personal audio market in India, valued at Rs 3,400 crore, experienced a 32 per cent YoY growth in value in MAT June 2024. Headphones, Headsets and mini/Bluetooth speakers have become essential for the Gen Z consumers, who...

title: India opposition leader Kejriwal says will resign as Delhi chief minister
content: Arvind Kejriwal announces resignation a day after his release from prison on bail in a corruption case he claims is politically motivated. Indian opposition leader Arvind Kejriwal says he will resign as chief minister of the capital New Delhi’s regional government, a day after his release from prison on bail in a corruption case. “Today I have come to ask the public whether you consider Kejriwal honest or a criminal... I will resign from the post of CM [chief minister] two days from today and ask people whether I am honest,” he said on Sunday. A fierce critic of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, Kejriwal, 55, is a former anti-corruption crusader whose decade-old Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) quickly rose to mainstream politics, although its clout is relatively small compared to older opposition parties. He has served as Delhi’s chief minister since 2015. On Friday, he was granted bail by India’s Supreme Court and he left the prison the next day, six months after being detained in relation to alleged irregularities in the capital city’s liquor policy. He was bailed on a million-rupee ($11,920) bond on conditions that he would not make public comment on the merits of the case against him, would not visit his office, and would refrain from signing official files. AAP had expected that Kejriwal’s release from prison would allow him to campaign as a chief minister in regional elections next month in the northern state of neighbouring Haryana, and in Delhi early next year. But Kejriwal said...

title: قيادي في حماس يؤكد احتفاظ الحركة "بقدرة عالية" للاستمرار في الحرب مع إسرائيل بعد عام على اندلاعها
Graz
creator: Marie Ott
content: Verpasse nicht die neuesten Inhalte von diesem Profil: Melde dich an, um neue Inhalte von Profilen und Bezirken zu deinen hinzufügen zu können. Durch die kräftigen Niederschläge ist es in Teilen von Österreich, zu massiven Überschwemmungen kommen. Von den Katastrophenschutzbehörden wurde daher auch das Ufer der Mur in Graz gesichert und auch das Murkraftwerk Graz-Puntigam hat die Schleusen geöffnet um so viel Wasser wie möglich durch zu lassen, bevor es zu einer Katastrophe kommt. Meiden Sie daher das Ufer der Mur und beobachten Sie die lokale Wetterentwicklung. Da stärkere Regenfälle die Gewässer und auch damit den Pegelstand der Mur, sehr schnell ansteigen lassen können. Beachten Sie die Gefahr von herabstürzenden Ästen und auch von lockerem Erdreich, somit auch den Hangrutschungen. Vermeiden Sie den Aufenthalt im Freien, insbesondere in Waldgebieten, Parks und Alleen. Rechnen Sie mit raschen Entwicklungen und Änderungen der Wetterlage und beachten Sie die Sturmwarnungen durch die Landeswarnzentrale. Melde Dich an, um diesen Inhalt mit «Gefällt mir» zu markieren. Du möchtest zur Diskussion beitragen? Melde Dich an, um Kommentare zu verfassen.

title: Borrell sigue la estela de Robles y califica a Venezuela de «régimen dictatorial»
Paula Moschella y Denis Álvarez ganaron los 10km “Entre Viñedos y Montañas” 28o aniversario de Diario San Rafael
creator: Javi Fernandez
content: Este domingo se desarrolló con total éxito la segunda fecha de la carrera “Entre Viñedos y Montañas” que tuvo cita en la zona de Los Reyunos y fue conmemorativa al 28o aniversario de Diario San Rafael que dejó como vencedores a Denis Álvarez y Paula Moschella en los 10 kilómetros, sumando a Héctor Antonio Reveco atleta con discapacidad. En damas la sanrafaelina Paula Moschella se quedó con el trofeo tras emplear el mejor tiempo que fue de 50 minutos y 11 segundos, 2o finalizó Elina Altamiranda (52m y 1s), y 3o Silvana Mansilla (52m y 15s). Denis Álvarez también de nuestra ciudad se impuso en caballeros tras 38 minutos y 35 segundos de carrera, Héctor Damián Salinas finalizó 2o (39m y 39s), 3oHernán Velazco (39m y 45s) y 4o Emanuel Pavez (40m y 28s). En esta distancia también estuvo Héctor Reveco atleta con discapacidad que se impuso en la categoría Especial completando los 10 kilómetros en 1 hora y 51 segundos, obteniendo también un trofeo otorgado por nuestro medio. Martina Braga logró el 1o puesto con un tiempo total de 26 minutos, 2o Martina Castro (27m y 32s) y el 3o lugar del podio quedó para María Vilche (29m y 53s). Una vez finalizado el evento, Juan Ruti junto a toda la gente organizadora realizó los premios correspondientes para los distintos ganadores de las diversas categorías. La 3a y próxima carrera “Entre Viñedos y Montañas” se realizará en el mes de noviembre en Algodón Wine Estates,en el distrito de Cuadro Benegas.

title: «Ora basta!», domani a Foggia la manifestazione contro le aggressioni al personale sanitario
creator: redazione.internet@gazzettamezzogiorno.it
content: FOGGIA - Sarà proprio la città dauna ad ospitare "Ora basta!", la manifestazione contro le aggressioni agli operatori sanitari. A partecipare medici, dirigenti sanitari, infermieri, operatori sanitari, specializzandi, studenti: tutti uniti per dire basta alla escalation di violenza contro il personale sanitario. Tutti in piazza, dunque, alle 11,30 di domani davanti all’ingresso del Policlinico, in via Martiri di via Fani a Foggia. L’evento è promosso dai sindacati dei medici Anaao Assomed e Cimo-Fesmed. Saranno presenti i segretari nazionali di Anaao Assomed, Pierino Di Silverio e di Cimo-Fesmed, Guido Quici e il presidente nazionale Cimo-Fesmed. Hanno, inoltre, aderito medici specializzandi e studenti rappresentati da ALS – Associazione Liberi Specializzandi, Giovani Medici per l'Italia, Area Nuova – Associazione Studentesca e l’organizzazione Cittadinanzattiva. Interverrà il presidente dell'Ordine dei Medici di Foggia, Pierluigi De Paolis.

title: Wolves 1-2 Newcastle: Harvey Barnes SCREAMER seals late comeback win to fire unbeaten Toon up to third after Fabian Schar's long-range strike cancelled out Mario Lemina opener
content: Wolves 1-2 Newcastle: Harvey Barnes SCREAMER seals late comeback win to fire unbeaten Toon up to third after Fabian Schar's long-range strike cancelled out Mario Lemina opener Wolves took the lead after 36 minutes through Mario Lemina's close-range finish Newcastle responded through Fabian Schar before Harvey Barnes' stunning goal LISTEN NOW: It's All Kicking Off!, available wherever you get your podcasts. New episodes every Monday and Thursday By Reuters Published: 13:29 EDT, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 14:04 EDT, 15 September 2024 e-mail View comments At some point the internal squabbling and underwhelming football might drag Newcastle United towards a dark place. For now, they find themselves unbeaten in the top three and with a growing reputation for the picking of pockets. Quite how they lifted this one from Wolves is a mystery, given they were so poor for so long and contrived to win it with a half-time substitution born from Eddie Howe ’s desperation and anger. They were 1-0 down by then and the embodiment of that truism around having all the gear and no idea. For all the possession they had held, they did zilch with it - too slow with the pass, too slow to react to the counters, too slow in realising they were doing all the things Wolves wanted them to do. And then Howe snapped – when the break came he hauled off two of his biggest names, Alexander Isak and Joelinton, as well as Sean Longstaff, and sent on Harvey Barnes , Sandro Tonali and Joe Willock . Even then it...

title: Hispanic Heritage Month kicks off with Hillsboro’s El Grito Celebration
creator: Chiara Profenna
content: Despite living in a different country than members of her family, Hillsboro resident Tina Escalera finds comfort knowing there’s an invisible string connecting them on this special day. “I have family in Mexico and they’re celebrating right now,” Escalera said. “I’m celebrating, so I feel connected, even though we’re one country away.” On Saturday afternoon, Hillsboro’s El Grito Celebration brought the community together for the annual event commemorating “El Grito de Dolores,” more commonly known as “El Grito de Independencia,” which translates to the cry of independence. This event sparked Mexico’s fight for freedom under Spanish rule on Sept. 16, 1810. It is celebrated annually on the first day of National Hispanic Heritage Month , which honors the independence of Mexico and eight other Latin American countries: Belize, Brazil, Chile, Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras and Nicaragua. At the vibrant event in Shute Park, thousands of Oregon residents browsed the mercadito, or market, where vendors sold handmade goods, many imported from Mexico. Across the park, food vendors were offering everything from paletas (fruit-flavored popsicles) to pupusas (stuffed griddle cakes). At the center of the celebration was a stage decorated in green, white and red balloons — a nod to the Mexican flag — featuring performances by local dance groups and mariachi bands, bringing a festive atmosphere to the park. The celebration extended to the parking lot, where a car show...

title: Temasek close to buying 20% in visa services provider VFS Global
content: Temasek Holdings Pte is nearing a deal to buy a significant minority stake in VFS Global , according to people familiar with the matter, a transaction that could value the visa outsourcing and technology services firm at about $7 billion including debt. The Singapore state-owned investor is poised to acquire about 20% in closely held VFS, which is controlled by US alternative asset manager Blackstone Inc., the people said, asking not to be identified because the deliberations are private. Temasek and Blackstone are hammering out the details of a deal that could be announced as soon as Monday, the people said. Blackstone will remain the majority shareholder in VFS after the deal, the people said. Blackstone has been weighing options including a full or partial sale in VFS after receiving interest from investors such as sovereign wealth funds, Bloomberg News reported on Friday. VFS has a large presence in India, where it provides visa application services for the US consulate in several cities. (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel )

title: Lib Dem deputy leader ‘pretty sure’ party stunts will continue
creator: PA Media: UK News
content: The deputy leader of the Liberal Democrats has said she is “pretty sure” the party will “keep going” with stunts if they continue to help deliver policy messages. Daisy Cooper told reporters at the party’s annual conference in Brighton that she believed stunts “show that you can do politics with some hope”. Party leader Sir Ed Davey became known during the general election campaign for stunts including bungee jumping and paddleboarding. He would take part in the activities when announcing policy plans, often with other Lib Dem MPs or candidates. Ms Cooper told reporters on Sunday that “most of our stunts come with a very serious message” and thought they would continue going forward. She said: “We take our politics very seriously but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. I think Ed has become renowned for his stunts, they genuinely make people smile. “I think given that there’s some very, very big and serious issues for the Government to start to address, I think it’s also important that we can show that you can do politics with some hope and optimism at the same time.” While they featured regularly in the election campaign, as the party’s conference opened on Saturday, Davey went jet-skiing in Brighton Marina. Pushed on whether there would be more going forward, Ms Cooper said: “Most of our stunts come with a very serious message.” She later added: “So I think for as long as there are stunts to be had, and for as long as the stunts bring joy to our politics and for as long...

title: Coimbatore round up
content: Awareness programme on ‘Breast and Cervical Cancer’ in Tiruppur Tiruppur Stakeholders Forum and Tiruppur Exporters’ Association - Women Empowerment Sub-Committee jointly organised an awareness programme on ‘Breast and Cervical Cancer’ for women, in collaboration with Rotary Club of Tiruppur Thirumuruganpoondi, recently. Gynaecologist Anitha Vijay oriented participants on prevention methods. TEA president K.M. Subramanian said in a press release that so far 4,000 women were tested through the initiative and 40 among them who were diagnosed with symptoms were cured through treatment. Faculty fudging: DGP urged to take action on erring colleges The Coimbatore unit of Anti-Corruption Movement has urged the Police Department to investigate the “fraudulent means” adopted by a section of affiliated colleges of Anna University to secure affiliation. The issue of fudging of faculty numbers by 224 colleges during the 2023-24 inspections that was brought out by an NGO Arappor Iyakkam raises serious questions on the role of AICTE (All India Council for Technical Education) also, Secretary of the Movement N.K. Velu said, in a representation to the Director General of Police Shankar Jiwal. The scandal reveals cognizable offences of grave nature. Any delay in investigation will result in manipulation of record, tampering of witnesses and destruction of evidence, Mr. Velu said in the letter. title: Patriots linebacker injured, return questionable
content: FOXBOROUGH — The Patriots ’ defense which has fueled their better-than-expected start, lost a key piece early in Sunday’s game against the Seahawks at Gillette Stadium. Ja’Whaun Bentley, their captain and veteran linebacker left the game in the first with a shoulder injury. It wasn’t immediately clear what play the injury occurred on. The Patriots announced him as questionable to return. The 28-year-old led New England with 12 tackles last week and had 114 last year. He’s been among the team’s most vocal leaders. Bentley usually wears the green dot as the team’s play-caller on defense. Kyle Dugger took over the role in his absence. Raekwon McMillan stepped in at linebacker. More Patriots Content

title: چرا اقتصاد ایران به مرحله ناامیدی مطلق رسیده است؟
creator: mehdi beigi
content: به رغم پوشاندن حقایق اما برخی رسانه‌های حکومتی و اقتصاددانان در حاکمیت ملایان به این واقعیت اذعان می‌کنند که اقتصاد ایران در مرحله ناامیدی مطلق قرار دارد. این را مردم در زندگی روزمره خود حس می‌کنند. نیاز به دانش تخصصی چندانی نیز هم ندارد. وقتی به بازار یا مغازه می‌روی تا خرید کنی، تورم و گرانی روزافزون کالاها و خدمات خود حرف می‌زنند. از سوی دیگر در بخش تولید در تمامی قسمت‌های آن، رکودی بی‌سابقه در اقتصاد کشور سایه انداخته است. این سایه نیز خودش را در اختصاص‌دادن حداکثر بیشترین زمان ممکن به شغل توسط اقشار مختلف نشان می‌دهد. بسیاری از مردم ۲ یا ۳ شیفت کار می‌کنند تا حداقل‌های بخور و نمیر زندگی را تامین کنند. بسیاری نیز به دلیل وخامت اوضاع اقتصادی به بیکاری مطلق کشیده شده‌اند. اینها بعلاوه دیگر نشانه‌های بارز که در زندگی روزمره سپهر اقتصادی ایران خود را نشان می‌دهد حرف‌های کمتر گفته یا پنهان‌شده در مورد اقتصاد ایران را نشان می‌دهند. فرقی هم نمی‌کند که کدام دولت و از چه جناحی بر سر کار باشد. روز به روز که می‌گذرد و هر دولتی که می‌آید و می‌رود وضعیت به همین منوال ادامه می‌یابد و البته افزایش وخامت اقتصاد ایران. حاکمیت تلاش می‌کند و تلاشی مذبوح تا وضعیت اقتصاد ایران در ناامیدی مطلق را به تحریم‌‌ها ربط دهد. اما در اینجا ۲ نکته را باید مد نظر قرار داد. اول اینکه تحریم‌ها به چه دلیل به حاکمیت ملایان، و بهتر است بگوییم مردم ایران اعمال شده است؟ آیا جز به دلیل سیاست‌های مخرب حاکمیت ملایان در زمینه اتمی، موشکی، تروریسم، دخالت‌های منطقه‌ای به جای رونق بخشیدن به اقتصاد ایران است؟ نکته دوم اینکه با وجود تحریم‌ها اما بسیاری در حاکمیت ملایان وجود دارند که به روشنی اذعان می‌کنند که وضعیت...

title: Przepływ wody na czesko-polskiej granicy
creator: JG, PAP
content: Kulminacja Odry na czesko-polskiej granicy jest spodziewana w niedzielę około północy. Jak poinformowała PAP rzecznik państwowego zarządcy wód na tym terenie (Povodi Odry) Szarka Vlczkova - przepływ ma być niższy niż zapowiadane wcześniej 2 tys. metrów sześciennych na sekundę. Prognozę taką przedstawił wcześniej w niedzielę minister rolnictwa Marek Vyborny, który odpowiada za gospodarkę wodną. „Teraz te prognozy zostały dopracowane i szczytowy przepływ jest obecnie szacowany na 1500 do 1600 metrów sześciennych na sekundę" - powiedziała PAP Vlczkova. Odra osiąga czesko-polską granicę na wysokości Starego Bogumina, przez chwilę jest rzeką graniczną, a od ujścia do niej Olzy płynie już po polskim terytorium. Rzecznik zapewniła PAP, że Povodi Odry nie prowadzi żadnych zrzutów wody z zapór, które znajdują się w jej administracji. JG, PAP

title: Экс-чемпион мира встал с нокдауна и нокаутом завоевал титул WBA в США. Видео
content: На T- Mobile Arena в Лас-Вегаса , штат Невада, США прошел поединок за «временный» титул WBA во втором среднем весе, передает Sports.kz со ссылкой на Fightnews.info . В ринге встретились экс-чемпион этой весовой категории Калеб Плант и его соотечественник Тревор Маккаби. Плант начал бой резво, но Тревор охладил его пыл уже во втором раунде. Калеб пропустил несколько левых хуков и оказался на настиле, но рефери не стал отсчитывать нокдаун, сославшись, что экс-чемпион поскользнулся. Эпизод повторился в четвертой трехминутке, после левого хука Плант снова на полу. В этот раз рефери засчитал нокдаун. CALEB PLANT KNOCKED DOWN IN ROUND 4!!️!!️ #Boxing #CaneloBerlanga 💥💥🥊🥊🥊 pic.twitter.com/XDikPNqlTi Все же Калеб смог собраться и перехватить инициативу во второй половине боя, в то время как Маккаби становился медленней и разбалансирование с каждым раундом. Тревор пропускал все больше, а в девятом раунде противостояние превратилось в односторонние избиение, в результате рефери пришлось вмешаться и остановить поединок. title: Positive steps will be taken to include Dhangar community in ST category: Maha CM
creator: Syed Iftequar
content: Mumbai : Maharashtra Chief Minister Eknath Shinde on Sunday said that positive steps will be taken for the inclusion of the Dhangar community in the Scheduled Tribe (ST) category. “Efforts are on to ensure that the admittance should be sustainable in the framework of law and should not be an injustice to any other community,” he said A meeting between the Chief Minister with the delegation of Dhangar Samaj coordination committee was held on Sunday against the backdrop of a demand made by the Dhangar community for the inclusion in Scheduled Tribe category and agitation following the demand, thereby. The Chief Minister had a telephonic interaction with the agitators and enquired about them. Shinde said that the demand for inclusion of the Dhangar community in the Scheduled Tribe category has been pending for many years and in order to ensure the inclusion, the prescribed procedure of the law will have to be followed. He further said that for this, the efforts for follow-up at the secretariat level will be immediately started. He said that the opinion of the Advocate General of the state, law and justice department will also be taken. Along with the tribal development department, secretaries of other departments and the members of the coordination committee should actively participate and action should be initiated with immediate effect regarding other demands, the chief minister directed. The directions were also given for submitting the report to the Sudhakar Shinde...

title: مرصد الختم الفلكي يلتقط صوراً لسديم "خوذة ثور" من سماء الإمارات - AARC مصر
content: نعرض لكم زوارنا أهم وأحدث الأخبار فى المقال الاتي: مرصد الختم الفلكي يلتقط صوراً لسديم "خوذة ثور" من سماء الإمارات - AARC مصر, اليوم الأحد 15 سبتمبر 2024 08:49 مساءً التاريخ: 15 سبتمبر 2024 ت + ت - الحجم الطبيعي التقط مرصد الختم الفلكي في أبوظبي صورة لسديم مميز يسمى سديم "خوذة ثور" ويحمل الرمز NGC2359 وهو سديم انبعاث يقع في مجموعة "الكلب الأكبر" يبعد عنا 15 ألف سنة ضوئية ويحتاج الضوء إلى 30 سنة ليقطعه من أوله إلى آخره. وهو عبارة عن كتلة كبيرة من الغاز الذي يتكون بشكل رئيس من غاز الهيدروجين والأوكسجين والنجم الأحمر في المنتصف هو نجم حار جدا ألمع من الشمس بـ 280 ألف مرة وكتلته أكبر من كتلة الشمس بـ 16 ضعفا وهو في مرحلة ما قبل انفجار "سوبرنوفا" والرياح النجمية الصادرة من النجم تتفاعل مع الغازات المحيطة وهو ما أعطى شكل الخوذة للسديم. وتشير الأبحاث إلى أن معدل توسع السديم يتراوح ما بين 10 إلى 30 كيلومترا في الثانية الواحدة مما يعطي السديم عمر يقدر ما بين 80 و240 ألف سنة وسمي كذلك لأن شكله يشبه شكل الخوذة التي ترتديها الشخصية "ثور" في الأفلام والروايات القصصية. وتم التقاط الصورة من مرصد الختم الفلكي في صحراء أبوظبي باستخدام تلسكوب قطره 14 إنش وباستخدام مرشحات الهيدروجين “اللون الأخضر” والأوكسجين “اللون الأزرق” والكبريت “اللون الأحمر” وبلغت عدد الصور 276 صورة بواقع 3 دقائق لكل صورة أي أن مدة تعريض الصورة بلغت حوالي 14 ساعة.

title: نيوكاسل يقلب الطاولة على وولفرهامبتون بثنائية في خمس دقائق بالدوري الإنجليزي - AARC مصر
content: نعرض لكم زوارنا أهم وأحدث الأخبار فى المقال الاتي: نيوكاسل يقلب الطاولة على وولفرهامبتون بثنائية في خمس دقائق بالدوري الإنجليزي - AARC مصر, اليوم الأحد 15 سبتمبر 2024 08:49 مساءً التاريخ: 15 سبتمبر 2024 ت + ت - الحجم الطبيعي قلب نيوكاسل يونايتد تأخره صفر / 1 إلى انتصار مثير 2 / 1 على مضيفه وولفرهامبتون، اليوم الأحد، في المرحلة الرابعة لبطولة الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز لكرة القدم. وانتهى الشوط الأول بتقدم وولفرهامبتون بهدف عن طريق ماريو ليمينا في الدقيقة 36، قبل أن ينتفض نيوكاسل في ربع الساعة الأخيرة من عمر اللقاء، عقب تسجيل فابيان شار وهارفي بارنيس هدفي الضيوف في الدقيقتين 75 و80 على الترتيب. بتلك النتيجة، حافظ نيوكاسل على سجله خاليا من الهزائم في البطولة خلال الموسم الحالي، بعدما حقق فوزه الثالث مقابل تعادل وحيد، ليتقدم للمركز الثالث بترتيب المسابقة، بفارق الأهداف خلف أرسنال، صاحب المركز الثاني، المتساوي معه في نفس الرصيد، فيما يبتعد كلاهما بفارق نقطتين خلف مانشستر سيتي (المتصدر)، حامل اللقب في المواسم الأربعة الأخيرة. في المقابل، توقف رصيد وولفرهامبتون، الذي تكبد خسارته الثالثة في البطولة هذا الموسم، عند نقطة وحيدة فقط في المركز الثامن عشر (الثالث من القاع)، علما بأنه ضمن 6 أندية مازالت تبحث عن حصد انتصارها الأول في المسابقة خلال الموسم الحالي. تابعوا البيان الرياضي عبر غوغل نيوز

title: Fédérale 3 : début tout bonus pour Issoudun, large vainqueur de Pompadour
content: Issoudun : 44 Pompadour : 15 Trente-deuxième minute de jeu et légère circonspection dans les travées de Frapesle : le petit promu Pompadour vient d’aligner deux essais du même Tronc-Rome et un 15-0 pour prendre les devants (10-15, 32 e ). Après son entrée sérieuse et efficace dans ce premier match de championnat, matérialisée par un essai du pilier gauche Boughellout en bout de temps fort (10-0, 10 e ), le RCI a baissé de rythme et sa garde. > À LIRE AUSSI. Fédérale 3 : le RC Issoudun entre en scène face à Pompadour On ne lui reprendra plus. C’est bien simple, à partir de cet instant, les Vert et Rouge de Corrèze ne reverront plus la couleur de l’en-but et celle des 22 mètres du RCI qu’en d’infimes occasions. Extinction du feu corrézien Pour voguer vers leur premier succès de la saison, les Issoldunois du tandem Ben Charada-Lagarde vont inscrire 30 points lors des 50 dernières minutes restantes. Un cavalier seul intimé dès le deuxième essai de Pompadour. Sur l’engagement, les « gros » du RCI mettent la pression et récupèrent le cuir. Ils ne le lâcheront plus durant deux bonnes minutes jusqu’à ce que leur capitaine, Joachim Robert, convertisse en aplatissant en coin (17-15, 34 e ). Très bon maestro du RCI, le Roumain Alexandru Afloare a embelli sa prestation d’un essai. © (Photo cor. NR, Serge Vialle) Le petit frein qui tenaillait les Issoldunois venait de lâcher. Et, juste avant la pause, la cavalerie déboule pour un essai d’école. Ducros...

title: Воени претставници на САД и на Кина разговараа за Тајван, Украина и тензиите во Јужното Кинеско Море
creator: Dimitar Gogov
content: Американски и кинески воени претставници се состанаа во Пекинг за да разговараат за актуелните прашања како што се ситуацијата во Тајван, руско-украинската војна и зголемените тензии во Јужното Кинеско Море, пренесува Бета. Aмериканската делегација на билатералните разговори за координација на одбранбената политика кои последен пат се одржаа во јануари, ја предводеше Мајкл Чејс, заменик помошник секретар за одбрана за Кина, Тајван и Монголија. – На состанокот е разговарано и за поддршката на Кина за Русија за време на војната во Украина, како и за активностите на Пекинг во Јужното Кинеско Море, изјавија од американскиот тим. Состанокот се одржа откако Чејс присуствуваше на форумот Ксианшан во Пекинг, којшто претставува одговор на Кина на дијалогото Шангри-Ла. Контактите меѓу двете страни беа прекинати во 2021 година, бидејќи ескалираа тензиите меѓу САД и Кина поради разликите за прашања како што се суверенитетот на Тајван, КОВИД-19 и економските прашања. Иако комуникацијата продолжи откако претседателите на САД Џо Бајден и на Кина Кси Џинпинг се сретнаа во Сан Франциско минатиот ноември, не е јасно дали разговорите би можеле да продолжат бидејќи во Америка наскоро ќе се одржат претседателски избори.

title: مبعوث دولي : قمة المستقبل فرصة حقيقية لإعادة النظر في آليات العمل الدولي وتفعيل مبادرات التنمية المستدامة و السلام العالمي - AARC مصر
content: نعرض لكم زوارنا أهم وأحدث الأخبار فى المقال الاتي: مبعوث دولي : قمة المستقبل فرصة حقيقية لإعادة النظر في آليات العمل الدولي وتفعيل مبادرات التنمية المستدامة و السلام العالمي - AARC مصر, اليوم الأحد 15 سبتمبر 2024 08:49 مساءً التاريخ: 15 سبتمبر 2024 ت + ت - الحجم الطبيعي أكد الدكتور محمود محيي الدين المبعوث الخاص للأمين العام للأمم المتحدة المعني بتمويل خطة التنمية المستدامة لعام 2030 أن نجاح أهداف قمة المستقبل التي تنظمها الأمم المتحدة بمقرها بنيويورك، يومي 22 و23 سبتمبر الجاري يعتمد بشكل كبير على التزام الحكومات بتنفيذ توصياتها والاتفاقات التي ستخرج بها. وقال محيي الدين في تصريحات له بمقر الأمم المتحدة بنيويورك إن المنظمة الدولية ستتابع عن كثب تنفيذ مخرجات القمة التي تعقد على هامش الأسبوع رفيع المستوى للدورة الـ 79 للجمعية العامة للأمم المتحدة واعتبرالقمة بمثابة قمة للحلول والمبادرات والفرص الحاسمة لإنقاذ ما يمكن إنقاذه من كفاءة وفعالية النظام العالمي القائم ومؤسساته المعنية بالسلم والتنمية ووصفها بأنها فرصة حقيقية لإعادة النظر في آليات العمل الدولي وتفعيل المبادرات المتعلقة بالتنمية المستدامة والسلام العالمي. وشدد على ضرورة التعاون الدولي والإقليمي الأعمق من أجل تحقيق التنمية المستدامة، خصوصا في المنطقة العربية التي تمر بتحديات كبيرة، بما في ذلك النزاعات والأزمات الإنسانية، لافتا إلى أن قمة المستقبل ستسعى إلى وضع حلول عملية لهذه التحديات، عبر التعاون الإقليمي والدولي. وكشف الدكتور محيي الدين، عن أن قمة المستقبل ستبحث ضمن جملة أمور، مسألة إصلاح النظام المالي العالمي بما يتلاءم مع التحديات الراهنة، مشيرا إلى أن إصلاح المؤسسات الدولية...

title: مريم كريم لاعبة منتخب الناشئين تحرز الذهبية الثانية في «عربية القوى» بالسعودية - AARC مصر
content: نعرض لكم زوارنا أهم وأحدث الأخبار فى المقال الاتي: مريم كريم لاعبة منتخب الناشئين تحرز الذهبية الثانية في «عربية القوى» بالسعودية - AARC مصر, اليوم الأحد 15 سبتمبر 2024 08:49 مساءً التاريخ: 15 سبتمبر 2024 ت + ت - الحجم الطبيعي أحرزت العداءة مريم كريم لاعبة منتخب الإمارات لألعاب القوى وشرطة دبي، الميدالية الذهبية في البطولة العربية للناشئين تحت 18 سنة، والتي استضافتها مدينة الطائف بالمملكة العربية السعودية، وذلك بعد حصولها على المركز الأول في منافسات نهائي 200 متر مساء اليوم، بمشاركة نحو 400 لاعب ولاعبة من 18 دولة، وشارك اللواء الدكتور محمد المر، رئيس اتحاد الإمارات لألعاب القوى في مراسم التتويج، بجانب مسؤولي اللجنة المنظمة. وتمكنت بطلة منتخبنا الوطني من انتزاع الذهبية محققة رقماً جديداً للإمارات «24.30 ثانية»، كما نجحت في كسر الأرقام القياسية للسيدات والشابات والناشئات في الدولة. كما تملك اللاعبة سجلاً حافلاً في حصد الميداليات الذهبية، إذ فازت بذهبيتي دورة الألعاب الخليجية الأولى للشباب «الإمارات 2024»، والبطولة العربية بجمهورية مصر العربية في مايو وأبريل الماضيين. وتعد ذهبية مريم كريم هي الثانية لها إثر تتويجها بذهبية سباق 400 متر مؤخراً، ليرتفع رصيد الإمارات إلى 3 ميداليات بعد فوز اللاعب سالم المقبالي بفضية رمي الجلة. تابعوا البيان الرياضي عبر غوغل نيوز

title: مرشح ترامب لمنصب نائب الرئيس يواصل خطابه المعادي للمهاجرين - AARC مصر
content: نعرض لكم زوارنا أهم وأحدث الأخبار فى المقال الاتي: مرشح ترامب لمنصب نائب الرئيس يواصل خطابه المعادي للمهاجرين - AARC مصر, اليوم الأحد 15 سبتمبر 2024 08:49 مساءً التاريخ: 15 سبتمبر 2024 ت + ت - الحجم الطبيعي استمر المرشح الجمهوري لمنصب نائب الرئيس جاي دي فانس، الأحد، في تغذية الشائعات العنصرية ضد المهاجرين الهايتيين المقيمين في ولاية أوهايو التي يمثلها في مجلس الشيوخ، رغم نفي حاكمها المزاعم بشأنهم بشكل قاطع. وتقع مدينة سبرينغفيلد منذ أيام في صلب الحملة الرئاسية بين المرشح الجمهوري دونالد ترامب والمرشحة الديموقراطية كامالا هاريس، مع انتشار شائعات غير مثبتة تفيد بأن مهاجرين هايتيين في المدينة يسرقون القطط والكلاب وغيرها من الحيوانات الأليفة لأكلها. عند سؤاله على شبكة "سي بي إس" عن هذه الشائعات التي انتشرت على مواقع التواصل الاجتماعي، قال فانس "سمعت عشر روايات من ناخبيّ في سبرينغفيلد بأوهايو ويمكن التحقق منها كلها وتأكيدها". وأضاف "بعضها صدر عن شهادات مباشرة مثل سرقة مهاجرين طيور إوز في حديقة لذبحها وأكلها". في الأيام الماضية، أدت هذه الادعاءات التي رددها دونالد ترامب خلال مناظرته المتلفزة مع هاريس إلى إنذارات بوجود قنابل وإغلاق مدارس مؤقتا مع وضع الشرطة في حال تأهب، فيما انتاب الذعر مهاجرين مقيمين في المدينة. وقال فانس "ندين جميع أعمال العنف والتهديدات"، مستدركا "لكن علينا أن نقول إن هذه المشاكل الفظيعة سببها سياسة فتح الحدود التي تنتهجها كامالا هاريس في سبرينغفيلد". شهدت سبرينغفيلد حيث غالبية السكان من البيض زيادة في عدد سكانها في السنوات الأخيرة. ووصل إليها حوالي 15 ألف هايتي هربا من الأزمة الخطيرة في بلادهم، بسبب الانتعاش الاقتصادي...

title: Tennis. TC Deux Tours : entre camarades de clubs
content: On n’était pas loin de l’ambiance des interclubs dans le cadre bucolique du TC Deux Tours à Hachimette ce dimanche avec des finales qui ont mis aux prises deux joueuses des SR Colmar, Valentina Jovicic (15/2) et Marion Cuenot (15/2), et deux sociétaires de l’AF Turckheim, Nicolas Fouquet (15/2) et Loann Lihrmann (15/3). Chez les dames, la toute jeune Valentina Jovicic, du haut de ses 12 ans, n’a pas craqué pour s’imposer 6-2, 6-3 face à Marion Cuenot. « J’ai toujours été en tête dans le premier set », souligne la jeune Colmarienne. « Je connais Marion avec qui j’ai joué en équipe 3 à Colmar. Je connais ses points forts et ses points faibles. » Le premier set en poche, Jovicic a peut-être cru un peu trop tôt à la victoire. « J’y suis allée un peu en rigolant et je me suis retrouvée menée 3-1. Mais j’ai réussi à revenir et à gagner. » « Une tigresse sur le...

title: Battery-powered devices are overheating more often on planes and raising alarm
content: Devices powered by lithium-ion batteries are overheating more often during airline flights and passengers often put them in checked bags that go into the cargo hold, where a fire might not be detected as quickly. Video above: Rossen Reports: Know your refund rights on international trips Overheating incidents rose 28% from 2019 to 2023, although such events remain relatively rare, UL Standards & Engagement said in a report released Sept. 9. E-cigarettes overheated more often than any other device, according to the report. In 60% of the cases, the overheating — called thermal runaway — happened near the seat of the passenger who brought the device on board. In July, a smoking laptop in a passenger's bag led to the evacuation of a plane awaiting takeoff at San Francisco International Airport. Last year, a flight from Dallas to Orlando, Florida, made an emergency landing in Jacksonville, Florida, after a battery caught fire in an overhead bin. More than one-quarter of passengers surveyed for the study said they put vaping cigarettes and portable chargers in checked bags. That is against federal rules. The Transportation Security Administration prohibits e-cigarettes, chargers and power banks with lithium-ion batteries in checked bags but allows them in carry-on bags. The rule exists precisely because fires in the cargo hold might be harder to detect and extinguish. UL Standards & Engagement, part of a safety-science company once known as Underwriters Laboratories, said it based...

title: Bilal Erdoğan'dan Fatih Altaylı'ya: Ahlaksız adam!
content: Dünya Etnospor Konfederasyonu Başkanı Bilal Erdoğan, AK Parti Genel Merkez İnsan Hakları Başkanlığınca Kocaeli'nin Kartepe ilçesinde düzenlenen "İnsan Hakları Eğitim Kampı"na katılarak, gençlerle sohbet etti. "Türkiye'de yurt sorunu olduğuna dair bir kamuoyu oluşturuyorlar" Teknoloji ve yapay zeka üzerine açıklamalarda bulunan Erdoğan, "Eskiden bir sürü insan bilgisayar başında oturuyordu. 'Troller' diyorduk ama artık o kadar trol istihdam etmelerine gerek kalmadı. Çünkü yapay zeka otomatik olarak belli kelimeler ile profilleri otomatik olarak yapabiliyor. Türkiye içinde bu çalışmaları yapanlar her cenahda vardır ama kazanan her zaman mecranın sahibi olan oluyor. Steril olan bilgi alma ortamımızda dünyanın gerçekliklerinden kopup, Türkiye'nin realitelerini oluşturmaya çalışıyorlar. Nedir bu' 'Türkiye'de yurt sorunu var' diyorlar. Türkiye'de yurt sorunu olduğuna dair bir kamuoyu oluşturuyorlar. Sanırsın ki dünyanın gelişmiş ülkelerinde bu sorunlar çözülmüş, Türkiye'de böyle bir sorun varmış. Biraz daha araştırıp, rakamlara baksanız Türkiye'deki devlet tarafından sağlanan yurt imkanının dünyanın hiçbirinde olmadığını görürsünüz" dedi. "Amerika, sosyal devlet anlayışının olmadığı bir ülke" Bilal Erdoğan, 10 yıl Amerika'da, 5 yıl da İtalya'da yaşadığını söyleyerek, "Başka ülkeleri bilme fırsatım oldu, çünkü başka üniversiteler ile iş birlikleri yapıyoruz. Yemek dahil aylık yurt ücreti 855 lira. Yemek de...

title: Ce Richelle-là était trop costaud pour Harre qui a manqué d’idées
content: Quatrième sortie pour Harre-Manhay et pas encore de succès. Les champions de P1 sont cette fois tombés sur un adversaire solide, rôdé à la série et ambitieux. Richelle, actuel leader de la série, a rapidement pris les commandes sur une inattention dans la défense harkaise. La messe aurait pu être dite dans la première demi-heure, mais les Liégeois manquaient plusieurs opportunités. Harre, avec Prévot dans la ligne arrière et Dewalque en pointe, a relevé la tête petit à petit, prenant davantage de risques dans les transmissions, mais sans jamais amener de danger dans le rectangle richellois, hormis à une seule reprise. Les échanges se sont équilibrés jusqu'à ce deuxième but consécutif à une petite erreur d'Olivier qui a refroidi les ardeurs locales. Ludovic Lejeune tentait d'amener plus de percussion au niveau offensif en joignant Roberty à l'isolé Dewalque, en passant en 4-4-2. Mais la maitrise et la puissance des joueurs de Richelle n'a pas permis à Harre de se créer une occasion digne de ce nom, hormis à la dernière seconde lorsque la reprise de Prévot a heurté le poteau. Les carences offensives d'Harre-Manhay sont criantes depuis le début et le staff semble chercher la bonne formule. Ni Beaujean, ni Dewalque, ni Debue ni Wilkin ne se sont encore imposés dans le onze. Avec un seul but marqué, Harre-Manhay sait où le bât blesse actuellement. Mais avec Libramont, Hamoir, Sprimont et Richelle comme adversaires pour débuter, Harre-Manhay...

title: THY'den kabin ekibine hakaret eden yolcu kara listeye eklendi
content: Sosyal medya hesabından açıklama yapan Üstün, "14.09.2024 tarihli TK1983 İstanbul-Londra seferinde kabin ekibi ve yolcularımıza karşı agresif tavırlar sergileyen ve sözlü hakarette bulunan yolcu uçaktan polis eşliğinde indirilmiştir. Uçağımıza maddi zarar veren B.G. isimli yolcu hakkında hukuki süreç başlatılmış olup, kural dışı yolcu listesine (kara liste) eklenmiştir." ifadelerini kullandı.

title: Pack of hyenas kill 25 sheep in Hamirpur dist
content: Kanpur: A total of 25 sheep , suspected to be killed by a group of hyenas , were found dead in Patanpur village of Hamirpur district on Sunday morning. The flock of sheep belonged to one Lalla Pal, who suspected an attack by hyenas that were frequently spotted in the area. Biwanar station head officer Dharmendra Singh said, "The investigation points to the involvement of hyenas in the gruesome attack. The carcasses will be sent for medical examination." District forest officer Anil Srivastava said, "The recent flooding of rivers in Hamirpur has compelled the hyenas to seek refuge on higher ground, leading them to target sheep as prey during their desperate search for sustenance."

title: Jedinstvo Franca: Oštećeni smo na pravdi Boga, a ničim to nismo zaslužili
creator: urednik
content: Utakmicu između Jedinstvo France i Dečić AdmiralBeta obilježio je sporan gol, tačnije, Tuzanima je priznat pogodak koji to nije bio. Danas se putem Fejsbuka oglasilo i Jedinstvo, a u saopštenji bjelopoljskog kluba se navodi: „Odlična igra naših momaka, odlično pripremljena utakmica od strane stručnog štaba, podrška sa tribina iskrenih ljubitelja fudbala, iako je velika kiša bila, ostaće u sjenci skandalozne sudijske odluke“, naveli su iz Jedinstva. Kako su dodali, sve je rečeno i sve je viđeno, kao i snimak i odluka koji su obišlli region... „Izvinjenje sudija i priznanje greške na poluvremenu nama, ovim momcima i publici ne znači ama baš ništa. Šta mi imamo od toga? Šta je opravdanje za loše suđenje tokom cijelog meča, ofsajde, faulove i ostalo...? Oštećeni smo na pravdi Boga, a ničim to nismo zaslužili. Naravno da smo reagovali gdje treba i kako treba, iako je svaka reakcija suvišna ovdje. Još jednom čestitke našim momcima, pokazali su kako se igra i u ovakvim utakmicama i ovakvim situacijama“, objavili su iz Jedinstva.

title: Ferrer le abre la puerta a Nadal para Málaga: “¿Por qué no?”
creator: Jaime Dávila
content: Éxito rotundo de la Selección española de tenis esta semana en la fase de grupos de la Copa Davis de Valencia. La Armada capitaneada por David Ferrer disputó tres eliminatorias en la ciudad del Turia y se impuso en las tres , un pleno de triunfos que le vale a España para regresar dos años después a la Final a 8 de Málaga (del 19 al 24 de noviembre) y hacerlo además como primera de grupo. El líder español, Ferrer, valoró en rueda de prensa, minutos después de la victoria definitiva de Pedro Martínez y Marcel Granollers sobre el dobles australiano , la semana de la Selección en Valencia y lo que viene por delante en Málaga, con el nombre propio de Rafa Nadal destacado. Semana redonda: “Ha sido impresionante, han luchado todos los partidos. Pablo ha jugado muy bien, cuando el partido empezó no fue fácil, y en el segundo set siguió creyendo en él. Al final fue increíble, estoy muy feliz por él porque ha estado mucho tiempo con la lesión y este momento es muy importante para él y para el equipo. Lo de Pedro ha sido una pena, enhorabuena a Alexei porque está jugando con mucha confianza. Pese a ello estoy feliz con el partido de Pedro. Y el dobles ha sido muy bueno, han estado muy bien, creyendo en cada punto que podían ganar. Ha sido increíble, estoy muy feliz por ellos y por mí mismo. Ha sido una gran semana, siempre tendré buenos recuerdos en Valencia. La semana, el ambiente del equipo... Ha sido todo muy bueno” Alivio tras el año pasado: “No...

title: RG Kar Hospital Incident: দেহ উদ্ধারের পর সন্দীপ ও অভিজিতের মধ্যে ফোনে কথা হয়েছিল, বৃহত্তর ষড়যন্ত্রের ইঙ্গিত পাচ্ছে সিবিআই
content: কলকাতা, ১৫ সেপ্টেম্বর: গত শনিবার রাতেই জুনিয়র চিকিৎসককে ধর্ষণ ও খুনের ঘটনায় গ্রেফতার করা হয় আরজি করের (RG Kar Medical College and Hospital) প্রাক্তন সুপার সন্দীপ ঘোষ ও টালা থানা তৎকালীন ওসি অভিজিত মণ্ডলকে। দুজনের বিরুদ্ধে প্রধান অভিযোগ ছিল তথ্য প্রমাণ লোপাট ও কর্তব্যের গাফিলতি। রবিবার অভিজিতকে হেফাজতে নেওয়ার জন্য শিয়ালদহ আদালতে সেকেন্ড জুডিশিয়াল ম্যাজিস্ট্রেট বিচারক পামেলা গুপ্তের এজলাসে তোলা হয় অভিজিতকে। সেই সময়ই সিবিআই এই ঘটনায় হাসপাতাল কর্তৃপক্ষ ও পুলিশ প্রশাসনের পক্ষ থেকে বৃহত্তর ষড়যন্ত্রের দাবি করা হয়। তাঁদের আন্দাজ দেহ উদ্ধারের পর থেকেই দুই পক্ষের চক্রান্তেই তথ্য প্রমাণ লোপাট করা হয়ছিল। এদিন আদালতে সিবিআই দাবি করে, দেহ উদ্ধারের পর অভিজিত ও সন্দীপ দুজনের মধ্যে ফোন দীর্ঘক্ষণ কথাবার্তা হয়। কল রেকর্ডস ও সিডিআরের মাধ্যমে তাঁদের কথোপকথন হয়ছিল সেটা প্রমাণিত। পাশাপাশি আরেকটি বিষয়েও সন্দেহ প্রকাশ করেছে সিবিআই। সেটি হল ঘটনার দিন সকাল ১০টা ০৩ নাগাদ টালা থানায় হাসপাতাল থেকে খবর যায়, তারপর কেন ১১টা নাগাদ ঘটনাস্থলে পুলিশ পৌঁছায়। কারণ টালা থেকে আরজি করের দুরত্ব এতটা নয়। আর এই সময়ের ব্যবধানে ক্রাইম সিনে একাধিক লোকের আনাগোনাও হয়েছে বলে মনে করছেন তদন্তকারী আধিকারিকরা। এমনকী দেহ ময়নাতদন্ত করে বের করে নিয়ে আসার পর তড়িঘড়ি কেন দাহ করানো হল সেই নিয়েও প্রশ্ন উঠছে। এদিন সিবিআই আদালতে জানিয়েছে, মৃতার পরিবারের সঙ্গে কথা বলে জানা গিয়েছে দেহ সৎকার করার আগে তাঁরা পুলিশকে দ্বিতীয়বারের জন্য ময়নাতদন্ত করার অনুরোধ করেছিল। কিন্তু পুলিশ সেই দাবি নাকি খারিজ করে দিয়েছিল। আর তারপরেই দেহ মর্গ থেকে বের করে দাহ করানোর জন্য পাঠানোর ব্যবস্থা করা হয়। ফলে ঘটনার...

title: Eight men drown trying to cross English Channel off Northern France
content: Nice: At least eight people died during a failed attempt to cross the English Channel from northern France , French maritime authorities said Sunday. The incident occurred Saturday just before midnight when authorities spotted a boat, carrying dozens, in distress near a beach in the northern town of Ambleteuse. A French rescue ship was deployed to the area, but could not offer assistance at sea. Once the vessel reached the beach, rescue services offered medical assistance to 53 migrants , a statement from the French maritime authorities in charge of the Channel and the North Sea said. "Despite the emergency care provided, eight people have died," the statement said. No people were discovered during the search at sea, it added. Six people were taken to hospitals in Boulogne and Calais "in relative emergency," including a 10-month-old baby with hypothermia, Jacques Billant, the Pas-de-Calais prefect, told French media on Sunday. He said survivors of the accident come from Eritrea , Sudan, Syria, Afghanistan, Egypt and Iran. title: Tato Vázquez: "Hasta ahora los profesionales de Urgencias se han formado por su cuenta y riesgo"
creator: María Boullosa
content: El aprobó el pasado mes de julio la creación de la especialidad de , una vieja demanda del sector sanitario que, en gran parte, ha salido adelante gracias al empecinamiento de profesionales como (Pontevedra, 1968), jefe de Urgencias del y presidente de la Sociedad Española de Medicina de Urgencias y Emergencias ( ). Es un salto cualitativo para la atención sanitaria en España que tiene tres grandes ventajas para el paciente, los profesionales y la planificación de recursos humanos. En el primer caso, creo que es más que evidente la importancia de que te atienda un profesional que está formado de manera homogénea, reglada y estructurada en las patologías tiempo-dependientes, es decir, en ese momento que nosotros le llamamos la hora de oro, que puede condicionar que el paciente pueda salir adelante o no. Significa más calidad asistencial y más seguridad, porque hasta ahora los profesionales de Urgencias se han formado por su cuenta y riesgo y, en cambio, los futuros médicos de este servicio se habrán formado para atender urgencias que condicionan la vida del paciente. Además, aproximadamente el 50% de los hospitales de España son hospitales pequeños, que no tienen todas las especialidades, y disponer de estos profesionales implica equidad en la asistencia. Pongo un ejemplo: si vives en Verín y sufres una parada cardíaca, el hecho de contar con un médico experto en Urgencias te da una garantía de supervivencia en un lugar donde no existen ni Cuidados...

title: Princess Diana 'always had major concern about Harry – and it's come true' warns expert
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Tim Hanlon)
content: Prince Harry had a “feeling of inadequacy” compared to William even as a young child that concerned Diana , a royal expert has claimed. The Duke of Sussex has had a frictious relationship with the Royal Family since leaving for the United States where he has been critical of his previous way of life in interviews with American media. And in his memoir titled Spare he discussed his upbringing where he was given the nickname that was the title of the book by his father Charles. Harry claimed Charles said to Princess Diana : "Wonderful! Now you've given me an heir and a spare - my work is done." In the book he expresses his resentment to the nickname and the way he would always be playing second fiddle to William as he writes about his childhood and royal role. And royal biographer Ingrid Seward has said that as a young child, Diana was worried that Harry felt inadequate compared to William. She told of a time when William was mentioned to Harry when he was at school and he reacted angrily. “[Diana] was very concerned about [Harry’s] feeling of inadequacy with William. Even when they were very little, when Harry went to Miss Minors, which was the baby school, after William had been there, the teacher there said to him ‘here Harry, play with this clay, William used to be really good at making model figures’," Ms Seward told The Sun . “Harry threw it down and said ‘no!’, so from a very young age, Harry felt inadequate. It was nothing to do with Diana, nothing to do with Charles,...

title: Carin León se convierte en el artista que más boletos ha vendido para una noche de concierto en el BMO Stadium
content: El cantante mexicano Carin León logró superar las marca de boletos vendidos para una noche de concierto en el BMO Stadium de Los Ángeles y ni siquiera la banda RBD, el grupo Fuerza Regida o Marco Antonio Solis han logrado superar los 24 mil boletos que el intérperet de éxitos como “Primerta cita” y “Te lo agradezco” logró vender para la noche del 13 de septiembre en el marco de la celebración de su “Boca Chueca Tour” en su paso por esta urbe. El ídolo nacido en Hermosillo, Sonora, México interpretó sus grandes éxitos musicales y enloqueció a sus fans, hombres y mujeres, desde el escenario que ha presentado a grandes figuras de la música mexicana hasta la fecha. Su concierto logró supertar las expectaivas e impuso un récord de asistencia para una noche de presentación. En repertorio incluyó también sus propuestas en el género country que han logrado conquistar el mercado hispano y el anglo. Con gorra o con tejana, el artista de 35 años de edad, sorprendió a las miles de almas que se congregaron en el emblemático estadio del centro angelino al lucir la camiseta del equipo local de Los Angeles Futbol Club, lo cual fue muy ovacionado por los fans que cada semana llenan el recinto para apoyar a la oncena de esta ciudad. “Boca Chueca Tour” es el nombre de este viaje musical que apoya su nueva producción del mismo nombre que incluye interesantes duetos, propuestas musicales innovadoras y fusiones más allá del regional mexicano. Donald Trump misgenders reggaeton star Nicky Jam at rally: 'She's hot'
content: Nicky Jam has pledged allegiance to Donald Trump , but the former president seemingly had no idea who the reggaeton star was when introducing him at a Las Vegas rally over the weekend. "Latin music superstar Nicky Jam. Do you know Nicky? She’s hot," Trump said during the Friday event at The Expo at World Market Center. Jam, born Nick Rivera Caminero, is male, which Trump acknowledged when the singer known in the Latin community for hits "Travesuras" and "X" (with J Balvin ) came to the stage. "Oh, look, I’m glad he came up," Trump said. Taylor Swift backs Kamala Harris: Popstar's endorsement sends more than 400,000 visitors to Vote.gov Need a break? Play the USA TODAY Daily Crossword Puzzle. Donning a red "Make America Great Again" baseball cap, Jam told Trump it was an honor to meet him."People that come from where I come from, they don’t meet the president. So, I’m lucky," Jam said. "We need you. We need you back, right? We need you to be the president." Born in Massachusetts, Jam grew up in Puerto Rico and is among several reggaeton stars who have endorsed Trump’s candidacy for president, including Anuel AA and Justin Quiles, who joined Trump at his rally in Johnstown, Pennsylvania, in August. Jam on Saturday seemingly dismissed Trump’s misgendering, posting a photo of the two on Instagram with the caption "Nicky jam la potra la bichota" and a string of laughing emojis. The comment translates, loosely, to "the filly, the big shot," the latter a Latin slang term...

IEI Visakhapatnam celebrates Engineers Day
content: Institution of Engineers (India) Visakhapatnam Local Centre (IEI Visakhapatnam), celebrated 57th Engineers’ Day at its premises at Dondaparthy, here on Sunday. Speaking on this occasion P.V.S. Ganesh Kumar, chairman of the centre informed that the day was being celebrated to commemorate the contributions of Bharat Ratna Mokshagundam Visvesvaraya on his 163rd birth anniversary. He stated that the theme for this year has been chosen as ‘Driving Sustainability with Engineering Solutions Embracing the Latest AI driven Technologies’. S. Jithender Reddy, Executive Director, BHEL (HPVP) was the chief guest. Debasish Chakraborty, Outstanding Scientist and Retired Director, ADRDE, DRDO, and U. Narayana Raju, retired Chief Engineer of A.P. Irrigation Department graced the occasion as guest speakers. K. Venkata Subbaiah, former Vice-Chancellor of JNTU Gurajada, spoke on the life and achievements of Sir Mokshagumdam Visvesvaraya. Mr. Jithender Reddy called upon all engineers to imbibe professional ethics and honesty displayed by Visvesvaraya all through his life. He narrated to the audience about legacy of engineering over the years from first industrial revolution to today’s industry. Mr. Debasish Chakraborti explained about sustainable engineering which leads to environment-friendly products He stated further that India as a country is moving towards the goal of sustainable society and the initiative launched by Prime Minister Narendra Modi for the exponential growth of semiconductor...

title: Tech billionaire returns to Earth after first private spacewalk
creator: Associated Press
content: CAPE CANAVERAL, Fla. — A billionaire spacewalker returned to Earth with his crew on Sunday, ending a five-day trip that lifted them higher than anyone has traveled since NASA’s moonwalkers. SpaceX’s capsule splashed down in the Gulf of Mexico near Florida’s Dry Tortugas in the predawn darkness, carrying tech entrepreneur Jared Isaacman, two SpaceX engineers and a former Air Force Thunderbird pilot. They pulled off the first private spacewalk while orbiting nearly 460 miles (740 kilometers) above Earth, higher than the International Space Station and Hubble Space Telescope. Their spacecraft hit a peak altitude of 875 miles (1,408 kilometers) following Tuesday’s liftoff. Isaacman became only the 264th person to perform a spacewalk since the former Soviet Union scored the first in 1965, and SpaceX’s Sarah Gillis the 265th. Until now, all spacewalks were done by professional astronauts. “We are mission complete,” Isaacman radioed as the capsule bobbed in the water, awaiting the recovery team. Within an hour, all four were out of their spacecraft, pumping their fists with joy as they emerged onto the ship’s deck. It was the first time SpaceX aimed for a splashdown near the Dry Tortugas, a cluster of islands 70 miles (113 kilometers) west of Key West. To celebrate the new location, SpaceX employees brought a big, green turtle balloon to Mission Control at company headquarters in Hawthorne, California. The company usually targets closer to the Florida coast, but two weeks of poor...

title: 'We're creating stories': JD Vance double downs on 'Haitian eating pets in Springfield' claim
content: Ohio Senator and Donald Trump 's running mate JD Vance on Sunday reiterated controversial claims about Haitian immigrants in Springfield , claiming that they are involved in disturbing activities such as eating pets. Vance maintained that his statements are based on "firsthand accounts" from his constituents, despite widespread backlash. "If creating stories brings the media's attention to the suffering in Springfield, then that's what I'm going to do," Vance told CNN. The controversy began with a misleading video that falsely linked a Haitian woman to an incident involving a pet. The video, debunked by USA Today, was from an unrelated event in Canton and had no connection to Springfield or Haitian immigrants. Despite this, former President Donald Trump and Vance have continued to promote these claims. Trump suggested that Haitian immigrants were causing disruptions and even taking geese from local parks, further fueling the debate. "A recording of 911 calls shows residents reporting that the migrants are walking off with the town’s geese. They’re taking the geese. You know where the geese are? In the park, in the lake. And even walking off with their pets," Trump said. Vance defended his controversial comments by arguing that they are meant to highlight the broader issues in Springfield that he believes have been ignored by mainstream media. "I’ve been trying to talk about the problems in Springfield for months, and the American media ignored it," Vance said. He accused the...

title: Patriots linebacker questionable to return in Week 2 battle vs. Seahawks | Sporting News
creator: Mike Masala
content: The New England Patriots made it through their first game of the 2024 season without having someone leave due to injury, but they won't be as lucky in the second contest. Early in their Week 2 battle against the Seattle Seahawks on Sunday at Gillette Stadium, Patriots linebacker and captain Ja'Whaun Bentley left the game due to a shoulder injury. The team announced shortly after that he's questionable to return to action. Bentley, 28, is in his seventh season with New England after they selected him in the fifth round of the 2018 NFL draft out of Purdue. He's ascended to a consistent contributor and leader of the defense. The Patriots may have some issues in the middle of their defense, as Sione Takitaki is on the reserve/PUP list. Until Bentley returns, they'll have to rely on Jahlani Tavai, Raekwon McMillan and Christian Eliss to man the middle in the second level. Hopefully, this injury isn't too serious, and he'll be back soon. title: Восходящая звезда сборной Казахстана забил в стиле Месси. Видео
content: Полузащитник « Тобола » Ислам Чесноков забил красивый гол в ворота « Елимая » (1:2) в матче 20-го тура Казахстанской Премьер-Лиги , сообщает Sports.kz. Сенсационный клуб вышел в лидеры КПЛ В компенсированное время, на 90+4 минуте, Чесноков совершил впечатляющий сольный проход, который завершился эффектным ударом пяткой и голом. Видео можно посмотреть ниже. После этого гола казахстанские болельщики начали сравнивать Ислама Чеснокова с Лионелем Месси. Впрочем, гол Чеснокова не спас «Тобол» от поражения: до этого «Елимай» забил дважды — отличились Ислам Машуков (10-я минута) и Никита Корзун (89-я) — и добился победы. После 19 сыгранных матчей «Елимай» идет на втором месте в КПЛ, а «Тобол» расположился на шестой строчке турнирной таблицы. Публикация от SPORTS.KZ (@kzsports)

title: Ganpati Utsav: মহারাষ্ট্রের মুখ্যমন্ত্রীর বাড়িতে গনপতি উৎসব, উপস্থিত সঞ্জয়, শিল্পা, গোবিন্দার মতো তারকারা
content: গনপতি উৎসবে (Ganpati Utsav) মেতে রয়েছেন মহারাষ্ট্রবাসী। বিগত কয়েকদিন ধরে লালবাগচা রাজা, খেতওয়াড়ি চা গনরাজ, মুম্বইচা রাজা, চিঞ্চপোকলি চিন্তামণির মতো বিখ্যাত পুজোমণ্ডপে ভিড় জমাচ্ছেন অসংখ্য মানুষ। এছাড়া সোশ্যাল মিডিয়ার রিলেও ভরে গিয়েছে গনপতি বাপ্পার নজরকাড়া মূর্তি। আজ রবিবার, তবুও এই উৎসবের মেজাজে বিন্দুমাত্রও ভাটা পড়েনি। এদিন রাজ্যের মুখ্যমন্ত্রী একনাথ শিন্ডে বাসভবনে ছিল গনেশ দর্শন অনুষ্ঠান। আর সেখানে তারকাদের উপস্থিতি ছিল লক্ষণীয়। #WATCH | Mumbai: Actor Sanjay Dutt arrived at Maharashtra CM Eknath Shinde's residence for Ganpati Darshan pic.twitter.com/joNF1wTWsZ — ANI (@ANI) September 15, 2024 বলিউডের একাধিক সেলিব্রিটি এসেছিলেন এই অনুষ্ঠানে। ছিলেন অভিনেতা সঞ্জয় দত্ত, গোবিন্দা, শিল্পা শেট্টি, দিব্যা খোসলা কুমার, অ্যাটলির মতো তারকারা। #WATCH | Mumbai: Shiv Sena leader and actor Govinda arrived at Maharashtra CM Eknath Shinde's residence for Ganpati Darshan pic.twitter.com/cGRS0SzCUg — ANI (@ANI) September 15, 2024 View this post on Instagram A post shared by Instant Bollywood (@instantbollywood) এছাড়া হিমেশ রেশামিয়া এবং তাঁর স্ত্রী সোনিয়া কাপুর, সুপারস্টার সলমন খানে ভগ্নিপতী আয়ুশ শর্মার মতো তারকাদেরও এই অনুষ্ঠানে দেখা যায়। View this post on Instagram A post shared by Instant Bollywood (@instantbollywood)
