title: Ντόναλντ Τραμπ: «Μισώ την Τέιλορ Σουίφτ» - Η ανάρτηση του πρώην προέδρου των ΗΠΑ
content: Θυμωμένος μπροστά στον κίνδυνο να χάσει δεκάδες χιλιάδες ψηφοφόρους, ο Ντόναλντ Τραμπ δήλωσε σήμερα ότι «μισεί» την Τέιλορ Σουίφτ, την Aμερικανίδα σταρ της ποπ μουσικής, η οποία λίγες μέρες πριν ανακοίνωσε την υποστήριξή της στην Κάμαλα Χάρις για πρόεδρο των Ηνωμένων Πολιτειών της Αμερικής. «Μισώ την Τέιλορ Σουίφτ!», έγραψε στο δίκτυό του Truth Social με κεφαλαία γράμματα ο πρώην πρόεδρος και υποψήφιος των Ρεπουμπλικάνων στις εκλογές της 5ης Νοεμβρίου . Κατά τη διάρκεια των MTV Video Music Awards, η Σουίφτ είχε πει στους εκατομμύρια νεαρούς Αμερικανούς θαυμαστές της να εγγραφούν για να ψηφίσουν στις επερχόμενες προεδρικές εκλογές. Αμέσως μετά την τηλεμαχία ανάμεσα στην Χάρις και τον Τραμπ, στις 10 Σεπτεμβρίου, η 34χρονη Aμερικανίδα σταρ είπε με ανάρτησή της στους 283 εκατομμύρια ακολούθους της στο Instagram πως θα ψηφίσει τη Δημοκρατική υποψήφια για την προεδρία στις εκλογές της 5ης Νοεμβρίου, διότι «αγωνίζεται για υποθέσεις και δικαιώματα που πιστεύω». Υπέγραψε την ανάρτησή της ως «άτεκνη γατομάνα», με αυτό το τελευταίο βέλος να είχε στόχο τον υποψήφιο αντιπρόεδρο των Ρεπουμπλικάνων Τζ. Ντ. Βανς, που προκάλεσε οργισμένες αντιδράσεις στη χώρα όταν χρησιμοποίησε τον όρο. Donald Trump has lost what little sanity he had left. Taylor Swift broke him. pic.twitter.com/LOOOZgFwtp Η ανάρτηση της τραγουδίστριας, η οποία έχει τεράστια απήχηση στους νέους κάτω των 30, κάτω από...

title: Lions' Aidan Hutchinson has historic 1st quarter with 3 sacks vs. Bucs | Sporting News
creator: Mike Moraitis
content: The Detroit Lions struck gold when they drafted Aidan Hutchinson with the No. 2 overall pick in the 2022 NFL Draft, and he quickly proved that once again in the Week 2 game against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers . Hutchinson recorded a whopping three sacks in the first quarter alone against the Bucs. His first sack came on the first drive of the game when the Bucs were threatening to score points on the heels of a Terrion Arnold pass interference. With Tampa Bay at the Lions' three-yard line, Hutchinson got to quarterback Baker Mayfield to secure an eight-yard loss and force the Buccaneers to settle for a field goal. Aidan Hutchinson already making plays 👀 pic.twitter.com/iSQmAh99BV On Tampa Bay's next offensive drive, Hutchinson got to Mayfield once again, this time near midfield. The Bucs were able to recover, however, and managed to grab a field goal a few plays later. Aidan Hutchinson with 2 sacks in the first 5 minutes of the game 👀 pic.twitter.com/JbGBTW0Bc9 Then, with about five minutes left in the first quarter, Hutchinson struck again with a third-down sack that forced the Buccaneers to punt. Aidan Hutchinson WITH HIS 3RD SACK OF THE DAY! He's on pace for 12 sacks today. pic.twitter.com/2bcnVtG7k0 https://t.co/rdd5ggl07L This is the third three-sack game of Hutchinson's career, tied for the third-most in franchise history. He's also just the fourth player since 1994 to record three sacks in the first quarter of a game. The other three are Chandler Jones, Chris Clemons and...

title: Harvey Barnes leaves it late to earn Newcastle victory at Wolves
creator: Carl Markham
content: Harvey Barnes’ brilliant strike completed Newcastle’s late turnaround as they won their first Premier League match at Wolves since 2011 with a 2-1 victory. With 15 minutes remaining the visitors were trailing to Mario Lemina’s first-half goal and looked to have run out of ideas after Eddie Howe’s triple half-time substitution appeared not to have made any difference to a lacklustre performance. A slice of fortune saw Fabian Schar, returning from a three-match ban, equalise with a 30-yard strike which deflected off the head of Craig Dawson but it was individual brilliance and not luck which brought the winner. Barnes exchanged passed with fellow substitute Joe Willock and cut inside before curling a superb shot into the top corner as Johnston was beaten for a second time inside three minutes. The goal extended the Magpies’ unbeaten start to the season, while stretching Wolves’ run to just one league victory in the last 14 games. However, it was far from convincing and Wolves will feel hard done by as they were the better team for the majority of the game with captain Lemina leading from the front. The Gabon international was given the armband at the start of the season and his roving role just behind the front line caused the visitors numerous problems after Newcastle’s early promise fizzled out surprisingly quickly. Striker Alexander Isak posed questions by dropping deep and from one such position he played in Jacob Murphy , whose shot was tipped over by Johnston on his home...

title: Infrastructures : Drains : 596 projets complétés
creator: Yasin Denmamode
content: Publicité Infrastructures 15 septembre 2024 21:00 Commentaire(s) Par Yasin Denmamode Partager cet article Facebook X LinkedIn WhatsApp Infrastructures Bassin de rétention à Belle-Source, Pamplemousses. Les opérations koup riban s’accélèrent alors que les murmures de dissolution du Parlement se font de plus en plus persistants. Ce dimanche a lieu le soft launch du flyover de Wooton et d’ici fin octobre, d’autres projets d’envergure, à l’instar du flyover de Terre-Rouge, devraient être ouverts à la circulation. Entre-temps, les travaux de drains et la gestion des risques d’inondations ont aussi connu des gros développements. À juin dernier, 596 projets de drains avaient été complétés. Ils ont coûté Rs 4,9 milliards. Pour rappel, en 2021, le gouvernement avait décaissé Rs 11,7 milliards pour 1 700 projets de drains à être complétés sur trois ans. Selon le ministère des Infrastructures nationales, plusieurs projets ont été complétés dans des endroits considérés comme flood-prone, tels à Fond-du-Sac et Piton. À Belle-Source, Pamplemousses, tout comme à Camp La Cloche à Pointe-aux-Piments et à Cottage, des bassins de rétention ont été construits. En tout, 14 endroits précédemment à risque sont désormais considérés comme résilients. À Rodrigues, des travaux ont eu lieu à Baie-Malgache, Port-Sud-Est et Anse-Ally. Drainsà Fond-du-Sac. Drains à La Paix, Piton. Bassin de rétention à Cottage. Bassin de rétention à Camp La Cloche,...

title: "Borovinić Bojović obmanjuje javnost, ljudi sa njene liste uništili sve"
content: A.J. MAŠKOVIĆ Kandidat na listi „Evropski savez – Boris Mugoša (SDP, SD, LP i građani) – Podgorica za primjer“, Miloš Mašković saopštio je da predsjednica Skupštine Glavnog grada, Jelena Borovinić Bojović, obmanjuje građane Podgorice tvrdeći da su krivicom političkih subjekata, koji su srušili vlast u Podgorici, blokirani brojni procesi važni za naše sugrađane. "Očigledno zabrinuta za interese Podgoričana, predsjednica Skupštine mogla je i sama podnijeti bilo koju inicijativu u skupštinsku proceduru, te uz konsultacije sa šefovima odborničkih klubova zakazati sjednicu Skupštine Glavnog grada. Međutim, odlazeća vlast nema dovoljno motiva da se bavi problemima i potrebama građana Podgorice, svjesni da nakon 29. septembra neće biti u poziciji da odlučuju o bilo čemu. A kako bi i mogli, kada su ljudi sa vrha liste gospođe Borovinić Bojović šampioni u partijskom zapošljavanju u prethodnih godinu i po, te su uništili gotovo sve čega su se dotakli", upitao je Mašković. Institucije i preduzeća kojima, kako je kazao, rukovode kadrovi Demokratskog fronta propadaju zbog anarhije po kojoj je prepoznatljiv njihov politički subjekat. "Jedno je sigurno, 29. septembra Podgorica će dobiti odgovornu i ozbiljnu vlast koja će Podgoricu učiniti gradom za primjer", zaključio je Mašković.

title: "Preispitaćemo ugovore za lokacije bivšeg hotela Fjord i URC u Kotoru"
content: A.J. DemokratskA alternativA Iz Demokratske alternative Crne Gore (DA) u susret lokalnim izborima u Kotoru poručili su da će preispitati ugovore za lokacije bivšeg hotela Fjord i URC (Ugostiteljsko-rekreativnog centara) u Kotoru i pokrenuti procedure za privođenje ugovorenoj namjeni ili vraćanje tih lokacija u vlasništvo Opštine. "Preispitivanje ugovora za lokacije bivšeg hotela Fjord i URCa u Kotoru zahtijeva detaljan pravni, finansijski i urbanistički pristup. Uz formiranje stručne radne grupe i temeljnu analizu ugovora, lokalna uprava može osigurati da se lokacije ili privedu ugovorenoj namjeni ili da se vrate u vlasništvo Opštine. Uvođenje strožih mehanizama praćenja transparentnosti tendera i aktivno uključivanje lokalne zajednice ključni su za uspješan ishod ovih projekata", naveli su u saopštenju. Kako su kazali, formiraće radnu grupu koja će se sastojati od stručnjaka iz oblasti prava, građevinarstva, urbanizma i ekonomije, kao i predstavnika Opštine. Grupa će analizirati sve ugovorne obaveze, uključujući rokove, uslove izgradnje i privođenja namjeni, obaveze investitora i eventualne pravne posljedice u slučaju neispunjavanja ugovora. "Detaljno će analizirati da li su investitori ispoštovali ugovorene obaveze. Ovo uključuje provjeru rokova za početak i završetak radova, urbanističko-građevinske uslove, i ugovorene finansijske aspekte. U slučaju da su investitori probili rokove ili prekršili uslove ugovora, radna grupa bi analizirala...

title: رابط مشاهده مباراة الاتحاد والوحدة اليوم رابط بث مباشر جودة عالية وبدون تقطيع 2024 لايف دوري روشين السعودي - AARC مصر
content: نعرض لكم زوارنا أهم وأحدث الأخبار فى المقال الاتي: رابط مشاهده مباراة الاتحاد والوحدة اليوم رابط بث مباشر جودة عالية وبدون تقطيع 2024 لايف دوري روشين السعودي - AARC مصر, اليوم الأحد 15 سبتمبر 2024 08:46 مساءً اليوم سوف تقام مباراة مهمة للغاية في الجولة الثالثة من دوري روشن السعودي، وسوف تجمع هذه المباراة بين الاتحاد والوحدة، كما سوف يحاول الاتحاد أن يحصل على العلامة الكاملة في هذه المباراة، وفي هذا المقال سنقوم بتوضيح موعد هذه المباراة ونعرض رابط مباشر لهذه المباراة لتتمكن من مشاهدتها بسهولة. في حالة ما إذا لم يكن باستطاعتك مشاهدة المباراة على التلفاز عبر القناة الناقلة لأي سبب كان يمكنك الاستعانة بالرابط المباشر الذي نوفره لكم، حيث بمجرد النقر على هذا الرابط ستفتح لك المباراة وسيتم بثها بجودة مناسبة ودون أي تقطيع. سوف يتم بث المباراة في يوم الأحد الموافق 15 من شهر سبتمبر الجاري لعام 2024، وسوف تقام هذه المباراة على ملعب الجوهرة المشعة بين الاتحاد الذي يسعى جاهدًا لتحقيق انتصار ساحق في المباراة والوحدة، بالنسبة إلى التوقيت بالتحديد سوف تقام المباراة في تمام التاسعة مساءًا بتوقيت القاهرة والسعودية. تم تأكيد أن مباراة الاتحاد والوحدة في دوري روشن السعودي سوف يتم نقلها وبثها عبر مجموعة قنوات SSC SPORTS، وستكون مهمة التعليق لهذه المباراة ل عبدالله الحربي ومدحت شلبي حيث أسندت شبكة قنوات SSC Sports مهمة التعليق لهم. نادي اتحاد جدة يسعى هذا الموسم بقوة للحصول على دوري روشن بعد أن استطاع تحقيقه في العام قبل الماضي، على وجه التحديد موسم 2022، والآن يتطلع للعودة مرة أخرى للمنافسة على اللقب الذي غاب عنه الموسم الماضي لصالح نادي الهلال الذي ظفر بالدوري في هذه المنافسة....

title: U poplavama i klizištima stradalo više od 100 ljudi, 320.000 privremeno raseljeno
content: B.B. [ Beta ] Uragan Jagi pogodio Mjanmar Više od 100 ljudi poginulo je u poplavama i klizištima izazvanim ostacima tajfuna Jagi koji je juče pogodio Mjanmar, prenosi Bi Bi Si (BBC). Portparol vladajuće vojne hunte Zav Min Tun rekao je u saopštenju danas da je potvrđeno da je umrlo 113 ljudi, a da se još 64 osobe vode kao nestale, iako regionalni izvještaji ukazuju da bi stvarni broj poginulih mogao biti veći. U međuvremenu, preko 320.000 ljudi bilo je prinuđeno da se evakuiše u privremena skloništa, navodi novinska agencija AFP. Glavni grad zemlje Nejpido je među najteže pogođenim, a lokalni mediji javljaju da su vlasti uspostavile više privremenih kampova za pomoć žrtvama koje su postale beskućnici. Najjača ovogodišnja oluja u Aziji, tajfun Jagi, pogodila je i Vijetnam, kinesko ostrvo Hajnan i Filipine. Vođa vojne hunte, general Min Aung Hlaing i drugi burmanski zvaničnici posjetili su poplavljena područja i pregledali napore za spasavanje i pomoć. Vladajuća vojna hunta je juče zatražila humanitarnu pomoć iz inostranstva kako bi se izborila sa posljedicama, javljaju državni mediji.

title: ”لسنا جنوبيين!”.. بن حريش يعلن موقفًا ناريًا ضد المجلس الانتقالي - AARC مصر
content: نعرض لكم زوارنا أهم وأحدث الأخبار فى المقال الاتي: ”لسنا جنوبيين!”.. بن حريش يعلن موقفًا ناريًا ضد المجلس الانتقالي - AARC مصر, اليوم الأحد 15 سبتمبر 2024 08:46 مساءً في تصريح سياسي ، أعلن رئيس حلف قبائل حضرموت، الشيخ عمر بن حريش، أن المجلس الانتقالي الجنوبي، الذي يتخذ من عدن مقرًا له، يمثل الجنوبيين فقط ولا يمثل أبناء حضرموت. جاء ذلك في تصريحات مصورة بثت يوم الأحد، حيث أكد بن حريش أن كل مجلس سياسي يجب أن يمثل الأطراف الشعبية التي ينتمي إليها، مشددًا على أن المجلس الانتقالي لا يعبر إلا عن الجنوبيين، في حين تمثل القوى السياسية الحضرمية أبناء حضرموت. هذه التصريحات أثارت جدلًا سياسيًا واسعًا في الأوساط المحلية، خاصة في ظل التوتر المتصاعد الذي تشهده محافظة حضرموت منذ أكثر من شهرين. ويعتبر هذا الموقف من بن حريش تصعيدًا كبيرًا في المشهد السياسي بين القوى الحضرمية والمجلس الانتقالي الجنوبي، ما يفتح الباب أمام مزيد من التوترات والانقسامات داخل الجنوب اليمني. محافظة حضرموت، التي تعتبر من أكبر المحافظات اليمنية وأغناها بالثروات، كانت خلال الفترة الماضية مسرحًا لتوترات سياسية واجتماعية، وسط مطالب متزايدة من القوى الحضرمية بالتمثيل السياسي المستقل بعيدًا عن المجلس الانتقالي الجنوبي. تصريحات بن حريش الأخيرة تسلط الضوء على هذا الانقسام المتنامي وتزيد من تعقيد المشهد السياسي في الجنوب اليمني.

title: Korać: Greške se događaju, sudija Savović nije imao namjeru da nas ošteti
content: S.V. NAPADAČ JEDINSTVA Napadač Jedinstva i najbolji strijelac CFL-a u istoriji, Žarko Korać kazao je da je njegov utisak, da sudija Miloš Savović nije imao namjeru da ošteti njegov tim. Podsjetimo, juče je sudija Savović, na asistenciju svog pomoćnika Uroša Rašovića priznao gol Dečiću, iako se jasno vidjelo da lopta nije prešla gol liniju, zapravo nije bila ni blizu toga. Meč je na kraju završen 1:1. "Jako mi je žao zbog svega što se dogodilo, sudiju Miloša Savovića znam dugo, radi se o velikom profesionalcu. Moj utisak je da nije htio da nam naškodi, jednostavno je bio trenutak nepažnje. Greške se dešavaju i kada se upotrebljava VAR, a ne kada ga nema. Igrali smo dobro i do tog momenta smo bili bolji. Poslije smo se vratili iz šoka i stigli do boda", kazao je Korać, gostujući u emisiji "Sportsko popodne" na TVCG. Kaže da je neprijatno iznenađen ponašanjem igrača Dečića u toj situaaciji. "Malo me iznenadila reakcija Dečića, nisu se ponašali kao šampioni. Ja bih sigurno rekao da nije bio gol", istakao je Korać. Na kraju se osvrnuo na dosadašnji tok šampionata. "Biće interesantno, šampionat je nikad jači, nikome nisu zagaranotvani bodovi. Dečić i Budućnost jesu favoriti za titulu, ali to ne mora ništa da znači", zaključio je Korać.

title: شاهد لحظة وصول الطائرات السعودية الثلاث ”برّا” إلى الرياض وكيف تم استقبالها - AARC مصر
content: نعرض لكم زوارنا أهم وأحدث الأخبار فى المقال الاتي: شاهد لحظة وصول الطائرات السعودية الثلاث ”برّا” إلى الرياض وكيف تم استقبالها - AARC مصر, اليوم الأحد 15 سبتمبر 2024 08:46 مساءً شاركت فرقة الدحة الشعبية بالمملكة العربية السعودية، في استقبال طائرات موسم الرياض الثلاث، لدى وصولها برًّا إلى العاصمة الرياض. ووثق مقطع فيديو نشرته قناة الإخبارية السعودية،، الفرقة وهي تؤدي الأهازيج، وهي موروث سعودي قديم، كانت تؤدى أثناء الحروب لبث الرعب في صدور الأعداء. جدير بالذكر، أن هذه الطائرات المنقولة ستستخدم في فعاليات بوليفارد Runway ضمن موسم الرياض. وفقا لوسائل إعلام سعودية.

title: İsrail’den Hizbullah hedeflerine saldırı
content: İsrail ile Lübnan’daki Hizbullah arasındaki çatışmalar sürüyor . İsrail Savunma Kuvvetleri tarafından yapılan açıklamada, Lübnan’ın güneyindeki Jarmaq kasabasında Hizbullah’a ait 20 roket rampası ve diğer altyapıların vurulduğu bildirildi. Açıklamada, “Fırlatıcılar İsrailli siviller için büyük tehdit oluşturuyor” denildi. Lübnan medyası da, Lübnan’ın güneyindeki Mahmudiyeh bölgesine çok sayıda İsrail hava saldırısı düzenlendiğini aktardı. Öte yandan, Lübnan’dan gönderilen 2 insansız hava aracı (İHA) Golan Tepeleri’nin kuzeyini vurdu. IDF ise, İHA’ların herhangi bir kasabayı vurmadığını iddia etti.

title: Reacher star Alan Ritchson's new movie is "virtually a silent film"
creator: Digital Spy
content: 's Alan Ritchson didn't have to worry about forgetting his lines whilst filming his upcoming movie Motor City. Set in 1970s Detroit, the gritty movie follows newly-released John Miller (played by ), as he seeks revenge after being framed and sent to prison. However, according to star Ben Foster, viewers can expect to see an unusual narrative style. In an interview with , Foster revealed that the movie will feature a little less conversation and little more action. "The film itself, Motor City — we just wrapped — is virtually a silent film," he shared. "There are five lines of dialogue. "Jack White is helping with the music, so it's like a rock disco revenge film. It's like a graphic novel, so it'll be interesting to see how that shakes out," Foster added. Directed by Potsy Ponciroli, Motor City will showcase a blend of various genres. Jon Berg, president of production at Stampede Ventures, described it as "somewhere between an opera, a music video and an ". Discussing the lack of dialogue, Berg explained that non-verbal communication plays a big role in the movie. "Emotion conveys without language being essential; the actors' performances are front and centre," he said. "Potsy has a killer vision for the film: dynamic camera, brilliant music, muscle cars and an immersive sound design surrounding badass action sequences." Elsewhere in the interview, Foster praised for his ambitious mindset. "He's very tall and very muscular and he's very handsome," Foster joked about his...

title: ارتفاع عدد الشهداء الفلسطينيين في العدوان الإسرائيلي المستمر على قطاع غزة إلى 41206 شهداء
content: ارتفع عدد الشهداء الفلسطينيين في عدوان الاحتلال الإسرائيلي المستمر على قطاع غزة لليوم الـ 345 على التوالي إلى 41206 شهداء، ونحو 95337 جريحاً، معظمهم من النساء والأطفال. وأفادت وزارة الصحة الفلسطينية، أنه تم استشهاد 24 فلسطينياً، وإصابة 57 بجروح مختلفة بعضها خطيرة، وارتكاب ثلاث مجازر ضد العائلات الفلسطينية، خلال الساعات الـ 24 الماضية، في قصف الاحتلال الإسرائيلي المستمر على قطاع غزة..مؤكدةً وجود عشرات الشهداء تحت ركام المنازل المدمرة في كافة مناطق القطاع، لم يتم انتشالهم لعدم توفر الإمكانيات والوقود اللازم لتشغيل المعدات.

title: Tux sieht rot: Linux Kernel 6.11 mit zahlreichen Neuerungen für AMD
creator: Marek Lindlein
content: Jeder Kernel-Release bringt Neuerungen, mal größere mal weniger bedeutende. Neben Unterstützung neuerer Hardware ziehen auch neue Funktionen in das ein. Besonders viele Verbesserungen gab es für AMD-Systeme und damit verbunden die Nutzung ruhender Funktionen in neuer Hardware. Großputz bei AMD Im Rahmen des Kernel 6.11 sind auffällig viele Verbesserungen für AMD-Systeme eingeflossen. Diese umfassen dabei nicht nur Grafik- oder Hauptprozessoren, sondern auch die Infrastruktur um die Systeme herum und die Nutzung bislang brach liegender Kapazitäten. Bereits im Juli eingereicht, haben die entsprechenden ihren Weg in den 6.11-Kernel gefunden. AMD führt diese als GC 12. Obendrein gibt es auch Fehlerbereinigungen für RDNA-3.5-Hardware in Strix Point. Moderne Prozessoren nutzen Stromsparmechanismen um ungenutzte Kerne herunter zu takten oder zu parken, ebenso gibt es Erkennung für den schnellsten Kern im System um Arbeitslast an diesen zu verteilen. All diese Funktionen stecken im speziellen Treiber.So zieht ein, welcher es erlaubt die Frequenz über die Vorgaben hin zu erhöhen solange Temperatur und/oder Leistungsaufnahme im Rahmen liegen. Eine ebenfalls neue Funktion im P-State-Treiber ist wodurch bessere Performance oder Energieeffizienz durch schnelleren und engmaschigeren Wechsel verschiedener ermöglicht wird. Neue Sensordaten gibt es ab sofort für Besitzer eines Asus ProArt X670E-Creator WiFi. Dessen Asus-Embedded-Controller-Sensor wird nun unterstützt, genau wie...

title: North Carolina customer shot and killed by Waffle House employee, 18
creator: Kia Fatahi
content: North Carolina police is looking for a customer who became so agitated while waiting for his food that he allegedly shot and killed a Waffle House teen employee. The incident unfolded at a Waffle House restaurant in Laurinburg shortly after midnight on Friday, when the suspect came into the restaurant and ordered food, the Laurinburg Police Department said . While his food was being prepared, the suspect allegedly became "more agitated and verbally abusive" toward the restaurant employees, according to police . After the suspect received his food, he allegedly walked out towards his vehicle at the parking lot and then fired two shots at the restaurant, striking one of the employees. The suspect then drove away in a dark grey-colored 2014 Chevrolet onto Scotland Crossing Drive toward West Boulevard. When police arrived around 12:45am, they found the employee - identified as 18-year-old Burlie Dawson Locklear of Red Springs - inside the restaurant with a gunshot wound. He was transported to Scotland Memorial Hospital where he later succumbed to his injuries. There have been no arrests so far, with police issuing an arrest warrant for the suspect - identified as 38-year-old Florwer Carlin Lizano - on suspicions of first-degree murder in the fatal shooting of Locklear. Lizano, also known as "Chulo" or "Carlos," is described as a black man with a light skin complexion, long dreads, and facial hair including a beard and mustache. He stands between 5-foot-8 inches and 5-foot-10...

title: واشنطن تتعهد بمواجهة «دعاة الحرب» ودعم الانتقال المدني في السودان
creator: رئيس التحرير: طارق الجزولي
content: اشتباكات مستمرة في الفاشر كمبالا: الشرق الاوسط: جدَّدت الإدارة الأميركية تعهداتها «بالوقوف مع شعب السودان لاستعادة الديمقراطية والحكم المدني، ومواجهة مَن يخوضون الحرب ويُهينون حُلمه وشجاعته». في هذه الأثناء، أعلنت قوات «الدعم السريع» أنها صدّت هجوماً شنّته القوات الحكومية في محور سنار، وألحقت بالقوة المهاجِمة «خسائر فادحة في الأفراد والعتاد»، بينما بقي الوضع في مدينة الفاشر طيّ الغموض. وقال المبعوث الأميركي الخاص إلى السودان، توم بريلليو، على صفحته في منصة «إكس»، الأحد، إنه وإدارته يقفان «إلى جانب الشعب السوداني في مطلبه الثابت بالديمقراطية الشاملة بقيادة مدنية». وأبدى بريلليو، بمناسبة «اليوم العالمي للديمقراطية»، احتفاءه «بثورة الشعب السوداني» ضد نظام حكم الإسلاميين، بقيادة الرئيس الأسبق عمر البشير، بقوله: «نحتفي بالشعب السوداني الذي ألهم العالم بانتفاضته لرفض النظام القمعي، ورفض السيطرة على مستقبله». وتعهّد بالوقوف ضد «الذين يخوضون هذه الحرب»، وعَدَّ تمسكهم باستمرار الحرب «إهانة للحلم السوداني، واستهانة بشجاعة السودانيين ووقفتهم السلمية»، التي أسقطت النظام القمعي عبر الانتفاضة الشعبية في 11 أبريل (نيسان) 2019. ومع أن بريلليو لم يذكر صراحةً الذين تعهّد بالوقوف ضدهم من «دعاة استمرار الحرب والاقتتال»، لكن الرجل كان قد سمّاهم بوضوح، في مناسبات صحافية سابقة، بأنهم أنصار النظام السابق، وأعضاء حزبه «المؤتمر الوطني» والإسلاميون. من جهة أخرى، تناقلت منصات تابعة لقوات «الدعم السريع» مقاطع فيديو تعلن فيها أن قواتها في محور مدينة سنار صدَّت هجوماً شنَّه الجيش السوداني قرب منطقة مايرنو، وألحقت به خسائر فادحة في الأفراد والعتاد، ولم يُعلّق الجيش أو...

title: The Truly Ancient Origins Of Vinegar
creator: staff@thedailymeal.com (Stephanie Oliveira Nguyen)
content: The last time you grabbed a bottle of white vinegar to utilize in your kitchen , you probably weren't thinking about the long and eventful sequence of human history leading to that very moment. The humble product, which is created through the twofold processes of fermentation plus acetification, is not a new invention by any means. Those with good culinary literacy may have heard of old-timey vinegar pie or of our forefathers pickling all the things. It's vinegar! It's been around forever, right? While vinegar being old is embedded in cultural awareness — there are several references to it in the Bible — most people are likely unaware of just how very (very) old it actually is. The stuff is not just retro; it's positively ancient. Vinegar is actually one of humanity's oldest foods, with its origins dating back somewhere between 4,000 and 7,000 years ago. Vinegar has been around for thousands of years Like many fermented ingredients, the first vinegar was probably the result of an accident. It has been posited that someone's wine went bad, and people discovered that the end product was still pretty tasty. Michael Harlan Turkell, author of "Acid Trip: Travels in the World of Vinegar," told The New Yorker , "It's not like we can talk to the Babylonians, but there's no way that vinegar was made with intent." Those Babylonians lived around 5000 B.C., and they left writings detailing the use of vinegar. Two thousand years later, the Egyptians also had access to vinegar, as...

That’s up from the same spot with 987 points last week. UO was No. 9 in last week’s AP poll and a new poll comes out later Sunday. title: Messi was Banned From Playing Football on First day at School for Bizarre Reason
creator: Max Bradfield
content: Lionel Messi was told he was too small to play football at his school when he was a kid. Human Growth Hormone injections helped Messi realise his footballing dreams. The legend went on to win more than 30 trophies with Barcelona in a glittering career. Lionel Messi is a phenomenal footballer and one that has been given many different nicknames throughout his highly storied career. For his exceptional exploits in Barcelona's glorious 3-1 Champions League final victory over Manchester United back in 2011, he was dubbed 'the Messiah'. He has also readily been branded as one of the GOATs within the football sphere (Greatest Of All Time), as well as 'La Pulga' (the Flea) and 'La Pulga Atomica' (the Atomic Flea). With the last two monikers, however, there are slightly tragic undertones. In Messi's youth in Argentina , the future star had issues with certain physical aspects while growing up and was once banned from playing football at school for a very bizarre reason. Lionel Messi scored 26 goals against his arch-rivals Real Madrid across his career at Barcelona. Banned from Playing Football at School Messi has been known as 'La Pulga' ever since he was a child, unfortunately, having been diagnosed with a growth hormone deficiency at the age of 11. His slight frame and modest height earned him the nickname of 'the flea' from his older brother, yet his reputation as a promising footballer, even at his early age, made waves and ensured that he was known for more than just his size....

title: Rangers step back from 'cliff edge' with restorative win
content: Rangers took a step back from what former Ibrox striker Billy Dodds suggests was "a cliff edge" to their season as they survived a stiff test against unbeaten Dundee United to avoid dropping further behind in the title race. Manager Philippe Clement suggests that the 1-0 victory showed "we are on the right track" despite a team rebuild after which "we need time to work on things". But time is never a friend in the Old Firm head-to-head at the top of the Scottish Premiership and former Celtic striker Chris Sutton claims "Rangers could easily go between now and 2 January and not lose another game in Scotland" yet still not narrow the five-point gap. So where does the win at Tannadice leave Clement's Rangers in their bid to wrest the title away from their city rivals? Clement was delighted with "a big result because it's a hard place to come to", especially as he "felt the synergy between the fans and the team". However, former Rangers striker Kris Boyd suggested on Sky Sports that, had they not responded to their 3-0 Old Firm derby defeat with a victory, fans would have been waiting at Ibrox "showing their dissatisfaction". Dodds agreed, saying on BBC Scotland's Sportsound: "They are on a cliff edge just now you feel with the Rangers fans. You can see them backing the team, trying to get them over the line, because they know how tense and nervous it is out there. "Rangers were vulnerable, but they got the job done. They are going to have to just keep chipping away until it...

title: K českej obci Troubky sa blíži povodňová vlna, všetkých obyvateľov evakuujú (video)
creator: Andrej Bančanský
content: V českej obci Troubky v okrese Přerov sa v nedeľu o 17-tej hodine začala všetkých obyvateľov. Hladina rieky Bečva sa totiž dramaticky zdvihla a povodňová vlna má do obce doraziť v noci na pondelok. Informuje o tom spravodajský portál . Keď Troubky postihla v roku 1997, zničila zhruba 200 domov a ďalšie museli pre podmáčanie zbúrať. Pri vtedajšej záplave zomrelo deväť ľudí. V meste Krnov sú podľa starostu Tomáša Hradila povodne ničivejšie ako v roku 1997. „ ,“ napísal na sieti X. Mesto Opava pre hrozbu pretrhnutia hrádze musí evakuovať ďalšie mestské časti. Evakuácie prebiehajú aj v Ostrave. Krnov zasáhly povodně ještě ničivější než v roce 1997. Celé město je pod vodou, bez elektrické energie a mobilního signálu. Podařilo se nám zprovoznit internetové připojení. Bojujeme! — Tomáš Hradil (@TomasHradil79)

title: Mikel Arteta delivers injury update as Arsenal hit again with Bukayo Saka issue
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Samuel Meade)
content: Mikel Arteta admits he doesn't know how Bukayo Saka is shaping up after he was forced off with an injury issue. Arsenal saw off Tottenham to claim the north London derby bragging rights , owing to a Gabriel header in the second-half. The Gunners were without several of their key men with Martin Odegaard injured and Declan Rice absent due to a suspension. Saka has now added to their concerns with the winger having to come off in the latter stages. He made it clear he couldn't carry on as Arteta is left to sweat on the fitness of another one of his key players with the games coming thick in fast in what could be a crucial week. Arteta said when quizzed on an update: "I don’t know. I made two changes with the front players and suddenly he’s down. I looked at the bench and the options that we had and we had to adapt. I don’t know exactly what it is but he could not continue." Arsenal will begin their Champions League campaign in midweek with a game against Atalanta before they travel to the champions. Manchester City have undone the north Londoners for the past two years and Arteta's men head up to the Etihad next weekend. The Gunners boss admitted they had a challenging run of games, but was ready to take it head on. He said: "I'm sure we're going to play Thursday and Sunday and then Tuesday. So it's what it is. We have to adapt to that. We're going to be a top team, a very challenging team that is up there. We're going to have to adapt to those things." Rice will soon return...

Am vergangenen Mittwoch hatte der SC Waldgirmes in der Fußball-Hessenliga das Mittelhessen-Derby beim FSV Fernwald mit 2:1 gewonnen, am Samstag folgte ein weiterer Sieg in einem Mittelhessen-Derby - die Elf von Trainer Mario Schappert schlug den VfB Marburg sicher mit 4:0. Vor rund 300 Zuschauern besorgte Mohamed Zouaoui per Handelfmeter nach 13 Minuten das 1:0 für seinen SC Waldgirmes, ehe in Halbzeit zwei ein Doppelschlag von Jacob Pistor (57.) und Javier Recio-Perez (Foulelfmeter) die Partie entschieden. Den Schlusspunkt setzte Karl Cost (80.).

title: Elias Khoury, outspoken Lebanese novelist, no more
content: Beirut: Lebanese novelist Elias Khoury who dedicated much of his writings to the Palestinian cause and taught at universities around the world, making him one of Lebanon's most prominent intellectuals, has died. He was 76. Khoury, a leading voice of Arab literature, had been ill for months and admitted and discharged from hospital several times over the past year until his death early Sunday, Al-Quds Al-Arabi daily that he worked for said. The Lebanese writer, born and raised in Beirut, was outspoken in defense of freedom of speech and harsh criticism of dictatorships in the Middle East. In addition to his novels, Khoury wrote articles in different Arab media outlets over the past five decades making him well known throughout the Arab world. Two days after the Israel-Hamas war broke out on October 7, Khoury wrote an article in Al-Quds A-Arab daily titled "It's Palestine." He wrote that "the biggest open-air prison, the besieged Ghetto of Gaza, has launched a war against Israel, occupied settlements and forced settlers to flee." title: Galatasaray kiralık göndermişti, ilk maçında gol attı
content: AJANSSPOR - HABER Almanya Ligi'nde 3. hafta maçında Mainz ile Werder Bremen karşı karşıya geldi. Mücadelede kazanan 2-1'lik skorla konuk ekip Werder Bremen oldu. Friedl kızardı Ev sahibi Mainz'in golünü 27. dakikada Jae-seong Lee kaydetti. Werder Bremen'in golleri 8. dakikada Marvin Ducksch (penaltı) ve 69. dakikada Derrick Köhn'den geldi. Konuk ekip Werder Bremen'de defans oyuncusu Marco Friedl, 60 dakikada kırmızı kart gördü. Derrick Köhn'den galibiyet golü Galatasaray'dan Almanya'ya kiralık giden Derrick Köhn, Werder Bremen'deki ilk maçında 10 kişi kalmalarına rağmen attığı golle galibiyeti getiren isim oldu. Yeni hedef; Bayern Munih Bu galibiyetin ardından Werder Bremen puanını 5'e yükseltti. Mainz 2 puanda kaldı. Almanya Ligi'nde gelecek hafta Mainz, Augsburg'a konuk olacak. Werder Bremen, Bayern Münih'i ağırlayacak.

content: Shares of Future Markets General, part of Kishore Biyani's Future Group, fell 2% on Friday to Rs. Closed at 12.47. The shares of the company have been in the upper circuit continuously for the last several trading days. It has seen a growth of 80% in one month. During this period, these shares traded at Rs. 6.87 (16 August 2024) to Rs. has reached the current price of 12.47. The stock has given a huge profit of 111% in the last six months. However, shares of Future Group have fallen 8% in the last five days. At the same time, this stock has lost a whopping 93% over the long term. Shares of Future Markets General are up 106% so far this year. It has increased by 103% in one year. During this period, the stock has risen from Rs 6 to its current price. However, this stock has suffered huge losses in the long run. It has decreased by 70% since 2019. On 25 October 2019, the share price was Rs 40. The stock is down 93% since 2017. During this period, its price has fallen from Rs 184 (8 September 2017) to Rs 12.41. Currently the market cap of the company is Rs. 71.76 crores is around. Let us tell you that the net profit of Future Market Networks was much higher than its revenue in the first quarter of the current financial year. The company's profit in the same quarter last year was Rs. 12.16 crore increased by 586 percent to Rs. 83.4 crores. title: Primer ministro británico, en el centro del escándalo por regalos de un multimillonario a su esposa
creator: RT en Español
content: El primer ministro del Reino Unido, Keir Starmer, está en el centro del escándalo político por caros regalos de su donante personal más importante y miembro del Partido Laborista, el multimillonario Lord Alli, a su esposa Victoria Starmer. Lord Alli, expresidente de la tienda de ropa en línea Asos, abonó los servicios de un comprador personal para Lady Victoria, así como ropa de marcas caras y arreglos, reporta The Sunday Times . Ahora el jefe del Gobierno británico podría enfrentarse a una investigación por incumplir las normas parlamentarias , al no declarar aquellos regalos hechos, según se cree, tanto antes como después de que Starmer asumiera el cargo. Según la guía del código de conducta de los parlamentarios británicos, deben registrar " cualquier beneficio otorgado a un tercero , independientemente de que este acompañe o no a un beneficio para él o ella" si el beneficio se otorga debido a su "pertenencia a la Cámara de los Comunes o actividades parlamentarias o políticas". "Sin duda alguna, los millones de pensionistas que tienen que elegir entre la calefacción y la comida aprovecharían la oportunidad de recibir ropa gratis para mantenerse calientes tras el cruel recorte de los laboristas", comentó el Partido Conservador sobre la polémica. A lo largo de este año, Lord Alli también ha regalado a Keir Starmer ropa de trabajo y varios pares de gafas por valor de 18.685 libras esterlinas (unos 24.500 dólares), y ha gastado 20.000 libras (unos...

title: Първите космически екскурзианти се върнаха живи и здрави
content: кадър бТВ Историческа мисия за SpaceX – екипажът, извършил първата в света комерсиална разходка в открития космос, се завърна на Земята. На борда бяха четирима цивилни – технологичният милиардер Джаред Айзъкман, пенсиониран американски пилот и двама инженери на компанията. В четвъртък (12 септември) Айзъкман, заедно с друг член на екипажа, прекара около 15 минути извън космическия кораб. Така те станаха първите непрофесионалисти, които се разходиха в Космоса. И още един успех – екипажът на космическия кораб достигна отдалечена точка, до която не са достигали астронавти през последните пет десетилетия. От НАСА заявиха, че мисията „представлява огромен скок напред за комерсиалната космическа индустрия“, разказа бТВ.

title: Speeding BMW kills two women in Indore; driver flees scene
content: NEW DELHI: Two young women lost their lives after a speeding BMW car driving in the wrong direction collided with their scooter in Indore. According to police reports , the driver of the car immediately fled the scene following the accident. The authorities have registered a case against both the vehicle's owner and the driver, and efforts are underway to arrest the accused. The tragic event occurred in the Khajrana area as Lakshmi Tomar and Diksha Jadon were on their way home after visiting the popular Khajrana Ganesh temple fair, the PTI reported. Witnesses reported that the BMW car crashed into their scooter, causing both women to be thrown onto the road. Despite being rushed to a nearby hospital, their injuries were too severe, and they succumbed to them. Manoj Singh Sendhav, the in-charge of the Khajrana police station, confirmed the details of the incident, saying, "Due to the impact, both women sustained critical injuries and unfortunately succumbed to them." Lakshmi Tomar, who hailed from Shivpuri, had been the primary provider for her family since her father's passing last year. She had relocated to Indore to support them. Diksha Jadon, a resident of Gwalior, was employed at a public sector bank in Indore. This accident comes months after a similar high-profile case that occurred earlier this year in Pune. On May 19, a Porsche driven by a minor under the influence of alcohol collided with a two-wheeler, resulting in the deaths of two IT professionals. Initially, the...

title: #Toluca: Reportan cadáver cerca del Mercado 16 de Septiembre
content: Un hombre fue encontrado sin vida al amanecer de este domingo cerca del mercado 16 de septiembre en el primer cuadro de la Ciudad de Toluca. Elementos de la Policía Estatal resguardaron la zona, y solicitaron la intervención del Ministerio Público. Se indicó que la víctima no tenía huellas de violencia, la parecer murió de una congestión alcohólica. Hasta ese momento nadie lo había identificado. Locatarios lo encontraron tirado sobre la banqueta en la calle Manuel Gómez Pedraza en el barrio de Zopilocalco. Vestía una chamarra café, un pantalón de mezclilla azul así como unos zapatos negros. Sin alguna seña en particular. La zona quedó resguardada a fin de que tomara conocimiento la Fiscalía General de Justicia del Estado de México FGJEM a fin de retirar el cuerpo a la morgue y conocer las causas del deceso.

title: Así detuvieron a un jubilado por robar dos paquetes de azúcar en un supermercado
creator: (Diario Crónica)
content: En las últimas horas, un hombre de 70 años fue detenido tras ser sorprendido con dos paquetes de azúcar, en un insólito robo ocurrido en un supermercado, ubicado en la calle Ituzaingó, en la ciudad de Salta El jubilado, residente de la zona, fue descubierto por el personal de seguridad del establecimiento mientras intentaba ocultar los productos entre sus prendas. El hecho fue detectado gracias a las cámaras de vigilancia del supermercado, que captaron el momento en que el hombre actuaba de manera sospechosa. Al percatarse de la situación, el personal de seguridad intervino de inmediato y dio aviso a la policía , que se presentó en el lugar para proceder con la detención. El anciano, cuyo nombre no fue revelado, enfrenta cargos por hurto. Sin embargo, se espera que las circunstancias particulares del caso , como su avanzada edad y la naturaleza del robo, sean tenidas en cuenta durante el proceso judicial. Fue ayer en zona céntrica de Trelew, y al automovilista le habría dado positivo el test de alcoholemia

title: Son Of Former DSS Boss, Abba Bichi Not On The Run
creator: Joy Anigbogu
content: LAGOS – The general public has been urged to disregard an online media report that the son of former Director General of Department of State Services (DSS), Abba Bichi is on the run, saying that the report is fake news. An online portal has been spreading fake news about Abba son of a former Director General of the Department of State Services (DSS), Yusuf Bichi was on the run after stealing his father’s $2m. Abba, who is a professional footballer based in Abuja and now searching for a prospective club in Germany, has debunked the fake news. According to video made available to journalists, the young lad in a podcast right inside the stadium in Germany told his father that his club just lost a match and his father was heard consoling him. He then asked his father to speak with his coach, and the father could be heard telling his son and coach that tomorrow is another day, adding that in life, you win some and lose some. Abba’s coach, Mr. Thomas, thereafter told his father that the next match would be against Bayer Leverkusen, and Bichi said the next outing would favour them. It would be recalled that some online portals have been engaging in a hatchet job to smear the image of the former DG who served meritoriously for more than six years as DG, DSS.

title: Tavares, surreale cambiare ora regole europee sulle emissioni
content: (ANSA-AFP) – ROMA, 15 SET – “Sarebbe surreale cambiare ora leregole europee” sulle emissioni di CO2, come richiesto da alcuniproduttori di auto. Lo ha detto il numero uno di Stellantis,Carlos Tavares, in un’intervista a France Presse. “Tutticonoscono le regole da molto tempo, tutti hanno avuto il tempodi prepararsi e quindi adesso si corre”, ha sottolineato. Secondo un documento informale pubblicato dalla stampa,l’associazione europea di settore Acea (che comprende Volkswagene Renault, ma non più Stellantis) chiede all’Ue di attivare unarara procedura di emergenza per rinviare di due annil’applicazione prevista nel 2025 di norme rafforzate sulleemissioni di CO2, spiega l’agenzia francese. Le regolecostringono le case automobilistiche a vendere più modellielettrici, pena pesanti multe. Ma negli ultimi mesi il mercatodell’elettrico in Europa non è cresciuto come previsto,soprattutto a causa del venir meno degli incentivi in Germania.Per Stellantis però non cambia nulla: “dal punto di vista dellaconcorrenza tanto cara all’Unione europea, sarebbe surrealecambiare le regole adesso”, ha affermato Tavares. (ANSA-AFP).

title: Houthi missile sets off panic in Israel, Bibi vows response
content: Jerusalem: A missile fired by Yemen's Iran-backed rebels landed in an open area in central Israel early Sunday and triggered air raid sirens at its international airport, in the latest reverberation from the nearly yearlong war in Gaza. Israel hinted it would respond militarily. There were no reports of casualties or major damage, but Israeli media aired footage showing people racing to shelters in Ben Gurion International Airport . The airport authority said it resumed normal operations shortly thereafter. A fire could be seen in a rural area of central Israel, and local media showed images of what appeared to be a fragment from an interceptor that landed on an escalator in a train station in the town of Modiin. The Israeli military said it made several attempts to intercept the missile using its multi-tiered air defences but had not yet determined if any had been successful. It said the missile appeared to have fragmented mid-air, and that the incident is under review. The Yemeni rebels, known as Houthis, have repeatedly fired drones and missiles toward Israel since the start of the war in Gaza between Israel and the Palestinian group Hamas, but nearly all have been intercepted over the Red Sea. In July, an Iranian-made drone launched by the Houthis struck Tel Aviv, killing one person and wounding 10 others. Israel responded with a wave of airstrikes on Houthi-held areas of Yemen, including the port city of Hodeidah. Artificial Intelligence(AI) Java Programming with...

title: Lorefice: “Don Pino Puglisi ha annunciato il Vangelo fino al sacrificio”
content: PALERMO – “Pino Puglisi lungo l’arco del suo ministero presbiterale come parroco e formatore di coscienze, soprattutto nell’ambito giovanile, ha oggettivamente posto chiari segni e parole di liberazione dall’oppressione mafiosa ma perché ha camminato come discepolo fedele dietro a Gesù, lo ha amato con tutto sé stesso, si è nutrito del suo Vangelo e lo ha annunziato da testimone autentico, da martire, fino al martirio di sangue”. Così, monsignor Corrado Lorefice, arcivescovo di Palermo, ha celebrato, nella sua omelia, durante la Messa in Cattedrale, il trentunesimo anniversario dell’uccisione del beato di Brancaccio, nell’avvio del nuovo anno pastorale. “L’anniversario della sua uccisione per volontà e mano mafiosa – ha detto Lorefice – ci sia di sprone a far nostra l’intenzionalità cristica, messianica, del presbitero di Brancaccio, del nostro fratello nel discepolato e nel presbiterato Giuseppe Puglisi, martire, testimone, di Cristo”. “Le nostre città sono travolte da una cultura dell’indifferenza , del profitto e della morte, dalla mancanza di un’etica sociale e pubblica, dalla violenza di strada, dallo spaccio delle nuove droghe che devastano i nostri giovani; sono sommerse dai rifiuti, ferite dalla mancanza di opportunità lavorative, dallo spopolamento, dalla dispersione scolastica, dalla marginalità periferica ed esistenziale che produce nuovi scarti umani”. “Carissime, Carissimi – ha concluso l’arcivescovo – è questo il luogo – l’Eucaristia, nella chiesa...

title: Nihat Kahveci: "Fenerbahçe performansına şükretsin"
content: AJANSSPOR - HABER Trendyol Süper Lig'de Fenerbahçe, deplasmanda Kasımpaşa'yı 2-0'lık skorla mağlup etmeyi başardı. Sarı-Lacivertli takımı Kontraspor YouTube kanalında değerlendiren Nihat Kahveci, flaş bir yorumda bulundu. Detaylar... "Gol yok ama çok kolay girdiler" Fenerbahçe'nin performasını değerlendiren Nihat Kahveci, "Ben Fenerbahçe'nin kendi 18'ine herhangi bir rakibin bu kadar kolay geldiğini görmedim. Gol yok ama çok kolay girdiler ceza sahasının içine" dedi. "Becao ve Çağlar da çok iyiydi" Sarı-Lacivertli takımın stoper ikilisi Becao ve Çağlar Söyüncü hakkında da konuşan Kahveci, "İrfan sonradan oyuna girince topu tutuyordu yine tuttu ama sen 2-0 olunca durdun. Kasımpaşa'da son vuruşlar sen gol yemediysen bu yüzden. Becao ve Çağlar da çok iyiydi" değerlendirmesinde bulundu. "Performansına şükretsin" Nihat Kahveci, yorumlarını şu sözlerle noktaladı: "Taraftar 10 yıldır Fenerbahçe'den şampiyonluk bekliyor. Seni güçlü oyun şampiyonluğa götürür. Ama bu futbolla bundan sonraki deplasmanlarda ne yapabilirsin bunu analiz etmen lazım. Fenerbahçe bugün Becao, Çağlar ve İsmail'in performansına şükretsin."

title: Deshaun Watson could lose guaranteed money if he’s suspended again
creator: Justin Tasch
content: When the Browns traded for Deshaun Watson in 2022, they gave the quarterback a five-year, $230 million contract that was fully guaranteed, including protections in the event of a suspension — which he eventually received after being accused by two dozen women of sexual misconduct during massages. With the 29-year-old facing new sexual assault allegations , it’s been revealed that Watson’s guarantees could now be in jeopardy in the event of a future NFL ban. NFL Network’s Tom Pelissero reported Sunday that Watson’s contract only contained protections for his guarantees against suspensions for the 2022 and ’23 seasons, but not for 2024 and beyond. A lawsuit was filed Monday in Houston by a woman alleging sexual assault, battery and intentional infliction of emotional distress against Watson during a date in October 2020. The Jane Doe accuses Watson of “aggressively yelling and screaming” at her when he couldn’t find her apartment, then laying face-down “completely naked” on her bed when he did arrive, insisting she massage his buttocks. She alleges Watson then penetrated her vagina without her consent. The quarterback denied the allegations . Watson did not play a snap during the 2021 season with the Texans after he faced 24 lawsuits accusing him of sexual misconduct. Twenty-three of them were settled confidentially. He was suspended for the first 11 games of the 2022 season and fined $5 million by the NFL. The league is looking into the latest allegations but they’re not yet...

title: KC Royals reflect on Roberto Clemente’s legacy during weekend series in Pittsburgh
creator: Kansas City Star
content: Roberto Clemente’s legacy is embedded in the ethos of . Clemente embodied the local blue-collar, hard-working mentality. His passion for the city made him a beloved hero and, with a short walk over the Allegheny River, his presence can be felt. His name is immortalized on the main bridge leading to PNC Park. Inside the stadium, Clemente’s No. 21 jersey is retired and displayed high above the stands. There is also a 21-foot wall in right field to honor the standout outfielder. More importantly, Clemente is an icon for his work off the field. His empathy and courage to help others lives on after his tragic death in 1972. And that’s why Clemente is so revered by the . “To actually be here for it, it’s really kind of emotional,” Royals manager Matt Quatraro said. “And to hear some of the stories and the guys that made it to (the Clemente Museum) and that kind of stuff, it’s just different. Something that you just dream about.” On Sunday, the Royals joined the Pirates in honoring Clemente. KC quartet , , and wore No. 21 jerseys in the game. The Pirates also wore No. 21 uniforms in Sunday’s game against the Royals. MLB allows current or former Roberto Clemente Award nominees to wear the number today. Players of Puerto Rican descent have had the option to wear the number in the past. Additionally, all MLB players will wear a “21” patch on their uniform sleeves. Active winners of the Roberto Clemente Award also have the “21” patch on the back of their ball cap. Today we remember the...

content: DASHI Energjia e gjallë dhe dinamizmi tipik i Dashit takohen me një javë që premton të jetë plot me zhvillime interesante dhe perspektiva të reja, veçanërisht në universin e larmishëm të financave dhe marrëdhënieve ndërpersonale. Të lindurit në shenjën e Dashit, të njohur për shpirtin e tyre sipërmarrës, do të zbulojnë se kjo javë sjell me vete ndezje të shumta drite në fushën financiare. Projektet fitimprurëse trokasin në derë, duke i ftuar ata të zhyten në sipërmarrje të guximshme, të cilat, ndonëse kërkojnë përpjekje dhe vendosmëri konkrete, premtojnë se do t’ua bëjnë punën e palodhur dukshëm. Shpejtësia me të cilën rezultatet do të fillojnë të shfaqen do të jetë një balsam për Dashin, duke konfirmuar se zjarrmia dhe shkathtësia e tyre janë vendosur mirë. Këshilla është që të mos frikësoheni nga sfidat, por t’i prisni me krahë hapur, pa harruar rëndësinë e menaxhimit të kujdesshëm të burimeve. title: Iran. Des centaines de manifestants à Paris deux ans après la mort de Mahsa Amini
content: C'est en scandant « Femme, Vie, Liberté » que des centaines de personnes ont marché dimanche à Paris, deux ans après la mort de Mahsa Amini, Kurde iranienne tuée pour un voile mal porté en Iran. Alors que pour « commémorer » le deuxième anniversaire de ce mouvement « Femme, Vie, Liberté », Chirinne Ardakani, avocate franco-iranienne, membre du collectif Iran Justice, a estimé que les « sacrifices » des Iraniens opposés au régime n'étaient « pas vains ». « Tout a changé en Iran, dans les mentalités, dans la société », a-t-elle déclaré. « On est passé d'une culture absolument patriarcale, où il n'était même pas question qu'elles puissent se dévoiler dans la rue, à un soutien massif à ces femmes ». Des prisonnières publient des écrits depuis leur lieu de détention, souligne-t-elle. « On a vu vraiment que le quartier des femmes de la prison d'Evin s'est imposé comme le bastion de la résistance dans cette lutte pour les Iraniennes, pour la démocratie, pour la liberté ».

title: ولي العهد رئيس الوزراء يتلقى برقية تهنئة من رئيس الأعلى للشئون الإسلامية بمناسبة ذكرى المولد النبوي الشريف
content: تلقى صاحب السمو الملكي الأمير سلمان بن حمد آل خليفة ولي العهد رئيس مجلس الوزراء حفظه الله، برقية تهنئة من معالي الشيخ عبدالرحمن بن محمد بن راشد آل خليفة رئيس المجلس الأعلى للشؤون الإسلامية، بمناسبة حلول ذكرى المولد النبوي الشريف.

title: Cel mai bun traseu turistic pentru această toamnă. Locul cu patru parcuri naționale și zeci de obiective de vizitat FOTO
content: Toamna este anotimpul care transformă peisajele naturale într-o simfonie a culorilor, iar cel mai bun loc pentru a experimenta această frumusețe este, fără îndoială, Banatul Montan. Această regiune spectaculoasă din sud-vestul României te întâmpină cu o bogăție naturală uimitoare, formată din patru parcuri naționale și peste 50 de rezervații naturale. Aici găsești zeci de obiective turistice , istorice și culturale care îți oferă o experiență de neuitat. Dacă ești în căutarea unei destinații care să îmbine natura sălbatică, istoria și tradițiile autentice românești, Banatul Montan este locul ideal de vizitat în această toamnă. Parcurile naționale din Banatul Montan sunt: Parcul Național Semenic – Cheile Carașului, Parcul Național Cheile Nerei – Beușnița, Parcul Național Domogled – Valea Cernei și Parcul Natural Porțile de Fier. Fiecare dintre acestea are câteva perle naturale, care sunt vizitate anual de mii de turiști. Cea mai veche pădure a Europei De exemplu, Parcul Național Semenic – Cheile Carașului este situat în partea centrală a Banatului Montan și impresionează prin peisaje spectaculoase și biodiversitate. Toamna, pădurile de fag și brad capătă nuanțe superbe de roșu și auriu, oferind o atmosferă de poveste. Aici găsim Rezervația Izvoarele Nerei, care se întinde pe o suprafață de 5028 ha și este una dintre cele mai mari păduri virgine din Europa. „Situată în Parcul Național Semenic –...

title: Lihtenştayn’da mutlaka görülmesi gereken doğal ve tarihi 7 yer
content: Alplerin eşsiz manzaraları arasında yer alan minik ülke Lihtenştayn, tarihi ve kültürel zenginlikleriyle ziyaretçilerini büyülüyor. Vaduz Kalesi'nin görkemli silüeti, tarihi köylerin taş evleri ve modern sanat müzeleri, ülkenin zengin bir mirasa sahip olduğunu kanıtlıyor. Aynı zamanda, yemyeşil vadileri, yüksek dağları ve kristal berraklığındaki gölleri ile doğa severlere de unutulmaz deneyimler sunuyor. Lihtenştayn'da gezilecek 7 yeri sizin için derledik. 1. VADUZ KALESİ Lihtenştayn'ın başkenti Vaduz'un tepesinde yükselen Vaduz Kalesi, ülkenin en ikonik yapılarından biridir. 12. yüzyılda inşa edilen bu muhteşem kale, 1700'lü yılların başından beri Prenslik Ailesi'nin resmi konutu olarak hizmet veriyor. Kalenin etkileyici mimarisi ve şehre hakim konumu, ziyaretçilere nefes kesici manzaralar sunuyor. Her ne kadar kale halka açık olmasa da, dışarıdan görünümü bile Lihtenştayn'ın tarihini ve kültürel mirasını hissetmek için yeterli. Vaduz sokaklarında yürürken, bu heybetli yapının şehre nasıl hayat verdiğini göreceksiniz. 2. WALSER MÜZESİ Triesenberg'de bulunan Walser Müzesi, bölgenin zengin kültürel mirasını keşfetmek isteyenler için mükemmel bir durak. 1961 yılında kurulan müze, Walser halkının yaşam tarzını, geleneklerini ve bölgenin tarihini canlı bir şekilde anlatıyor. Müzenin en ilgi çekici özelliklerinden biri, arazisinde bulunan yaklaşık 400 yıllık Walser Evi. Bu tarihi yapı, ziyaretçilere geçmiş...

title: Malkoç'un 'Gazze' konuşması engellenmeye çalışıldı
content: KAMU Başdenetçisi Şeref Malkoç'un, İtalya'da Uluslararası Ombudsmanlık Konferansı'nda yapacağı konuşma metninden Gazze ile ilgili bölümün, İsrail Ombudsmanlık Kurumu temsilcileri tarafından çıkarılması istendi. Engellemeye rağmen konuşmasını yapan Malkoç, Gazze'de yaşanan insan hakları ihlallerine kayıtsız kalamayacaklarını, İsrail'in kadın, çocuk demeden masum sivillerin, ibadethanelerin, hastanelerin, okulların bombalamasının vicdanları yaraladığını söyledi. Kamu Denetçiliği Kurumundan yapılan açıklamaya göre, Kamu Başdenetçisi Şeref Malkoç, İtalyan Ombudsmanları Ulusal Koordinasyon Başkanı ve Lazio Ombudsmanı Marino Fardelli'nin daveti üzerine gittiği İtalya'da Uluslararası Ombudsmanlık Konferansı'na konuşmacı olarak katıldı. Malkoç'un yapacağı konuşma öncesi İsrail Ombudsmanlık Kurumu temsilcileri tarafından konuşma metninden Gazze bölümünün çıkarılması istenerek konuşması engellenmeye çalışıldı. Engellemeye rağmen konuşmasını yapan Malkoç, ombudsmanların insan hakları ve temel özgürlüklerin korunması için çalıştığını, Gazze'de yaşanan insan hakları ihlallerine kayıtsız kalamayacaklarını, İsrail'in kadın, çocuk demeden masum sivillerin, ibadethanelerin, hastanelerin, okulların bombalamasının vicdanları yaraladığını söyledi. Gazze'nin tüm insanlığın meselesi olduğunu kaydeden Malkaç, özellikle böyle uluslararası toplantılarda devamlı gündeme getirilmesi gerektiğini ifade etti. 'BARIŞIN OLMADIĞI HER...

title: Iran. Des centaines de manifestants à Paris deux ans après la mort de Mahsa Amini
content: C'est en scandant « Femme, Vie, Liberté » que des centaines de personnes ont marché dimanche à Paris, deux ans après la mort de Mahsa Amini, Kurde iranienne tuée pour un voile mal porté en Iran. Des sacrifices « pas vains » Alors que pour « commémorer » le deuxième anniversaire de ce mouvement « Femme, Vie, Liberté », Chirinne Ardakani, avocate franco-iranienne, membre du collectif Iran Justice, a estimé que les « sacrifices » des Iraniens opposés au régime n'étaient « pas vains ». « Tout a changé en Iran, dans les mentalités, dans la société », a-t-elle déclaré. « On est passé d'une culture absolument patriarcale, où il n'était même pas question qu'elles puissent se dévoiler dans la rue, à un soutien massif à ces femmes ». Des prisonnières publient des écrits depuis leur lieu de détention, souligne-t-elle. « On a vu vraiment que le quartier des femmes de la prison d'Evin s'est imposé comme le bastion de la résistance dans cette lutte pour les Iraniennes, pour la démocratie, pour la liberté ». A lire aussi La marche, organisée par un collectif d'une vingtaine d'associations de défense des droits humains, a également reçu le soutien de Benjamin Brière et Louis Arnaud, deux Français qui avaient été arrêtés et détenus arbitrairement en Iran avant d'être libérés respectivement en mai 2023 et juin dernier. L'ancien otage Louis Arnaud présent L'Iran est accusé d'arrêter sans motif des Occidentaux et de s'en servir comme monnaie...

title: Hochwasser - Menschenrettungen in Klosterneuburg: „Lebensgefährliche Einsätze“
content: Die Feuerwehren der Stadt sind an diesem Wochenende im Dauereinsatz. Kommandant Benjamin Löbl ist seit gestern in der Zentrale. Mehrere hundert Alarmierungen - Menschenrettungen, Fahrzeugbergungen, Überschwemmungen - gingen in dieser Zeit ein. Das Notruftelefon läutet laufend: „Wenn du drei Einsätze abarbeitest, poppen fünf neue auf.“ Zeitweise waren alle drei Täler abgeschnitten, die Feuerwehr musste über den Haschhof ausweichen. Mittlerweile lässt der Regen nach, die Situation auf den Straßen verbessert sich. Die Lage ist aber nach wie vor prekär. Auch am Sonntagabend rückte die Feuerwehr per Boot zu Menschenrettungen im Donau-Überschwemmungsgebiet aus. „Jene Personen in den Siedlungen haben die Situation völlig unterschätzt. Man bringt sich selbst und die Einsatzkräfte in Gefahr. Das sind Einsätze, die sind wirklich lebensgefährlich“, findet Löbl deutliche Worte. Nur erfahrene Zillenfahrerinnen und -fahrer schaffen den riskanten Rettungseinsatz - und auch nur, wenn es noch hell ist. Klosterneuburg bleibt weiter im Ausnahmezustand, die Hilfsbereitschaft in dieser schweren Zeit ist groß. Löbl dankt: „Viele rufen an und fragen, ob sie irgendwo helfen können. Die Unterstützung der Zivilbevölkerung ist für uns sehr wichtig.“ Heute, Sonntag, haben auch Kameradinnen und Kameraden aus Baden mitgeholfen. Morgen kommen Einsatzkräfte aus Amstetten zur Unterstützung. „Wir versuchen jetzt in der Nacht die Einsätze mit höheren Prioritäten abzuarbeiten“, sagt...

title: Die Woche in Haltern: Kastanien an der Koeppstraße, ZUE für 10 Jahre und Ehrenamtstag
content: Im Sythener Dorfkern fehlt ein benötigter Briefkasten. Dazu wurde ein toter Bulle aus dem Hullerner Stausee gefischt. Außerdem erzählt Andreas Winkler von seinem Leben in Thailand. Bevor die neue Woche startet, blicken wir zurück auf die vergangenen sieben Tage. Diese Themen interessierten die Leserinnen und Leser in Haltern am See besonders. Starke Nachrichten aus Haltern Das war in der Region wichtig Das Wetter In Haltern kann sich tagsüber die Sonne nicht durchsetzen und es bleibt bedeckt bei Werten von 12 bis zu 18 Grad. In der Nacht ist ein Blick auf die Sterne nur vereinzelt bei sonst wolkigem Himmel möglich bei Tiefstwerten von 13 Grad. Mit Böen zwischen 21 und 34 km/h ist zu rechnen.

title: Das war die Woche in Dorsten: Kuhhirte gesucht, Bauernhof-Kita, Zwangsversteigerungen
content: In einer satirischen Anzeige sucht ein Bauer einen Cowboy, eine Bauernhof-Kita wird konkreter und zwei Wohnungen werden zwangsversteigert Bevor die neue Woche startet, blicken wir zurück auf die vergangenen sieben Tage. Diese Themen interessierten unsere Leserinnen und Leser besonders: Aus der Region Das Wetter In Dorsten iIn Dorsten bleibt am Tag die Wolkendecke geschlossen bei Temperaturen von 12 bis 17°C. In der Nacht stören nur einzelne Wolken den sonst klaren Himmel bei Tiefstwerten von 13°C.

title: Fisch essen bei Österreichs bestem Fischkoch
content: Lukas Nagl hat im Sommer sein drittes Lokal eröffnet. Foto: Tobias Müller Ich war lange der Meinung, dass Süßwasserfische eher uninteressant sind. Bis ich den Lukas Nagl kennengelernt habe. Der Mann ist seit über zehn Jahren Chefkoch im Bootshaus am Traunsee und hat mir gezeigt, was für grandiose Dinge man auch aus Süßwasserbewohnern machen kann. Er hat mich so nachhaltig bekehrt, dass ich ein ganzes Süßwasserfischkochbuch mit ihm geschrieben habe.

title: Im Heimspiel gegen Wanne: Königsborner SV verspielt die nächste Führung
content: Der Königsborner SV hat im Heimspiel gegen Wanne erneut den Sieg hergegeben. Wieder war das Team dabei zunächst in Führung gegangen. Eine Führung letztlich auch in einen Sieg übergehen zu lassen, scheint in der laufenden Spielzeit nicht wirklich das Ding des Fußball-Landesligisten Königsborner SV zu sein. Landesliga 3 Königsborner SV – SV Wanne 1:1 (1:0) Wie schon so oft gaben die Schützlinge von Coach Arndt Kempel auch gegen den SV Wanne 1911 erneut eine Pausenführung aus den Händen. „Allerdings muss man sagen, dass wir diesmal nicht zusammengebrochen sind“, so der Coach. „In Hombruch und auch gegen SW Wattenscheid haben wir Führungen hergeschenkt, weil nichts mehr zusammenlief.“ Das war diesmal gegen Wanne 1911 anders. „Es war ein Match auf Augenhöhe mit wenigen Torgelegenheiten auf beiden Seiten“, verdeutlicht Kempel. „Wir haben im ersten Spielabschnitt einen Umschaltmoment genutzt, Wanne hat das in der zweiten Hälfte genauso gemacht.“ Beim Königsborner Tor hatte sich Luca Becker gut durchgesetzt und auf den mitgelaufenen Val-Leander Wettklo abgelegt. Der Stürmer dankte es mit dem zwischenzeitlichen 1:0, das Wanne später (64.) aber ausgleichen konnte. Folgerichtig ging die Partie unentschieden aus, was in den Augen des Trainers auch den Tatsachen auf dem Feld entsprach. Foul an Leo Mayka erhitzt die Gemüter Dennoch gab es noch eine Spielszene, an der sich die Gemüter erhitzten. In der Schlussphase kam Königsborns quirliger Außenangreifer Leo Mayka im...

title: Im Dauer-Einsatz - Floriani aus Herzogenburg und Umgebung kämpfen gegen die Wassermassen
content: In zahlreichen Gemeinden in Niederösterreich ist die Lage weiterhin prekär. Allein im Bezirk St. Pölten sind über 2.700 Einsatzkräfte am Werk. Auch die Feuerwehren in und rund um Herzogenburg sind konstant im Einsatz. In mehreren Herzogenburger Ortsteilen kam es zu Überschwemmungen durch den Mühlbach und auch die Traisen stieg weit über ihre Grenzen hinaus. In einer Aussendung des Bezirksfeuerwehrkommando St. Pölten heißt es, dass in Oberndorf um die Mittagszeit zwei Personen aus einem vom Hochwasser eingeschlossenen Fahrzeug gerettet werden mussten. In Ederding kam ein Weinkeller zum Einsturz, es wurde allerdings niemand verletzt. Auch im Fladnitztal mussten die Floriani zu zahlreichen Einsätzen ausrücken. Neben Sandsäcken befüllen mussten auch umgefallene Bäume von Straßen entfernt, Keller ausgepumpt und Autos geborgen werden. Aber im absoluten Fokus stand es die Wassermassen zu bekämpfen und sie so gut wie möglich zu beseitigen. Einige Mitglieder der Wehren des Fladnitztal wurden auch auswärts eingesetzt, wie zum Beispiel in Hafnerbach. Im Gemeindegebiet von Obritzberg-Rust-Hain ist die Straße von Neustift nach Weyersdorf gesperrt. In Statzendorf ist die Sportplatzstraße Richtung ASV-Platz gesperrt, im Gemeindegebiet Wölbling der Verbindungsweg zwischen Noppendorf und Absdorf und die Straße von Viehausen nach Hessendorf. Laut dem BFKDO brach in Langmannersdorf um die Mittagszeit ein Damm in der Perschling.

title: Municipio Ezequiel Zamora se une a la campaña Monagas Vive
creator: Marines Rivas
content: La actividad Monagas Vive, permitió crear un espacio adecuado para hablar sobre la salud mental, compartir experiencias y ofrecer apoyo a quienes lo necesiten. Municipio Ezequiel Zamora se une a la campaña Monagas Vive. — Con una jornada de actividades recreativas y de concienciación, este 14 de septiembre el municipio Ezequiel Zamora se unió a la campaña Monagas Vive en el marco del Día Mundial de la Prevención del Suicidio. La actividad se llevó a cabo en el gimnasio cubierto de Punta de Mata, que desde temprano se llenó de vida con diferentes actividades culturales a cargo de la academia Neo Dance, el grupo de teatro de la iglesia apostólica Piedra Viva y Zumba Academia. Fabiola Millán, directora de la Fundación Casa Bolivariana de la Mujer Zamorana, expresó su satisfacción por poder compartir con cada una de las personas que se encontraban participando “en esta maravillosa campaña”. Para nuestro alcalde Oscar Cedeño, la vida es prioridad. Por tercer año consecutivo venimos realizando esta campaña que nos une a todos como familia, ya que todos somos importantes”, expresó. El evento permitió crear un espacio adecuado para hablar sobre la salud mental, compartir experiencias y ofrecer apoyo a quienes lo necesiten. Millán invitó a reflexionar sobre las estadísticas alarmantes de suicidio y a recordar que detrás de cada número hay una historia, una familia, un amigo que sufre. “Debemos trabajar unidos para brindar esperanzas y apoyo a quienes se...

title: Футзал ЖЧ: Қозоғистон Испания билан дуранг ўйнади, Афғонистон эса Анголани мағлуб этди
creator: Газета.uz
content: 14 сентябрь куни Бухоро ва Тошкентдаги ўйинлар билан футзал бўйича 2024 йилги жаҳон чемпионатига старт берилган эди . 15 сентябрь куни учинчи мезбон шаҳар — Андижонда ҳам мусобақа байроғи кўтарилди: водийда мусобақанинг «Д» гуруҳи вакиллари ҳисобланган Янги Зеландия, Ливия, Испания ва Қозоғистон ўз ўйинларини ўтказмоқда. Шунингдек, бу кунда Тошкентдаги «Ҳумо Арена»да «С» гуруҳидаги Афғонистон, Ангола, Аргентина ва Украина ҳам ўзининг илк ўйинларини ўтказди. 15 сентябрь, якшанба «Д» гуруҳи, 1-тур учрашувлари Янги Зеландия — Ливия 1:3 Голлар: Хорди Дитфорд (40) — Муҳаммад Хамис (7), Муҳаммад Зриг (28), Фирас Абуҳошим (40). Учрашувнинг энг яхши ўйинчиси: Муҳаммад Хамис (Ливия). Янги Зеландия учрашувни дадил бошлади, айниқса, ФИФАнинг бошқа бир мусобақаси — клублар ўртасидаги жаҳон чемпионатида профессионал футболчи сифатида ҳам қатнашишга улгурган Дилан Маникум «кивилар» таркибидаги энг хавфли ўйинчилардан бири экани кўриб турди, аммо ҳисобни Ливия футзалчилари очишди: Муҳаммад Зригнинг зарбасидан сўнг зеландияликлар посбони Михаил Антаманов қайтарган тўпни Хамис дарвозага тўғрилаб қўйди. Фото: ФИФА Иккинчи таймда Зриг барибир мақсадига эришди, ундан сўнг эса Фирас Абдуҳошим жорий мусобақада гол урган илк дарвозабонга айланди. Фақат ўйиннинг сўнгги сонияларида Дитфорд ўз жамоаси учун овунчоқ гол муаллифига айланди. Янги Зеландияни чоршанба куни яна бир жиддий синов кутиб турибди — жамоа футзал грандларидан бири ҳисобланган Испанияга қарши...

title: देश में जल्द लागू होगी समान नागरिक संहिता, मोदी सरकार करेगी बड़ा ऐलान
creator: Amod Rai
content: समान नागरिक संहिता (सेकुलर सिविल कोड) देश में जल्द लागू किया जाएगा. समान नागरिक संहिता के लिए पांच राज्यों ने समितियां बनाईं हैं.इन सभी 5 राज्यों की समितियों की रिपोर्ट शीघ्र आने वाली है.एक-एक कर इन सभी 5 राज्यों में समान नागरिक संहिता का कानून बनाया जायेगा. सूत्रों का कहना है कि5 राज्यों में समान नागरिक संहिता लागू होने के बाद आखिर में केंद्र सरकार अपनी ओर से पूरे देश में समान नागरिक संहिता लागू करने के लिए कदम उठाएगी. इस क्रम में उत्तराखंड ने समान नागरिक संहिता का कानून बनाया जा चुका है.उत्तराखंड के समान नागरिक संहिता को अभी तक किसी ने कानूनी चुनौती किसी अदालत में नहीं दी है. पीएम मोदी ने कहा था कि यह जरूरी है कि देश में एक धर्मनिरपेक्ष नागरिक संहिता स्थापित की जाए, तभी यह धर्म के आधार पर भेदभाव को खत्म कर सकता है. समान नागरिक संहिता (यूसीसी) सभी नागरिकों के लिए समान कानून प्रस्तावित करती है, चाहे उनका धर्म कुछ भी हो, जिसमें विवाह, तलाक, विरासत, उत्तराधिकार और गोद लेने जैसे मामले शामिल हैं. इसका लक्ष्य इन क्षेत्रों में धार्मिक कानूनों को दरकिनार करते हुए धर्मनिरपेक्ष कानून बनाना है. उत्तराखंड में भी विधानसभा में समान नागरिक संहिता को लेकर विधानसभा में कानून पारित हो चुका है. इसके साथ ही असम के सीएम हिमंत बिस्वा सरमा ने भी ऐलान किया है कि असम में जल्द समान नागिरक संहिता लागू किया जाएगा. बता दें कि समान नागरिक संहिता को लेकर पूरे देश में बहस चल रही है और इस बहस के बीच समान नागिरक संहिता लागू करने की केंद्र सरकार योजना बना रही है.

title: Premier League: Schar, Barnes inspires Newcastle United to 2-1 comeback win against Wolves
content: Newcastle United fought back from a halftime deficit with two long-range strikes in the space of five minutes to beat Wolverhampton Wanderers 2-1 at Molineux on Sunday and move into third place in the Premier League. Fabian Schar’s speculative effort took a deflection to draw Newcastle level after Wolves captain Mario Lemina’s 36th-minute goal had put the host ahead at the break as it chased a first league success of the season. ALSO READ | Premier League: Gabriel’s header earns Arsenal 1-0 win against Tottenham Hotspur in feisty derby But while there might have been an element of fortune about Schar’s 75th-minute goal, there was no luck involved as Harvey Barnes thrashed home a spectacular winner five minutes later. Both efforts came from outside the penalty area and dramatically turned around the outcome after struggling Wolves had dominated most of the encounter. Comments Related stories Related Topics Newcastle United / Wolverhampton Wanderers / Premier League 2024-25 / Harvey Barnes / Fabian Schar Latest on Sportstar

title: وصول سفينة مصرية تحمل مساعدات إغاثية إلى دولة السودان
content: تنفيذاً لتوجيهات الرئيس عبد الفتاح السيسى رئيس الجمهورية القائد الأعلى للقوات المسلحة بتقديم كل سبل الدعم للأشقاء السودانيين، وصلت إلى ميناء بورسودان بدولة السودان سفينة الإمداد ( أبو سمبل – 2 ) التابعة للقوات البحرية المصرية محمل عليها أكثر من 200 طن من المساعدات الإغاثية من مواد غذائية وإعاشية ومستلزمات طبية وأدوية مقدمة من القوات المسلحة المصرية ووزارة التضامن الإجتماعى ووزارة الصحة والسكان وجمعية الهلال الأحمر ، وذلك لدفعها إلى المناطق الأكثر إحتياجاً بدولة السودان الشقيق والذي تعاني الولاية الشمالية فيه من أضرار السيول.

title: إضراب 34 سجينة عن الطعام في إيران في ذكرى مقتل مهسا
content: أعلنت مؤسسة نرجس محمدي الحائزة على جائزة نوبل للسلام والمسجونة منذ العام 2021 في طهران، أن 34 سجينة أضربن عن الطعام في سجن إيوين الأحد، في ذكرى مرور عامين على اندلاع الاحتجاجات في إيران. وقالت المنظمة "اليوم، في 15 سبتمبر 2024، أضربت 34 سجينة سياسية في سجن إيوين عن الطعام إحياء للذكرى الثانية لحركة "امرأة، حياة، حرية" ومقتل مهسا أميني". وكان مقتل الشابة الإيرانية الكردية مهسا أميني، بعد أيام من توقيفها لدى شرطة الأخلاق في طهران على خلفية عدم التزامها قواعد اللباس الصارمة، قد أثار احتجاجات في أنحاء البلاد".

title: قيادة الجيش اللبناني تعلن تحرير مخطوف عراقي عند الحدود اللبنانية – السورية

title: الجيش الإسرائيلي يعلن استهداف منصات صواريخ لحزب الله
content: أعلن المتحدّث باسم الجيش الإسرائيلي افيخاي أدرعي، في منشور على حسابه عبر منصة “إكس”، أن “جيش الدفاع يغير على منصة صاروخية جاهزة لإطلاق وعدة منصات صاروخية أخرى لحزب الله في جنوب لبنان”. وأضاف: “قبل قليل أغارت طائرات حربية على منصات صاروخية لحزب الله ومن بينها منصة صاروخية جاهزة للإطلاق في منطقة رشيا الفخار في جنوب لبنان”. وتابع: “بعد قصف المنصة تم رصد انفجارات ثانوية تدل على وجود قذائف صاروخية داخل المنصة، وخلال اليوم قصف جيش الدفاع بالمدفعية نحو عدة مناطق في جنوب لبنان”.

title: Haitians in Ohio find solidarity at church after chaotic week of false pet-eating claims
creator: Associated Press
content: SPRINGFIELD, Ohio — Many Haitian immigrants spend Sunday mornings in Springfield, Ohio, joyfully worshipping God as they sing and pray in their native Creole. This Sunday, they needed that uplifting balm more than ever. Their community is reeling — confused, frustrated, hurt — from false accusations that they are eating their neighbor’s cats and dogs. The now viral and highly politicized rumors are being fueled by former President Donald Trump, his running mate JD Vance and others, and violent threats against the community are upending daily life in their city. “Jesus is with us in truth, and the truth is that Haitians are not eating pets and geese in Springfield,” said the Rev. Carl Ruby, preaching at Central Christian Church. He invited community members to join his congregation in prayer and peaceful protest of the false rumors leveled against their Haitian neighbors. They also demanded an apology. “It is truth that a retraction of these rumors will help to restore peace in Springfield,” Ruby said. “We respectfully call on all politicians and media figures who are promoting this rumor to help make Springfield great and safe again by speaking the truth about our community.” Viles Dorsainvil, the leader of Haitian Community Help and Support Center in Springfield, accepted Ruby’s invitation to worship together at Central Christian, and was grateful to be relying on his faith. “It’s important to be here because we’re Christian — despite everything, we worship in good times...

title: آیا خامنه‌ای از تله اتمی راه نجاتی دارد؟
creator: mehdi beigi
content: یک سال و چند روز (۱۶ مهر ۱۴۰۴) به پایان مهلت قطعنامه ۲۲۳۱ شورای امنیت علیه برنامه هسته‌ای ایران مانده است. با اختلافات و نقض فاحش برجام که از سوی حکومت ایران صورت گرفته، به نظر می‌رسد خامنه‌ای راه گریزی از تله اتمی که در آن گرفتار شده، ندارد. شورای حکام آژانس بین‌المللی انرژی اتمی نخستین نشست خود را پس از آغاز ریاست جمهوری مسعود پزشکیان برگزار کرد. به دلیل مذاکراتی که در شورا عمدتاً از دید رسانه‌ها دور مانده‌اند، ممکن است این تصور ایجاد شود که بحران هسته‌ای حکومت ایران به حالت آرامش رسیده است. اما محتوای گفت‌وگوها نشان می‌دهد که شمارش معکوس برای افزایش تنش‌ها و گیر افتادن خامنه‌ای در تله اتمی، پیش از مهرماه ۱۴۰۴ آغاز شده است. اگرچه قطعنامه‌ای در پایان نشست صادر نشد، اما موضوعات مربوط به حکومت ایران در آژانس با توجه به اتهام‌هایی مبنی بر ارسال موشک‌های بالستیک به روسیه در جنگ اوکراین، قطعنامه ۲۲۳۱ را به پیش کشید. تکلیف این قطعنامه باید پیش از ۱۶ مهرماه ۱۴۰۴ مشخص شود. در اجلاس فصلی شورای حکام که در وین برگزار شد، رافائل گروسی، مدیرکل آژانس، گزارش داد که با وجود عدم همکاری کامل حکومت ایران، ارزیابی بازرسان درباره برنامه هسته‌ای این کشور ناقص است. گروسی اشاره کرد که حکومت ایران هیچ پاسخی به پرسش‌های قبلی آژانس درباره کشف ذرات اورانیوم طبیعی و آزمایش انفجاری در آباده، که در سلاح‌های هسته‌ای کاربرد دارد، نداده است. اما این گزارش مکتوب گروسی است، که معیار اصلی تصمیم‌گیری در شورای حکام است. این گزارش مشابه گزارش سه ماه پیش و حاکی از گرفتاربودن خامنه‌ای در تله اتمی است. نگرانی‌ها در گزارش گروسی به شورای حکام منعکس شده و مبنای اصلی تصمیم‌گیری اعضاء درباره رفتار هسته‌ای...
