WVU Extension’s Energy Express awarded grant to help teachers
creator: Submitted to The Dominion Post
content: West Virginia University Extension’s Energy Express program has been awarded a $50,000 Sparking Early Literacy Growth grant, a statewide initiative to enhance literacy instruction for elementary-aged children. The grant was made possible by the West Virginia Public Education Collaborative and the Claude Worthington Benedum Foundation. This funding will kickstart the creation of the Energy Express Literacy Leaders program. The Literacy Leaders program will engage up to 10 site supervisors who are certified teachers in an action research project that focuses on supporting and extending early elementary-aged students’ learning through a literacy activity plan. Throughout the grant cycle, Energy Express site supervisors will participate in monthly meetings and enroll in literacy education graduate coursework through WVU to become certified reading specialists. Participants also will conduct a research project based on the Energy Express curriculum, looking at specific lesson plans. They will examine the plans to pinpoint activities that are effective and promote literacy, while also suggesting solutions to improve upon the current methods to create the best possible learning environment. Each participant will cover a specific area of the lesson plan — like writing or art — and present their findings at the annual Energy Express conference next summer. Teachers must have their application endorsed by a school administrator or fellow teacher who will support their professional...

title: İstanbul Gençlikspor Çeyrek Finale Yükseldi
creator: Anadolu Ajansı
content: Voleybol: Erkekler AXA Sigorta Kupa Voley İstanbul Gençlikspor , Cizre Belediyespor'u 3-1 yenerek çeyrek finale yükseldi. Karşılaşma Detayları AXA Sigorta Kupa Voley 3. grupta mücadele eden İstanbul Gençlikspor, Ankara'daki TVF Ziraat Bankkart Voleybol Salonu'nda gerçekleşen maçta Cizre Belediyespor'u 3-1'lik skorla geçerek çeyrek finale yükselmeyi başardı. Maçta set sonuçları; 18-25, 25-23, 25-17 ve 28-26 şeklinde oluştu. Böylece İstanbul Gençlikspor, 3. grubu ilk sırada tamamlayarak çeyrek finale hak kazanmış oldu. Organizasyonda grup maçları sona ererken, Arkas Spor ve Altekma da daha önce çeyrek finale adını yazdırmayı başarmıştı. Çeyrek Finale Yükselen Takımlar Geçtiğimiz sezon Efeler Ligi'nde ilk 5 sıraya yerleşen Halkbank , Fenerbahçe Medicana , Ziraat Bankkart , Galatasaray HDI Sigorta ve Spor Toto ekipleri, kupada çeyrek finalden oyuna başlayacaklar.

title: ‘I don’t like those comments’: JD Vance, married to an Indian-American, distances himself from Laura Loomer’s racist slur

title: Maltempo, 8 morti per tempesta Boris fra Romania, Polonia e Austria
creator: Redazione Sky TG24
content: Sei vittime si sono registrate solo nella regione rumena di Galati. Piogge torrenziali e inondazioni hanno colpito anche Repubblica Ceca, dove quasi 50.000 case sono rimaste senza elettricità, e Slovacchia. title: Covid XEC: All you need to know about new 'more contagious' variant and symptoms to look out for
content: Covid XEC: All you need to know about new 'more contagious' variant and symptoms to look out for By Matt Drake Published: 13:28 EDT, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 13:58 EDT, 15 September 2024 e-mail 34 shares 18 View comments A new 'stronger' Covid variant is spreading across Europe and the world, as experts warn it is 'just getting started'. The XEC strain was first detected in Germany in June and has been identified in 15 countries across three continents. According to experts, the strain could become the dominant variant within months when the weather gets cold. Director of the Scripps Research Translational Institute in California Eric Topol said XEC is 'just getting started now around the world and here'. Speaking to the LA Times , he added: 'And that's going to take many weeks, a couple months, before it really takes hold and starts to cause a wave. The XEC strain was first detected in Germany in June and has been identified in 15 countries across three continents. (Stock photo) The XEC strain could become dominant within weeks or months when the weather gets colder 'XEC is definitely taking charge. That does appear to be the next variant. 'But it's months off from getting into high levels.' title: MKE Ankaragücü’nde fatura Cihat Arslan’a kesildi
content: MKE Ankaragücü, Teknik Direktör Cihat Arslan’ın görevine son verdi. Trendyol 1. Lig kulüplerinden MKE Ankaragücü, Fatih Karagümrük karşısında alınan 3-2’lik mağlubiyetin ardından Cihat Arslan’la yollarını ayırdı. Ankara temsilcisi, söz konusu kararı şu ifadelerle duyurdu: "Teknik direktörümüz Cihat Arslan ile yapılan görüşmelerin ardından karşılıklı olarak anlaşılarak yollarımızın ayrılması konusunda mutabakata varılmıştır. Cihat Arslan'a emekleri için teşekkür eder, bundan sonraki kariyerinde başarılar dileriz."

title: Filistin'den Ayşenur Ezgi Eygi adımı... Mahkemeye taşıyorlar
content: Filistin Devlet Başkanı Mahmud Abbas, İsrail'in öldürdüğü Türk aktivist Ayşenur Ezgi Eygi cinayetiyle ilgili Uluslararası Ceza Mahkemesi’ne şikayette bulunmaya hazırlandıklarını açıkladı. Abbas, Türkiye ve ABD makamlarıyla ortak çalışma yürüttüklerini de duyurdu. Filistin yönetimi, Batı Şeria'da İsrail askerlerince gerçek mermi ile öldürülen Türk asıllı ABD vatandaşı Türk aktivist Ayşenur Ezgi Eygi için Uluslararası Ceza Mahkemesi'ne başvuracak. Gelişmeyi, Filistin Devlet Başkanı Mahmud Abbas duyurdu. Abbas, Eygi'nin ölümü nedeniyle çok üzgün olduğunu ve İsrail'e de öfke dolu olduklarını ifade etti. Uluslararası Ceza Mahkemesi’ne sunmak üzere ABD ve Türkiye makamları ile ortak bir dilekçe çalışması yürüttüklerini de belirtti. Mahmud Abbas, Ayşenur Ezgi Eygi onuruna Kudüs Yıldızı Nişanı da verecek. Filistin haber ajansı Wafa'ya göre, Filistin Devlet Başkanı Abbas telefon ile Eygi'nin ailesini arayarak baş sağlığı dileklerini iletti. Türk asıllı Amerika vatandaşı Ayşenur Ezgi Eygi, Filistin topraklarında işgal karşıtı bir protestoya katılmıştı. Gösteri sırasında ise İsrail güçleri tarafından vuruldu ve Eygi hayatını kaybetti. Eygi, Uluslararası Dayanışma Hareketi gönüllüsüydü.

title: French police launch criminal investigation as eight men die and baby left seriously injured after small boat filled with migrants is 'ripped apart' after hitting rocks in the English Channel
content: French police launch criminal investigation as eight men die and baby left seriously injured after small boat filled with migrants is 'ripped apart' after hitting rocks in the English Channel Eight men were killed, and a baby was hospitalised following the crash Nearly 60 UK-bound migrants were on the small boat It was 'ripped apart' when it hit rocks in the English Channel By Peter Allen and Perkin Amalaraj Published: 13:34 EDT, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 13:34 EDT, 15 September 2024 e-mail View comments A criminal enquiry was launched today after eight men died and a baby ended up in intensive care following the latest small boat disaster in the English Channel . Jacques Billant, the Pas de Calais prefect, as he confirmed eight unidentified migrants were declared dead at the scene, adding that six people were taken to hospital 'in relative emergency', including a ten-month-old baby with hypothermia. They were among the 59 UK-bound migrants crammed into a flimsy dinghy which was 'ripped apart' when it hit rocks close to Calais on Sunday morning. Less than 10 people on board had life jackets on inside a boat organised by people smugglers charging up to £1000-a-head for an illegal passage from France to the UK. It had set off from the Slack River, which flows into the English Channel close to the towns of Ambleteuse and Wimereux. 'The toll was terrible, with eight people reported dead,' said Jacques Billant, the Pas de Calais prefect. French gendarme and a member of the...

title: Rio Acre sobe 5 centímetros em dois dias e se afasta de cotas históricas em Rio Branco
content: Este índice é sete centímetros acima da menor cota já registrada na capital acreana, em 2 de outubro de 2022. , saindo de 1,28 metro para a marca atual. Porém, segundo projeções da Defesa Civil, é possível que o nível continue baixando, podendo alcançar ou até superar a marca de 1,25 metro. : O rio chegou a ficar três centímetros da menor cota histórica desde 1971, quando o manancial começou a ser monitorado em Rio Branco. title: Wichtige Ratschläge: Mit mehr Optimismus weniger aufschieben: Mit diesen Tipps klappt es
content: Einen Termin beim Arzt vereinbaren oder die lästige Steuererklärung machen. Viele schieben solche Aufgaben vor sich her. Hier gibt es hilfreiche Tipps, um der Prokrastination den Kampf anzusagen, und wie eine optimistische Lebenseinstellung dabei hilft. Was du heute kannst besorgen, das verschiebe ruhig auf morgen - oder übermorgen, oder am besten gleich auf nächste Woche. Lästige Aufgaben werden gerne mal vor sich hergeschoben, selbst dann, wenn das negative Konsequenzen mit sich bringen kann. Statt wichtige To-Dos abzuarbeiten, werden lieber Banalitäten erledigt. Eine aktuelle Studie der Universität Tokio legt nun nahe, dass Prokrastination nicht nur eine lästige Angewohnheit sein muss. Es hat auch nichts mit Faulheit zu tun. Vielmehr kann ein Zusammenhang mit der Lebenseinstellung bestehen. Die Forscher fanden heraus, dass Menschen, die mit Sorgen in die Zukunft blicken, eher dazu neigen, Dinge aufzuschieben. Optimisten prokrastinieren demnach eher seltener. Dabei spiele es überraschenderweise keine Rolle, wie gestresst oder unzufrieden die Studienteilnehmerinnen und -teilnehmer mit ihrem Leben sind. Studienmitautorin Saya Kashiwakura hat selbst schon seit ihrer Jugend mit Prokrastination zu kämpfen und profitiert nun selbst von ihren Studienergebnissen. "Diese Erkenntnis hat mir geholfen, eine heiterere Perspektive auf die Zukunft einzunehmen, was zu einem direkteren Blick und weniger Prokrastination geführt hat", wird sie in einer Mitteilung der Universität...

title: Tekirdağ'da park halindeki araçlara çarpıp kaçtı
content: Geçtiğimiz gece saat 23.30 sıralarında Muradiye Mahallesi 93. Sokak'ta meydana gelen olayda, sürücüsü tespit edilemeyen araç, park halindeki 2 araca çarptıktan sonra hiçbirşey olmamış yoluna devam etti. Olay anı güvenlik kamerası tarafından anbean kaydedildi. Yaşanan olayda toplam 3 otomobilde maddi hasar meydana geldi. Plakası belirlenen aracın sürücüsünün bir müddet sonra emniyete giderek suçunu kabul ettiği belirtildi.

title: Dacešin o izmjenama nastavnog plana u RS-u: 'Nije fer, osjećam prazninu...'
content: "Kao neko koga prate tu i tamo neki ljudi, ponekad osjetim potrebu da se oglasim po pitanju nekih ne toliko putničkih stvari. Potpuno neplanski jutros otvorih vijest da se u Republici Srpskoj od sada u devetom razredu poseban dio od deset časova posvećuje ratu koji nam se desio. Navodi se u tekstu dalje da se u tim udžbenicima Karadžić i Mladić spominju kao heroji, Alija kao hitlerski orijentisan, kao i da o Srebrenici nema ni riječi. E sad, iako sam do sada par puta već zbog svojih stavova na teme Srbi-Hrvati -Bošnjaci znao dobijati razne komentare, kada vidim nešto ovako, najveća emocija koju dobijem je neka praznina. Da se razumijemo, ne znam kako izgledaju udžbenici drugih dijelova entiteta, ali mislim da ovo prije svega nije fer prema mladim ljudima koji se rađaju u Republici Srpskoj. Nije fer da već od malih nogu odrastaju sa učenjem kako je jedna strana dobra a druga nije i da dijele Milana od Mirze. Da od malena uče da trebaju da navijaju za Srbiju i Hrvatsku i ne prate Bosnu, kad mogu oboje. Nije fer ni veličanje jednih a ponižavanje drugih, jer u ratu su svi jednako dobri i loši. Nije fer da u tih deset časova koliko se obrađuje ova tema, ne bude ni spomena na ono što je generalno najviše suza u njemu donijelo. Da se razumijemo, vrlo dobro mi je jasno zašto se ovakav narativ stvara, ali mislim da tih 8000+ žrtava u Srebrenici zaslužuje barem spomen ako ništa. Mnogo toga nije fer u društvu u kojem živimo, a koje kroje oni drugi, ali se...

title: Lamine Yamal applauded off by opposition fans as he leads Barcelona to crushing 4-1 win over Champions League rivals
creator: Joshua Hall
content: LAMINE YAMAL continues to impress at such a young age, so much so that opposition fans are clapping him off the pitch. The 17-year-old received a round of applause from Girona fans today as he trudged off the pitch having netted twice to sink Barcelona 's Catalonia rivals 4-1. Yamal sparked Barcelona into life with two first half goals, setting the tone for Hansi Flick 's side to thrash their local enemies. The teenager, who shone for Euro 2024 winners Spain in the summer, netted his first by stealing the ball away from a Girona defender and cooly dispatching an effort past keeper Paulo Gazzaniga . While his second has a delightful curled effort from just inside the area which nestled into the bottom corner. Summer signing Dani Olmo and fellow La Masia product Pedri added the other two goals as Barcelona went on to win 4-1. READ MORE IN FOOTBALL But all the attention was on Yamal's spectacular performance with the youngster being showered with love from both sets of fans as he was substituted for Gerard Martin in the 92nd minute. His goals today take his tally in La Liga this season to an astonishing three goals and four assists in just five league games. In fact, the talented winger hasn't gone a single league game this season without registering a goal contribution. And today's efforts were no breeze either with Girona a Champions League side who will take on the likes of Arsenal , Liverpool, AC Milan and PSG in the new league phase of the competition. title: Packers dominate first quarter with run-heavy attack setting up Malik Willis TD pass
content: Packers quarterback Jordan Love is out today with a knee injury, so it’s no surprise that the Packers are hitting the Colts with a run-heavy attack. But it is surprising just how effective Green Bay has been running the ball. Less than 12 minutes into the first quarter, the Packers already have 135 rushing yards and a 10-0 lead. Packers quarterback Malik Willis has thrown the ball only twice, but the second time was a 14-yard touchdown pass to Dontayvion Wicks. Colts quarterback Anthony Richardson threw an interception into heavy coverage after Willis’s touchdown pass, and the Packers are rolling in what has so far been a one-sided game.

title: ഓണാഘോഷത്തിനിടെ ബൈക്ക് ഇടിച്ചുകയറി; ആഘോഷം കാണാനെത്തിയ ആള്‍ക്ക് ദാരുണാന്ത്യം
content: :തിരുവനന്തപുരം മംഗലപുരം ശാസ്തവട്ടത്ത് ഓണാഘോഷത്തിനിടെ ബൈക്ക് പാഞ്ഞുകയറി ഒരാൾ മരിച്ചു. ശാസ്തവട്ടം സ്വദേശി ഷൈജു (45) ആണ് മരിച്ചത്. ബൈക്കിടിച്ച് ദൂരെയ്ക്ക് തെറിച്ചു വീണ ഷൈജുവിനെ ഗുരുതര പരിക്കുകളോടെ മെഡിക്കൽ കോളേജിൽ പ്രവേശിപ്പിച്ചെങ്കിലും വൈകിട്ട് ആറരയോടെ മരിച്ചു. ബൈക്കോടിച്ചിരുന്ന പെരുങ്ങുഴി സ്വദേശി റോഷൻ രാജിനും ഗുരുതര പരിക്കുണ്ട്. ശാസ്തവട്ടത്തെ ക്ലബ്ബിന്‍റെ ഓണാഘോഷ പരിപാടി കാണാനെത്തിയതായിരുന്നു ഷിജു. മൂന്ന് പേർ കയറിയ ബൈക്കാണ് ആഘോഷം കാണാനെത്തിയവരുടെ ഇടയിലേക്ക് ഇടിച്ചുകയറിയത്.

title: España culmina ante Australia la semana ideal
creator: Alejandro Ciriza Istúriz
content: España culmina ante Australia la semana ideal Los de Ferrer se imponen a los oceánicos gracias a los triunfos de Carreño y el dobles, y acceden como primeros de grupo a la fase final de noviembre en Málaga España culminó este domingo una semana prácticamente perfecta, en la que el triunfo frente a Australia (2-1) en el tercer compromiso de la semana le conduce a la fase final de la Copa Davis en Málaga (del 19 al 24 de noviembre) como primera de grupo. Intervino David Ferrer, en su condición de alineador, y le salió al capitán la apuesta a pedir de boca. La remontada de Pablo Carreño ante Jordan Thompson (2-6, 6-2 y 7-6(3) en 2h36) y el triunfo posterior en el dobles, registrado por Marcel Granollers y Pedro Martínez frente al dúo formado por Max Purcell y Matthew Ebden (5-7, 6-4 y 6-4, en 1h 56m), redondeó una fase clasificatoria que se preveía durísima y que al final se resolvió a golpe de fiesta. No tuvo trascendencia la derrota de Martínez en el segundo individual, contra Alexei Popyrin (doble 64, en 1h 29m). Una vez abatidas tres potencias de la magnitud de República Checa , Francia y la laureadísima selección oceánica, el equipo español irrumpirá en el desenlace de la competición a lo grande, después de que en la última edición no hubiera logrado superar el corte de septiembre. Esta vez, un desarrollo y una resolución a pedir de boca, con tres triunfos de mucho mérito y una firma coral, sin personalismos. Lució Carlos Alcaraz los dos...

title: Туск: Никога нећемо оставити на цједилу!
creator: Срна
content: "Послије консултација са надлежним министрима и службама, дао сам инструкције да се припреми уредба Савјета министара за увођење стања природне катастрофе", написао је Туск на платформи "Икс". Он је додао да је затражио од министра одбране да упути додатне снаге у угрожена подручја. "Никога нећемо оставити на цједилу", рекао је Туск. Стање природне катастрофе даје влади већу контролу за сузбијање и рјешавање посљедица катастрофе, што може укључивати ограничавање одређених слобода и права, наводи Би-Би-Си. У међувремену, локалне власти на југозападу Пољске апеловале су на мјештане да се евакуишу како расте водостај и поплаве воде пријете да пробију још једну брану. Градоначелник мјеста Прудник Грегор Завишлак апеловао је на мјештане села Мошчанка, Лака Прудницка и дијелове самог Прудника да се одмах евакуишу. "Овај апел је веома озбиљан, не губите вријеме на размишљање, морате напустити куће. Укокико брана буде пробијена ваше куће биће уништене, а животи угрожени", рекао је локални званичник Радослав Рошковски. Путеви око најгоре погођених подручја су затворени. Мјештани покушавају да испумпају воду из подрума и постављају вреће са пијескомоко кућа и других објеката, чекајући ново погоршање ситуације. Фокус је сада на на подручју око града Ниса. Главни пут у овом крају је потпуно под водом и вода је већ изнад висине прозора. Мјештанима је наложено да се евакуишу. Киша се очекује и наредних дана, а побољашње ситуације тек у уторак, 17. септембра. и .

title: Tusk: Nikoga nećemo ostaviti na cjedilu!
creator: Srna
content: "Poslije konsultacija sa nadležnim ministrima i službama, dao sam instrukcije da se pripremi uredba Savjeta ministara za uvođenje stanja prirodne katastrofe", napisao je Tusk na platformi "Iks". On je dodao da je zatražio od ministra odbrane da uputi dodatne snage u ugrožena područja. "Nikoga nećemo ostaviti na cjedilu", rekao je Tusk. Stanje prirodne katastrofe daje vladi veću kontrolu za suzbijanje i rješavanje posljedica katastrofe, što može uključivati ograničavanje određenih sloboda i prava, navodi Bi-Bi-Si. U međuvremenu, lokalne vlasti na jugozapadu Poljske apelovale su na mještane da se evakuišu kako raste vodostaj i poplave vode prijete da probiju još jednu branu. Gradonačelnik mjesta Prudnik Gregor Zavišlak apelovao je na mještane sela Moščanka, Laka Prudnicka i dijelove samog Prudnika da se odmah evakuišu. "Ovaj apel je veoma ozbiljan, ne gubite vrijeme na razmišljanje, morate napustiti kuće. Ukokiko brana bude probijena vaše kuće biće uništene, a životi ugroženi", rekao je lokalni zvaničnik Radoslav Roškovski. Putevi oko najgore pogođenih područja su zatvoreni. Mještani pokušavaju da ispumpaju vodu iz podruma i postavljaju vreće sa pijeskomoko kuća i drugih objekata, čekajući novo pogoršanje situacije. Fokus je sada na na području oko grada Nisa. Glavni put u ovom kraju je potpuno pod vodom i voda je već iznad visine prozora. Mještanima je naloženo da se evakuišu. Kiša se očekuje i narednih dana, a poboljašnje...

title: Ντενί Βιλνέβ: Η ταινία «Dune 3» θα είναι η τελευταία της κινηματογραφικής σειράς
creator: info@newsbomb.gr (Newsroom)
content: O Ντενί Βιλνέβ επιβεβαίωσε επίσημα ότι η τρίτη ταινία «Dune» θα είναι η τελευταία της κινηματογραφικής σειράς. Αν και το κινηματογραφικό πρότζεκτ «Dune 3» θα ολοκληρώσει τριάδα ταινιών σε αυτό το σύμπαν, ο Βιλνέβ έχει επίσης ξεκαθαρίσει ότι δεν είναι τριλογία. Σε πρόσφατη συνέντευξή του στο Vanity Fair, ο Γαλλο-Καναδός σκηνοθέτης είπε: «Είναι σημαντικό ο κόσμος να καταλάβει ότι για μένα ήταν πραγματικά ένα δίπτυχο. Ήταν πραγματικά δύο ταινίες που αποτελούν τη διασκευή του πρώτου βιβλίου. Αυτό έγινε και τελείωσε». «Αν κάνω μια τρίτη, η οποία βρίσκεται στη διαδικασία συγγραφής σεναρίου, δεν θα είναι σαν μια τριλογία. Είναι περίεργο να το λέω αυτό, αλλά αν επιστρέψω εκεί, θα είναι για κάνω κάτι που θεωρώ διαφορετικό και έχει τη δική του ταυτότητα», διευκρίνισε. Η τρίτη ταινία, που αναμένεται να έχει τον τίτλο «Dune: Messiah» σχεδιάζεται να διαδραματίζεται 12 χρόνια μετά τα γεγονότα του πρώτου μυθιστορήματος «Dune», πράγμα που σημαίνει ότι το καστ θα πρέπει να είναι μεγαλύτερο σε ηλικία. Για αυτή τη συγκεκριμένη αποστολή ο σκηνοθέτης είπε: «Αυτό είναι το πρόβλημά μου. Ξέρω πώς να το κάνω αυτό». Ο Βιλνέβ υπαινίχθηκε ότι θέλει να αποχωρήσει από το franchise «Dune», αλλά αυτό δεν σημαίνει ότι θέλει η ιστορία να τελειώσει. «Δεν κλείνω την πόρτα. Δεν θα το κάνω μόνος μου, θα μπορούσε να συμβεί με κάποιον άλλο» είπε ο σκηνοθέτης. *Πηγή: ΑΠΕ-ΜΠΕ

title: UFC saluda al futuro con un evento para la historia en La Esfera
creator: Víctor Martín J.
content: Muy poca gente lo pensaba, pero siempre fue así: La Esfera de Las Vegas era, al final de todo, el gran protagonista de Noche UFC. Por encima de un Sean O’Malley que soñaba con ser McGregor y a no es siquiera campeón, y por encima incluso de un Merab Dvalishvili que demostró que sin tener nada, se puede conseguir todo. El georgiano no es el más alto, ni el mas fuerte de su división . Es criticado por no finalizar sus combates y la UFC no lo quiere como estrella, pero sin embargo, su corazón y mentalidad han demostrado que lo pueden todo. Ampliar Pese al duro golpe recibido por los mexicanos en su gran noche (solo 2 victorias en 6 combates), Noche UFC se puede catalogar de éxito total. La compañía recaudó más de 20 millones de dólares con la entrada del evento y no solo eso: le mostró al mundo como se ve el futuro gracias a un escenario nunca antes visto en un deporte de esta magnitud. La Esfera, un ecosistema de luz y sonido con vida propia, dotó de una narrativa a un evento de dimensiones colosales que intercalaba ficción con realidad, una dura realidad más concretamente. A medida que iban sucediéndose los combates, el recinto cambiaba su imagen para llevar al público a una inmersión en un universo paralelo, donde cada pelea era una absoluta batalla librada en un lugar casi mágico. title: 'He's number one terrorist': Union Minister Bittu sparks controversy while attacking Rahul Gandhi
content: Bhagalpur: Attacking Leader of Opposition Rahul Gandhi over the statements he made in the US about the condition of Sikhs in India , Union minister Ravneet Singh Bittu on Sunday said that if those "manufacturing bombs" were supporting him, he is the " number one terrorist ". Bittu, the MoS for railways, made the remark in Bihar 's Bhagalpur where he came to attend the flagging-off ceremony of a Vande Bharat Express train to Howrah. Condemning the statement, the Congress said he was talking "like a senseless man". Speaking to reporters, Bittu said, "Rahul Gandhi spent most of his time outside the country. His friends and family are there. I think he does not love his country much because he goes abroad and says negative things about India. I think he is not a Hindustani." "Now, he has got support from separatists, who always talk about dividing this country. They (separatists) and the most-wanted persons are also appreciating Rahul Gandhi for his remarks against Sikhs. When such people, who are also experts in manufacturing bombs, are supporting Rahul Gandhi, then he is the number one terrorist of the country. He is talking like a separatist. There should be a reward for catching him as he is the biggest enemy of the country," he added. Bittu alleged that Congress earlier tried to "use" Muslims, but as that could not happen, it was now attempting to divide Sikhs. title: Τρόμος για τρεις νεαρούς: Κουκουλοφόροι μπούκαραν σε σπίτι στα Πεύκα
creator: info@newsbomb.gr (Newsroom)
content: Μια υπόθεση ληστείας ερευνά η αστυνομία στη Θεσσαλονίκη, ύστερα από καταγγελία στο Τμήμα Ασφάλειας Νεάπολης - Συκεών σύμφωνα με την οποία τις πρωινές ώρες σήμερα, άγνωστοι με καλυμμένα τα χαρακτηριστικά τους έσπασαν το παράθυρο μπαλκονόπορτας στην περιοχή των Πεύκων, εισέβαλαν στον χώρο και άσκησαν σωματική βία σε βάρος τριών ατόμων. Σύμφωνα πάντα με την καταγγελία οι φερόμενοι ως δράστες ακινητοποίησαν τους τρεις άνδρες ηλικίας 27, 29 και 31 ετών , τους αφαίρεσαν τα κινητά τηλέφωνα και τα πορτοφόλια τους με 665 ευρώ συνολικά, όπως οι ίδιοι δήλωσαν. Οι κουκουλοφόροι -πιθανολογείται ότι ήταν πέντε- μετά τη ληστεία τράπηκαν σε φυγή. Ο ένας εκ των τριών θυμάτων, ο 31χρονος, σύμφωνα με την αστυνομία νοσηλεύεται στο νοσοκομείο «Παπαγεωργίου». Την υπόθεση ερευνά το Τμήμα Ασφάλειας Νεάπολης-Συκεών. Πηγή: Αθηναϊκό/Μακεδονικό Πρακτορείο Ειδήσεων

title: Hundreds rally in Paris for Iranian women’s rights
creator: none@none.com (AFP)
content: PARIS: Hundreds of people marched through Paris on Sunday in support of women’s rights and the opposition in Iran, two years after the death of Mahsa Amini sparked protests against the country’s religious authorities. A 22-year-old Iranian Kurd, Amini died in custody after being arrested for allegedly violating the Islamic Republic’s strict dress code for women. The march, organised by around 20 human rights associations, took place as 34 women began a hunger strike in a Tehran prison to mark the two-year anniversary of her death. Iran picks new president at turbulent time Chirinne Ardakani, a Franco-Iranian lawyer and member of the “Iran Justice” collective, said that the “sacrifices” made by Iranians opposed to the regime were “not in vain”. “Everything has changed in Iran,” Ardakani told AFP. “We’ve gone from an absolutely patriarchal culture, where there was no question of women being able to reveal themselves in the street, to massive support for these women,” the lawyer and activist added. The march in solidarity with the “Women, Life, Freedom” movement was attended by Benjamin Briere and Louis Arnaud, two Frenchmen who were arrested and arbitrarily detained in Iran. Iran is accused of arresting Westerners without cause and using them as bargaining chips in state-to-state negotiations, with French diplomats describing these prisoners as “state hostages”. Briere was eventually released in May 2023, while Arnaud was let go the month after. “Yes, I was in prison, but it...

title: Rory McIlroy rues another near-miss as Rasmus Hojgaard claims Irish Open title
creator: Sport
content: Denmark’s Rasmus Hojgaard produced a brilliant finish to win the Amgen Irish Open and inflict a second heartbreaking defeat of the year on home favourite Rory McIlroy. McIlroy looked on course to claim his first professional win on home soil when he led by two shots with four holes to play at Royal County Down, just an hour from where he grew up. But while Hojgaard completed a superb closing 65 with four birdies in the last five holes – including three in a row from the 16th – McIlroy crucially three-putted the 17th and then agonisingly missed an eagle putt on the 18th to force a play-off. title: Chief Minister to lay foundation for car manufacturing plant, footwear park in Ranipet on September 28
content: Chief Minister M.K. Stalin will lay the foundation stone for the JLR and Tata Motors manufacturing facility and a footwear park inside the spacious SIPCOT complex in Panapakkam near Ranipet town on September 28.On Sunday, accompanied by Ranipet Collector J. U. Chandrakala and the Superintendent of Police (SP), D. V. Kiran Shruthi, Minister for Handlooms and Textiles, R. Gandhi, inspected preparatory work that is being undertaken by the district administration as part of the event. “Road formation inside SIPCOT premises is being done on war footing for the event. Space for parking of vehicles, visitors’ arena and creation of basic amenities for them are also being arranged,” said an official of State Highways.A total of 1,213 acres of land from four villages, namely Agavalam, Thuraiyur, Nedumpuli and Peruvalayam, identified for the project. These villages come under Nemili panchayat union in the district. Of total 1,213 acres, Tata Motors manufacturing facility will be coming up in 470 acres and remaining space goes to a leather industrial park with SIPCOT premises. Ranipet SIPCOT acquired the land for the purpose and has allocated it to Tata Motors, revenue officials said. Revenue officials said Tata Motors manufacturing facility will be coming up at a cost of Rs 9,000, making Tamil Nadu first in the country to manufacture the luxury models of JLR, brand owned by Tata Motors that specialises in electric vehicles. title: АПИ: Столичната община да се заеме с надлеза към Бояна
creator: Мария Атанасова
content: Агенция "Пътна инфраструктура" (АПИ) отправи апел към Столична община за по-бързо решение на ситуацията около надлеза при детелината на бул. "България" и Софийския околовръстен път в посока от бул. "Братя Бъкстон" към кв. "Бояна". С нарастващия трафик след летните отпуски и началото на учебната година, АПИ настоява за своевременно намиране на решения в полза на гражданите. АПИ изразява готовност да помогне, като разработи и одобри временна организация на движението, която ще позволи възстановяване на преминаването под моста, ограничавайки скоростта до 30 км/ч и обезопасявайки съоръжението с бетонови огради, изброи news.bg. Въпреки множеството проведени разговори, АПИ все още не е получила категоричен отговор от Столична община относно подписването на необходимото споразумение, което би позволило въвеждането на тази временна организация преди началото на учебната година. АПИ припомня, че според Закона за пътищата общинските пътища трябва да осигуряват транспортни връзки с републиканската пътна мрежа, каквато е функцията на компрометираното съоръжение при бул. "България" и Софийския околовръстен път.

title: ΑΠΟΛΛΩΝ: «Ξεκάθαρα τα πράγματα, οι κανονισμοί είναι κανονισμοί»
creator: ΚΩΣΤΑΣ ΠΑΝΑΓΙΩΤΟΥ
content: «Είμαστε απογοητευμένοι γιατί για κάποιους ανεγκέφαλους ένας αγώνας δεν γίνεται και πρέπει να λέμε τα πράγματα με το όνομα τους. Όλοι είδαμε τι έγινε, εμείς ενημερωθήκαμε από την Αστυνομία για το τι έγινε. Η Αστυνομία πήρε αυτή την απόφαση διότι δεν μπορούσε να εγγυηθεί την ασφάλεια του παιχνιδιού. Υπάρχει η ΚΟΠ, υπάρχουν οι αρμόδιοι εμείς δεν ζητάμε τίποτα απλά να γίνει αυτό που πρέπει, είναι ξεκάθαρα τα πράγματα, οι κανονισμοί είναι κανονισμοί».

title: Rory McIlroy rues another near-miss as Rasmus Hojgaard claims Irish Open title
content: Denmark’s Rasmus Hojgaard produced a brilliant finish to win the Amgen Irish Open and inflict a second heartbreaking defeat of the year on home favourite Rory McIlroy. McIlroy looked on course to claim his first professional win on home soil when he led by two shots with four holes to play at Royal County Down, just an hour from where he grew up. But while Hojgaard completed a superb closing 65 with four birdies in the last five holes – including three in a row from the 16th – McIlroy crucially three-putted the 17th and then agonisingly missed an eagle putt on the 18th to force a play-off. A disappointed McIlroy, who missed out on a first major since 2014 when he bogeyed three of the last four holes in the US Open in June, said: “Unfortunately I’m getting used to it this year. “Hopefully the tide is going to turn pretty soon, and I can turn all these close calls into victories. “I must say, that roar when I hit that second shot on 18 was pretty cool. The support I got out there this week was absolutely amazing. I certainly don’t take it for granted. “I had to try to keep my composure walking up to the 18th green there. Wish I could play in front of those fans and this atmosphere every week. “From where I was at the start of the week and what I wanted to do, it’s a step in the right direction. You know, if anything, it just whets my appetite even more for Portrush [the Open Championship] next year.” McIlroy took a one-shot lead into the final round and made the ideal start...

title: Armadilhas fotográficas flagram fogo chegando em área conservada no Pantanal de MS: 'questão de 3 minutos'
content: Conforme explica a bióloga Natália Cará, as "armadilhas fotográficas" são câmeras instaladas em campo para monitoramento dos animais na região. Fogo derreteu câmera de monitoramento de animais silvestres — Foto: Redes sociais No vídeo publicado na rede social da ONG, neste fim de semana, a bióloga explica que conseguiu resgatar de duas o cartão de memória. No vídeo acima, é possível ver alguns animais passando pelo local no dia 1 de agosto e, no dia seguinte, uma das câmeras mostram a área completamente tomada pelo incêndio. Além da imagem impressionante, as câmeras também mostram a temperatura do ambiente. Câmera atingida pelo fogo do Pantanal de MS registrou 73oC — Foto: Redes sociais Com a diminuição do fogo, os profissionais voltaram a espalhar as armadilhas pelo campo para poder saber se algum animal precisa de ajuda. Com isso, nas redes sociais, a ONG fez um apelo a população e pediu doações para custear os serviços veterinários aos animais silvestres. Céu mudou de cor após incêndios no Pantanal — Foto: Divulgação/Bombeiros Nos primeiros 10 dias de setembro, o Pantanal registrou 736 focos de incêndios. O número é quase o dobro do total registrado no mesmo mês do ano passado, quando o bioma teve 373 focos, de acordo com o Instituto Nacional de Pesquisas Espaciais (Inpe). No recorte que considera apenas os 10 primeiros dias do mês, são 736 focos em 2024, contra 85 em 2023. Cerca de 40% das cidades de MS estão com focos de...

title: Bakan Tekin: 'Liseye Hoş Geldin' kitaplarımızı erişime açtık
content: MİLLİ Eğitim Bakanı Yusuf Tekin, liseye başlayan öğrenciler için hazırlanan 'Liseye Hoş Geldin' kitaplarının erişime açıldığını duyurdu. Milli Eğitim Bakanı Yusuf Tekin, sosyal medya hesabından yaptığı açıklamada, "Ortaokulu başarıyla bitirip liseye başlayan öğrencilerimiz için Bakanlığımızca hazırlanan 'Liseye Hoş Geldin' kitaplarımızı erişime açtık. Liseye Hoş Geldin kitaplarımızla 8'inci sınıftan 9'uncu sınıfa geçerek ortaöğretimle tanışan öğrencilerimizin ortaöğretim konu ve derslerine dair bilgilerini artırmak, akademik uyumlarını güçlendirmek ve öğrencilerimizin hazırbulunuşlukları çerçevesinde derslerin amaçlarını ve çalışma tekniklerini öğretmeyi amaçlıyoruz" ifadelerini kullandı.

title: Narin’in annesinin kelepçeli fotoğrafı ortaya çıktı
content: Diyarbakır’ın Bağlar ilçesi kırsal Tavşantepe Mahallesi'nde 21 Ağustos tarihinde kaybolan, 19 gün sonra dere yatağında, çuval içinde, üzeri taş ve çalılıklarla kapatılmış cesedi bulunan Narin Güran cinayetiyle ilgili Diyarbakır Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı tarafından yürütülen soruşturma sürüyor. Soruşturma kapsamında Narin Güran'ın annesi Yüksel Güran "Kasten öldürme suçuna iştirak etmek" suçundan tutuklanmıştı. GÖRÜNTÜSÜ ORTAYA ÇIKTI Ekol TV'nin haberine göre, Narin'in annesi Yüksel Güran'ın ifade verdiği esnada fotoğrafı çekildi. Çekilen fotoğrafta Güran'ın ifade verdiği esnada kelepçeli olduğu da görüldü.

title: Los Cebolleros también juegan hoy en Estados Unidos
creator: Antorcha Deportiva
content: Achuapa, dirigido por el costarricense Ronald ‘La Bala’ Gómez,han confirmado su participación en un partido amistoso que se celebrará HOY a las 16:00 horas contra el NY Phoenix FC, en el Community Center Joseph Lawrence de Nueva York. Según la promotora del evento, el partido se organiza en el marco de la celebración de la independencia de Centroamérica, por lo que el equipo guatemalteco, que ha sido uno de los protagonistas del Torneo Apertura 2024 de la Liga Nacional, fue invitado a participar. «Rumbo a Estados Unidos a vivir una nueva experiencia juntos. Seguimos creciendo #TodosSomosAchuapa», publicó el club en sus redes sociales, acompañado de una fotografía de la delegación en el Aeropuerto Internacional La Aurora. Achuapa tiene la oportunidad de jugar en Estados Unidos debido a que adelantó su compromiso correspondiente a la jornada 7 del Torneo Apertura 2024 frente a Comunicaciones, por lo que no afectará su calendario. Actualmente, el equipo se encuentra en la cuarta posición del torneo con 11 puntos, producto de tres victorias, dos empates y dos derrotas en siete jornadas. Su próximo partido oficial será el domingo 22 de septiembre, cuando reciba a Xinabajul-Huehue a las 15:00 horas.

title: Sakarya'da fabrikada patlama: 1 kişi hayatını kaybetti, 30 kişi yaralandı
content: Anadolu Otoyolu Hendek gişeleri mevkisinde faaliyet gösteren bir makarna fabrika sında, yem silolarının bulunduğu alanda henüz belirlenemeyen nedenle patlama meydana geldi. Patlamanın ardından yangın çıktı. İhbar üzerine olay yerine kent merkezi, ilçe ve çevre illerden ambulans ve itfaiye ile AFAD, Orman Bölge Müdürlüğü ve polis ekipleri sevk edildi. Patlamada 1 kişi hayatını kaybetti, 6'sı ağır 30 kişi yaralandı. Yaralılar sağlık ekiplerince çevredeki hastanelere kaldırıldı. Bu arada patlamanın meydana geldiği silo alanında mahsur kalan bir işçi, itfaiye ekiplerinin çalışmasıyla vinç yardımıyla bulunduğu yerden kurtarıldı. Dumandan etkilenen işçiye ambulansta müdahale edilerek hastaneye kaldırıldı.Alevleri kontrol altına alan itfaiye ekiplerinin soğutma çalışmaları sürüyor. Bu arada olay yerinden yükselen dumanlar ilçenin farklı noktalarından görüldü. Sakarya Valisi Yaşar Karadeniz de olay yerine gelerek incelemelerde bulundu, yetkililerden bilgi aldı. Vali Karadeniz, gazetecilere, şu ana kadar fabrika bölgesinden toplam 21 yaralının tespit edildiğini belirterek, "12 kişi ambulanslarla hastanelere sevk edildi, 9 yaralı ise kendi imkanlarıyla hastaneye ulaştılar. Yaralılarımızdan ikisi entübe durumda." dedi. Fabrika yetkililerinin içeride başka kimsenin olmadığı yönünde bilgi verdiğini aktaran Karadeniz, patlama alanındaki tahliye çalışmalarının tamamlandığını, içeride mahsur kalan bulunmadığını bildirdi. title: Una niña de seis años y dos adultos resultan heridos en atentado, en Manta
creator: Irving Navarrete
content: Una niña de seis años de edad y dos personas adultas resultaron con heridas de bala durante un ataque a balazos registrado la mañana de este domingo en Manta, provincia de Manabí. La violencia pareciera no tener fin en la ciudad portuaria manabita, pues tras varios sucesos violentos reportados la noche del sábado, este domingo continúa el terror. Cerca del mediodía de este 15 de septiembre, una ráfaga de balas alarmó a los residentes del barrio El Paraíso, donde sujetos atacaron a tres personas. Entre las víctimas de este nuevo hecho violento se encuentra una niña de seis años. Además, de la menor de edad, una mujer y un hombre, adultos, también resultaron heridos. Toda la información completita, con fotos, mañana en nuestra edición impresa. Recuerde comprar todos los días nuestro diario o suscribirse a la edición digital para estar bien informado. Este nuevo suceso se reportó en la calle 122 y avenida 105, zona que pertenece a la parroquia urbana Los Esteros. Hasta el momento se desconoce el estado de salud de la niña de seis años y de los adultos heridos.

title: Sakarya'daki makarna fabrikasındaki patlama anı güvenlik kamerasına yansıdı
content: Bu videoyu izlemek için lütfen JavaScript'i etkinleştirin TEM Otoyolu Hendek gişeleri mevkisinde faaliyet gösteren makarna fabrikasında patlama meydana geldi. Patlamanın ardından 112 Acil Çağrı Merkezi'ne yapılan ihbar üzerine bölgeye Sakarya başta olmak üzere Düzce ve Kocaeli'den çok sayıda itfaiye, sağlık, AFAD, orman, polis ve jandarma personeli sevk edildi. ÇALIŞMALAR SÜRÜYOR İlk tespitlere göre fabrikanın değirmen bölümünde meydana geldiği değerlendirilen patlamanın ardından bölgedeki çalışmalar sürüyor. BİR KİŞİNİN CANSIZ BEDENİNE ULAŞILDI Anadolu Otoyolu Hendek gişeleri mevkisinde faaliyet gösteren fabrikada; yem silolarının bulunduğu alanda henüz belirlenemeyen meydana gelen patlamada 6'sı ağır 28 işçi yaralanmıştı. 28 kişinin yaralandığı fabrikadaki patlamada, içeride mahsur kalan bir kişinin yanmış cesedine ulaşıldı. Cesedin Mesut Şımay'a ait olduğu belirlendi. PATLAMA ANINA AİT GÖRÜNTÜLER ORTAYA ÇIKTI 30 kişinin yaralandığı patlama anına ilişkin yeni görüntüler ortaya çıktı. Fabrikanın adeta bomba gibi patladığı, alev ve dumanların yükseldiği anlar saniye saniye görüntülendi. Öte yandan yaralılardan birinin 12 yaşındaki bir çocuk olduğu öğrenildi. Babası ile iş yerine geldiği esnada patlamada yaralanan çocuğun sağlık durumunun iyi olduğu öğrenildi. SORUŞTURMA BAŞLATILDI Adalet Bakanı Yılmaz Tunç, patlamanın nedeni ve sorumluların tespiti için Hendek Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı...

title: Камила Валиева приняла решение после неожиданной новости по ее делу
content: Российская фигуристка Камила Валиева выступит в шоу двукратной чемпионки мира и семикратной чемпионки Европы Ирины Слуцкой « Гордость великой России », которое пройдёт 19 октября в Краснодаре , передает Sports.kz со ссылкой на Championat.com . Соответствующую информацию опубликовала фан-группа Валиевой. Напомним, после 29 января 2024 года Камила Валиева не участвует в спортивных соревнованиях по решению Спортивного арбитражного суда (CAS) о её дисквалификации на четыре года за применение допинга. 30 января Международный союз конькобежцев лишил Валиеву всех медалей. Ранее Валиева показала, что восстановила все тройные прыжки, кроме лутца. Соответствующее видео спортсменка опубликовала в социальных сетях, выложив каскад двойной аксель + тройной тулуп, одинарные тройной риттбергер и флип. На этой неделе издание The Associated Press сообщило, что руководство WADA убрало из дела Камилы Валиевой заключение бывшего директора лаборатории в Лозанне Марсиаля Сожи. Камила Валиева поделилась хорошими новостями после изменений в скандальном деле

title: Σε κατάσταση φυσικής καταστροφής κηρύχθηκε η Πολωνία: Φονικές πλημμύρες σαρώνουν την Ευρώπη
content: Οι τοπικές αρχές στη νοτιοδυτική Πολωνία απηύθυναν επειγόντως έκκληση στους κατοίκους να εκκενώσουν τα σπίτια τους επειδή τα νερά των πλημμυρών απειλούν να σπάσουν ακόμη ένα φράγμα. Σε βίντεο που δημοσιεύτηκε στη σελίδα του στο Facebook οι αρχές της πόλης Προύντνικ, απηύθυναν έκκληση στους κατοίκους της πληθυσμού άνω τω 22.000 ατόμων περιοχής για άμεση εκκένωση. «Η έκκληση είναι πολύ σοβαρή, μην χάνετε το χρόνο σας σε διλήμματα, πρέπει να φύγετε. Εάν παραβιαστεί το φράγμα, τα σπίτια σας θα καταστραφούν και η ζωή σας θα απειληθεί» ακούγεται να λέει στο βίντεο τοπικός αξιωματούχος. Στην Κεντρική Ευρώπη έχει ήδη πέσει τεράστιος όγκος βροχής τις τελευταίες ημέρες. Τεράστιοι όγκοι νερού Περίπου 435 χιλιοστά βροχής έπεσαν στην πόλη Τσέζενικ της Τσεχίας τις τελευταίες τρεις ημέρες– πρόκειται για ακραίες βροχοπτώσεις. Αναμένονται δε περισσότερες βροχές το βράδυ της Κυριακής και τη Δευτέρα, με τη στάθμη των ποταμών να συνεχίζει να αυξάνεται. Ο καιρός θα βελτιωθεί από την Τρίτη με πολύ πιο ξηρές συνθήκες, ωστόσο θα χρειαστούν πολλές μέρες για να υποχωρήσει όλο αυτό το νερό στις λεκάνες απορροής των ποταμών της Ευρώπης. Και αυτό σημαίνει ότι για ορισμένες κοινότητες, οι πλημμύρες θα χειροτερέψουν πολύ περισσότερο ακόμη και αφού σταματήσει η βροχή. ΠΛΗΜΜΥΡΕΣ ΠΟΛΩΝΙΑ Δημοφιλή Προτεινόμενα για εσάς

title: Centro de Morelia cerrado; toma estas alternativas viales
content: Morelia, Michoacán.- Por las fiestas patrias el Centro de Morelia está cerrado, y así permanecerá hasta el 16 de septiembre debido al desfile cívico que año con se realiza, sin embargo, puedes tomar estas alternativas viales. Calles cerradas La avenida Francisco I. Madero desde la calle Nigromante hasta la avenida Morelos; la calle Abasolo esquina con Corregidora; la calle Abasolo esquina con Santiago Tapia; la calle García Obeso esquina con avenida Madero; la calle Virrey de Mendoza esquina con avenida Madero; la calle 20 de Noviembre esquina con Vasco de Quiroga. Rutas alternativas Pero la calle de Rayón está libre, Aldama, Mariano Elizaga, y Vicente Santa María, por la Pila del Gallo, pueden ser una opción, ya que ésta es una vialidad que está utilizando el transporte público. Hacia el norte, la calle Eduardo Ruíz también está abierta, así como la avenida Nocupétaro y la León Guzmán para poder acercarte al primer cuadro de la ciudad. Sin embargo, debes considerar que no hay suficientes espacios de estacionamiento y que los ubicados en la zona del primer cuadro no estarán disponibles por lo que se recomienda tomar precauciones. El transporte público en general funciona de manera normal en el resto de la ciudad, y solo los camiones y combis que llegan al centro, tomaron rutas alternas, aunque viables para los pasajeros.

title: Man behind series of house burglaries in Gudiyatham arrested
content: A 36-year-old man was arrested by the Gudiyatham Town police on Sunday in connection with a series of burglaries in the past few months. The police recovered eight sovereigns of gold jewellery, silver objects and anklets, laptops, television sets, and bicycles from the accused identified as S. Mohan, a native of Nellore Pettai village near Gudiyatham. The police also found a collection of wigs at his residence. The police zeroed in on Mohan after he gave contradicting answers during a routine vehicle check near the new bus terminus in the town. Growing suspicious, the police had taken him to the police station, where he confessed to the crime. Mohan breaks into houses when the occupants are away. Once the burglary is committed, he would return to his native village to hide the stolen valuables. Mohan has more than 40 criminal cases registered against him in the district. Investigation also revealed that the two-wheeler he used was stolen from a resident of Gudiyatham. A case was registered. Mohan was lodged at the sub-jail in the town. Published - September 15, 2024 11:03 pm IST Copy link Email Facebook Twitter Telegram LinkedIn WhatsApp Reddit

title: Britney Spears Celebrates Sons Sean and Jayden’s Birthdays
creator: Ryan Hudgins
content: Britney Spears is paying tribute to her sons, Sean Preston and Jayden James, in celebration of their birthdays, which both fall in September. “This month is my boys’ birthdays !!! Happy Birthday 🎁 babies and I hope you get all your wishes and more !!!” Spears, 42, wrote via Instagram on Saturday, September 14. Alongside the birthday message, Spears shared several throwback photos of her and the boys. In one image, Spears and her two children seemed transfixed on something in the distance. “Psss does anyone have any clue why we’re all looking up ???” she added. Spears welcomed Sean and Jayden with ex-husband Kevin Federline in September 2005 and September 2006, respectively. (Spears and Federline, 46, tied the knot in 2004 and their divorce was finalized three years later.) While Spears and her sons have had an estranged relationship through the years, she has been attempting to work on their bond. During most of Sean and Jayden’s life, Spears was under conservatorship by her father, Jamie Spears . One year after a judge terminated the conservatorship in November 2021, Jayden got candid about his estranged connection with his mom. “I think Mom has struggled giving us both attention and showing us equal love and I don’t think she showed enough to Preston and I feel really bad for that,” Jayden said to The Daily Mail in September 2022. “We’ve both been through so much pressure in the past that this is our safe place now, to process all the emotional trauma we’ve been through to...

title: Four IT professionals escape unhurt as car goes up in flames
content: Four IT professionals escaped unhurt after the car they were travelling in caught fire on Chennai-Bengaluru Highway (NH44), in Udayarajapalayam village near Ambur town, Tirupattur, on Sunday. The police said Mohammed Sadiq, 24, an IT professional from Chennai, was heading to Yelagiri Hills in Tirupattur to spend the weekend. He was accompanied by three of his friends in the car. About 12.30 a.m., the vehicle veered off track after Sadiq lost control of the wheels while trying to avoid hitting a container. The car plunged into a pit near the carriageway after ramming the steel railings of the highway. In the impact, the car caught fire. The four passengers escaped unhurt. Immediately, passersby alerted the Ambur Taluk police and fire and rescue services personnel, who rushed to the spot. The four passengers were rushed to the Government Taluk Hospital for a medical check-up. The car was completely gutted by the time the personnel doused the fire. The police removed the mangled remains of the car. The traffic along the route was affected for nearly an hour before it was restored. A case was registered. title: פיטר פלצ'יק הכריז על פתיחת הקמפיין לאולימפיאדת לוס אנג'לס 2028
creator: אורן אהרוני
content: הג'ודוקא פיטר פלצ'יק הודיע היום (ראשון) כי ימשיך לקמפיין אולימפי נוסף ויכוון להגיע למשחקים האולימפיים בלוס אנג'לס 2028, כפי שפורסם ב"ישראל היום". המדליסט האולימפי מפריז כינס בראשון לציון את המשפחה, חברים ואנשים שעוזרים ועזרו לו במהלך הדרך והודיע על ההחלטה. פלצ'יק אמר באירוע: "הגשמתי את חלום הילדות שלי בפריז ובאותו יום בחרתי להיות מחובר לכולם. עשינו את זה ביחד ואין מאושר ממני לחגוג היום את סיום הקמפיין. המדליה היתה המטרה שהייתי נחוש להשיג כל יום מחדש. "ההקרבה היא אדירה ובמהלך הקמפיין סבלתי מלא מעט פציעות, אבל לא עצרתי לרגע אחד. שמח שהצלחתי לשמח את העם עם המדליה, קשה לתאר במילים את הרגעים אחרי הזכייה". פיטר פלצ'יק, יעל ארד, יו"ר הוועד האולימפי, אמרה: "לפיטר יש נחישות שהיה קשה לפספס במהלך השנים. מי שראה את הדרך אפשר לראות את האינטליגנציה הרגשית שלך. היה ברור שתביא מהמעמקים את הזכייה הזאת, אתה דוגמא ומופת לאיך שאנחנו רוצים לראות ספורטאי". יעל ארד ופיטר פלצ'יק, מאמנו אורן סמדג'ה: "לא היה פשוט לאמן את פיטר ואחת ההברקות הייתה לקחת את הצוותים ולצוות לכל אחד ספורטאי וזה עבד עם פיטר וגולן פולק, ידעתי שהוא בידיים טובות. ידענו שיגיע לאולימפיאדה, למרות שהתמודד עם דברים לא קלים". פיטר פלצ'יק ואורן סמדג'ה, הכתבות ועידכוני הספורט החמים אצלך בטלגרם להצטרפות בתוך כך פלצ'יק הכריז כי הוא מקים את קרן פלצ'יק לתמיכה בספורטאים צעירים, כשהמטרה לגייס לפחות 8 מיליון לשנים הקרובות טעינו? נתקן! אם מצאתם טעות בכתבה, נשמח שתשתפו אותנו

title: פיגוע דקירה בירושלים: שוטר נפצע קל, המחבל חוסל

title: נטע אלחמיסטר בהריון שני
creator: יוסי דלאל
content: נטע אלחמיסטר בישרה היום (ראשון) בחשבונה באינסטגרם על כך שהיא ובעלה הכדורגלן רמי גרשון צפויים בקרוב להפוך הורים לשניים, אחרי שבחודש נובמבר האחרון נולד בנם הבכור, אל-ים. בפוסט שהעלתה בצירוף תמונה משפחתית בהרכב מלא כתבה אלחמיסטר: "אני אוהבת את האהבה שהאהבה שלנו יוצרת". אלחמיסטר מכריזה על היריון שני, צילום: מתוך אינסטגרם כזכור, אלחמיסטר בת ה- 30 נישאה לגרשון לפני למעלה מחמש שנים, אחרי זוגיות ארוכה ויציבה, באירוע מושקע שכלל מאות מוזמנים ולא מעט סלבס שבאו לפרגן ולהפגין נוכחות. ארבע שנים אחרי החופה, השניים הפכו להורים. שבוע אחרי לידת בנה הבכור, אלחמיטסר כבר הציגה גזרה חטובה ודקיקה, בלי זכר לבטן העגלגלה ההריונית, ועוררה ביקורת בקרב הגולשים. נטע אלחמיסטר ורמי גרשון, צילום: ניר פקין

title: הפתעה: נטע אלחמיסטר ורמי גרשון מצפים לילד שני
creator: מערכת ישראל היום
content: הדוגמנית ואשת העסקים נטע אלחמיסטר חשפה הערב (ראשון) שהיא ובעלה רמי גרשון, מצפים לילד שני. אלחמיסטר העלתה תמונה משפחתית לחשבון האינסטגרם שלה, והוסיפה את הכיתוב "אני אוהבת את האהבה שהאהבה שלנו יוצרת". נטע אלחמיסטר רמי גרשון, צילום: אינסטגרם בחודש נובמבר האחרון ילדה אלחמיסטר את בנם הבכור, אל-ים. היא וגרשון נישאו בשנת 2019 אחרי זוגיות פוטוגנית של ארבע שנים. טעינו? נתקן! אם מצאתם טעות בכתבה, נשמח שתשתפו אותנו

title: Randale bei Kreisligaspiel mit Max Kruse – „Unwürdig“
content: Ein Kreisliga-Spiel mit dem Ex-Nationalspieler Kruse eskalierte. Sogar die Polizei rückte an. Was war der Auslöser für den Platzsturm? Tumultartige Szenen in der Kreisliga. Und mittendrin: Ex-Nationalspieler . In einer Partie seiner Mannschaft BSV Al Dersimspor II kam es zu deartigen Ausschreitungen, dass das Spiel der Berliner Fußball-Kreisliga A gegen Delay Sports sogar abgebrochen werden musste. Die bestätigte dem RBB einen Einsatz auf dem Sportplatz in Berlin-Kreuzberg, strafrechtlich Relevantes sei aber nicht vorgefallen. Was passiert sei, sei „unwürdig. Das hat im Fußball nichts zu suchen“, sagte Kruse in einer Story und entschuldigte sich für seine Mannschaft und den Verein, dass Zuschauer den Platz gestürmt hätten. „Da müssen wir uns alle an die eigene Nase fassen.“ „Was heute passiert ist beim Spiel, hat mit Fußball nichts zu tun“ Auf Instagram hieß es von Delay Sports, dass es einen der gegnerischen Fans gegeben habe und die Partie wegen körperlicher Angriffe auf Spieler von Delay abgebrochen worden sei. „Bild“ und „B.Z.“ hatten zuerst darüber berichtet. „Was heute passiert ist beim Spiel, hat mit nichts zu tun“, sagte Ex-Profi Kevin Pannewitz, der als Co-Trainer bei Delay im Einsatz war, in einer Instagram Story. Die Situation eskalierte, als Delay Sports nach dem späten 2:2-Ausgleichstor von Kruse in der Nachspielzeit den 3:2-Siegtreffer erzielte. Zuschauer hätten sich demnach vom Jubel der Gäste provoziert gefühlt. Schiedsrichter musste das Spiel...

title: Former Google exec shares what he learned after 7 years trying to give AI a robot body
content: Hans Peter Brondmo, former CEO of Google's robotics moonshot project Everyday Robotics recently wrote in Wired about why he thinks that building AI-powered robots that can flexibly operate in the real world is going to take much longer than Silicon Valley believes and promises. "As the head of Alphabet’s AI-powered robotics moonshot, I came to believe many things. For one, robots can’t come soon enough. For another, they shouldn’t look like us," he wrote. Started in 2016, Google scrapped Everyday Robotics last year (February 2023). Brondmo wrote that he joined X, Alphabet’s secret innovation lab, in early 2016. The project, under the leadership of Astro Teller, aimed to create AI-powered robots that could assist humans in everyday tasks. My involvement was driven by a belief in Google's potential to make a significant impact on the world. The company's commitment to long-term, ambitious projects, and its ability to invest heavily in research and development, made it an ideal environment for such a venture. "My job: help figure out what to do with the employees and technology left over from nine robot companies that Google had acquired," he said. The Moonshot Mindset Google X was established with the goal of addressing global challenges through innovative technologies. Projects were required to meet specific criteria, including addressing a significant problem, utilizing groundbreaking technology, and offering a radical solution. Google founder Larry Page — favored moving...

title: Η αποστολή για το πρώτο ντέρμπι της σεζόν – Με 23 ποδοσφαιριστές κόντρα στην ΑΕΚ!
creator: Panayiotis Toumbas
content: Με προπόνηση που έγινε το απόγευμα στο “Ηλίας Πούλλος” η ΟΜΟΝΟΙΑ ολοκλήρωσε την προετοιμασία της για το παιχνίδι με αντίπαλο την ΑΕΚ, το οποίο θα γίνει στο πλαίσιο της 3ης αγωνιστικής της Cyprus League by Stoiximan. Σύμφωνα με την επίσημη ενημέρωση η ΟΜΟΝΟΙΑ θα μεταβεί αύριο στο ΓΣΠ έχοντας στην αποστολής της συνολικά 23 ποδοσφαιριστές. Δεν συμπεριλήφθηκαν σε αυτήν για προληπτικούς λόγους οι Μασούρας, Λοίζου και Ατζίλι. Η ενημέρωση: Έχει ολοκληρωθεί η προετοιμασία της ομάδας μας ενόψει του αυριανού (16/09) αγώνα απέναντι στην ΑΕΚ για την 3η αγωνιστική του πρωταθλήματος. Η αποστολή μας αποτελείται από τους ακόλουθους ποδοσφαιριστές: Φαμπιάνο, Ουζόχο, Κυριακίδης, Ντιουνκού, Κίτσος, Ελάντερ, Κουλιμπαλί, Σεμέδο, Κακουλλής, Εβάντρο, Στεπίνσκι, Μάριτς, Σίμιτς, Λανγκ, Χαμάς, Παναγιώτου, Κούσουλος, Μουσιαλόφσκι, Χαραλάμπους, Εράκοβιτς, Νικολάου, Νεοφύτου, Αλιούμ. Προληπτικά εκτός αποστολής έμειναν οι Μασούρας, Λοΐζου και Ατζίλι. Το παιχνίδι θα διεξαχθεί στο στάδιο ΓΣΠ θα αρχίσει στις 19:00 και θα μεταδοθεί ζωντανά από τη Cytavision. Επίσης, θα υπάρχει και ζωντανή ηχητική μετάδοση του αγώνα από το γήπεδο μέσω του ΟΜΟΝΟΙΑ TV.

title: ضغط بريطاني على ستارمر للسماح بضربات أوكرانية داخل روسيا
وزير الإسكان يتفقد موقف تسليم الوحدات السكنية لحاجزيها بـ"العلمين الجديدة"
content: كتب- محمد عبدالناصر: تفقد المهندس شريف الشربيني، وزير الإسكان والمرافق والمجتمعات العمرانية، موقف تسليم الوحدات السكنية لحاجزيها بالمشروعات السكنية المختلفة بمدينة العلمين الجديدة (الحي اللاتيني - كمبوند مزارين - الأبراج الشاطئية - سكن مصر للإسكان المتوسط)، ويرافقه مسؤولو الوزارة، وهيئة المجتمعات العمرانية الجديدة، وجهاز مدينة العلمين الجديدة، والمكتب الفنى للوزير. وشدد وزير الإسكان، على ضرورة الالتزام بالجداول الزمنية المحددة لتسليم الوحدات لحاجزيها بمختلف المشروعات السكنية، وسرعة إنهاء اللمسات الأخيرة لأعمال تشطيبات الوحدات السكنية، وأعمال تنسيق الموقع، وأعمال الزراعات، بالمشروعات السكنية، لتسليمها، طبقاً للمواعيد المحددة. كما تفقد الوزير سير العمل بوحدات المبادرة الرئاسية "سكن لكل المصريين" بمدينة العلمين الجديدة، وكذا أعمال تنفيذ الوحدات السكنية، والفيلات، وأعمال المرافق، والطرق وتنسيق الموقع، والزراعة، وغيرها، بكمبوند "مزارين" بمدينة العلمين الجديدة، موجهاً بسرعة إنجاز الأعمال، وإنهاء مناطق مكتملة تباعاً، لسرعة تسليم الوحدات للحاجزين. اقرأ أيضًا: عاجل.. وزير الإسكان يعلن طرح 70 ألف شقة لمحدودي ومتوسطي الدخل مقدم حجز 190 ألف جنيه.. قدم على شقة كاملة التشطيب بالتقسيط على 30 سنة

title: الكاوتش ضرب.. 11 مصابًا في انقلاب سيارة ربع نقل جنوبي المنيا
content: المنيا - جمال محمد: أُصيب 11 شخصًا، مساء اليوم الأحد، إثر انقلاب سيارة ربع نقل على الطريق الصحراوي الشرقي بالقرب من مركز ملوي جنوب محافظة المنيا. تلقت الأجهزة الأمنية بلاغًا من عمليات النجدة بوقوع حادث انقلاب سيارة ربع نقل تحمل رقم (2418 ن، ج، ف) على الوصلة بين قرية دير البرشا ومدينة ملوي، نتيجة انفجار الإطار الأمامي الأيمن. الحادث أسفر عن إصابة 11 شخصًا، بينهم ربة منزل، وجميعهم من سكان قرية قلندول التابعة لمركز ملوي. تم نقل المصابين إلى مستشفى ملوي التخصصي لتلقي العلاج، وحررت الأجهزة الأمنية محضرًا بالواقعة، وتم إخطار النيابة العامة للتحقيق.

title: هل أسامح اللي ظلمني ولا آخد حقي منه؟.. أمين الفتوى يُجيب
content: كتب- حسن مرسي: أجاب الشيخ أحمد وسام، أمين الفتوى بدار الإفتاء المصرية، على سؤال متصل بشأن: "أسامح اللي ظلمني ولا آخد حقي منه؟". وقال أمين الفتوى، خلال حلقة برنامج "فتاوى الناس"، المذاع على فضائية "الناس"، اليوم الأحد، إن عدم مسامحة الشخص الذي أساء أو ظلم ليس ذنبًا بحد ذاته، ولكنه يشير إلى درجات مختلفة من الفضل عند الله. وأوضح أنه ليس من الضروري أن يشعر الشخص بالذنب إذا لم يكن قادرًا على مسامحة من أساء إليه أو ظلَمه، ولكن هناك درجات أعلى من الفضل عند الله سبحانه وتعالى لمن يسامح ويعفو، موضحا أن تمسك الإنسان بحقه واسترداده ليس ظلمًا، ولكنه قد يكون أقل درجة من الفضل الذي يناله من يعفو ويسامح. وأشار إلى أن الله تعالى يقول في القرآن الكريم: "وَلَا يَأْتَلِ أُولُو الْفَضْلِ مِنْكُمْ وَالسَّعَةِ أَنْ يُؤْتُوا أُولِي الْقُرْبَىٰ" (سورة النور: 22)، وهو يشير إلى أن الفضل والكرم أعلى درجة من التمسك بالحقوق فقط، مضيفا أن هذه الآية نزلت في سياق حادثة الإفك، حيث كان سيدنا أبو بكر الصديق رضي الله عنه يمد قريبًا له بمرتب شهري، وعندما انتشرت الإشاعات عن ابنته السيدة عائشة رضي الله عنها، قطع سيدنا أبو بكر المساعدة المالية، ورغم أنه لم يكن عليه إثم، إلا أن الله سبحانه وتعالى يوصي بالعفو والفضل. وشدد على أن مسامحة الآخرين والعفو عنهم هي درجة عالية من الفضل عند الله، في حين أن التمسك بالحقوق هو أمر مشروع ومسموح به، فإن العفو والتسامح يرفعان الإنسان إلى درجات أعلى من الأجر والمغفرة، موضحا أن الله سبحانه وتعالى يقول في نهاية الآية: "وَلْيَعْفُوا وَلْيَصْفَحُوا ۗ أَلَا تُحِبُّونَ أَنْ يَغْفِرَ اللَّهُ لَكُمْ" (سورة النور: 22)، مما يدل...

title: 9 workers from Afghanistan die in Pakistan Coal Mine accident
creator: Fidel Rahmati
content: Pakistani media have reported that Five Afghanistan workers, including two brothers, lost their lives due to the release of toxic gas in a coal mine in the Shahrag area of Harnai district, Balochistan province, Pakistan. According to the Dawn newspaper, citing local officials in Balochistan, This incident occurred on the morning of Saturday, September 14, in southwestern Pakistan, when six miners entered a private coal mine to begin their work. Local authorities explained that the miners, including two brothers, lost consciousness after being exposed to methane gas when they entered the mine and later died. The incident’s victims have been identified as Rahman Shah, Shafiullah, Zubairullah, and Mutiullah. As reported by Dawn , the coal mine has since been shut down, and the contractor has been handed over to judicial authorities for further investigation. The tragic incident underscores the dangerous working conditions faced by Afghan laborers in Pakistani coal mines, highlighting the need for stricter safety measures in such hazardous environments. This event may prompt further scrutiny of privately owned mines in the region. Authorities are likely to investigate safety standards to prevent future accidents and ensure the protection of workers’ lives. title: JIPMER resident doctors to join nation-wide protest today
content: The JIPMER Resident Doctors’ Association (JRDA) will stage an hour-long pen-down strike confined to elective services, take out a rally and form a human chain on Monday to join a nation-wide protest in solidarity with the month-long agitation by resident doctors in Kolkata seeking justice in a rape-murder case of a PG trainee at the RG Kar Hospital. The JRDA, which was reconstituted through an election on Sunday, formulated the protest plan in response to an urgent call for nation-wide solidarity action on Monday by the All India Resident and Junior Doctors’ Joint Action Forum (AIJAF) and after consultation with student bodies in other States, a spokesperson said. The nation-wide action has been timed a day prior to when the Supreme Court is scheduled to next take up hearing on the Kolkata case.In fact, when it called off its ten-day boycott of elective duties in August seeking justice in the Kolkata incident and concrete guarantees for workplace safety for healthcare professionals, the JRDA had said it was reposing faith in the institution of the Supreme Court to secure justice, but warned of returning to the war path if the core demands remained unaddressed. Though they had resumed regular duty, the resident doctors in JIPMER had continued with symbolic actions over the past month in solidarity with their peers in Kolkata. “It has been more than a month since we are fighting for justice and are no significant steps taken satisfying the demands,” the JRDA said. The JRDA,...

title: حكم ضرب الزوجة في الإسلام.. واعظة بالأوقاف تكشف 3 طرق متاحة
content: كتب- حسن مرسي: كشفت الدكتورة نيفين مختار، الواعظة بوزارة الأوقاف، أن بعض الأئمة أفتوا بأن السيدة ليس من الواجب عليها إعداد ما يحتاجه المنزل من طبخ وغسيل وتنظيف وغيره، لافتة إلى أن العلماء الآخرين أوجبوا على المرأة فعل تلك الأمور. وتابعت خلال لقائها مع الإعلامية فاتن عبد المعبود، مقدمة برنامج صالة التحرير، المذاع على قناة صدى البلد: النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم كان يساعد زوجاته في أعمال المنزل، لأن الحياة تقوم على المشاركة والتفاهم، نافية أن يكون الضرب مشرع في القرآن. ولفتت نيفين مختار إلى أن الضرب الذي ذكر في القرآن الكريم -حال نشوزها- إما بالسواك أو بالمنديل أو وكز الكتف، رافضة تصريحات بعض المشهورات أن المرأة غير ملزمة بالمبيت في بيت زوجها. وقالت نيفين مختار إن من قالت بأن المساكنة أمر مطلوبة فأرد عليها بأنه زنا صريح، مستشهدة بقوله تعالى: وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِيمَا عَرَّضْتُمْ بِهِ مِنْ خِطْبَةِ النِّسَاءِ أَوْ أَكْنَنْتُمْ فِي أَنْفُسِكُمْ عَلِمَ اللَّهُ أَنَّكُمْ سَتَذْكُرُونَهُنَّ وَلَكِنْ لَا تُوَاعِدُوهُنَّ سِرًّا إِلَّا أَنْ تَقُولُوا قَوْلًا مَعْرُوفًا وَلَا تَعْزِمُوا عُقْدَةَ النِّكَاحِ حَتَّى يَبْلُغَ الْكِتَابُ أَجَلَهُ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِي أَنْفُسِكُمْ فَاحْذَرُوهُ وَاعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ حَلِيمٌ. وواصلت قائلة: نعيش الآن حروب الجيل الثامن والتاسع وهي حروب الأخلاق، وخاصة فئة الشباب، مختتمة: هناك من يريد هدم الإسلام والأمة الإسلامية خير الأمم التي خرجت للإسلام.

title: يرصدها بالصور.. هشام ناشط بيئي يتابع رحلات الطيور المهاجرة من أوروبا إفريقيا
مطور عقاري: الحديث عن فقاعة عقارية "أكذوبة".. وأسعار العقارات سترتفع لهذه الأسباب
content: كتب- محمد عبدالناصر: كشف المهندس محمد طاهر، عضو جمعية مطوري القاهرة الجديدة والعاصمة الإدارية، عن حقيقة حدوث فقاعة عقارية، موضحًا أن العقار في مصر على مدار تاريخه لم يشهد انخفاضًا في الأسعار بل على العكس أثبت أنه الملاذ الآمن لحفظ قيمة الأموال وتحقيق عوائد كبيرة رغم الاضطرابات الاقتصادية المختلفة، والحديث عن انهيار وركود محتمل هو أكذوبة. وأضاف "طاهر"، في بيان، أن أفضل وقت لشراء عقار هو خلال الفترة الحالية، لافتًا إلى أن من تعاقدوا على وحدات قبل 4 سنوات رغم التخوفات وقتها بأن أسعار العقارات في طريقها للانهيار، حققوا مكاسب كبيرة، فمن تعاقد على وحدة في عام 2020 حقق مكاسب تتخطى ٥٠٠٪؜ بحلول العام الحالي، وكذلك الحال الآن وسيكون كذلك بعد 4 سنوات قادمة. وأكد "طاهر"، أن الأسعار سترتفع بشكل كبير خلال الفترة القادمة، بسبب ارتفاع أسعار الوقود وبالتبعية أسعار الحديد ومواد البناء كذلك، وارتفاع أسعار الأراضي وتكلفة التسويق والبيع ولذا الرابح هو العميل الذي يتعاقد على وحدة بمشروع منتقى بعناية في ٢٠٢٤ فهذا توقيت مثالي للاستثمار في العقار. وأشار إلى أن حديث البعض عن بيع العقار بأسعار تقارب فوائد البنوك، كلام غير دقيق حيث تتعامل الشركات في الحدود الطبيعية وتعتبرها فترة عارضة وتتحمل فرق تكلفة رأس المال، مؤكدًا أن تعامل الشركات العقارية بمعدل خصم 32% يعني أن سعر بيع المتر سيرتفع من 80 ألف جنيه إلى 180 ألف جنيه، فضلا عن وجود منافسة عالية في السوق تمنع حدوث تلك الزيادات الكبيرة. وكشف المهندس محمد طاهر، عن حالة واحدة يخسر فيها العميل أمواله، أبرزها الاختيار الخاطئ للمشروع أو لشركة التطوير، فالشراء والتعاقد مع شركة ضعيفة هو خسارة محققة للأموال، وكذلك التعاقد...

title: La calle Adolfo Miaja de la Muela reabre al tráfico tras mes y medio de obras
creator: I. R.
