title: How small town in Kansas found itself at center of abortion’s national moment
creator: Associated Press
content: Security personnel stand outside a recently opened Planned Parenthood clinic Tuesday in Pittsburg, Kan. Charlie Riedel | AP PITTSBURG, Kan. — The Rev. Anthony Navaratnam stood before his congregation and urged them to pray for the women from surrounding states who will flock to the new abortion clinic in town that opened in August. “God is giving us an opportunity to be missionaries in Pittsburg, Kansas,” he told those at Flag Church, which hosted a training on how to protest outside of the clinic. The debate over reproductive rights has landed in this college town of 20,000 in the southeast corner of one of the few states left in the region still allowing abortions. It is near Missouri, Oklahoma and Arkansas and not terribly far from Texas. A place this size, especially one in a historically red state, was unlikely to have an abortion clinic before Roe v. Wade was overturned in 2022. Since then, Kansas has become one of five states that people are most likely to travel to in order to get an abortion when they’re unable to at home, said Caitlin Myers, an economics professor at Middlebury College who researches abortion policies. Abortions spiked in Kansas by 152% after Roe, according to a recent analysis by the Guttmacher Institute, which supports abortion rights. Using Myers’ count, six of the clinics in Kansas, Illinois, New Mexico, North Carolina and Virginia that have opened or relocated post-Roe are in communities with fewer than 25,000 people. Two others are in...

title: Ντόναλντ Τραμπ: «Μισώ την Τέιλορ Σουίφτ»
content: Η Aμερικανίδα σταρ της ποπ μουσικής, λίγες μέρες πριν ανακοίνωσε την υποστήριξή της στην Κάμαλα Χάρις. Θυμωμένος μπροστά στον κίνδυνο να χάσει δεκάδες χιλιάδες ψηφοφόρους, ο Ντόναλντ Τραμπ δήλωσε σήμερα ότι «μισεί» την Τέιλορ Σουίφτ, την Aμερικανίδα σταρ της ποπ μουσικής, η οποία λίγες μέρες πριν ανακοίνωσε την υποστήριξή της στην Κάμαλα Χάρις για πρόεδρο των Ηνωμένων Πολιτειών της Αμερικής. «Μισώ την Τέιλορ Σουίφτ!», έγραψε στο δίκτυό του Truth Social με κεφαλαία γράμματα ο πρώην πρόεδρος και υποψήφιος των Ρεπουμπλικάνων στις εκλογές της 5ης Νοεμβρίου . Κατά τη διάρκεια των MTV Video Music Awards, η Σουίφτ είχε πει στους εκατομμύρια νεαρούς Αμερικανούς θαυμαστές της να εγγραφούν για να ψηφίσουν στις επερχόμενες προεδρικές εκλογές. Αμέσως μετά την τηλεμαχία ανάμεσα στην Χάρις και τον Τραμπ, στις 10 Σεπτεμβρίου, η 34χρονη Aμερικανίδα σταρ είπε με ανάρτησή της στους 283 εκατομμύρια ακολούθους της στο Instagram πως θα ψηφίσει τη Δημοκρατική υποψήφια για την προεδρία στις εκλογές της 5ης Νοεμβρίου, διότι «αγωνίζεται για υποθέσεις και δικαιώματα που πιστεύω». Υπέγραψε την ανάρτησή της ως «άτεκνη γατομάνα», με αυτό το τελευταίο βέλος να είχε στόχο τον υποψήφιο αντιπρόεδρο των Ρεπουμπλικάνων Τζ. Ντ. Βανς, που προκάλεσε οργισμένες αντιδράσεις στη χώρα όταν χρησιμοποίησε τον όρο. Η ανάρτηση της τραγουδίστριας, η οποία έχει τεράστια απήχηση στους νέους κάτω των 30, κάτω...

title: Barcelona goleó 4-1 a Girona con doblete de Lamine Yamal
creator: Agencia AP
content: Lamine Yamal se despachó con un doblete en un lapso de siete minutos y el Barcelona aplastó el domingo 4-1 a Girona para confirmarse como el líder con paso perfecto de la Liga española. Yamal abrió la cuenta después de recuperar el balón en una salida de David López y definir con un zurdazo arriba frente al arquero argentino Paulo Gazzaniga a los 30 minutos. La joya azulgrana de 17 años celebró su primer doblete del curso a los 37. Después de aprovechar un rechace que quedó en el borde del área, Yama remató de zurda con clase rumbo a las redes. Dani Olmo se encargó del tercer tanto azulgrana tras la reanudación — su tercero en igual cantidad de partidos tras llegar procedente del Leipzig — con un derechazo cruzado tras recibir pase en profundidad de Jules Kounde. Pedir se unió a los goleadores después de recibir un pase filtrado de Marc Casadó. Al entrar al área, Pedri se quitó Gazzaniga y definió con un tiro de zurda con el marco abierto a los 64. Christian Stuani hizo el tanto de la honra para los anfitriones después de rematar desde el corazón del área una diagonal de Portu a los 80. Fue la 28va diana del atacante uruguayo saliendo de cambio. El Barça hilvanó la quinta victoria para consolidar el liderato con 15 unidades. Fue su segunda goleada, luego del 7-0 que le propinó a Valladolid en el partido previo a la pausa por la fecha FIFA. Los azulgranas sacan cuatro puntos de diferencia al campeón defensor Real Madrid, que el sábado venció 2-0...

title: Mülheim: Mann mit Behinderung vermisst – Polizei bittet Bevölkerung um Hilfe
content: In Mülheim wird ein junger Mann vermisst! Justus H. hat am Samstag (14. September) seine Wohnung an der Liverpoolstraße gegen 13 Uhr verlassen und kehrte bis in die späten Abendstunden nicht zurück. Seine Eltern meldeten den 24-Jährigen daraufhin bei der Polizei vermisst. Der Mülheimer ist körperlich und geistig eingeschränkt und stark pflegebedürftig. Deshalb ist es wichtig, Justus H. so schnell wie möglich zu finden. Um sich von A nach B zu bewegen, ist er auf einen Rollator angewiesen. Die Polizei hat bereits erste Hinweise erhalten und sucht nun mit Hochdruck nach dem jungen Mann. ++ ++ In der Regel hält sich der Mülheimer im Bereich des Witthausbusch, am Elbinger Weg und im Nahbereich der Mendener Höhe auf und geht dort eigenständig spazieren. Von seinem letzten bekannten Spaziergang kehrte er jedoch bis jetzt nicht zurück. ++ ++ Die Polizei leitete sofort eine große Öffentlichkeitsfahndung ein und erhielt bereits erste Hinweise. Zeugen meldeten sich am Sonntagvormittag (15. September) bei der Polizei und gaben an, Justus H. Samstag am Essener Hauptbahnhof gesehen zu haben. Videoauswertungen der Bundespolizei bestätigten, dass sich der 24-Jährige gegen 15.30 Uhr an einem der Bahnsteige aufhielt. Auf den Aufnahmen trägt Justus H. ein rotes T-Shirt und führt seinen Rollator mit sich. Einen Tag später wurde der Vermisste gegen 13.30 Uhr am Hauptbahnhof in Köln und gegen 14.30 Uhr am Eberplatz gesehen. Die Polizei Köln und Essen bitten um weitere...

title: ‘Giants and Warriors’ new exhibit in Chesterton roots ancient history
creator: Philip Potempa
content: A new two-month free exhibit at Chesterton Art Center celebrates rituals, customs and cultural heritage through the mediums of fresco painting and photography. “Of Giants and Warriors” highlights local artists Diane Grams and Timothy D. Lace now through Oct. 30 with an opening artist reception from 4-7 p.m. Friday, Sept. 20 at the galleries located at 115th South 4th St. in Chesterton. “This is a beautiful and thought-provoking exhibition of about 40 pieces,” said Chesterton Art Center Executive Director Hannah Hammond-Hagman, who is in her third year in that capacity. “Our exhibits and special events are a way for us to build access to the artists and artwork for our guests as we continue to program with exhibits in more meaningful ways.” According to Hammond-Hagman, “Of Giants and Warriors” introduces patrons to “tales of memory, metaphor, ancient artistic processes, resilience, joy and passion.” She said Grams’ fresco paintings offer “a feminist gaze into modern gender socialization and the masculine history of fresco-making.” The show includes Lace’s large-scale photographs of Mardi Gras Indians in brightly colored suits of feathers and beads placing focus on the rituals of the the backstreets of New Orleans to celebrate connections between African and Native American traditions. She said both artists “push contemporary boundaries” to offer explorations into worlds of modern narrative imagery with roots in ancient history. “The title of the exhibition was conceived by...

title: Boyertown’s Oktoberfest offers authentic German experience
creator: Lisa Mitchell
content: Building a Better Boyertown ‘s 17th Annual Oktoberfest served up a taste of Bavaria on Friday and Saturday, Sept. 13 and 14, in Boyertown’s Town Center parking lot. Organizers estimate 8,000 to 9,000 people came out for the event. “The atmosphere this year was electric! The bands had people on their feet, the weather was perfect, and we had a large selection of delicious food. There was something for everyone to enjoy!” Krista Gross, event planner at Building a Better Boyertown, said in a statement. Committed to fostering a strong sense of community and tradition, Building a Better Boyertown’s annual Oktoberfest is a celebration of heritage and culture, bringing together residents and visitors for a day of joy, camaraderie, and shared experiences, the nonprofit Main Street organization stated in the release. “I truly enjoy Oktoberfest more every year. To be able to host an event that brings the community together is such an amazing thing,” said Gross. Zachary, Theodore and Stephanie Schlegel enjoy a cool refreshing brew at Building a Better Boyertown's 17th Annual Oktoberfest on Saturday, Sept. 14. (Barry Taglieber/For MediaNews Group) Dancers perform a traditional German anvil dance at Building a Better Boyertown's 17th Annual Oktoberfest on Saturday, Sept. 14. (Barry Taglieber/For MediaNews Group) Alphorn long horns were played during Building a Better Boyertown's 17th Annual Oktoberfest on Saturday, Sept. 14. title: Trump auf Truth Social: "Ich hasse Taylor Swift!"
creator: SN.at Redaktion
content: Truth Social ist das Online-Sprachrohr des republikanischen Präsidentschaftskandidaten. Die Plattform hat er einst als eine Art Twitter-Ersatz mitgegründet. Swift hatte sich unmittelbar nach dem TV-Duell am Dienstagabend (Ortszeit), bei dem Harris erstmals auf Trump traf, für die Demokratin ausgesprochen. Sie werde bei der Präsidentenwahl am 5. November für Harris und deren Vizepräsidentschaftskandidaten Tim Walz stimmen, kündigte die Sängerin in einem Beitrag auf Instagram an. Swift hat bei ihren Fans enormen Einfluss und auf der Plattform rund 284 Millionen Follower. Trumps Truth-Social-Account setzte am Sonntagmorgen (Ortszeit) diverse Beiträge in Großbuchstaben ab - darunter: "Die gescheiterte New York Times ist eine echte Gefahr für die Demokratie." Vor dem Swift-Post hieß es dort: "Alle reichen, arbeitsplatzschaffenden Menschen, die Genossin Kamala Harris unterstützen, sind dumm." Trump hatte bereits kurz nach Swifts Instagram-Beitrag verärgert gewirkt. "Sie scheint immer einen Demokraten zu unterstützen. Und dafür wird sie wahrscheinlich auf dem Markt einen Preis zahlen", sagte er. Er sei kein Swift-Fan, fügte er hinzu. Vor einigen Wochen hatte Trump auf Truth Social noch mit Künstlicher Intelligenz generierte Bilder veröffentlicht, die den Eindruck erwecken sollten, dass Swift und ihre Fans Trump unterstützten. Swift nannte diese Bilder nun als einen Grund dafür, warum sie ihre politische Position öffentlich mache. Der Truth-Social-Account wird in...

title: Trotz Rot gegen Friedl: Werder Bremen gewinnt in Mainz dank Debütant Köhn
creator: Sportredaktion RND
content: Werder Bremen jubelt über den Siegtreffer bei Mainz 05. Quelle: IMAGO/Thomas Frey Trotz halbstündiger Unterzahl hat Werder Bremen am Sonntagabend den ersten Sieg in dieser Bundesliga-Saison eingefahren. Die Hanseaten gewannen ihre Partie bei Mainz 05 mit 2:1 (0:0) und haben nun fünf Zähler auf dem Konto. Zum Matchwinner vor den Augen von Trainerlegende Jürgen Klopp avancierte Debütant Derrick Köhn. Unter den Augen seines früheren Trainers Jürgen Klopp hat Mainz 05 gegen Werder Bremen trotz einer halbstündigen Überzahl verloren. Die Mainzer unterlagen zum Abschluss des dritten Spieltags in der Bundesliga mit 1:2 (1:1). Für Bremen ist es der erste Ligasieg in dieser Saison, für die 05er die erste Niederlage. Werders Marvin Ducksch erzielte vor 32.000 Zuschauern die frühe Führung per Foulelfmeter (8. Minute). Für den FSV glich der südkoreanische Nationalspieler Jae-sung Lee (27.) aus. Den Siegtreffer für die Gäste erzielte in Unterzahl der kurz zuvor eingewechselte Derrick Köhn (69.). Zuvor sah Werder-Kapitän Marco Friedl wegen einer Notbremse die Rote Karte (60.). Vor der Partie wurde Klopp, der auf der Tribüne saß, von den Mainzer Fans gefeiert. Mit „Jürgen, Jürgen, Jürgen“-Rufen nahmen die Anhänger ihn in Empfang. Der 57-Jährige prägte bei den Rheinhessen eine Ära, war von 2001 bis 2008 ihr Chefcoach. Unter Klopp schafften die Mainzer 2004 den erstmaligen Aufstieg in die Bundesliga. Klopp sah eine Anfangsphase, in der beide Mannschaften viel...

Die Mainzer unterlagen zum Abschluss des dritten Spieltags in der Bundesliga mit 1:2 (1:1). Für Bremen ist es der erste Ligasieg in dieser Saison, für die 05er die erste Niederlage. Werders Marvin Ducksch erzielte vor 32.000 Zuschauern die frühe Führung per Foulelfmeter (8. Minute). Für den FSV glich der südkoreanische Nationalspieler Jae-sung Lee (27.) aus. Den Siegtreffer für die Gäste erzielte in Unterzahl der kurz zuvor eingewechselte Derrick Köhn (69.). Zuvor sah Werder-Kapitän Marco Friedl wegen einer Notbremse die Rote Karte (60.). Klopp emotional empfangen Vor der Partie wurde Klopp, der auf der Tribüne saß, von den Mainzer Fans gefeiert. Mit „Jürgen, Jürgen, Jürgen“-Rufen nahmen die Anhänger ihn in Empfang. Der 57-Jährige prägte bei den Rheinhessen eine Ära, war von 2001 bis 2008 ihr Chefcoach. Unter Klopp schafften die Mainzer 2004 den erstmaligen Aufstieg in die Bundesliga. Klopp sah eine Anfangsphase, in der beide Mannschaften viel Offensivdrang zeigten. Die Gäste aus Bremen hatten eine Dreifachchance zur Führung, doch erst parierte Mainz-Torwart Robin Zentner, dann klärten zwei Abwehrspieler der 05er kurz vor der Linie. Früher Wechsel bei Werder Nur Augenblicke später kam Bremens Justin Njinmah nach einem Zweikampf mit Dominik Kohr im Strafraum zu Fall. Den Elfmeter verwandelte Ducksch. Der Stürmer hatte...

title: JAVIER GALARZA ALONSO
5 साल... 5 हजार वीजा और ₹300 करोड़ की कमाई, दिल्‍ली पुलिस ने फर्जी वीजा फैक्‍ट्री का किया भंडाफोड़
Esta aspiradora limpia, trapea, se limpia sola y se seca con aire caliente: Dreame H14, lanzamiento y precio en México
creator: Antonio Cahun
content: Dreame trae a México otra aspiradora inteligente, la Dreame H14 . Después de la aspiradora robot L20 Ultra , ahora la compañía china trae al país otra alternativa con formato más clásico, pero con funciones avanzadas e inteligentes con la promesa de facilitar la vida de los usuarios. Dreame H14 tiene precio oficial en México de 10,999 pesos , ya a la venta en Amazon México . En la tienda oficial de Dreame también están disponibles otros productos de la compañía, como más modelos aspiradoras robot, de mano, y hasta secadoras de cabello. La aspiradora Dreame H14 aspira y trapea al mismo tiempo . La compañía la describe como "aspiradora en seco y húmedo". Con su poder de succión de 18,000 Pa puede retirar polvo y cualquier tipo de suciedad de distintos tipos de piso, incluso objetos sólidos, asegura la compañía. Para complementar, su cepillo integrado limpia líquidos con agua caliente a 60° C , de esta manera se asegura de disolver suciedad y residuos que pueden quedar en las superficies. Así funciona la limpieza 2-en-1 con aspiración y trapeado al mismo tiempo de la Dreame H14. Dreame asegura que su aspiradora puede limpiar polvo y suciedad de todos los rincones del hogar, alrededor de patas de las mesas, en bordes de las paredes y de muebles. También es capaz de limpiar superficies como alfombra y hasta desenredar cabellos y pelo de mascotas. Además, Dreame H14 tiene "diseño de alcance plano a 180°", es decir que puede doblarse para quedar paralela...

title: WTA Hua Hin Day 1 Predictions Including Katerina Siniakova vs Arina Rodionova
creator: Jordan Reynolds, Last Word On Sports
content: It promises to be a great day of tennis in Hua Hin. The No. 2 seed, Katerina Siniakova, is one of the players scheduled to play on Day 1 of the WTA-250 tournament. There are seven matches on the slate in total. We at LWOT predict all the matches here and in a separate article, including Katie Volynets vs Clara Tauson . But which players do you think will win? WTA Hua Hin Day 1 Predictions Lanlana Tararudee vs Thasaporn Naklo Head-to-head: First meeting This is a battle of the two local wild cards. Tararudee has enjoyed a slightly more accomplished career to date. The 20-year-old reached a career-high ranking of No. 175 at the end of July. Thasaporn is also enjoying the best season of her career but has yet to break into the Top 300. Her compatriot is a slightly better player at the moment, making her the favorite to progress. Prediction: Tararudee in 2 Viktorija Golubic vs Wang Xiyu Head-to-head: Golubic 2-0 Wang Both players had pretty underwhelming North American hardcourt seasons. Wang’s issues go back further than that. Her level has nosedived since her run to the final of the ATX Open at the start of March. Golubic is not in her prime, but her playing style has caused Wang issues in the past. The Swiss player’s spin from her forehand and one-handed backhand does not suit Wang and could give her the edge again. Prediction: Wang in 3 Varvara Gracheva vs Taylah Preston Head-to-head: First meeting This is not a bad draw for either woman. 18-year-old Preston is inexperienced...

title: ΘΕΣΗ ΑΠΟΛΛΩΝΑ: «Ξεκάθαρα τα πράγματα, οι κανονισμοί είναι κανονισμοί»
creator: ΓΙΩΡΓΟΣ ΝΙΚΟΛΑΟΥ
content: «Είμαστε απογοητευμένοι γιατί για κάποιους ανεγκέφαλους ένας αγώνας δεν γίνεται και πρέπει να λέμε τα πράγματα με το όνομα τους. Όλοι είδαμε τι έγινε, εμείς ενημερωθήκαμε από την Αστυνομία για το τι έγινε. Η Αστυνομία πήρε αυτή την απόφαση διότι δεν μπορούσε να εγγυηθεί την ασφάλεια του παιχνιδιού. Υπάρχει η ΚΟΠ, υπάρχουν οι αρμόδιοι εμείς δεν ζητάμε τίποτα απλά να γίνει αυτό που πρέπει, είναι ξεκάθαρα τα πράγματα, οι κανονισμοί είναι κανονισμοί».

title: Зеленский назвал риторикой слова Трампа о завершении конфликта на Украине
creator: Иван Крылов
content: Главарь киевского режима заявил в интервью CNN, что считает слова кандидата в президенты США от Республиканской партии о завершении им конфликта Киева и Москвы только предвыборными обещаниями. «Моя позиция заключается в том, что период выборов и предвыборные послания — это предвыборные послания. Иногда они не совсем реальны», — сказал Зеленский. При этом он отметил, что не знает всех деталей предложения Трампа.

title: Найден «лучший завтрак» для сердечников
content: Завтрак при заболеваниях сердца, сосудов или высоком уровне холестерина должен быть грамотно подобран. Так считают медики, которых цитирует портал NEWS.ru. Специалисты уверены, что для сердечников для первого приема пищи подойдет овсяная каша - без добавок и желательно на воде. Такое блюдо снижает уровень липопротеинов низкой плотности, уменьшает уровень "плохого холестерина". Последний, напомним, ведет к гипертонии, заболеваниям сердца и сосудов, инсульту или диабету второго типа. Кроме того, овсянка - источник полезной для ЖКТ клетчатки. По подсчетам диетологов, в день достаточно съедать 5-10 г клетчатки. Помимо овсяной каши она содержится в семенах чиа, льне, бобовых, фруктах, авокадо и овощах.

title: Whose wall is it anyway? Structure at Minto Road in disrepair for 15 months
creator: Vibha Sharma
content: New Delhi: The arched brick wall along Minto Road between Connaught Place and New Delhi Railway Station, near Minto Railway Bridge, has remained in a state of disrepair for over 15 months. The area, which is under New Delhi Municipal Council ( NDMC ), suffered damage in June last year, and the civic body promptly attributed the collapse to work being carried out by Northern Railway . Despite repeated correspondence, no assurance of repair has been forthcoming from the railway authorities, the council said. On being questioned, an NDMC official said: "As soon as the wall collapsed last year, we wrote to the Northern Railways to get it repaired immediately in view of the upcoming G20 Summit . But nothing happened. Thereafter, we sent three reminders, but there was no response or confirmation from the other side. Finally, we have done an estimation of the cost for repair work and will soon get it approved in principle. We will get it repaired from our side and later send the recovery letter to the railways as the damage was caused by them only," the official said. The official added that the wall on the rear side was constructed after the issue was highlighted, but work on the aesthetically developed front wall with an arch-shaped jail wall is still in a damaged condition, giving an ugly look to the area. Thousands of commuters used the prominent stretch connecting Connaught Place and Lutyens' Delhi to Central Delhi every day. The council had earlier said that the structure was...

title: Ola de violencia en Culiacán no cesa; suman 7 días de choques armados
creator: Itzel Castañares
content: La ola de violencia en Sinaloa no cesa y este domingo 15 de septiembre se cumplen 7 días de choques armados que han cimbrado principalmente a la capital, Culiacán , lo que ha dado como resultado la muerte confirmada de al menos 30 personas entre el lunes y las primeras horas de este domingo. De acuerdo con reportes en redes sociales de periodistas originarios y que residen en Culiacán, además de estas muertes confirmadas , se sumarían aquellas que están sin registrar , que los grupos se llevan y que las autoridades no procesan . A nivel oficial, la Fiscalía de Sinaloa ha emitido un reporte general cada 24 horas , siendo el último publicado ayer 14 de septiembre, en el que dio cuenta de la apertura de al menos 4 carpetas de investigación por homicidio doloso ante el hallazgo de una cabeza humana en la colonia República Mexicana y de los cuerpos de tres hombres en la carretera internacional México 15 al sur. A través de su cuenta de X, el periodista Aaron Ibarra hizo un recuento de la semana de violencia que ha vivido la ciudad y la actualización de reportes durante las primeras horas de este domingo, entre detonaciones al aire , asesinatos en domicilios particulares y ‘levantones’ . Anoche en todo el sector norte se oyeron detonaciones “al aire”, diría mi secre de seguridad, y el sueño se interrumpe por ese sentido constante de alarma. Ayer hallaron la cabeza del cuerpo decapitado. También ayer un enfrentamiento dejó tres hombres armados sin vida. — Aarón...

title: Setor imobiliário critica as mudanças da reforma tributária
creator: Agência Brasil
content: O projeto de lei complementar que regulamenta a reforma tributária pode sofrer uma nova alteração, que poderá fazer o texto voltar à Câmara. O governo e o setor imobiliário se opõem em torno do novo sistema de tributação sobre a venda de imóveis por empresas. O projeto estabelece que as vendas de imóveis novos por empresas, chamadas de incorporações, terão uma alíquota reduzida em 40%, o que equivalerá a 16,78% do Imposto sobre Valor Adicionado (IVA). O cálculo considera a alíquota padrão de 27,97% calculada pelo Ministério da Fazenda após a aprovação do texto na Câmara dos Deputados. As vendas de imóveis por pessoas físicas continuarão não tributadas, como ocorre atualmente. Carros elétricos têm desvalorização com evolução e concorrência chinesa O setor imobiliário critica as mudanças. Segundo a Câmara Brasileira da Indústria da Construção (Cbic), a carga tributária média sobre o segmento está entre 6,4% e 8%. A Cbic e outras entidades do setor, como a Associação Brasileira de Incorporadoras Imobiliárias (Abrainc), defendem a elevação do redutor da alíquota padrão de 40% para 60%, o que reduziria a alíquota de IVA para 11,98% e, segundo o setor teria impacto neutro sobre o setor. A equipe econômica, no entanto, afirma que os 16,78% de alíquota efetiva do texto atual nem sempre refletirão a carga tributária final. Isso porque haverá um redutor social de R$ 100 mil sobre o valor tributado, o que reduzirá o IVA para os...

title: António Guterres alerta sobre los riesgos de una inteligencia artificial sin control en democracia
creator: without@email.com (elplural.com)
content: Este domingo , coincidiendo con el Día Internacional de la Democracia, el secretario general de la ONU, António Guterres, ha lanzado una advertencia sobre los posibles peligros de una Inteligencia Artificial (IA) no regulada. Según Guterres, esta podría desestabilizar los sistemas democráticos y promover el discurso de odio a través de la propagación de falsedades y desinformación. Sin embargo, no todo son sombras en el horizonte tecnológico, ya que la IA también posee un gran potencial para fortalecer los sistemas democráticos mediante una mayor participación pública, avances en igualdad y aportes significativos al desarrollo humano. “La IA puede impulsar la educación sobre procesos democráticos y dar forma a espacios cívicos más inclusivos en los que la gente pueda participar para la toma de decisiones y que haya rendición de cuentas”, argumentó Guterres. Este enfoque positivo se ve reforzado por la capacidad de los países de utilizar esta nueva tecnología para aumentar la transparencia del sistema democrático y fomentar una participación más activa de los ciudadanos. El líder de la ONU también mencionó el último informe del Organismo Asesor de Alto Nivel sobre Inteligencia Artificial, que incluye recomendaciones clave para maximizar los beneficios de la IA y minimizar sus riesgos. “El mensaje es claro: la IA debe servir a la humanidad con equidad y seguridad”, enfatizó Guterres, quien aprovechó la ocasión para insistir en la importancia de...

title: ലോകത്ത് അവശേഷിക്കുന്നത് 10 ജീവികൾ മാത്രം! വംശനാശത്തിലേക്ക് അടുത്ത് വാക്വിറ്റ | Vanishing Vaquitas: Scientists Sound the Alarm as the Ocean’s Rarest Mammal Nears Extinctio
creator: അന്വേഷണം ലേഖകൻ
content: വംശനാശത്തിലേക്ക് അനുദിനം അടുത്തുകൊണ്ടിരിക്കുകയാണ് വാക്വിറ്റകൾ. സമുദ്രത്തിൽ അപൂർവമായി കാണപ്പെടുന്ന ഭംഗിയുള്ള ഈ ചെറുജീവികളിൽ വെറും 10 എണ്ണം മാത്രമാണ് ഇനി ശേഷിക്കുന്നതെന്ന് ഗവേഷകർ മുന്നറിയിപ്പ് നൽകുന്നു.വാക്വിറ്റകൾ ഇന്ന് കലിഫോർണിയ ഉൾക്കടലിന്റെ ഉത്തരഭാഗത്ത് 2235 ചതുരശ്ര കിലോമീറ്റർ സ്ഥലത്തുമാത്രമാണ് കാണപ്പെടുന്നത്. ആഴം കുറഞ്ഞ ജലമേഖലയിലാണ് ഇവ താമസിക്കുന്നത്. ഇത്രയും ചെറിയ വിസ്തൃതിയിൽ താമസമേഖലയുള്ള ഏക സമുദ്രജീവി കൂടിയാണ് വാക്വിറ്റ. ആഴം കുറഞ്ഞ ജലമേഖലയിൽ താമസിക്കുന്നതിനാൽ മനുഷ്യരുടെ പ്രവർത്തനങ്ങൾ ഇവയെ നന്നായി ബാധിക്കാറുണ്ട്. ഇവയുടെ പ്രതിസന്ധിക്കുള്ള പ്രധാന കാരണവും ഇതുതന്നെ. ഏകദേശം 1.5 മീറ്റർ നീളവും 68 കിലോഗ്രാം ഭാരവുള്ള ജീവികളാണ് വാക്വിറ്റകൾ. ഫൊസീന സൈനസ് എന്നറിയപ്പെടുന്ന ഇവ പോർപോയിസ് എന്ന ജീവിവിഭാഗത്തിൽ പെടുന്നു. ഡോൾഫിനുകൾ, തിമിംഗലങ്ങൾ തുടങ്ങിയവ ഉൾപ്പെടുന്ന സെറ്റേഷ്യൻസ് എന്ന സമുദ്ര സസ്തനി വിഭാഗത്തിൽ ഉൾപ്പെടുന്ന ജീവികളാണ് വാക്വിറ്റകൾ. ചാരനിറത്തിൽ ശരീരമുള്ള ഇവയുടെ കണ്ണുകളിലും ചുണ്ടിലും കറുത്ത പാടുകളുണ്ട്. ഉരുണ്ട തലകളുമാണ് ഇവയ്ക്ക്.ക്രിട്ടിക്കലി എൻഡേഞ്ചേഡ് അഥവാ ഗുരുതരമായ തോതിൽ വംശനാശഭീഷണി നേരിടുന്ന ജീവിയായാണ് രാജ്യാന്തര പ്രകൃതി സംരക്ഷണ സംഘടന ഇവയെ കണക്കാക്കുന്നത്. 1997ൽ 567 വാക്വിറ്റകൾ ഭൂമിയിലുണ്ടായിരുന്നു. 2015ൽ ഇത് 59 ആയി കുറഞ്ഞു. 2022 ആയതോടെ വാക്വിറ്റകളുടെ എണ്ണം 10 ആയി മാറി. അനധികൃതമായ മത്സ്യബന്ധനമാണ് വാക്വിറ്റകളുടെ നാശത്തിനു കാരണമായി പറയപ്പെടുന്നത്. ടോടാബ എന്നയിനം സമുദ്രജീവികൾക്കായുള്ള മത്‌സ്യബന്ധനമാണ് വാക്വിറ്റകളെയും വലയ്ക്കുന്നത്. ടോടാബകൾ വാക്വിറ്റകളുടെ താമസമേഖലയിൽ കാണപ്പെടാറുണ്ട്.ഇന്ന് വാക്വിറ്റകളെ സംരക്ഷിക്കുന്നത് സംബന്ധിച്ച് വലിയ അവബോധമുണ്ട്. വാക്വിറ്റകളുടെ...

title: В Приозерске в День города открыли передвижную выставку военной техники
content: В Приозёрске отметили День города. Большой интерес горожан вызвала передвижная военно-патриотическая выставка на главной площади, сообщил в своем телеграм-канале глава районной администрации Александр Соклаков. Поисковая группа «Ладога» и ее бессменный руководитель Александр Удалов представили военную технику, стрелковое вооружение и экипировку бойцов периода Великой Отечественной войны. Все экспонаты были найдены поисковиками на местах боев и отреставрированы. Ранее «МК в Ленобласти» рассказал , что молодые специалисты прокуратуры побывали на местах боев в Гатчинском районе.

title: Las farmacéuticas destinan 110 millones al año a financiar a las asociaciones europeas de pacientes

title: الأردن يدين محاولة اغتيال رئيس جزر القمر
content: خبرني -أدانت وزارة الخارجية وشؤون المغتربين، بأشد العبارات، محاولة اغتيال رئيس جمهورية جزر القمر عثمان غزالي. وأكد الناطق الرسمي باسم الوزارة السفير الدكتور سفيان القضاة، وقوف المملكة الكامل وتضامنها مع جمهورية جزر القمر الشقيقة في هذه الحادثة التي تستهدف أمنها واستقرارها، متمنياً الشفاء العاجل للرئيس، والاستقرار والسلامة والأمن لشعبها.

title: Why you shouldn’t short-change your bedroom
creator: RecentlyHeard
content: Take into consideration what number of hours you spend in your bed room every week? Even in case you’re merely returning from work and crashing out, the hours nonetheless mount up. Having a bed room that helps your psychological and bodily effectively being is crucial in your total well being and it is best to make investments money and time into making your bed room as prime quality as potential. Brief-change your bed room with poor high quality mattresses or low-cost furnishings might result in additional dearer points additional down the road. Not solely can your sleep be affected by a poorly designed bed room however you might develop issues along with your again, neck and shoulders. Find out how to put money into your bed room There are various issues you are able to do to put money into your bed room and assist to make it right into a wholesome sanctuary the place you may get pleasure from high quality relaxation and leisure. title: Rory McIlroy rues another near-miss as Rasmus Hojgaard claims Irish Open title
creator: PA Media: Sport
content: Denmark’s Rasmus Hojgaard produced a brilliant finish to win the Amgen Irish Open and inflict a second heartbreaking defeat of the year on home favourite Rory McIlroy. McIlroy looked on course to claim his first professional win on home soil when he led by two shots with four holes to play at Royal County Down, just an hour from where he grew up. But while Hojgaard completed a superb closing 65 with four birdies in the last five holes – including three in a row from the 16th – McIlroy crucially three-putted the 17th and then agonisingly missed an eagle putt on the 18th to force a play-off. Agony for Rory McIlroy. Rasmus Højgaard wins the Amgen Irish Open 🏆 — DP World Tour (@DPWorldTour) A disappointed McIlroy, who missed out on a first major since 2014 when he bogeyed three of the last four holes in the US Open in June, said: “Unfortunately I’m getting used to it this year. “Hopefully the tide is going to turn pretty soon, and I can turn all these close calls into victories. “I must say, that roar when I hit that second shot on 18 was pretty cool. The support I got out there this week was absolutely amazing. I certainly don’t take it for granted. “I had to try to keep my composure walking up to the 18th green there. Wish I could play in front of those fans and this atmosphere every week. content: Denmark’s Rasmus Hojgaard produced a brilliant finish to win the Amgen Irish Open and inflict a second heartbreaking defeat of the year on home favourite Rory McIlroy. A disappointed McIlroy, who missed out on a first major since 2014 when he bogeyed three of the last four holes in the US Open in June, said: “Unfortunately I’m getting used to it this year. “Hopefully the tide is going to turn pretty soon, and I can turn all these close calls into victories. “I must say, that roar when I hit that second shot on 18 was pretty cool. You know, if anything, it just whets my appetite even more for Portrush [the Open Championship] next year.” McIlroy took a one-shot lead into the final round and made the ideal start...

title: Union minister calls Rahul Gandhi ‘number 1 terrorist’; Congress urges leader to seek ‘professional Psychiatric help’
creator: TOI News Desk
content: NEW DELHI: Leader of opposition in Punjab Partap Singh Bajwa said that it was disturbing for a minister to exhibit such a lack of understanding of constitutional principles while reacting to the recent controversial statements made by Union minister and BJP leader Ravneet Singh Bittu against Congress MP Rahul Gandhi . "His derogatory remarks demonstrate not only a profound lack of education and understanding of parliamentary principles but also an appalling disregard for responsible public conduct," Bajwa said. He further implied that Bittu might require professional “mental health support” due to his disconnect between his words and logical reasoning. "It appears that Bittu has completely lost his sense of reason, and perhaps it would be prudent for him to seek professional psychiatric assistance. His inability to win public trust has long been evident, yet he continues to draw a ministerial salary. Perhaps those funds could be better utilised in addressing what seems to be a deeper mental affliction. Such a baseless accusation is not merely a lapse in judgement; it is a clear manifestation of a troubling disconnect between his speech and reasoning," Bajwa added. Bajwa said that Bittu's accusations were a clear display of irresponsibility, and he urged the Government of India to take action to ensure that those holding positions of authority maintain the "integrity of the Constitution." Congress leader Sandeep Dikshit also criticised Bittu, he used to praise Rahul Gandhi...

title: MAMC student found dead, no note found; suicide suspected
content: New Delhi: A student at Maulana Azad Medical College ( MAMC ) in central Delhi allegedly died by suicide on Sunday. Navdeep , a 25-year-old second-year MD student, was found dead in his room. According to resident doctors, he was a junior resident in radiology-PG. "He did his MBBS from MAMC and was a very bright student All india rank 1 in NEET UG exam," said a doctor. According to police, Navdeep's father grew concerned when his son didn't respond to phone calls. He sent a friend to check on Navdeep, who found the door locked from the inside. Upon breaking open the door, the friend discovered Navdeep's lifeless body. The police were immediately informed. An inquest is currently underway. However, no suicide note has been found at the scene, leaving the exact circumstances and motivations behind Navdeep's death unclear. MAMC community expressed shock, with students and faculty members expressing their condolences and support for Navdeep's family. Some doctors claimed multiple deaths by suicide have come to fore in the last one year and needed attention. The Resident Doctors' association also released a statement. "With a very heavy heart, we mourn the untimely and tragic demise of our beloved post- graduate resident Dr. Navdeep Singh of batch 2023, Department of Radio-diagnosis, MAMC. His presence will be profoundly missed, and his memory will forever remain in our hearts. Our thoughts and prayers are with his family and loved ones during this difficult time. May his soul...

title: Shooting at GK 1 gym: Lookout circular issued against history sheeter
creator: Raj Shekhar
content: New Delhi: A lookout circular has been issued against a man named Kunal Chhabra , aka KC, who is allegedly connected to the killing of Dubai-based entrepreneur Nadir Shah . KC, cops said, was a history sheeter and an accused in four FIRs registered by special cell. He is learnt to have fled to Portugal via Dubai. Shah was gunned down by a group of assailants in south Delhi's GK-I on Thursday night, a hit supposedly ordered by jailed gangster Lawrence Bishnoi . KC was a close associate of Shah, and a multi-crore transaction between the two had allegedly irked Bishnoi. Cops may seek a court nod to visit Gujarat jail to question Bishnoi in the case. Bishnoi cannot be moved from there as govt has invoked Section 268 (1) of Code of Criminal Procedure in his case to exclude him from productions. The order is issued on the likelihood of 'disturbance of public order' if the person in question is allowed to be removed from prison. Meanwhile, a hunt continues for the main shooters Madhur, alias Mota, and Raju, who work for gangster Hashim Baba and are absconding. TOI had first disclosed their identity and role in the murder on Saturday. The duo was joined by four others who arrived in the city from Azamgarh on Thursday and stayed in Jamia Nagar. The shooters had also come to the city a week before the incident and done a reconnaissance of Surya hotel in southeast Delhi, sources said. Hashim's men allegedly provided them with logistical support and weapons. They reached the gym in GK-I...

title: College student jumps to death
content: New Delhi: A 25-year-old student allegedly jumped to his death in a hostel in Dwarka . He was a first-year MBA student at a private university . Police received information at 6:20pm about a student who had died by suicide. "The body was sent to the hospital for a post-mortem," an officer said. DCP (Dwarka) Ankit Singh said police were conducting an inquiry to determine any potential responsibilities. tnn

title: আবার কোনও প্রভু ক্ষমতায় আসুক আমরা চাই না: সমন্বয়ক আশরেফা
creator: যশোর প্রতিনিধি
content: বৈষম্যবিরোধী ছাত্র আন্দোলনের যশোরের সমন্বয়কদের সঙ্গে মতবিনিময় সভা করেছেন কেন্দ্রীয় সমন্বয়করা। রবিবার দুপুর ১টায় গণঅভ্যুত্থান পরবর্তী ‘রাষ্ট্র সংস্কারের রূপরেখা ও আমাদের ভাবনা’ শীর্ষক এ মতবিনিময় সভা অনুষ্ঠিত হয়। যশোর শিল্পকলা একাডেমির অডিটরিয়ামে আয়োজিত সভায় ঢাকা বিশ্ববিদ্যালয়ের সমন্বয়ক ওয়াহিদ উজ্জামান জেলার সমন্বয়কদের উদ্দেশে বলেন, ‘সংখ্যালঘুদের সবসময় টার্গেট করা হয়। তাদের কারা ব্যবহার করে সবাই জানে। এখন সব বিভক্তি ভুলে আমাদের একমাত্র পরিচয় হবে বাংলাদেশি। ধর্মীয় বা রাজনৈতিক বিশ্বাসের ওপরে নির্ভর করে নয়, নাগরিক হিসেবে সবার নিরাপত্তা দেওয়ার দায়িত্ব রাষ্ট্রের। এটা দিতে ব্যর্থ হলে সামষ্টিকভাবে এর দায় আমাদেরই নিতে হবে। সবার নিরাপত্তা নিশ্চিত করতে হবে।’ সভায় ছাত্রদের প্রশ্নের জবাবে ঢাকার সমন্বয়ক আশরেফা খাতুন বলেন, ‘আমরা এসেছি নতুন বাংলাদেশ বিনির্মাণে আপনাদের মতামত উপদেষ্টামণ্ডলীকে জানানোর জন্য। উপদেষ্টাদের কয়েকজনের সঙ্গে আমাদের পরিচয় আছে। সেই কারণে আপনাদের বার্তাগুলো তাদের কাছে পৌঁছে দেওয়া সহজ হবে।’ তিনি বলেন, ‘স্বৈরাচারের পতনে রাজপথে শুধু ছাত্ররাই নয়, দেশের আপামর জনসাধারণ আন্দোলন করেছেন। যারা আমাদের জন্য ঘরে বসে দোয়া করেছেন, তারাও এই গণঅভ্যুত্থানের সারথি। আমরা ততক্ষণ পর্যন্ত কাজ করে যাবো, যতক্ষণ পর্যন্ত জনতার ক্ষমতা নিশ্চিত হবে। নির্বাচিত সরকার আসার আগেই রাষ্ট্রের যেসব জায়গায় সংস্কারের প্রয়োজন সেগুলো সম্পন্ন করতে ছাত্র-জনতা একসঙ্গে কাজ করবে। আমরা চাই না, আবারও নতুন করে কোনও প্রভু ক্ষমতায় আসুক। সিস্টেম পরিবর্তন না হলে সেই সমস্যা থেকেই যাবে। এজন্য সিস্টেম পরিবর্তন করতে হবে।’ সন্ধ্যা পর্যন্ত গড়ানো মতবিনিময় সভায় আন্দোলনে নিহত ও...

title: СТЕФАН МОМИРОВ, НОВИ КОШАРКАШ СПАРТАКА, ЗА „ДНЕВНИК“: Увек сам био мотор екипе
Set-piece goal part of mania for detail that separates Arsenal from Spurs | Barney Ronay
creator: Barney Ronay at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium
content: Yes, well, of course that was going to happen. Ange Postecoglou has a particular manner on the touchline, a way of standing in the same spot for long periods of time, fists bunched in his pockets, a little hangdog and sad, like a long-suffering dad at sports day. As this slow burn north London derby ticked down towards its inevitable endgame, as the sight of Arsenal’s set-piece coach leaping up at the edge of Postecoglou’s eyeline became ever more potent and ominous, there was a sense also of a man being chased down by the fates, like the doomed priest in The Omen, fate foretold by the shadow of the church spire sticking out of his back. Let’s face it, this is how these things work. If you say you’re not interested in set pieces after losing one north London derby on set-piece goals, and not interested because you just want to play a more expansive holistic game, football logic states very clearly that you will definitely lose the next one that way, too. And that you will do so after playing really quite well, with some nice holistic-process stuff chucked in. And so it came to pass here. In part because it was always going to, but mainly because Arsenal made it happen. It is a good cinematic detail that Mikel Arteta’s team won this game thanks to a single clean header from a corner. But zoom out a little and set-piece clarity is just part of the package, a symptom of this Arsenal era’s mania for detail. This is a minutely planned sporting entity from pressing to passing...

content: Yes, well, of course that was going to happen. Ange Postecoglou has a particular manner on the touchline, a way of standing in the same spot for long periods of time, fists bunched in his pockets, a little hangdog and sad, like a long-suffering dad at sports day. But zoom out a little and set-piece clarity is just part of the package, a symptom of this Arsenal era’s mania for detail. This is a minutely planned sporting entity from pressing to passing combinations. So, yes, of course...

title: Vote count to resume in NSW local government elections
creator: Adrian Black
content: NSW's local governments will continue taking shape this week as the ballot count resumes. or signup to continue reading Local government elections were held on Saturday for all but one of the state's 128 councils. While some candidates were declaring victory on Sunday, the full results won't be announced until early October. "The count cannot be concluded until all postal votes have been returned to the Electoral Commissioner," a NSW Electoral Commission spokesman said in a statement. Postal votes can still be returned until September 27, and about 1.5 million people, or one in four, opted to vote early. The Labor party looks set for a sweeping victory in the Inner West council, securing more than 40 per cent of votes in all wards and leading in all but Stanmore, where the Greens have won 44.5 per cent so far. Australia's longest-serving lord mayor, Clover Moore, all but declared victory for a record sixth term after winning almost 37 per cent of the vote, followed by Labor on 17 per cent and the Greens on 13 per cent. Several councils could be lurching to the left after the Liberals failed to nominate 136 endorsed candidates, a debacle that could significantly reshape local government for the next four years. title: UK royal social media accounts offer birthday wishes to Prince Harry
creator: Associated Press
content: LONDON — Britain’s royal social media accounts posted 40th birthday wishes Sunday for Prince Harry, marking the milestone celebration despite longstanding strains following the publication of his explosive memoir, “Spare.” The Royal Family site shared an image of a beaming Harry with a birthday cake emoji and the caption “Wishing The Duke of Sussex a very happy 40th birthday today!” The Prince and Princess of Wales shared the image, adding their own birthday wishes. The post from the royal family account marked the first public birthday message for Harry since 2021. The Duke and Duchess of Sussex announced they were giving up royal duties in January, 2020. They moved to America and said they hoped to become financially independent, signing lucrative deals with Netflix and Spotify. Harry famously shared his story in the memoir, “Spare.” In the ghostwritten book, Harry recounted his grief at the death of Princess Diana, a fight with Prince William and his unease with life in the royal shadow of his elder brother.

title: Jacoby Brissett hits Ja'Lynn Polk to put the Patriots up 7-0 vs. Seahawks | Sporting News
creator: Mike Masala
content: The New England Patriots surprised everyone in Week 1 by upsetting the Cincinnati Bengals 16-10 at Paycor Stadium, and they have a chance to do it again in Week 2, as they host the Seattle Seahawks at Gillette Stadium in Foxboro, Massachusetts. On their second offensive drive, Patriots quarterback Jacoby Brissett avoided pressure on multiple dropbacks to find tight end Hunter Henry, and running back Rhamondre Stevenson made defenders miss to drive the team down the field. New England found the end zone with Brissett hitting rookie wide receiver Ja'Lynn Polk to put them up 7-0 in the first quarter. FIRST @NFL TOUCHDOWN JA'LYNN POLK!!!!! @jpolk_22 | @JBrissett12 pic.twitter.com/loEvUOB7H9 The bullet from Brissett was his first passing touchdown with the Patriots, and the touchdown reception was Polk's first in his career. New England's offense looks better than expected, and the defense has been as advertised through one drive. If they continue playing the way they have, Jerod Mayo will have his team 2-0 to start the season, and nobody would've predicted that. UPDATE: Seahawks quarterback Geno Smith hit wide receiver D.K. Metcalf for a long touchdown to tie the game at 7-7 on the next drive. MORE PATRIOTS NEWS Patriots offensive lineman leaves team, considering retirement Patriots rule out 1, list 4 as questionable Patriots listed as a landing spot for former first-round WR What New England needs to do to beat Seattle in Week 2

title: Heartbreak for McIlroy as Hojgaard grabs Irish Open win
creator: Phil Casey
content: Denmark's Rasmus Hojgaard produced a brilliant finish to win the Irish Open as home favourite Rory McIlroy suffered a second heartbreaking loss of the year. McIlroy looked on course to claim his first professional win on home soil when he led by two shots with four holes to play at Royal County Down, just an hour from where he grew up. But while Hojgaard completed a superb closing 65 with four birdies in the last five holes, McIlroy crucially bogeyed the 17th and then agonisingly missed an eagle putt on the 18th which would have forced a play-off. McIlroy, who missed out on a first major since 2014 when he bogeyed three of the last four holes in the US Open in June, took a one-shot lead into the final round and made the ideal start with birdies on the first and second. With playing partner Matteo Manassero then dropping shots on the third and fourth, McIlroy briefly enjoyed a four-shot lead before making a bogey on the seventh after failing to get up and down from left of the green. McIlroy then missed from inside 10 feet for birdie on both the eighth and the ninth as Hojgaard kickstarted his challenge with an outrageous chip-in for birdie on the 10th. A birdie on the 11th edged McIlroy two in front again, but that advantage was wiped out as Hojgaard birdied the 16th and McIlroy bogeyed the 15th. Hojgaard then dramatically holed out from a greenside bunker on the 17th and although McIlroy drew level with a birdie on the 16th, the four-time major winner charged his birdie...

title: Josep Borrell tilda al Gobierno de Venezuela de "régimen dictatorial"
creator: without@email.com (elplural.com)
content: En una reciente intervención en Telecinco, Josep Borrell, el Alto Representante de la Política Exterior de la Unión Europea , ha lanzado una severa crítica al Gobierno de Venezuela , calificándolo de "régimen dictatorial". Borrell ha subrayado la alarmante cifra de "más de 2.000 detenidos" y los "siete millones" de venezolanos que han tenido que abandonar su país, además de mencionar a los líderes opositores que se han visto forzados al exilio. La situación en Venezuela es, según Borrell, extremadamente preocupante. Ha recordado la difícil situación de los partidos políticos, que enfrentan "mil limitaciones" en su actuación, y ha reiterado la huida hacia España de Edmundo González, candidato presidencial de la oposición venezolana. "¿Cómo le llama usted a todo eso?", ha preguntado retóricamente, para resaltar la gravedad de la situación. Además, Borrell ha comentado que, aunque Venezuela ha convocado elecciones, esto no significa que el país haya adoptado una forma democrática de gobierno. "No era una democracia antes y lo es mucho menos después", ha afirmado con contundencia. El representante de la UE ha enfatizado que, aunque es necesario mantener una "cierta contención verbal", no se debe perder de vista la "naturaleza de las cosas". El desafío de enfrentar esta crisis no es menor, y Borrell ha admitido que simplemente describir la situación no soluciona los problemas. "Lo que se trata es de intentarlo resolver", ha declarado, sugiriendo la...

title: One arrested for murder of 2 brothers
content: New Delhi: Delhi Police discovered the body of a man who had been shot, just hours after his brother was killed at his shop in Geeta Colony on Saturday. Police have taken one suspect into custody. Preliminary investigations suggest the motive behind the murders was a dispute over vacating a rented property. The deceased has been identified as Irshad. Police received information around 6.41 pm on Saturday that one Shahid , a 20-year-old resident of Rani Garden, had been declared dead at a hospital after sustaining a gunshot wound to the neck. Shahid had been whitewashing his shop at B-64 Rani Garden when an assailant shot him and fled the scene. Later, Shahid's sister informed police that her other brother was missing. "At 1 am on Sunday, during a search, we found a locked room. We broke it open to find Irshad lying in a pool of blood. He had also been shot," the officer said. Shahid had been involved in a conflict with his tenant Munna over vacating a rented portion. Munna's sons, Chand and Imran, were suspects. Sources said that one of them had been detained by police, and interrogation is ongoing.

title: ‘Nobody cares about us... who will give us work?’ Sex workers share plight at legal awareness camp
content: New Delhi: "Hum toh ginti me hi nahi hain, kaun dega hume kaam?" asked a 37-year-old sex worker. She was attending a legal awareness camp organised by Central, Central-II Delhi Legal Services Authority at Raja Ram Mohan Roy Memorial Hall in ITO last month under the supervision and guidance of Delhi State Legal Services Authority (DSLSA). The commercial sex workers , aged 18-50 years, shared their plight, hardships and struggles at the event. "We are shooed away from govt hospitals. Security guards and staff misbehave with us and treat us as untouchables. How are we supposed to get treatment and medical advice if we are chased from govt hospitals?" asked a transgender sex worker. Another sex worker added, "Even when we show our trans ID cards, we are denied attention. We need our existence to be acknowledged by society as equal to others." Doctors, lawyers, members of NGOs working with commercial sex workers, activists and volunteers also participated in the camp. Led by Richika Tyagi, secretary, Central-II DLSA, the camp provided legal advice and solutions on how sex workers can assert their legal rights. Citing the landmark 2022 Supreme Court judgment in the Budhadev Karmakar vs State of West Bengal, Tyagi told the sex workers that voluntary sex work was not a crime in India, but running a brothel and pimping were crimes under the law of the land. The judgment states that sex workers are entitled to equal protection of the law and if it is indisputable that a sex worker is...

title: Deshaun Watson rushing touchdown gives Browns 7-0 lead
content: The Browns have gotten on the board first in Sunday’s matchup with the Jaguars. Cleveland ended a marathon of a first drive with a 1-yard touchdown run by quarterback Deshaun Watson, giving the club a 7-0 lead. The Browns went 89 yards in 16 plays, taking 9:14 off the clock. Watson completed a pair of passes to Elijah Moore early on in the drive to push the Browns into Jacksonville territory — including a 22-yard strike on third-and-5. While Watson took a sack in the red zone, the Jaguars were flagged for roughing the passer after a completion on third-and-14 to move the chains and set Cleveland up at the 2-yard line. A play later, Watson took a designed run into the end zone for his first rushing touchdown of the season. Watson was 7-of-8 passing for 83 yards on Cleveland’s first drive.

title: Game On! DDA To Kick Off Work On Sports Stadium In Dwarka By Dec
creator: Vibha Sharma
content: New Delhi: Delhi Development Authority (DDA) has expedited efforts to establish a sports complex in Dwarka Sector 19B. This will be the first sports infrastructure project undertaken by DDA under the public-private partnership model and the process for obtaining necessary permissions is in progress. "Some permissions have already been obtained. We are likely to begin construction by Dec," said a representative from Omaxe, which is the real estate developer working on this project. The project, which was inaugurated by lieutenant governor VK Saxena two years ago, involves the construction of an international cricket stadium and hospitality services across a 50.4-acre site. DDA has set the target of Sept 2027 for completing it. "It will be an integrated multisport arena with an international cricket-cum-football stadium having a seating capacity of 30,000, indoor multisport facilities with a seating capacity of 2,000, a clubhouse facility with a minimum of 3,000 memberships, and other facilities for swimming, tennis, badminton, squash, table tennis, etc.," said a DDA official. "All sports facilities developed on the site will be available for users without requiring membership. Non-members can use the facility on a pay-and-play basis, and they will be allowed for a minimum of 25% of the capacity of the facilities," the official added. As per the project plan, the concessionaire will be responsible for the design, finance, operation and transfer of the site with a concession...

title: Govt’s free coaching scheme lends students helping hand
content: New Delhi: In a city where high-quality coaching often comes with a steep price tag, Delhi govt 's free coaching scheme is proving to be beneficial for some students. The scheme, Chief Minister's Super Talented Students, was launched in 2022 by CM Arvind Kejriwal and is designed to make competitive exam preparation accessible, easing the financial burden on families of students studying in Delhi govt schools. Recently, govt announced that it will increase 100 seats for girl students under the scheme. Aarna Jaiswal, a student from Dr BR Ambedkar School of Specialised Excellence, Sector-11, Rohini, said, "The coaching has helped me enhance my skills and perform well in academics. I also went to Paris under an exchange programme recently." Another Class XI student at Sarvodaya Kanya Vidyalaya in Mandawali, Sweety Jha, aspires to become an agricultural engineer. She started receiving free coaching under this programme in Class IX and credits the scheme with "providing her a solid foundation and support, which has been crucial in pursuing her dream". For many students, the high cost of private coaching can be a significant barrier in pursuing it. One student shared his frustration at being unable to afford a coaching institute for JEE preparation due to its Rs 3-4 lakh fee. "I am a homemaker and my husband is an electrician. We will never be able to afford the coaching institutes that ask for lakhs of rupees for our child. These kinds of schemes build confidence in us that our...

title: Trump: „ÉG HATA TAYLOR SWIFT!“
content: Donald Trump, forsetaframbjóðandi Repúblikanaflokksins, birti tíst á samfélagsmiðlinum Truth Social í dag þar sem hann sagðist hata söngkonuna Taylor Swift. „ÉG HATA TAYLOR SWIFT!“ stóð í færslunni. Ekkert meira kom þar fram en ljóst er að þar var hann að bregðast við færslu Swift á Instagram þar sem hún sagðist ætla að kjósa andstæðing Trumps í komandi forsetakosningum, Kamölu Harris. Stuðningsyfirlýsingar frægs fólks við frambjóðendur hafa oftast ekki mjög mikil áhrif á kosningar í Bandaríkjunum en Swift er gríðarlega vinsæl í landinu. Hún er með yfir 100 milljónir fylgjenda á samfélagsmiðlum og þar af líkuðu 10 milljónir við færslu hennar um Kamölu Harris á Instagram. „Að fara í hart við Taylor Swift er virkilega slæm hugmynd í kosningabaráttu,“ sagði einn sem setti inn færslu á X. „Taylor verður ekki reið, hún jafnar metin.“ Ekki er ljóst hvað Trump vonast til að ná fram með ummælum sínum um Swift en hugsanlegt er hann telji hvaða umræðu sem er betri en enga.

title: Italy, Argentina qualify for Davis Cup final eight
creator: kuwaittimes
content: PARIS: Defending champions Italy qualified for the Davis Cup final eight on Saturday without playing as Argentina advanced with a dominant 3-0 win over Finland. Italy and Argentina join Spain, Australia, the United States and Germany, who are already through to the eight-team finals in Malaga, Spain from November 19-24. On Sunday, the last two places are up for grabs with Britain needing to beat Canada 3-0 at home in Manchester to take the Group D berth ahead of the Canadians. All is to play for in Group A between Brazil, Belgium and the Netherlands, depending on the result of the clash between the Dutch and Italy. In Bologna, Italy advanced thanks to Brazil’s 2-1 victory over Belgium. Brazil’s Thiago Monteiro beat Belgian Zizou Bergs 4-6, 7-6 (7/5), 7-5 after Joao Fonseca defeated Raphael Collignon 6-3, 7-6 (7/3), 6-3. Belgium kept their slim hopes alive thanks to their doubles victory. In Group D, Guillermo Coria’s Argentina powered back after 2-1 to Canada on Tuesday crushing last year’s semi-finalists Finland. Tomas Martin Etcheverry beat Eero Vasa 7-6 (7/5), 6-3 with Francisco Cerundolo battling past Otto Virtanen 6-7 (4/7), 6-1, 6-0. Maximo Gonzalez and Andres Molteni survived dropping their opening set to take the doubles. Argentina return to the last eight for the first time since 2019. “We knew we had to win 3-0,” said Gonzalez. Etcheverry added: “The Davis Cup was a tournament I always dreamed about as a child. It was so important to get the first point.” In China,...

title: العسومي: البحرين تولي ملف حقوق الإنسان أولوية قصوى
content: أشاد رئيس البرلمان العربي، رئيس مجلس أمناء المرصد العربي لحقوق الإنسان، عادل العسومي بما حققته مملكة البحرين من إنجازات على صعيد صون وحماية حقوق الإنسان والتعايش السلمي، مشيرًا إلى أنه بات صناعة بحرينية وترجمة حقيقية لتوجيهات حضرة صاحب الجلالة الملك حمد بن عيسى آل خليفة ملك البلاد المعظّم، في إيلاء ملف حقوق الإنسان أولوية قصوى، وكذلك دعم الحكومة برئاسة صاحب السمو الملكي الأمير سلمان بن حمد آل خليفة ولي العهد رئيس مجلس الوزراء. وقال في كلمة له خلال افتتاح أعمال الاجتماع الثاني لمجلس أمناء المرصد العربي لحقوق الإنسان، بالقاهرة، إن هذه الإنجازات التي حققتها مملكة البحرين تأتي امتدادا لنهج المملكة الراسخ والأصيل المستمد من قيمها الحضارية والإنسانية، مشيدًا باللفتة الأبوية والكريمة لجلالة ملك البلاد المعظم بالعفو الشامل والإفراج عن بعض المحبوسين بمناسبة اليوبيل الفضي لتولي جلالته مقاليد الحكم. وأضاف أن هذا القرار الإنساني والحكيم لجلالة الملك المعظم، يأتي لدعم وتعزيز منظومة حقوق الإنسان في المملكة، ويساهم في مسيرة التنمية الشاملة، ويهدف لإتاحة الفرصة لهم للاندماج الإيجابي في المجتمع على نحو من شأنه إعلاء قيم ومعايير حقوق الإنسان، كما يضاف للإنجازات التي تحققها المملكة في مجال حماية وصون حقوق الإنسان بما يتفق مع أفضل الممارسات الدولية في هذا المجال.

title: Frente fria vai trazer 'chuva preta' para o Rio? Especialista explica
creator: redacao@odia.com.br (O Dia)
content: Rio - Após dias de intenso calor, os cariocas podem se preparar para uma mudança no clima. Segundo o Alerta Rio, neste domingo (15), o tempo na cidade será marcado por céu nublado e uma queda significativa nas temperaturas, com máxima de 29°C. É a chegada da frente fria, que deve permanecer ao longo da semana. A recente mudança no tempo, que traz a previsão de chuvas, aliada às queimadas florestais que têm devastado o estado , levantou preocupações sobre o fenômeno da 'chuva preta'. Esse tipo de precipitação, já registrada em estados como Rio Grande do Sul, Santa Catarina, Paraná e São Paulo, ocorre quando partículas de fumaça e poluentes – principalmente fuligem de incêndios florestais ou atividades industriais – se misturam com as gotas de chuva. Especialistas explicam que o vento transporta essas partículas até as nuvens, e, durante o processo de condensação, a fuligem se incorpora às gotículas de água, escurecendo as nuvens. Quando a chuva cai, a água misturada com fuligem adquire um tom escuro, caracterizando a chamada 'chuva preta'. No entanto, os cariocas podem ficar tranquilos. Segundo Camilla Visibeli, meteorologista da Tempo OK, não há risco de a chuva preta atingir o Rio de Janeiro. "É bem improvável. A fumaça que veio para o estado ficou mais para o Sul, não temos uma camada de poluição suficiente para isso, e temos também o fator de umidade, o Rio atingiu valores de umidade razoáveis esses dias, o que quebra essa...

title: نادي نجوم عدن للمكفوفين يحتفل بالذكرى الخامسة لتأسيسه
content: من علي الحنشي نظم نادي نجوم عدن الرياضي للمكفوفين، اليوم الأحد، احتفالاً بمناسبة الذكرى الخامسة لتأسيسه، في فعالية رياضية كبيرة احتضنتها الصالة المغلقة "صالة الشهيد علي مثنى" بالمدينة الرياضية في العاصمة المؤقتة عدن، وجاء الحفل برعاية الأستاذ مؤمن السقاف، رئيس القيادة المحلية للمجلس الانتقالي الجنوبي بعدن. وشهد الحفل حضور الأستاذ فادي باعوم، عضو هيئة رئاسة المجلس الانتقالي الجنوبي، والأستاذ عبدالفتاح العبادي، رئيس إدارة الشؤون الاجتماعية والجماهيرية بانتقالي الشيخ عثمان، والأستاذ فواز، رئيس الدائرة السياسية، وجار الله، رئيس دائرة الشؤون الاجتماعية والجماهيرية في المجلس الانتقالي الجنوبي بعدن، بالإضافة إلى معاذ درويش، نائب مدير مكتب الشباب والرياضة في انتقالي عدن. تخلل الاحتفال بطولة كرة الهدف (الجرس)، التي بدأت أمس بتصفيات وتأهلت على إثرها أربعة فرق إلى النهائيات، وفي صباح اليوم، أقيمت مباراتين لتحديد المراكز الأولى، وسط أجواء تنافسية وحضور كبير. وفي ختام البطولة، تم تكريم الفائزين بميداليات ومبالغ مالية تقديراً لأدائهم المتميز في المنافسات. وخلال الحفل، ألقت الأستاذة أروى العمري، رئيسة نادي نجوم عدن للمكفوفين، كلمة قصيرة عبرت فيها عن فخرها بالإنجازات التي حققها النادي خلال السنوات الخمس الماضية، مشيرة إلى أهمية دعم المكفوفين وتوفير الفرص لهم لممارسة الأنشطة الرياضية وتعزيز دورهم في المجتمع. كما وجهت العمري الشكر إلى الاستاذ مؤمن السقاف رئيس القيادة المحلية لانتقالي عدن على دعمه الا محدود، كما شكرت مدير مكتب الشاب والرياضة بعدن الاستاذ وجدان شاذلي على التسهيلات التي منحوها للنادي وكل طاقم مكتب الشباب والرياضة وشكرت جمعية رعاية...

title: Ukraina kylvää nyt drone-lennokeillaan uudenlaista kuolemaa: jälki on kauhistuttavaa
creator: Mikko Pulliainen
content: Ukrainan asevoimat on turvautunut taktiikkaan, jossa se pudottaa droonikalustosta sulaa metalliseosta venäläisjoukkojen päälle. Kysymyksessä on siis termiitti, jopa yli 2 200 celsiusasteessa palava jauhemainen sekoitus alumiinia ja rautaoksidia. Nyt Defensenewsin haastattelemat asiantuntijat kertovat, että taktiikalla on todennäköisesti kolme tarkoitusta. LUE MYÖS: ”Pääasiallinen käyttötarkoitus fpv-termiittidrooneille on puiden ja muun kasvuston lehtien tuhoaminen, mikä paljastaa kasvuston keskellä piileskelevät venäläisjoukot ja -kaluston. Sekundäärinen tarkoitus on todennäköisesti psykologinen, kun ajatellaan mitä termiitti aiheuttaa joutuessaan kontaktiin ihon kanssa”, arvioi brittiläisen RUSI:n (Royal United Services Institute) ilmasodan tutkija ja Norjan kuninkaallisen ilmavoima-akatemian professori Justin Bronk . U.S. Center for European Policy Analysis -ajatushautomon tutkija Federico Borsari taas arvioi, että termiitillä kyetään myös tuhoamaan verraten suuri määrä kalustoa yhdellä tehtävällä, esimerkiksi polttamaan vihollisen hylkäämää laitteistoa. Molempien asiantuntijoiden mukaan fpv-droonit ovat sopivaa kalustoa tällaisiin puuhiin, koska ne ovat edullisia ja liikehtimiskyvyltään tarkkoja. Riskinä on, että termiitin käyttö sytyttää hallitsemattomia tulipaloja, jotka vahingoittavat myös siviili-infrastruktuuria. Venäjän on vuonna 2023 raportoitu käyttäneen termiittiä itäisen Ukrainan asuinalueilla...

title: Athlétisme. Manon Coste en mode record sur le semi-marathon de Mâcon
content: Huit petits degrés. Un vent du Nord de face sur la première partie du parcours. Mais un soleil généreux tout au long de la matinée. Dans ces conditions, Manon Coste a brillé en remportant le semi-marathon de Mâcon, organisé le long de la Saône. Sans rivale Au sud de la Bourgogne, la sociétaire du Dijonnais Université Club, sans rivale ce dimanche en Saône-et-Loire, a avalé les 21,1 km en 1h16’45’’, signant aussi la sixième place au scratch, à seulement 4’37 du vainqueur de l’épreuve masculine (Romain Savoyen, EA Chambéry). Il s’agit du nouveau record personnel de Manon Coste sur la distance alors qu’elle est actuellement en pleine préparation du marathon de Berlin (Allemagne) qu’elle courra dans deux semaines. title: « Nous n’abandonnerons pas » : dans le cadre de la grève chez Boeing, les négociations reprendront mardi
content: Les négociations entre l’avionneur américain Boeing et le syndicat international des machinistes et des ouvriers de l’aérospatial (IAM) vont reprendre ce mardi, dans le cadre d’une médiation fédérale, a indiqué tard samedi l’antenne locale de l’organisation syndicale. « Le syndicat va rencontrer mardi les médiateurs fédéraux mandatés par le service fédéral de médiation et de conciliation (FMCS) et Boeing pour commencer les discussions », a précisé sur son site internet l’IAM-District 751, qui représente plus de 33.000 syndiqués de Boeing dans la région de Seattle (nord-ouest). Aucun détail supplémentaire n’est disponible à ce stade, a indiqué le syndicat ce dimanche à l’AFP. Sollicité par l’AFP, Boeing n’a pas apporté de commentaire. Dès l’annonce de la grève, le groupe avait affirmé avoir hâte de retourner à la table des négociations pour parvenir à un accord. Les dizaines de milliers d’ouvriers représentés par le District 751 - sur quelque 170.000 employés du groupe - ont rejeté jeudi le projet de convention collective annoncé le 8 septembre à 94,6 % et approuvé un débrayage à 96 % . La dernière grève, en 2008, avait duré 57 jours. Le FMCS avait fait savoir vendredi soir que les parties allaient « reprendre leurs réunions en début de semaine prochaine », sans préciser de date. « C’est le moment de nous dresser - de montrer à Boeing que nos voix ne sont pas simplement puissantes, mais qu’elles ne peuvent être étouffées »,...

title: Irã planeja deportar 2 milhões de refugiados afegãos
creator: admin3
content: Após anos de crise econômica, frustração dos iranianos tem se voltado contra os migrantes afegãos. Sob pressão para agir, regime anuncia planos para deportar milhões de pessoas nos próximos meses.O regime iraniano pretende expulsar do país cerca de 2 milhões de estrangeiros sem documentação nos próximos seis meses. O anúncio foi feito na última terça-feira (10/09), pelo chefe da polícia do governo fundamentalista, Ahmad-Reza Radan. Radan também disse que as forças de segurança e o Ministério do Interior estavam elaborando medidas para conseguir deportar "um número considerável de estrangeiros ilegais" a longo prazo. Quando as autoridades iranianas falam de "estrangeiros ilegais", geralmente se referem a migrantes do Afeganistão. O Irã e o Afeganistão compartilham uma fronteira de 900 quilômetros de extensão, parte da qual passa por cadeias de montanhas altas e inacessíveis. Por mais de 40 anos, os afegãos fugiram para o Irã para escapar da guerra civil, da pobreza e, agora, novamente do Talibã. "Os afegãos são pessoas cultas, mas nosso país não pode receber tantos migrantes", disse o ministro do Interior do Irã, Eskandar Momeni, em entrevista à agência de notícias estatal do Irã na segunda-feira. Ele também destacou as dificuldades que as pessoas no Afeganistão enfrentam. "Planejamos lidar com essas questões de forma ordenada e sem muita confusão", disse ele. "Nossa prioridade são os migrantes irregulares". Em maio, o Ministério...

title: Svečana akademija povodom Dana nacionalne zastave u Novom Sadu! Prisustvuje predsednik Vučić
content: Pored njih Svečanoj akademiji u Srpskom narodnom pozorištu u Novom Sadu prisustvuju i predsednica Skupštine Ana Brnabić, srpski član predsedništva BiH Željka Cvijanović kao i drugi predstavnici državnog i političkog vrha. Srbija i Republika Srpska danas obeležavaju zajednički praznik - Dan srpskog jedinstva, slobode i nacionalne zastave, koji je ustanovljen na godišnjicu proboja Solunskog fronta, 15. septembra 1918. godine. Organizatori svečanosti su odbori za negovanje tradicija oslobodilačkih ratova Vlada Republike Srbije i Republike Srpske. Zaključkom Vlade Srbije od 11. septembra 2020. godine, dan proboja Solunskog fronta, 15. septembar, obeležava se kao Dan srpskog jedinstva, slobode i nacionalne zastave, a istovetnu odluku dan ranije donela je Vlada Republike Srpske. Praznik je prvi put svečano proslavljen 2021. godine i to u Beogradu na Savskom trgu, kod spomenika Stefanu Nemanji, 2022. godine u Bijeljini. 115. 09. 2024. u 18:33 215. 09. 2024. u 18:33 115. 09. 2024. u 16:15 215. 09. 2024. u 16:15 Predsednik Republike Srbije Aleksandar Vučić će danas primiti učenike i nastavnike osnovnih škola i predsednike opština iz Republike Srpske i Crne Gore povodom Dana srpskog jedinstva, slobode i nacionalne zastave. 15.09.2024 07:00 Gradonačelnik Novog Sada Milan Đurić održao je konferenciju za medije na kojoj je istakao da se Institut za javno zdravlje Vojvodine ograđuje od dokumenta koji kruži društvenim mrežama o neispravnosti vode. 13.09.2024...

title: Издирват жена, последно забелязана да се движи пеша по пътя Пазарджик - Пловдив
content: Издирват жена, изчезнала в неделя по обяд. Апелът е отправен в социалните мрежи от дъщеря й - Никол Делиева. Жената се казва Яна, облечена е в розов екип. Забелязана е днес около обяд на гара Костандово, а по-късно дъщеря й съобщава, че жената е видяна да се движи пеша по пътя Пазарджик - Пловдив. "Ако някой има информация или я забележи, моля да сигнализира на 112 или да ми пише тук", пише дъщеря й във фейсбук.

title: Si të rregulloni tensionin e gjakut pa ilaçe
creator: Taulant Halili
content: Nëse vuani nga tensioni i lartë i gjakut, atëherë është shumë e rëndësishme që të bëni ndryshime thelbësore në stilin e jetës. Këto ndryshime mund t’ju ndihmojnë që të mos keni nevojë për shumë medikamente, thonë ekspertët. Në këtë artikull do të mësoni për ndryshimet e rëndësishme në stilin e jetesës që kanë ndikim në tensionin e gjakut. Nëse humbni në peshë do të mund të ulni tensionin e gjakut me 5-20 milimetra zhive, mmHg. Nëse ushqeheni shëndetshëm do të ulni tensionin me 8-14 mmHg. Duke ulur sasinë e kripës, tensioni do të ulet me 2-8 mmHg. Aktiviteti i rregullt fizik e ul tensionin me 4-9 mmHg. Ulja e sasisë së alkolit e ul tensionin me 2-4 mmHg. Duke bashkuar këto hapa të rëndësishëm do të mund të ulni tensionin me një mesatare prej 20-50 mmHg. Pra nëse tensioni juaj i lartë është në masën 180 (pra siç thuhet 18) mund të ulet deri 160 madje edhe 130. Të njëjtin rezultat e merrni duke marrë medikamente kundër tensionit të lartë të gjakut. Këshillohet të konsultoheni me mjekun tuaj për në kombinim të medikamenteve me stilin e jetesës. Roli i ushqyerjes në uljen e tensionit të gjakut Ushqyerja e shëndetshme është thelbi i i të gjitha përpjekjeve tuaja për të ulur tensionin e lartë të gjakut. Efekti i saj shtrihet në të gjithë organizmin dhe ndikon në shifrat e tensionit. Për më tepër, duke qenë se heqja dorë nga kripa është e vështirë, duhet të jeni shumë...

title: Delhi’s rural residents protest at Jantar Mantar for infra overhaul, land reforms
content: New Delhi: Residents from Delhi's rural areas held a demonstration at Jantar Mantar to voice their frustration over unresolved issues, including infrastructure and land matters. The mahapanchayat saw participation from residents of all 360 villages in Delhi, as well as several villages from neighbouring Haryana. They presented ten demands, including tax exemptions, amendments to the land pooling policy, and the development of Delhi's villages into smart villages. Chaudhary Surender Solanki, head of Palam 360 Khap and leader of the protest, said that rural communities have significantly contributed to the development of Delhi but are currently neglected. "Delhi's villages have become neither cities nor villages, but rather resemble slum areas. The apathy of successive govts towards the long-standing issues of Delhi's rural population is no longer tolerable," he said. Protesters warned of boycotting the state polls if their demands are not met before the Delhi assembly elections. "For over a year, we have been raising these issues with LG and chief minister of Delhi. Yet, apart from addressing a few minor concerns, the majority of problems remain unresolved. This time, we are ready for a decisive fight. We demand a permanent solution to all our issues with respect," he added. The mahapanchayat's demands include resuming land mutation processes in Delhi's villages, granting land ownership rights to poor farmers, and allocating alternative plots for those whose lands were...

title: Delhi zoo gets new residents: Rhino, tiger, 2 hornbills
content: New Delhi: Delhi zoo has welcomed a single-horned rhino , a Bengal tiger and two pied hornbills recently from the Guwahati zoo after over a month of planning and negotiations. Officials said the animals were being acclimatised and will soon be out for public viewing. "They will be put for viewing only after a 14-21-day quarantine period," zoo director Sanjeet Kumar said. The animals arrived in Delhi on Saturday. The 10-year-old is called Dharmendra. The four-year-old male tiger is christened Sanatan. Officials said that after quarantine, the animals will be socialised with others of their species. Dharmendra, who was not bred in captivity but was free-ranging, will be socialised with a female rhino who is the daughter of the famous Delhi zoo rhino Maheshwari. Sanatan will be socialised with other tigresses. Delhi zoo procured the animals for captive breeding. A zoo official earlier said it was necessary to make the animals and birds breed to give a boost to their population. The Central Zoo Authority in 2010 started a planned conservation breeding programme of 73 critically endangered wild animal species. Delhi zoo has been chosen for tiger conservation and breeding under this programme.

title: First Suspected Dengue Death This Year
creator: Vibha Sharma
content: New Delhi: A 67-year-old man succumbed to dengue at LNJP Hospital in central Delhi last week, the hospital said on Sunday. While the hospital refused to release the name of the patient, according to information provided by them, the patient was a resident of Delhi. Municipal Corporation of Delhi ( MCD ), however, has said that their death review committee is yet to ascertain the cause of death. "The patient had pre-existing medical conditions and was admitted to the hospital for treatment," the hospital said. An MCD official said: "We got the information that a male patient suffering from chronic obstructive pulmonary disease was admitted to LNJP Hospital, but our death review committee is yet to verify the exact reason for the death. We will give confirmation only after that," the official said. Delhi BJP spokesperson Praveen Shankar Kapoor on Sunday said both the Delhi BJP and the Leader of Opposition in the MCD, Sardar Raja Iqbal Singh have been continuously drawing mayor Shelly Oberoi's attention to the rising menace of mosquito-borne diseases such as dengue, malaria and chikungunya. "We have been urging her to intensify the anti-mosquito campaign, but the mayor has paid no heed. Despite increasing rain, waterlogging and filth, the mayor has completely neglected the campaign, focusing only on statements, which has led to a severe deterioration of the situation in Delhi. Not just that, they are even hiding figures of dengue cases to keep the public in the dark, something...

title: Health cards made for 56 waterbodies, watchdog tells NGT
content: New Delhi: National Wetlands Authority of India, under the Union environment ministry, has reported to National Green Tribunal ( NGT ) about the measures being implemented to protect water bodies in Delhi. The authority said that " health cards have been created for 56 waterbodies so far. In addition, the national body has also done ground truthing of 36 wetlands with 19 wetland mitras – volunteer protectors of wetlands – appointed for the national capital." Ground truthing is the process of verifying the existence, state and status of a waterbody by physical, on-the-spot examination by authorities. The report, dated Sept 12, was submitted in response to NGT's request for information from the national authority and Delhi's state wetland authority regarding steps being taken to safeguard the city's waterbodies. NGT had taken notice of a media report in April, which highlighted the gradual disappearance of waterbodies in Delhi due to encroachment. According to the submission, the Union environment ministry launched the Sahbhagita Mission in 2022 to increase awareness about the protection of waterbodies in the country. The mission encourages stakeholder participation in protecting and rejuvenating waterbodies in each state. The same year, the ministry also launched the Save Wetlands campaign, which focuses on protecting wetlands by raising public awareness and appointing wetland mitras who assist govt in protecting and rejuvenating the waterbodies. The national authority's...
