title: No bajan de “oportunista” a Enrique Peñalosa por usar muerte de Juanita Cárdenas como discurso político
Ian Wright ‘very surprised’ with Tottenham star for making Arsenal winner ‘easy’
creator: Tony Mogan
content: Ian Wright has singled out Cristian Romero for making it ‘very easy’ for Arsenal to score their winner in the north London derby against Tottenham . The Gunners inflicted another defeat on their arch-rivals on Sunday afternoon with Gabriel Magalhaes powering home a header in the 64 th minute to seal the win. As was the case in the same fixture last April, Tottenham persistently looked vulnerable from set pieces and were once again exposed when Bukayo Saka whipped his corner kick into the six yard area. Spurs goalkeeper Guglielmo Vicario was at fault with club legend Glenn Hoddle slamming the Italian’s ‘unconvincing’ display. But Wright was also critical of Romero after Gabriel was able to shrug the Argentine off the ball all too easily. While the Arsenal legend admitted there could have been a case for a foul being given, he was convinced Romero should have put more pressure on his Arsenal counterpart. ‘I was very surprised with Romero, it feels very easy for a defender of his calibre to be moved out of the way,’ Wright told Premier League Productions. ‘I think it could have been a foul but not enough maybe. That just seems very simple when you look at the proximity from the goal and where he headed it in, It’s a very easy goal for Arsenal to score.’ Alan Shearer meanwhile was even more scathing in his criticism, insisting there was ‘only one player’ winning their duel. ‘There was one player that really wanted that to get onto the end of that and another who was happy to be...

title: Veintiún organizaciones de pacientes concentran la mitad de los pagos de las farmacéuticas en España
creator: Manuel Rico, Chris Matthews (Investigate Europe)
content: Manuel Rico, Chris Matthews (Investigate Europe) Las grandes farmacéuticas financian a todos los actores relevantes del sector: pagan actividades de formación a miles de profesionales sanitarios , patrocinan a sociedades científicas y asociaciones médicas , y también subvencionan a organizaciones de pacientes. Estos pagos se llaman en el argot de la industria “transferencias de valor”, pero más allá de la denominación, se trata de dinero que sale de los enormes beneficios de las farmacéuticas para apoyar a quienes luego prescriben sus medicamentos o los necesitan para curarse. title: Group of Ministers to review tax rates on health, life insurance
content: The GST Council constituted a 13-member Group of Ministers (GoM) on Sunday (September 15, 2024) to suggest GST rates on premiums of various health and life insurance products. It will submit its report by October 30. Bihar Deputy Chief Minister Samrat Choudhary is the convenor of the GoM. Members of the panel include members from Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, West Bengal, Karnataka, Kerala, Andhra Pradesh, Goa, Gujarat, Meghalaya, Punjab, Tamil Nadu, and Telangana. The 54th GST Council meeting on September 9 decided to establish a GoM to examine and review the present structure of GST on life and medical insurance. A final call by the Council on the taxation of insurance premiums is likely to be taken in the next meeting in November based on the GoM report. Currently, 18% Goods and Services Tax (GST) is levied on insurance premiums. The Terms of Reference (ToR) of the panel also include suggesting tax rates for health insurance, including individual, group, and family floaters. Also under review is the rate for various categories like senior citizens, the middle class, and people with mental illnesses. It will also suggest tax rates on life insurance, including term insurance, and life insurance with investment plans, whether individual or group, and re-insurance. Report by Oct 30 "The GoM is to submit its report by October 30, 2024," said the office memorandum issued by the GST Council Secretariat on the constitution of the GoM on life and health insurance. title: La Belgique éliminée en Coupe Davis au terme d’un parcours qui les fera grandir : “L’avenir s’annonce prometteur”
creator: Clémence Louis
content: Forgée par l'adversité, notre équipe de Coupe Davis s'est enrichie par l'expérience que lui a apportée cette phase de poule durant toute la semaine. Arrivée avec le statut d'outsider à Bologne, la sélection belge, qui s'est imposée d'entrée de jeu face aux Pays-Bas (2-1) et qui est passée proche de l'exploit face à l'Italie (1-2), devait absolument s'imposer face au Brésil pour pouvoir espérer décrocher leur ticket pour le tour final à Malaga. Mais après la défaite de Raphaël Collignon (6-3, 6-7, 6-3) dans le premier simple, Zizou Bergs a stoppé sa série de victoires sous les couleurs de la Belgique au terme d'un nouveau combat de 2h44 en 3 sets (6-4, 6-7, 5-7). "Le match était très serré, confiait-il après sa défaite. Je n'ai pas vraiment trouvé de réponse à son service. J'étais un peu fatigué mentalement aussi. Je n'ai pas pu avoir mon sommeil habituel en raison de ces soirées à rallonge. L'adrénaline est encore dans le corps, et il faut malgré tout se lever assez tôt le lendemain. Tout cela joue." Le 72e joueur mondial peut tout de même se satisfaire de son parcours en tant que leader de l'équipe. " Cela a été une belle semaine pour moi. J'ai affiché un très bon niveau. Et mentalement, j'ai été fort également. Battre Griekspoor et Cobolli, cela signifie que j'ai le niveau. Je dois construire là-dessus. Nous n'étions pas loin de nous qualifier. Et je pense que l'on aurait certainement signé pour se retrouver dans cette...

title: Iqaluit deputy mayor, city remind drivers to follow school bus rules
creator: Jeff Pelletier - Local Journalism Initiative Reporter
content: It may only be the second week of the school year, but City of Iqaluit officials are reminding drivers to be safe around school buses as kids are being picked up and dropped off. Deputy Mayor Kim Smith spoke about the issue at last week’s council meeting, reminding drivers in both directions that they need to stop when a school bus’s red lights are flashing and its stop sign is out. Last Tuesday, she said she saw two vehicles near the hospital hill overtake a stopped school bus. “I, of course, laid on my horn and pointed to the school bus, and when the driver was alerted to his error he graciously gave me the (middle) finger,” she said. “To that guy, do better, and to everyone, do better.” Smith reminded people that the fine for overtaking a school bus in that manner is $1,000. After Tuesday’s council meeting, Smith said Iqaluit is a small city and there’s no need to rush past a school bus like that. She floated the suggestion that school buses be equipped with cameras to catch license plates of passing vehicles. “Putting this solely on municipal enforcement isn’t necessarily unfair, it’s a pretty hard thing to catch in the act,” she said. “I’m certain once people start getting $1,000 fines, the behaviour would stop pretty quick.” The City of Iqaluit issued a public service announcement before the school year telling people to watch out for children and buses. It encouraged children to be vigilant around roads, make eye contact with drivers while crossing, and follow the bus...

title: Avoiding The Sophomore Slump: How Connor Zary and Martin Pospisil Can Build On Their Rookie Seasons
creator: Ian Buchanan, Last Word On Sports
content: Two of the biggest bright spots last season for the Flames were Connor Zary and Martin Pospisil . Both of them played their first NHL games and managed to stay with the Flames the whole season. These two young players jumped up the Flames depth charts and carved out full-time roles in the NHL. Heading into their second seasons, the two young players will be looking to take another step forward and avoid the dreaded sophomore slump. The Sophomores In Calgary Connor Zary Rookie Season The Flames drafted Zary with the 24th pick in the 2020 NHL entry draft. He would go on to spend two full seasons in the AHL developing before getting his first NHL action. Zary was called up in October after a hot start in the AHL where he tallied ten points in his first six games. Zary would form a line with centreman Nazem Kadri and fellow rookie Martin Pospisil . This trio would quickly become one of the Flames’ most effective lines. The line was fuelled by the energy of the two rookies, combined with offensive skill. Zary showed he has more than enough skill and speed to keep up in the NHL. After his initial debut, Zary was able to maintain his production, finishing wiht 34 points in 63 games. He won some Calder Trophy votes and was a big success many didn’t see coming. Keys To A Successful Sophomore Season The question heading into this season will be how can Zary continue to build off his strong rookie season. The easiest answer is to increase his point production. Zary showed that he has...

title: Saudi Arabia footballer Fahad Al-Muwallad hospitalized after fall from balcony
content: NEW DELHI: Saudi Arabian footballer Fahad Al-Muwallad has been hospitalized in Dubai after sustaining injuries from a fall from a second-floor balcony. The incident occurred on Saturday while the 30-year-old winger was on vacation in the city. Dubai Police General Command confirmed the incident, stating that Al-Muwallad was involved in an accident while on his balcony at his temporary residence. Preliminary investigations suggest the fall occurred while he was present on the balcony, but the exact circumstances leading to the incident remain under investigation. Al-Muwallad was immediately transported to a local hospital and admitted to the intensive care unit. Medical professionals are currently providing him with necessary care and monitoring his condition closely. The extent and nature of his injuries have not been publicly disclosed. The news of Al-Muwallad's accident has sent shockwaves through the footballing community in Saudi Arabia and beyond. The talented winger is a prominent figure in Saudi Arabian football , having represented his nation at the 2018 FIFA World Cup in Russia. He currently plays for Al-Shabab , a leading club in the Saudi Pro League . Fans, teammates, and officials have expressed their concern and offered messages of support for Al-Muwallad and his family during this difficult time. The Saudi Arabian Football Federation is reportedly in contact with relevant authorities in Dubai and is closely monitoring the situation. Further updates on...

title: Nijerya’da teknenin alabora oldu. 41 kişi hayatını kaybetti
content: Ulusal basında yer alan haberlere göre, Gummi kasabasından çiftliklerine gitmek isteyen 53 kişiyi taşıyan tekne, nehirde bilinmeyen bir nedenle alabora oldu. Yaşanan kazada 41 kişi hayatını kaybetti. Yerel yetkililer, aralarında tekne kaptanının da olduğu 12 kişinin kazadan kurtulduğunu ve karaya çıkarıldığını ifade etti. Yetkililer, teknenin aşırı yüklü olduğunu, tekne kaptanının bazı yolcuların inmesi için uyarıda bulunduğunu fakat yolcuların kaptanı dinlemediğini duyurdu. Nijerya Devlet Başkanı Bola Ahmed Tinubu, hayatını kaybeden kişiler için eyalet halkına başsağlığı diledi.

title: Более 40% туляков сознательно ограничивают пребывание в Интернете
content: Жители тульского региона вместе со всеми россиянами стали чаще игнорировать цифровые устройства с доступом в Интернет. Об этом популярном среди туляков тренде сообщили в Институте статистики и экономики знаний Высшей школы экономики. Фолловеры полагают, что "зависание" в сети ведет к одиночеству и психическим проблемам. "По результатам опроса, в этом году в России более сорока процентов Интернет-пользователей от четырнадцати лет и старше хотя бы время от времени сознательно ограничивали свою активность в Интернете", - информирует "Парламентская газета". Многие практикуют, своего рода, лайфхаки: прячут с глаз долой смартфоны и другие гаджеты в некоторых ситуациях, например, за столом. Иногда люди готовы отписываться о уведомлений либо удалять навязчивые приложения. Наиболее активные в "цифровом детоксе" продвинутые пользователи Всемирной паутины, люди, работающие учителями, медиками, юристами. "МК в Туле" писал: наша область не попала в ТОП "регионов-трудоголиков" по средней продолжительности рабочей недели.

title: Matteo Salvini e il caso Open Arms: il ministro rischia il carcere
content: Rischia davvero il vicepremier italiano Matteo Salvini di finire in prigione per il caso Open Arms? Il 14 dicembre, a conclusione di un lungo processo di primo grado, la pubblica accusa a Palermo ha richiesto una pena di sei anni contro il leader della Lega, all’epoca dei fatti ministro dell’Interno. PERCHÉ? Il processo è per sequestro di persona ai danni di 147 migranti a bordo della nave umanitaria spagnola Open Arms. Era l’agosto del 2019: il ministro impedì per 19 giorni lo sbarco dei migranti, raccolti in alto mare dalla nave. Fu il più grave dei molti scontri che in quei mesi opposero Salvini e le navi umanitarie. In estrema sintesi, la procuratrice aggiunta Marzia Sabella ha sostenuto che “tra i diritti umani e la protezione della sovranità dello Stato” i primi “devono prevalere” sui secondi, mentre Salvini, in un video di quasi 4 minuti trasmesso ovunque (anche dalla TV di Stato, la Rai, fra molte proteste) si proclama un perseguitato politico e continua a dichiarare di aver agito per difendere i confini nazionali. CHE SUCCEDE ADESSO? Il 18 ottobre sarà l’avvocata di Salvini, Giulia Bongiorno (senatrice della Lega ed ex collega di governo di Salvini) a pronunciare l’arringa difensiva. La sentenza dei giudici dovrebbe arrivare entro ottobre. Se condannato, Salvini potrebbe scegliere di fare appello ma la sua posizione politica diventerebbe più delicata. title: Fenerbahçe Teknik Direktörü Jose Mourinho 2-0 kazanılan Kasımpaşa maçının ardından takımdaki problemi açıkladı!
content: Fenerbahçe Teknik Direktörü Jose Mourinho, 2-0 kazanılan Kasımpaşa maçının ardından açıklamalarda bulundu. "İKİNCİ YARIYI BEĞENMEDİM" "İkinci yarı takımı beğenmedim. Skor güzel, oyunu ilk yarıda iyi kontrol ettik. İlk yarıdaki hırsı ikinci yarıda göstermedik. Çok hata yaptık, sanki oyuncular 3 puanı alıp eve gitmek istiyor gibiydi. Ancak milli arada oyuncular rutinini kaybedebilir, o yüzden 3 puanı almak önemli bizim için." "HIRS PROBLEMİ VARDI" "Çok fazla top kaybı yaptık, topu tutamadık. İkinci yarıdaki tek pozisyonumuz kornerden Çağlar ile geldi. Bir hırs problemimiz vardı ve ben daha farklı şekilde olmasını tercih ederdim. 2-0 oyuncuları rahatlatmış gibiydi. Ancak kazanmayı bildik." HAKEM SÖZLERİ Hakem dürüst olduğu müddetçe başkanlarla, teknik direktörlerle, futbolcularla arkadaş olabilirler. Bununla ilgili bir sorun görmüyorum. Performansıyla bağımsız ve dürüst olduğunu gösterdiği müddetçe benim için bir sorun yok.

title: SON DAKİKA: Trabzonspor-Beşiktaş derbisinde tarihi an! Henüz 13. dakikada kırmızı kart... Bordo-mavililer 10 kişi kaldı
content: Süper Lig'in 5. haftasında sezonun ilk derbisinde Trabzonspor sahasında Beşiktaş ile karşı karşıya geldi. Oldukça hızlı başlayan mücadelenin henüz 13. dakikasında karşılaşmanın hakemi Ali Şansalan kırmızı kartına başvurdu. DİREKT OYUNDAN ATILDI Bordo-mavililerin tecrübeli oyuncusu Edin Visca, Rafa Silva ile girdiği ikili mücadelede rakibini faulle yere düşürürken yapılan VAR uyarısı sonrası hakem Şansalan potansiyel kırmızı kart gerekçesiyle VAR monitörüne çağrıldı. Pozisyonu izleyen Ali Şansalan, Visca'ya direkt kırmızı kart göstererek oyundan ihraç etti. TARİHİ KIRMIZI KART Bu kırmızı kart Trabzonspor-Beşiktaş derbisi tarihindeki en erken kırmızı kart olarak kayıtlara geçti.

title: Мэр Великого Новгорода Розбаум проверил ход работ у памятника Рахманинову
content: Ремонтные работы вокруг памятника Сергею Васильевичу Рахманинову в Кремлевском парке продолжаются. О ходе работ сообщил в своем Telegram-канале мэр Великого Новгорода Александр Розбаум. «Сразу после поздравления Попова Александра Петровича проверил ход ремонтных работ на территории вокруг памятника Сергею Васильевичу Рахманинову. Подрядчик работает без выходных. Как сказал наш президент Владимир Владимирович Путин: «Кремль и все, что вокруг, должно выглядеть достойно», — написал глава города. Он поблагодарил губернатора Новгородской области Андрея Никитина за поддержку в реализации инициатив. «МК» в Великом Новгороде ранее рассказывал, что специалисты проводят ремонтные работы впервые с момента открытия монумента в 2009 году.

title: Housing funding announced as Senate battle continues
creator: Adrian Black
content: As the federal government announces initial funding rounds for two key housing policies, two more face fierce resistance in the Senate. or signup to continue reading The first tranche of funds for the Housing Australia Future Fund and National Housing Accord programs are expected to deliver more than 13,700 new social and affordable homes nationwide. Construction on almost 40 per cent of the builds was expected to begin in the current financial year. Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said the programs would deliver social and affordable housing to those who needed it most. "I grew up in social housing. I know how important a roof over your head is and the opportunities it creates," Mr Albanese said in a statement. Round one of the HAFF funding will unlock $9.2 billion of investment in social and affordable housing and will include more than 1200 homes for women and children escaping domestic violence and older women at risk of homelessness. Housing and Homelessness Minister Clare O'Neil said the first round was supporting more social and affordable housing than the coalition had in nine years in government. "We're building homes for renters, homes for first-home buyers, and homes for women and children escaping domestic violence and those at risk from homelessness, because more homes means more affordable housing for everyone," Ms O'Neil said. Less than 40 per cent of the 13,742 builds are expected to be under way this financial year, and applications for round two will open...

title: Airbnb: Σε ποιες περιοχές της Αθήνας μπαίνουν περιορισμοί – Οι προτάσεις της αγοράς
content: Τον φάκελο των (τύπου Airbnb) ανοίγει η κυβέρνηση σε μια προσπάθεια να προσφέρει αδιέξοδο σε χιλιάδες οικογένειες που αναζητούν κατοικία. H απόφαση για το πάγωμα ή όχι στις νέες άδειες για τις βραχυχρόνιες μισθώσεις παραμένει στα χέρια της κυβέρνησης και όχι των Δήμων. Άλλωστε και ο δήμαρχος Αθηναίων και υποψήφιος πρόεδρος του ΠΑΣΟΚ-ΚΙΝΑΛ, Χάρης Δούκας μιλώντας στο στούντιο του ΟΤ στο πλαίσιο της 88ης ΔΕΘ τόνισε τη σημασία του φορέα που παίρνει μέτρα για τη διαχείριση του προβλήματος, όπως για παράδειγμα η Βαρκελώνη που αποφάσισε να ορίσει κανόνες για να την περιορίσει. Η Airbnb εκδήλωσε διάθεση συνεργασίας με την ελληνική κυβέρνηση, ώστε να βρεθούν λύσεις για την εξυπηρέτηση των αναγκών κάθε περιοχής «Αντίστοιχα, εδώ, το Κουκάκι είναι υπερκορεσμένο και θα πρέπει να λάβουμε την απόφαση ότι πρέπει να σταματήσει η βραχυχρόνια μίσθωση. Δεν μπορούμε όμως να το απαγορεύσουμε ως δήμος Αθηναίων, γιατί απλά δεν υπάρχει το προεδρικό διάταγμα που να μας δίνει τη δυνατότητα αυτή. Γι’ αυτό και ζητάμε σταθερά να είμαι πρωταγωνιστές και να λαμβάνουμε αποφάσεις και όχι να είμαστε κομπάρσοι», κατέληξε. Σύμφωνα με τις ως προς τις βραχυχρόνιες μισθώσεις, θα απαγορευτεί τουλάχιστον για ένα χρόνο η ένταξη νέων ακινήτων τύπου Airbnb στις πλατφόρμες για τα τρία κεντρικά διαμερίσματα της Αθήνας (1ο, 2ο και 3ο), ενώ θα δοθεί απαλλαγή από τον φόρο εισοδήματος επί των μισθωμάτων...

title: Ya todo está listo para el festejo por el Grito de Independencia en Chihuahua capital; amenizarán Conjunto Primavera y Alfredo Olivas
creator: Editor
content: Desde temprana hora de este domingo comenzó el cierre de diversas calles del Centro de la ciudad, debido a los festejos por el Grito de Independencia. El escenario también está listo para la presentación de Narce Dalia, Conjunto Primavera y Alfredo Olivas. Será la gobernadora Maru Campos quien salga al balcón de Palacio de Gobierno, en donde recordará a los héroes que dieron patria cuando comenzó la lucha por la Independencia en 1810. Se espera que miles de personas arriben a la Plaza del Ángel para presenciar las participaciones de los artistas que festejarán el 214 aniversario del inicio de la lucha por la Independencia.

title: Copa Intercontinental: séptimo título en la historia del Unicaja
creator: Emilio Fernández
content: Palmarés Copa Intercontinental: séptimo título en la historia del Unicaja La Copa Intercontinental FIBA lograda este domingo en Singapur permite agrandar el palmarés del club de Los Guindos, tras la Copa Korac 2001, la Copa del Rey 2005, la Liga ACB 2006, la Eurocup 2017, la Copa del Rey 2023 y la BCL 2024 El Unicaja celebra el título en Singapur. . . Es el séptimo trofeo para las vitirinas de Los Guindos y como en los seis títulos anteriores, el triunfo llegó fuera de Málaga, extremadamente lejos en esta ocasión de un Martín Carpena que nunca ha visto a su equipo ganar una finalísima. en esa lista de ciudades fetiche de la historia de la entidad cajista. Vrsac , en la que los verdes superaron en la finalísima al Hemofarm de la localidad serbia de Vrsac. Fue después de una eliminatoria a doble vuelta en la que el partido de ida se jugó en el Carpena y la vuelta en tierras balcánicas. Berni Rodríguez fue el que levantó aquella Copa Korac al cielo serbio. El Unicaja fue campeón de la Korac 2001. Zaragoza . El equipo entrenado en ese momento por ganó en cuartos de final al Etosa Alicante 79-62; en semifinales, al Valencia Basket, 90- 82, y a los merengues entrenados por Bozidar Maljkovic, 80-76, en la finalísima. Fue el primer título nacional para las vitrinas del club de Los Guindos. Los jugadores del Unicaja celebran su primera Copa. Vitoria Una temporada después, Pero tampoco fue en Málaga. Fue en un play off al mejor de cinco partidos contra el...

title: Şişli'de Bıçaklı Kavga: 2 Yaralı ve Gözaltılar
creator: Anadolu Ajansı
content: Şişli'de Kavga Anı Güvenlik Kamerasında Şişli, Halaskargazi Caddesi'nde meydana gelen olayda, iki grup arasında alacak meselesi nedeniyle kavga çıktı ve bu kavga, bir iş yerinin güvenlik kameraları tarafından görüntülendi. Bıçaklı Saldırı ve Yaralılar Gece saatlerinde gerçekleşen kavgada, Mısır uyruklu olduğu öğrenilen O.A.R.A.R. ve S.T.S. bıçakla yaralandı. Olay sonrası 112 Acil Servis ekipleri, biri ağır iki yaralıyı hastaneye kaldırdı. Polis Ekiplerinin Müdahalesi İhbar üzerine olay yerine intikal eden polis ekipleri, kargaşaya karışan A.M.A.A.G. isimli şüpheliyi, olay yerinden kaçmaya çalışırken gözaltına aldı. Diğer zanlıların yakalanması için çalışmalar devam ediyor. Kavga Anı Kayıt Altında Olayın güvenlik kameralarına yansıyan görüntülerde, kavga eden kişilerden birinin elindeki şişeyle bir diğerine saldırdığı anlar yer alıyor. Bu görüntüler, kavgayı aydınlatmaya yardımcı olacak.

title: "Nunca pensé estar tan feliz con un mural de la U": hinchas azules hacen homenaje a Cristóbal Campos
creator: Jose Arias
content: Impacto, dolor y tristeza: emociones que sintieron varios al conocer la noticia del accidente de Cristóbal Campos . El arquero de San Antonio Unido chocó en su vehículo y tuvo que sufrir la amputación de su pie derecho. El mundo del fútbol se conmocionó y se unió. Múltiples mensajes pulularon por las redes sociales y por las canchas del fútbol chileno. La idea: no dejar solo al ex meta de Universidad de Chile , en este difícil momento. Pero también los hinchas hicieron de su parte. Especialmente, la hinchada del equipo al que perteneció Cristóbal Campos antes de recalar en San Antonio Unido. Cabe recordar que Campos estuvo por cuatro temporadas en Universidad de Chile, entre 2020 y 2023, luego de hacer las inferiores en el cuadro azul y de pasar un tiempo en el Sporting de Lisboa. ver también Mural azul para Cristóbal Campos Oriundo de Lonquén, el meta de San Antonio Unido ha estado acompañado por su familia, que sigue viviendo en la localidad de Talagante. Ellos han sido los que han estado cada día en la clínica. Para ellos fue dedicado el muro que la hinchada azul hizo en favor de Cristóbal Campos, justo al frente de la casa de los padres del arquero. “Fuerza Campos, LDEA”, dice el mural pintado justo al frente del hogar. “Nunca pensé estar tan feliz por un mural de la U fuera de mi casa”, puso la hermana de Cristóbal Campos, Julisa, reconocida hincha de Colo Colo, quien, además de subir la foto de la dedicatoria, agradeció el gesto. “¡Gracias por...

title: En Colombia: expectativas de negocios por $21,6 millones de dólares
creator: William diaz
content: septiembre 15, 2024 12:30 pm AmCham Colombia informó que en actividades que han involucrado la participación de 393 empresas de Colombia, Venezuela y Estados Unidos, se han propiciado expectativas de negocios para Colombia por $21,6 millones de dólares. De esa cifra, $1.038.232 dólares fueron negocios ya concretados lo cual refleja que oportunidades hay para las empresas colombianas. Sobre el tema, María Claudia Lacouture, presidenta de AmCham Colombia, aseveró que la Rueda de Negocios Colombia – Estados Unidos, que organizó la Cámara en Bogotá, dejó un total de $14.317.132 de dólares en expectativas de negocios, según el reporte de los 100 compradores de Estados Unidos que participaron en la actividad. Agregó que “oportunidades hay y así lo muestran los resultados que los propios empresarios expresaron como resultado de más de 1.400 reuniones comerciales que se desarrollaron en el marco de la Rueda entre 200 empresas exportadoras provenientes de 12 departamentos de Colombia y 100 compañías estadounidenses de 12 estados, entre ellos Florida, Nueva York, Texas y California”. Puedes leer: Atento: Tips para su declaración de renta Según la directiva, uno de los compradores estadounidenses que concretó negocios durante la Rueda fue la importadora Colusa LLC. title: ਪ੍ਰਧਾਨ ਮੰਤਰੀ ਮੋਦੀ ਲੋਕਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਗੁੰਮਰਾਹ ਕਰਨ ’ਚ ਰੁੱਝੇ: ਫਾਰੂਕ ਅਬਦੁੱਲਾ
creator: gsvaltoha
content: ਸ੍ਰੀਨਗਰ/ਕੁਲਗਾਮ, 15 ਸਤੰਬਰ ਸਾਬਕਾ ਮੁੱਖ ਮੰਤਰੀ ਫਾਰੂਕ ਅਬਦੁੱਲਾ ਨੇ ਕਿਹਾ ਕਿ ਪ੍ਰਧਾਨ ਮੰਤਰੀ ਨਰਿੰਦਰ ਮੋਦੀ ਇਹ ਕਹਿ ਕੇ ਦੇਸ਼ ਨੂੰ ‘ਗੁੰਮਰਾਹ’ ਕਰ ਰਹੇ ਹਨ ਕਿ ਕੇਂਦਰ ਸ਼ਾਸਿਤ ਪ੍ਰਦੇਸ਼ ’ਚ ਨੈਸ਼ਨਲ ਕਾਨਫਰੰਸ-ਕਾਂਗਰਸ ਗੱਠਜੋੜ ਦੀ ਸਰਕਾਰ ਬਣਨ ਨਾਲ ਦਹਿਸ਼ਤਗਰਦੀ ਸੁਰਜੀਤ ਹੋਵੇਗੀ। ਨੈਸ਼ਨਲ ਕਾਨਫਰੰਸ ਆਗੂ ਨੇ ਕਿਹਾ, ‘‘ਮੈਂ ਪ੍ਰਧਾਨ ਮੰਤਰੀ ਨੂੰ ਕਹਿਣਾ ਚਾਹੁੰਦਾ ਹਾਂ ਕਿ ਧਾਰਾ 370 ਰੱਦ ਕੀਤੇ ਜਾਣ ਮਗਰੋਂ ਪਿਛਲੇ ਪੰਜ ਸਾਲਾਂ ਤੋਂ ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੀ ਸਰਕਾਰ ਦਾ ਹੀ ਸ਼ਾਸਨ ਹੈ। ਉਹ ਆਮ ਤੌਰ ’ਤੇ ਕਹਿੰਦੇ ਹਨ ਕਿ ਇੱਥੇ ਦਹਿਸ਼ਤਗਰਦੀ ਲਈ ਧਾਰਾ 370 ਜ਼ਿੰਮੇਵਾਰ ਹੈ ਪਰ ਅੱਜ ਧਾਰਾ 370 ਨਹੀਂ ਹੈ। ਇਹ ਅਤਿਵਾਦ ਕਿੱਥੋਂ ਆ ਰਿਹਾ ਹੈ।’’ ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਕਿਹਾ, ‘‘ਤੁਸੀਂ ਲੋਕਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਗੁੰਮਰਾਹ ਕਰ ਰਹੇ ਹੋ। ਤੁਸੀਂ ਰੋਜ਼ਾਨਾ ਝੂਠ ਬੋਲ ਰਹੇ ਹੋ।’’ ਦੂਜੇ ਪਾਸੇ ਪੀਪਲਜ਼ ਡੈਮੋਕਰੈਟਿਕ ਪਾਰਟੀ (ਪੀਡੀਪੀ) ਮੁਖੀ ਮਹਿਬੂਬਾ ਮੁਫ਼ਤੀ ਨੇ ਕਿਹਾ ਕਿ ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੀ ਪਾਰਟੀ ਜੰਮੂ-ਕਸ਼ਮੀਰ ਅਸੈਂਬਲੀ ਚੋਣਾਂ ਸਿਰਫ ਵਿਕਾਸ ਕਰਨ ਲਈ ਹੀ ਨਹੀਂ ਬਲਕਿ ਭਾਜਪਾ ਨੂੰ ਕਸ਼ਮੀਰ ਦੇ ਮੁੱਦੇ ਅਤੇ ਧਾਰਾ 370 ਨੂੰ ਦਫਨ ਕਰਨ ਤੋਂ ਰੋਕਣ ਲਈ ਵੀ ਲੜ ਰਹੀ ਹੈ।’ -ਪੀਟੀਆਈ

title: Sjutra promjenljivo, temperatura do 23 stepena
creator: portal@dan.co.me (DAN portal)
content: Kako je saopšteno iz Zavoda za hidrometeorologiju i seizmologiju, ujutru se po kotlinama na sjeveru mjestimično očekuje magla, a tokom popodneva ponegdje je moguća kratrkotrajno slaba kiša. Vjetar će biti slab do umjeren, promjenljivog smjera. Jutarnja temperatura vazduha od jedan do 12, najviša dnevna od deset do 23 stepena. U Podgorici pretežno sunčano, povremeno uz malu do umjerenu oblačnost. Vjetar slab do umjeren, promjenljivog smjera. Jutarnja temperatura vazduha 12, najviša dnevna oko 22 stepena.

title: Watch Deshaun Watson cap off a 16-play touchdown drive vs. the Jaguars
content: . @Browns get on the board first! 📺: #CLEvsJAX on CBS/Paramount+ 📱: https://t.co/waVpO909ge pic.twitter.com/SKzGTpmBiU CLEVELAND, Ohio — Deshaun Watson and the Browns offense got the start they desperately needed in Jacksonville on Sunday after their problems in Week 1 vs. Dallas. Watson rushed for a 1-yard touchdown to give the Browns a 7-0 lead late in the first quarter to cap off a 16-play, 89-yard drive for Cleveland. On the drive, Watson looked sharp as he completed seven of eight passes for 83 yards. More Cleveland Browns coverage Jeremiah Owusu-Koramoah is the first Browns player to wear Guardian Cap in game Browns vs. Jaguars: Live updates and highlights from Week 2 Browns’ Jack Conklin inactive; Jaguars tight end Evan Engram late scratch after hurting his hamstring in pre-game warmups Week 2 NFL Preview: Find everything you need to know with our Week 2 NFL preview. He converted a third down with a 22-yard completion to Elijah Moore and also threw a 21-yard pass to Jerry Jeudy to convert a 2nd-and-20. The 83 yards Watson had on the opening drive are nearly half of the 169 yards he had in the entire game vs. the Cowboys. The Browns also showed an interesting wrinkle on Watson’s TD run, sending guard Zak Zinter and center Nick Harris out wide on motion. D’Onta Foreman was also lined up out wide and showed like he was ready for a pass before Watson ran for the score.

title: Presas políticas iraníes inician una huelga de hambre en el segundo aniversario de la muerte de Mahsa Amini
creator: without@email.com (elplural.com)
content: Este domingo, un grupo de 34 mujeres recluidas en la prisión iraní de Evin han comenzado una huelga de hambre indefinida. Este acto no solo busca protestar contra las políticas represivas del gobierno de Irán, sino también marcar el segundo aniversario de la trágica muerte de Mahsa Amini . Amini, una joven kurdo-iraní, falleció tras ser detenida en Teherán por no llevar correctamente el velo, un incidente que desató amplias protestas en el país. La premio Nobel de la Paz, Narges Mohamadi, ha informado que estas mujeres también pretenden recordar el inicio del movimiento Mujer, Vida, Libertad , que surgió como respuesta a la muerte de Amini. Según Mohamadi, "las mujeres presas político-ideológicas de Evin han iniciado una nueva huelga de hambre para sumarse a las protestas en Irán". En la víspera del aniversario, el sábado, las reclusas políticas de Evin se reunieron para entonar consignas y cantar canciones en contra de la represión. El portal de noticias Bidarzani ha publicado una grabación con las voces de las presas, evidenciando el ambiente de desafío dentro de la prisión. Un grupo de mujeres iraníes en huelga de hambre para conmemorar a Mahsa Amini Por otro lado, la familia de Amini ha sido objeto de restricciones severas. Según informa la emisora Radio Farda, a la familia se le ha prohibido salir de su casa durante todo el día. "El Ministerio de Información se ha puesto en contacto con Amyad Amini en la mañana del domingo y le ha trasladado...

title: Community attitudes pose dementia challenge
creator: Poppy Johnston
content: People living with dementia are still experiencing disheartening levels of discrimination, especially from community members in public spaces. Login or signup to continue reading Two-thirds of those living with dementia identified "people in the community" as the most common source of discrimination. Dementia Australia chief executive officer Tanya Buchanan said the findings from the national survey highlighted the need for improved awareness. "It is incredibly disappointing that Australians' understanding of dementia has not shifted in a decade and profoundly concerning that more people now think dementia is a normal part of ageing than they did a decade ago," Professor Buchanan said. "Dementia is not a normal part of ageing," she said. Moving towards dementia-friendly communities was a key recommendation, with the report flagging dementia-inclusive choirs and police training as opportunities to combat social isolation. Stigma and discrimination can have serious health effects, leading people to put off doctor appointments for fear of a diagnosis or prompt withdrawal from friends and family reflexively. Dementia Australia Advisory committee chair Bobby Redman, who lives with dementia, said people would feel less socially isolated if friends and others in the community "kept an eye out for us". "All we are asking for is to be understood, respected and supported – just basic human rights," Ms Redman said. The nationally representative survey of 2,000 people found 71 per cent...

title: José Mota 'parte a louça' após derrota no Dragão: "Penálti caído do céu"
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: J osé Mota, treinador do Farense, em declarações à Sport TV, após a vitória diante do Farense (2-1), em jogo da 5.a jornada da I Liga, disputado este domingo. Análise : "O FC Porto dispensa apresentações, tínhamos de ser solidários e ter qualidade de jogo mas nem sempre foi possível. o FC Porto pressionou muito. Estávamos a equilibrar, tivemos dificuldades em jogar futebol mais apoiado mas estávamos a equilibrar embora o FC Porto com mais bola. A equipa estava solidária mas foi pena que não tivéssemos saído com mais critério. O jogo estava a correr para nós de feição até ao intervalo e pensámos que com o desgaste do FC Porto e alterações nossas pudéssemos jogar mais no meio-campo do FC Porto no segundo tempo." Arbitragem : "Mas veio logo o golo do FC Porto... até me custa falar, mais uma vez. Veio o golo do FC Porto, uma grande penalidade, hoje não estava a chover mas caída do céu. Viemos novamente para cima do jogo, conseguimos o empate e quando pensava que podíamos ser mais agressivos ofensivamente aparecesse o segundo golo onde perguntou onde está o VAR. Não há faltas para o Farense. Um pisão enorme sobre o Poloni. Vamos continuando a assobiar para o lado. Pergunto se acham que é penálti e pergunto também se não existiu um pisão sobre Poloni no segundo golo do FC Porto. Isto pesa muito e faz a diferença para quem trabalhou toda a semana. Para a próxima o melhor é nem sequer dar conferências, pois andamos na mesma ladainha,...

title: Vítor Bruno responde a Mota: "As camisolas não são para ser agarradas"
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: V ítor Bruno, treinador do FC Porto, em declarações à Sport TV, após a vitória diante do Farense (2-1), em jogo da 5.a jornada da I Liga, disputado este domingo. Ferros e Ricardo Velho complicaram : "O FC Porto ganhou porque tinha de ganhar e ganhou bem. Se alguém questiona a vitória do FC Porto hoje, é alguém que viu um jogo diferente. É verdade que o Ricardo Velho fez uma exibição fenomenal. Tivemos oito lances de golo, quatro bolas no poste. Absolutamente avassaladores. A primeira parte podia estar fechada com resultado em 3, 4 ou 5-0. Não era favor nenhum. Abrimos a segunda parte e fazemos um golo. E depois num erro individual, que faz parte do nosso crescimento, de passos que temos de dar em frente para ganhar maturidade, mas a equipa está preparada para responder e proteger um colega que possa errar. Foi à vista de todos. É um erro individual, mas é um erro de alguém que trabalha e é sério. A mim não me incomoda porque sei qual é a casta de que ele é feito. Ele a equipa. A equipa sentiu-o e sentiu necessidade de voltar a agarrar o jogo para camuflar esse erro e ganhar o jogo que é perfeitamente justo. Acaba por ser ridículo poder não ganhar este jogo. Foi demasiado avassalador para aquilo que foi o resultado final". Otávio ficou instável após erro : "Faz parte do crescimento. O Otávio estava numa realidade diferente, com todo o respeito, o Famalicão não tem a exigência do FC Porto. O próprio Moura, que fez o primeiro jogo... Isso leva...

title: Fallece hombre en calles de la colonia San Pablo
content: Un hombre de aproximadamente 55 años de edad murió en la vía pública de la colonia San Pablo, donde su c uerpo yacía tirado sobre la banqueta y a la vista de los peatones. Vecinos fueron los que dieron aviso a la policía al notar al sujeto con un golpe en la cabeza, aparentemente inconsciente, el cual se encontraba sobre la banqueta. Policiaca Con todo y camioneta se mete a tienda de conveniencia en Centro Sur Policías municipales de Querétaro y servicios de emergencias llegaron a la calle 5 de Febrero y cruce con Camino Real, donde lo encontraron, lamentablemente ya sin vida. Según testigos, la persona caminaba por la calle y al momento de sufrir un presunto infarto cayó, golpeándose la cabeza, lesiones que le provocaron su deceso de manera inmediata. ➡️ Suscríbete a nuestro Newsletter y recibe las notas más relevantes en tu correo Policías Municipales de Querétaro acordonaron la zona a la espera de los agentes de Fiscalía y Semefo para el levantamiento del occiso, el cual fue llevado a sus instalaciones para la necropsia de ley. title: Ricardo Velho lacónico acerca do seu futuro: "Logo se vê"
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: R icardo Velho, jogador do Farense, em declarações à Sport TV, após a vitória diante do Farense (2-1), em jogo da 5.a jornada da I Liga, disputado este domingo. Aguentou o resultado : "Eu e toda a equipa. Foi um todo. Ter os nossos avançados, desde o Tomané até cá atrás aos nossos defesas, fizemos um bom jogo dentro das nossas condições. A equipa está a crescer. Uniu-se e é este espírito que temos de levar para os próximos jogos. É continuar a batalhar e lutar, do primeiro ao último minuto. Infelizmente sofremos golos, mas o futebol é assim. Esta equipa vai continuar a crescer e vai dar muitas alegrias aos nossos adeptos." Equipa ainda não venceu esta temporada: "Foi a união que nos trouxe até aqui, até ao final do jogo a discutir o resultado. Só assim conseguimos os nossos objetivos. Unidos, compactos e tentar jogar o melhor possível. Assim certamente vamos ser felizes futuramente." Futuro noutro clube : "Eu faço o meu trabalho todos os dias para tentar evoluir. Continuar a ajudar o Farense. O futuro logo se vê. Neste momento estou empenhado em ajudar o farense e continuar a crescer. Só assim os bons resultados vão aparecer." Melhor exibição da carreira? "Para ser a melhor tínhamos de sair daqui com pontos." Leia Também: Samu salta do banco para garantir regresso do FC Porto às vitórias

title: Ucrânia dá socorristas à Polónia para apoiar na resposta às inundações
creator: Lusa
content: "O primeiro-ministro da Ucrânia, Denys Chmygal, comunicou-me a sua solidariedade para com a Polónia e a sua disponibilidade para enviar imediatamente uma centena de socorristas equipados com material especializado para combater as inundações", declarou o chefe do governo, Donald Tusk, esta tarde, numa mensagem na rede social X. "Isto é muito comovente", acrescentou o primeiro-ministro polaco, cujo país é um dos mais fortes apoiantes da Ucrânia. Kiev está a lutar contra a agressão de Moscovo desde fevereiro de 2022. Assolada pelos bombardeamentos e operações do exército russo, a Ucrânia precisa e beneficia de um grande apoio internacional para resistir. No leste da Ucrânia, o avanço do exército russo acelerou de tal forma que este ano Moscovo registou os seus maiores ganhos territoriais desde o outono de 2022. Bombardeamentos russos hoje na cidade estratégica de Pokrovsk, um importante centro logístico no leste da Ucrânia ameaçado pelo avanço das tropas do Kremlin, mataram, pelo menos, uma pessoa. A tempestade Boris está a causar estragos na Europa Central desde sexta-feira, com chuvas torrenciais, inundações fortes e mortíferas e retirada de milhares de pessoas das suas casas. O número de vítimas da tempestade na República Checa, Eslováquia, Polónia, Áustria e Roménia subiu hoje para, pelo menos, sete mortos e vários desaparecidos. Leia Também: UE expressa solidariedade e promete apoiar vítimas da tempestade Boris

title: Salzburg in CHL auf Achtelfinal-Kurs
content: Die „Bullen“ gingen in Zürich durch Treffer von Peter Hochkofler (3./PP), Peter Schneider (12.), Ryan Murphy (14.) und Lucas Thaler (26.) komfortabel in Führung. Die Schweizer kamen durch Tore von Denis Malgin (33.) und Santtu Kinnunen (45.) zwar noch einmal heran, konnten aber den dritten Salzburg-Sieg im vierten Spiel nicht mehr verhindern. Für die Mozartstädter geht es am 8. Oktober gegen die Växjö Lakers in Schweden weiter. KAC vergibt klare Führung Die Klagenfurter gaben eine 4:1-Führung im Schlussdrittel noch aus der Hand und haben bei zwei ausbleibenden Spielen nur noch kleine Chancen auf die K.-o.-Phase. Der KAC ist am 9. Oktober bei Genf-Servette HC in der Schweiz zu Gast. Der KAC wurde gegen Oswiecim im ersten Drittel für einen couragierten Auftritt belohnt, Polens Meister für eine vermeidbare Zweiminutenstrafe doppelt bestraft. Aufgrund der CHL-Spezialregel, wonach ein Powerplay nach einem Tor nicht endet, erzielte der KAC in einem Überzahlspiel zwei Treffer. Erst war Johannes Bischofberger nach schöner Vorarbeit von Nick Petersen, der sich auf der rechten Seite durchgesetzt hatte, erfolgreich (11.), 79 Sekunden später bediente Bischofberger seinen Sturmkollegen Thomas Hundertpfund, der platziert ins lange Eck traf (12.). Die Klagenfurter zogen in der Folge zwar durch Tore von Daniel Obersteiner (35.) und David Maier (43.) auf 4:1 davon, die Gäste aus Polen drehten die Begegnung im Schlussdrittel allerdings mit vier Toren innerhalb von 8:17 Minuten....

title: "Merecíamos muito mais e foi uma pena ficar só 2-1"
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: N ico González, treinador do FC Porto, em declarações à Sport TV, após a vitória diante do Farense (2-1), em jogo da 5.a jornada da I Liga, disputado este domingo. Ricardo Velho evitou goleada: "Sem dúvida, fez um grande jogo, a verdade é que merece ser o homem do jogo. Evitou quatro, cinco, seis ocasiões claríssimas, que na maioria das vezes devia ser golo e os postes também evitaram alguns golos." Tranquilidade foi a chave?: "Confiar no plano, no que estamos a fazer, no que temos vindo a fazer desde o início da pré-época e creio que estamos a fazer grandes jogos e foi mais um. Merecíamos muito mais e foi uma pena ficar só 2-1 e sofrer um pouco até ao final, mas foi um grande jogo de todos." Regressar da pausa com vitória: "Sem dúvida, no FC Porto, perder é algo que não pode acontecer e temos de tentar que aconteça o mínimo possível e, depois de uma derrota, o mais importante é voltar o quanto antes a uma vitória. Foram duas semanas um pouco longas por isso, porque ficámos com má sensação de Alvalade, mas voltámos e estamos muito fortes.» Samu decidiu jogo no Dragão: "Muitas emoções, este é um campo incrível, adeptos incríveis e entrar no seu primeiro jogo e resolver é muito importante para ele e para a equipa. Estou certo de que ficará com muita confiança e que vai continuar a ajudar como hoje." Leia Também: Vítor Bruno responde a Mota: "As camisolas não são para ser agarradas"

title: Siete contratos bajo la lupa y 40.000 euros sin justificar cercan por corrupción a la 'número tres' de Ayuso
creator: Álvaro Sánchez Castrillo
content: Álvaro Sánchez Castrillo Arganda del Rey, primer jueves de septiembre. La plana mayor del PP madrileño , con Isabel Díaz Ayuso al frente, se desplaza hasta esta localidad del sureste regional para dar el pistoletazo de salida al nuevo curso político. Las distintas intervenciones sirven para cargar, como es previsible, contra el Gobierno central. Pero también para arropar a una de las suyas. El Tribunal Superior de Justicia de Madrid acaba de abrir diligencias contra Ana Millán, actual vicepresidenta de la Asamblea de Madrid y número tres en el organigrama de los conservadores madrileños como vicesecretaria de Organización y Electoral. Pero sus compañeros no dudan en expresarle su apoyo. "Gracias por tu ejemplo y tu coraje siempre" , lanza el portavoz del partido en la Cámara regional. title: U kapën me 15 kilogram kokainë, arrestohet 52-vjeçari dhe partnerja e tij! Makina në emrin e një bosi shqiptar në Itali
creator: Java News
content: Një shqiptar dhe partnerja e tij janë arrestuar mbrëmjen e së shtunës nga policia italiane pasi u ndalën në autostradën Bozen-Sud, pasi gjatë kontrollit të makinës së tyre u gjetën 15 kilogram lëndë narkotike e llojit kokainë. Mediat italiane raportojnë se 52-vjeçari shqiptar dhe partnerja e tij 37-vjeçari banues në Abruzzo u ndalën pak pasi kishte kaluar mesnata. Oficerët fillimisht e ndaluan makinën për shkak të manovrave të rrezikshme që po kryente në rrugë. Në momentin që po ushtrohej kontroll dy personat u dukën mjaft të tensionuar. Pas kontrollit të letërnjoftimit policia vuri re se shoiferi shqiptar rezultonte me precedentë të mëparshëm penal, ndërsa makina ishte e një mikut të tij po shqiptar, i cili është një emër mjaft i njohur në botën e krimit. Lënda narkotike u sekuestrua. Në qoftë se ajo do të dilte në treg do të sillte fitime më shumë se 5 milionë euro.

title: Caso Gémeas. Chega avançará com investigação sobre pedidos, se necessário
creator: Lusa
content: O Presidente da República divulgou no sábado a lista de 14 pedidos formulados por Nuno Rebelo de Sousa, salientando que foram na qualidade de presidente da Câmara de Comércio Luso-Brasileira de São Paulo e "todos eles de natureza funcional". "Nós já temos esses elementos na nossa posse, estamos a avaliá-los também e, se necessário, avançaremos com uma investigação parlamentar", afirmou André Ventura aos jornalistas em São Pedro do Sul, onde hoje participou no almoço-comício de encerramento da quarta edição da Academia Política de Verão. Na opinião de André Ventura, "cabe agora às autoridades e ao parlamento fazerem o apuramento sobre se estes pedidos ou cunhas" feitos pelo filho de Marcelo Rebelo de Sousa "tiveram o mesmo tratamento que o caso das gémeas, que acabaram por ter um tratamento de milhões irregularmente". "Em qualquer caso, dá a sensação aos portugueses que a cunha é o elemento mais institucional da nossa vida política e isso é muito negativo quando vem do próprio Presidente da República", considerou. O deputado frisou que o Chega só avançará para uma investigação parlamentar se for mesmo necessário, até porque o Presidente da República está no último ano de mandato. "Nos próximos meses o cenário político vai-se clarificar também quanto a candidatos presidenciais. E eu penso que nós devemos ter também a ponderação necessária de perceber o momento político que estamos a viver e o momento já é muito instável...

title: Terrorismo, estrangeiros detidos e mais tensão: Que se passa, Venezuela?
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: D epois da conturbada ida às urnas na Venezuela, no final de julho, das críticas de países que não reconheceram os resultados eleitorais que deram a reeleição a Nicolás Maduro, das manifestações com milhares nas ruas... os problemas em Caracas não param de 'nascer' - e florescer além-fronteiras. Uma semana depois de o candidato presidencial da oposição, Edmundo González Urrutia, se ter exilado em Espanha, para "continuar a luta a partir de fora", e com menor risco dada a reeleição de Maduro, há espanhóis que ficam na Venezuela - detidos. O caso foi anunciado este fim de semana, com o governo venezuelano a fazer acusações graves não só a estes dois cidadãos espanhóis, como também a outros quatro cidadãos - três norte-americanos e um checo. Segundo o que o ministro do Interior, Diosdado Cabello, explicou no sábado, os cidadãos espanhóis em questão estariam a tirar fotografias de instalações num aeroporto e estariam também interessados em saber como poderiam obter explosivos. De acordo com o responsável pela pasta, tratam-se de José María Basoa e Andrés Martínez Adasme. As autoridades venezuelanas anunciaram também a apreensão de cerca de 400 espingardas provenientes dos EUA. Cabello associou o alegado plano aos serviços secretos espanhóis e norte-americanos, bem como à líder da oposição Maria Corina Machado. "Contactaram mercenários franceses, contactaram mercenários da Europa de Leste e estão a levar a cabo uma operação para...

title: «Я ненавижу Тейлор Свифт» — Трамп ответил певице на призыв голосовать за Харрис
content: Миллиардер Дональд Трамп, претендующий на пост президента США, написал в социальных сетях, что ненавидит Тейлор Свифт. Это произошло спустя несколько дней после того, как мегазвезда поп-музыки поддержала его соперницу-демократку Камалу Харрис. «Я НЕНАВИЖУ ТЕЙЛОР СВИФТ», — написал Трамп на своей социальной платформе Truth, используя капслок. Призыв Свифт голосовать за Харрис появился вскоре после президентских дебатов во вторник вечером. «Я отдам свой голос за Камалу Харрис и Тима Уолца на президентских выборах 2024 года», — заявила она, положив конец многомесячным спекуляциям о том, поделится ли она своими политическими предпочтениями в преддверии выборов 5 ноября. «Я голосую за Камалу Харрис, потому что она борется за права и дела, которые, как я считаю, требуют борца, способного их отстаивать», — сказала она своим 284 миллионам подписчиков. Певица подписала свой пост в Instagram, на котором она держала на руках своего кота Бенджамина Баттона, надписью «Бездетная кошатница» — отсылкой к замечаниям, сделанным напарником Трампа по предвыборной гонке и кандидатом в вице-президенты Джей Ди Вэнсом. Ранее Telegraf.news сообщил, что американский бизнесмен Илон Маск, который является активным сторонником республиканца Дональда Трампа в его гонке за пост президента США, в очередной раз привлёк к себе внимание публики своими противоречивыми высказываниями. На этот раз он попытался высмеять популярную американскую поп-певицу Тейлор Свифт за её пост в поддержку...

title: Benfica B empata com Oliveirense e falha 'assalto' à liderança
creator: Lusa
content: O s 'encarnados' estiveram a vencer por 2-0, com golos de Diogo Prioste (cinco minutos), de grande penalidade, e Hugo Félix (nove), mas consentiu a igualdade à Oliveirense, que reduziu, também de grande penalidade, por Daniel Candeias (39), e igualou por Tiago Veiga (49). A entrada do Benfica B foi 'fulgurante' e antes dos 10 minutos já vencia por 2-0 com a dupla de centrais da Oliveirense a ficar mal na 'fotografia' nos dois lances. No primeiro, Mateus Raniel derrubou Rodrigo Rêgo dentro da área, permitindo a Diogo Prioste adiantar o Benfica B no marcador. No segundo, Hugo Félix fez um 'túnel' a Gabriel Noga para ficar na cara do guarda-redes e ampliar a vantagem. Após uma entrada para esquecer, a Oliveirense teve o mérito de se reequilibrar e, finalmente, começar a discutir o jogo, reentrando na discussão do resultado através de uma grande penalidade convertida por Daniel Candeias, aos 39 minutos, a castigar derrube de Rafael Luís a André Santos. Mas, apesar da evidente subida de rendimento, o treinador dos visitantes deu sinais de querer ainda mais, promovendo uma dupla alteração ao intervalo, com as entradas de Tyler Keating e Sabino, para assumir um sistema de três defesas centrais que deu ainda mais equilíbrio à equipa. Foi, desde logo, 'premiado' com o golo do empate, apontado, aos 49 minutos, por Tiago Veiga, assistido por Daniel Candeias, e só não chegou à vantagem porque Gabriel Noga (55) acertou no poste, após um passe de qualidade do...

title: Mercato : Il débarque au RC Lens et lâche un aveu
content: Will Still a débarqué en France au Stade de Reims, et il continue d'étonner avec un parcours incroyable. L'entraîneur belgo-britannique poursuit son aventure avec le RC Lens désormais. Un club un peu plus huppé. En effet, les Sang et Or ont réussi à s'imposer dans le paysage footballistique ces dernières années, jouant les premiers rôles en Ligue 1. Mais pas de quoi impressionner Will Still. En faisant son arrivée au RC Lens au tout début du mercato cet été, Will Still a parfaitement débuté son aventure avec le club. Avant la réception de Lyon ce dimanche soir, il s'est confié sur sa nouvelle tâche. Mercato - RC Lens : Décision prise pour le transfert d'un buteur https://t.co/6FbPS0LCrU pic.twitter.com/BELoIhBAYq Will Still a succédé à Franck Haise à la tête du RC Lens , un profil bien plus expérimenté que lui, qui a réussi à propulser son club vers les sommets. On pouvait alors penser que passer après serait compliqué pour l'ancien coach de Reims , mais il n'en est rien. « Avez-vous douté devant l'ampleur de la tâche de passer après Franck Haise ? Je ne l'appréhendais pas du tout, pour être honnête. J'ai toujours eu un super bon contact avec Franck, il a fait des choses incroyables, mais comme je le répète, je ne suis pas là pour le remplacer. Bouleverser tout ce qui est ici, c'est impossible, car tu arrives dans une institution, avec des codes. Peu importe l'entraîneur, Lens restera toujours », a-t-il déclaré à L'Equipe ....

title: 'À lei da bomba'. Newcastle dá a volta e agrava crise do Wolverhampton
creator: Notícias ao Minuto
content: O Wolverhampton continua em queda livre na Premier League. Os lobos perderam, na tarde deste domingo, na receção ao Newcastle, por 1-2, me jogo da quarta jornada da competição. O conjunto do sul de Inglaterra continua sem vencer esta temporada. Com Nélson Semedo na equipa inicial, a equipa da casa chegou ao intervalo a vencer graças a um bom golo do capitão Mario Lemina aos 36 minutos. No entanto, o Newcastle confirmou o seu bom início de temporada e deu a volta ao marcador no espaço de cinco minutos e com duas 'bombas'. Schar fez o golo do empate aos 75 minutos, antes de Joe Willock e Barnes, lançados ao intervalo, construírem o golo da reviravolta que foi assinado pelo ex-Leicester em cima do minuto 80. Destaque ainda para as utilizações de mais dois portugueses. Carlos Forbs realizou os seus primeiros minutos com a camisola dos lobos, com Gonçalo Guedes a ser também ele um suplente utilizado por parte de Gary O'Neil. Feitas as contas, o Newcastle sobe ao terceiro lugar com dez pontos, os mesmos que o Arsenal que é segundo classificado, a dois do líder Manchester City. O Wolverhampton está em posição de descida e é 18.o classificado com um ponto apenas. Leia Também: EM DIRETO: Wolves e Newcastle já jogam no encerramento da ronda

title: Europei ciclismo: Italia chiude 3/a, Dagnoni 'bilancio positivo'
content: L'Italia chiude gli Europei diciclismo su strada nel Limburgo con cinque medaglie (2 ori, 1argento e 2 bronzi) e il terzo posto del medagliere alle spalledi Olanda e Belgio e con lo stesso numero di medaglie deipadroni di casa. "Il bilancio è senza dubbio positivo - leparole del presidente della Federciclismo, Cordiano Dagnoni -. Torniamo a casa con due titoli europei, grazie alla splendidavittoria di Edoardo Affini nella cronometro individuale e alsuccesso del nostro Mixed Team Relay élite. A queste siaggiungono due medaglie di bronzo, una conquistata da MattiaCattaneo nella cronometro e l'altra da Eleonora Gasparrini nellaprova in linea U23, oltre all'argento di ieri di Elisa Balsamo. Purtroppo non siamo riusciti a salire sul podio con gli uominiélite, nonostante il grande lavoro di squadra: gli azzurri hannolavorato in maniera compatta e determinata, dimostrando ancorauna volta la solidità e l'affiatamento del gruppo, qualità checi contraddistinguono a livello internazionale. Dispiace cheJonathan Milan non sia riuscito a esprimersi al meglio e aconcretizzare gli sforzi dei compagni, ma resta laconsapevolezza del valore dimostrato in gara anche in unagiornata in cui il risultato non ha premiato i nostri sforzi". "Se da una parte c'è un po' di rammarico per il podio mancato- conclude il n.1 della Fci -, possiamo comunque essereorgogliosi di un altro grande risultato: l'argento conquistatoda Andrea Garibbo nel primo Mondiale di Enduro, che si è svoltoquesto weekend a...

title: DK Metcalf's 56-yard touchdown knots things at 7-7 in New England
content: Marcus Jones gave the Patriots good field position on their first drive with a 15-yard punt return to the Seahawks 40. The team’s offense needed eight plays to cover the rest. New England took a 7-0 lead after Ja’Lynn Polk’s 5-yard touchdown pass from Jacoby Brissett. Brissett was 5-of-5 for 49 yards on the drive with tight end Hunter Henry catching three for 37, including a 17-yarder. Rhamondre Stevenson rushed for 17 yards on four carries. The Seahawks gained only 7 yards on their opening possession, but responded to New England’s score with a big one of their own. DK Metcalf caught a 56-yard pass from Geno Smith, knotting things up 7-7. Smith is 6-of-7 for 77 yards.

title: Inteligjenca Artificiale, gara e çipave
creator: lexo.al media
content: gjerësi 21.5 cm. Ndërsa GPU-të e tjera përmbajnë dhjetëra mijë “bërthama” që kryejnë llogaritje në të njëjtën kohë, ky procesor ka pothuajse një milion. Kompania thotë se ai përdor vetëm gjysmën e energjisë së çipit më të mirë të Nvidia-s. Google ka krijuar “njësinë e përpunimit të tensorit” (TPU), që mund të përdoret si për trajnim, ashtu edhe për të nxjerrë konkluzione. Modeli i tij Gemini 1.5 është në gjendje të gëlltisë tetë herë më shumë të dhëna njëherësh sesa aplikacioni GPT-4. Vlera e madhe dhe në rritje e njësisë GPU është shfrytëzuar si një levë gjeopolitike. Megjithëse industria e çipave është globale, një numër i vogël vendesh kontrollojnë qasjen në nivelet më të larta të Inteligjencës Artificiale. Çipat e Nvidia-s modelohen në Amerikë. Makineritë më të përparuara të litografisë në botë, të cilat kthejnë dizajnet në silic, janë bërë të gjitha nga ASML, një kompani holandeze me vlerë 350 miliardë dollarë. Në këto makineri, kanë qasje vetëm punishtet më të përparuara në botë, si TSMC e Tajvanit, një firmë me vlerë rreth 800 miliardë dollarë dhe Intel e Amerikës. Kjo vlen dhe për shumë pajisje të tjera më të vogla, dhe në këtë grup të vogël të privilegjuar shtetesh, do të fusnim edhe Japoninë. Këto kufizime kanë bërë të mundur që qeveria amerikane të vendosë kontrolle të ashpra dhe efektive mbi eksportin e çipave të përparuar në...

title: Australian energy industry report slams Greens gas plan
creator: Sam McKeith
content: A Greens' plan to halt to investment in gas supply in Australia would "devastate the economy", a report commissioned by the peak body for the country's oil and gas industry says. or signup to continue reading The report by consultancy EnergyQuest on behalf of Australian Energy Producers, said "blackouts loom for millions of homes and businesses in southeastern Australia in as little as two years" if the Greens' policy was enacted. The Greens want an immediate ban on the build of new coal, oil and gas infrastructure in what the party says will transition the economy to zero carbon energy while maintaining a safe climate. But the Greens platform on gas would lead to manufacturers closing, and long-term Queensland export contracts being cancelled, according to the report. "A halt to investment in gas supply would devastate the economy. Gas for east coast electricity could be interrupted within two years and would run out by 2029," it said. Australian Energy Producers chief executive Samantha McCulloch said investment in new gas supply was urgently needed to meet domestic demand. "The Future Gas Strategy is clear that the Australian economy will need gas to 2050 and beyond," Ms McCulloch said in a statement. The industry-backed report comes after the federal government this month said emissions from coal and gas could grow by 1.7 billion tonnes by 2050 if their use was extended another 15 years. Under the government's strategy for gas, the fossil fuel will be in the energy mix...

title: Wolves 1 Newcastle 2 - Report
creator: Liam Keen
content: It was a scrappy start to the game on Sunday afternoon until a superb team move from Wolves saw captain Mario Lemina tap home an opening goal. Wolves endured a poor opening five minutes of the second half before taking a grip on proceedings and wasted good chances, while twice hitting the post. Newcastle began to push for a way back into the game and had a slice of luck when Fabian Schar’s long range effort deflected off Craig Dawson before nestling in the net. Wolves never recovered and just five minutes later, Harvey Barnes cut in off the left flank and curled home the winner, to leave Wolves rooted in the relegation zone with one point. Analysis Gary O’Neil made one change to the team that drew with Nottingham Forest before the international break, as he started in a 4-2-3-1 formation. Andre came in for his full debut, as Toti Gomes dropped out of the squad, meaning Rayan Ait-Nouri moved back to left-back. Sam Johnstone was given the nod in goal, with Jose Sa taking his place on the bench and Dan Bentley not making the matchday squad. New signing Carlos Forbs was named among a strong attacking bench. Eddie Howe made three changes to his Newcastle side after their win over Spurs, as he played a 4-3-3 formation. Schar, Lewis Hall and Jacob Murphy all came into the team. Before the game, Wolves’ line-up would have suggested a 4-3-3 formation, but once the game kicked-off it was more of a 4-2-3-1 with Lemina and Jean-Ricner Bellegarde on either flank. Wolves struggled to...

title: Appello di Zelensky agli alleati su uso armi, anche a Italia
content: "Ogni attacco russo, ogni atto terroristico, come l'attacco odierno alla città di Kharkiv e alle regioni di Sumy e Donetsk, dimostra che abbiamo bisogno della capacità" dei missili "a lungo raggio per distruggere l'aviazione militare russa nelle sue basi". "Stiamo aspettando le decisioni in merito, in particolare dagli Stati Uniti, dal Regno Unito, dalla Francia, dalla Germania, dall'Italia, da tutti coloro la cui risolutezza può aiutare a salvare vite". E' il nuovo appello lanciato nel messaggio serale dal presidente ucraino Volodymyr Zelensky per il via libera all'uso dei missili occidentali in Russia.

title: Breiðablik - HK, staðan er 1:2
content: Breiðablik tekur á móti HK í Kópavogsslag í lokaumferð Bestu deildarinnar í knattspyrnu karla fyrir tvískiptingu í Kópavogi klukkan 17 í dag. Breiðablik er í öðru sæti með 46 stig og leikur í efri hlutanum og HK er í tíunda sæti með 20 stig og leikur í neðri hlutanum. Mbl.is er í Kópavogi og fylgist með gangi mála í beinni textalýsingu.

title: Dove vedere Milan-Liverpool di Youth League in tv o diretta streaming
content: Milan-Liverpool Primavera , in tv e in streaming, tutto ciò che c'è da sapere. Martedì 17 settembre, alle ore 14:30 , si disputerà, al 'Puma House of Football' di Milano, la sfida Milan-Liverpool Primavera, valevole per la 1^ giornata del campionato della Youth League 2024-2025 . I ragazzi di Federico Guidi in questa prima parte di stagione hanno conquistato tre successi in campionato, contro Udinese , Torino ed Empoli , a fronte di una sola sconfitta. A questo punto è ora di esordire in Europa, dove i giovani diavoli difendono la finale della scorsa edizione. I diritti per la stagione 2024/25 di Youth League li possiede solamente Milan TV . Sarà quindi possibile seguire tutte le sfide dei rossoneri in Europa sul canale tematico presente su Sky al canale 230 e compresa nell'offerta di DAZN. Per vedere Milan-Liverpool Primavera in streaming si potrà scaricare l'applicazione di Sky Go , sempre dopo aver sottoscritto l'abbonamento a Sky. In alternativa si potrà abbonarsi a Now TV , un'altra piattaforma di streaming che mostra tutto il meglio di Sky ad un prezzo minore. Ricordiamo inoltre come, da circa 15 minuti prima della partita, potrete seguire il live testuale qui su ' PianetaMilan.it ' per non perdervi nulla. LEGGI ANCHE: Milan, hai visto Reijnders? Qualità e... libertà. Con lui spunti e fantasia

title: Lazio, Baroni elogia Isaksen: "È forte, va lanciato e io ho fiducia in lui"
content: Alla viglia della sfida tra Lazio e Verona , in programma lunedì 16 settembre alle 20.45 allo stadio Olimpico, il tecnico dei biancocelesti Marco Baroni è intervenuto nella consueta conferenza stampa e tra i vari temi ha parlato anche della fiducia che ripone in Gustav Isaksen : "Questo ragazzo è forte, va lanciato, io ho tanta fiducia in lui. La responsabilità è la mia, deve andare in campo e divertirsi. Lo stesso discorso vale anche per Tchaouna. È un percorso che gli va fatto fare, ma secondo me faranno bene entrambi in questa stagione", queste le sue parole.

title: Imparable la violencia en Sinaloa: seis asesinatos y tres secuestros en Culiacán
creator: El Universal
content: CULIACÁN.- La violencia continúa imparable en Sinaloa, donde en las últimas horas se registraron en Culiacán seis asesinatos y tres secuestros . Uno de los homicidios, ocurridos en puntos distintos de la capital sinaloense, fue de una mujer llamada Daniela “N”, de 19 años de edad, cuyo domicilio fue atacado a balazos por un grupo armado que privó de la libertad a tres miembros de su familia. Un reporte a las líneas de emergencia alertó a la policía que en la avenida Manuel Carpio, de la colonia Miguel Hidalgo, un grupo armado tomó por asalto la vivienda. Asimismo, los ocupantes fueron sacados “con lujo de violencia” y subidos por la fuerza en camionetas. Violencia en Sinaloa: joven mujer asesinada Elementos de las corporaciones policiacas y el Ejército respondieron a la llamada y, al ubicar el domicilio, descubrieron que en el interior se encontraba tirada una joven sin signos vitales, Daniela “N”. Otro hecho ocurrió a un costado de la carretera México-Nogales, en la salida sur de Sinaloa, donde se localizaron los cuerpos de cinco hombres, mayores de 20 años de edad , quienes presentaban impactos de bala. title: AIFs drive Indian realty investments, set for continued growth
content: MUMBAI: Alternative Investment Funds (AIFs), privately pooled and regulated investment vehicles, have emerged as a dominant force in the Indian real estate sector by playing a crucial role in reshaping India’s the investment landscape by injecting much-needed capital into key segments of the market. With rising demand for both residential and commercial spaces, as well as an increasing focus on logistics due to the growth of e-commerce, these funds are capitalizing on a variety of opportunities. Since January 2021, several real estate-focused AIFs have announced plans to raise over $8.2 billion, targeting residential, commercial, and logistics assets . These funds have already secured more than $5.3 billion, showed data from Knight Frank India . The fund raise Is an indication of growing confidence in Indian realty's potential, with robust demand and growth prospects. “Private equity investments in real estate are expected to remain robust in the foreseeable future, with a substantial pipeline of both undeployed capital and real estate assets. An estimated $2 billion is yet to be deployed from $5.3 billion raised for real estate in recent years," said Harry Chaplin Rogers, Director of International Capital Markets, Knight Frank India. title: Ramona Bădescu, cadou inedit pentru fiul ei de 5 ani: „I-o las moștenire!”
content: 17 septembrie este o zi cu mari emoții pentru frumoasa Ramona Bădescu! Românca noastră locuiește de 34 de ani în Italia, dar nu a uitat nici o clipă de țara ei natală. Marți, de ziua fiului ei, Ignazio, Ramona va lansa la București o pinserie , pe care i-o va lăsa moștenire! Ramona Bădescu e de neoprit! La 55 de ani, frumoasa româncă originară din Craiova care a cucerit Italia, este o femeie împlinită din toate punctele de vedete. Este mama unui băiețel de aproape 5 anișori, este cântăreață și actriță celebră în Italia și în România, iar mai nou și-a propus să devină o antreprenoare de succes. Ramona Bădescu, cadou inedit pentru fiul ei de 5 ani: o pinserie! Ramona se află în aceste zile la București, unde robotește de zor de dimineață până seara pentru că marți, 17 septembrie, chiar de ziua fiului ei, Ignazio, va lansa o pinserie. Ramona ne-a dezvăluit rețeta ei secretă de pinsa, într-un interviu acordat în exclusivitate pentru Click! Click!: Ramona Bădescu, ai revenit în România. Ce vânt te-a adus din Italia, ca să zicem așa?! Înțeleg că ai ceva treabă pe aici în această perioad ? Ramona Bădescu: După 34 de ani de trăit în Italia, unde am încercat de fiecare dată să vorbesc despre bucătăria românească, acum îmi doresc să introduc și în România nu doar un produs în sine, ci un concept adevărat italienesc numit pinsa. Pinsa are 2000 de ani vechime ca produs, căci romanii puneau acest aluat...

title: Calmes: The GOP House won't govern. Send it to the backbenches in November.
creator: LA Times
content: Lucky for the Republicans who run the House, few Americans are paying attention to their antics of late, given the focus on the presidential race. Here’s what they’re up to: busily exemplifying the definition of insanity — doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results. “Led” by Speaker “ ” Johnson, Republicans yet again are threatening by their actions to shut down the government. After their extended summer recess, they returned after Labor Day and set out to score preelection points — egged on by Donald Trump — rather than seriously trying to pass legislation to keep the government funded. And they’re doing this just weeks before the Oct. 1 start of a new fiscal year, though they’ve had months to pass regular bills funding federal operations to avoid a last-minute grab-bag. Their doomed strategy — and they it’s doomed — is a familiar one: Attach a pet right-wing priority onto the funding package and try to force the Democratic Senate majority and President Biden to accept it under deadline pressure. Except the House Republicans to pass the package, given the opposition of party defectors as well as Democrats. In past years, Republicans’ “poison pills” on funding bills have included proposals targeting Obamacare, abortion rights, immigrants and transgender people. This time immigrants are their target again. They are demanding a law requiring Americans to show proof of citizenship when registering to vote. Voting by noncitizens and one that...

title: Þórólfur Matthíasson: Lausung í ríkisfjármálum og mistök Seðlabankans í Covid orsök hárra vaxta nú
creator: Eyjan
content: Í stað þess að draga saman ríkisútgjöld þegar í ljós kom að ekki þyrfti að styrkja fyrirtæki og atvinnuleysistryggingasjóð eins mikið og ráð var fyrir gert í Covid, greip ríkisstjórnin ný viðfangsefni og lagði fjármuni í þau. Þess vegna hefur okkur ekki tekist að snúa við dæminu eins og öðrum Norðurlöndum og þess vegna, en einnig vegna mistaka Seðlabankans sem lækkaði vexti of mikið í Covid, sitjum við nú uppi með þessa háu vexti hér á landi. Þórólfur Matthíasson, hagfræðiprófessor emeritus, er gestur Ólafs Arnarsonar í hlaðvarpi Markaðarins á Eyjunni. Markaðurinn - Þórólfur Matthíasson - klippa 3.mp4 „Síðan er vissulega ákveðinn vandi sem steðjar að mönnum í sambandi við Covid. Ég held að menn hafi gert ráð fyrir miklu, miklu dýpri kreppu heldur en varð. Það má segja, 80-90 prósent af hagkerfinu gekk bara alveg furðu vel á Covid tímanum. Það voru tíu prósentin sem tilheyra ferðaþjónustunni sem fóru úr sambandi, en meira að segja byggingariðnaðurinn gekk. Það kom upp einstaka hópsýking þegar okkar erlendu starfsmenn fóru í jólafrí til Póllands, en annars gátu þeir bara haldið áfram að smíða og slá upp mótum, eins og enginn væri morgundagurinn,“ segir Þórólfur. Og það sýndi sig náttúrlega að það hafði minni áhrif á heildina litið, að landið skyldi lokast svona eins og gerðist, og reyndar öll lönd meira og minna, vegna þess að Íslendingar, sem hafa verið duglegir að eyða í útlöndum, fóru þá bara að eyða...

title: Зеленский: США не разрешили удары вглубь РФ американским оружием
creator: Дарья Петуненкова
content: Вашингтон еще не дал разрешение Киеву наносить удары вглубь России американским оружием. Об этом заявил в интервью CNN президент Украины Владимир Зеленский. Ранее издание Bild сообщило, что украинский лидер планирует лично поехать в США и к американскому лидеру Джо Байдену с просьбой разрешить удары вглубь Российской Федерации с использованием дальнобойного оружия. Также Зеленский хочет «представить свою стратегию» Камале Харрис и Дональду Трампу. На минувшей неделе телеканал ABC со ссылкой на неназванного советника украинского лидера сообщил, что Зеленский госсекретарю США Энтони Блинкену план возможного применения дальнобойных западных ракет для ударов по территории РФ и «список вероятных целей». В свою очередь, министр иностранных дел РФ Сергей Лавров , что, по мнению Москвы, Запад уже давно убрал ограничения на использование дальнобойного оружия ВСУ для атак на Россию.

title: The GOP House won't govern. Send it to the backbenches in November.
content: Lucky for the Republicans who run the House, few Americans are paying attention to their antics of late, given the focus on the presidential race. Here’s what they’re up to: busily exemplifying the definition of insanity — doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results. “Led” by Speaker “ MAGA Mike ” Johnson, Republicans yet again are threatening by their actions to shut down the government. After their extended summer recess, they returned after Labor Day and set out to score preelection points — egged on by Donald Trump — rather than seriously trying to pass legislation to keep the government funded. And they’re doing this just weeks before the Oct. 1 start of a new fiscal year, though they’ve had months to pass regular bills funding federal operations to avoid a last-minute grab-bag. Their doomed strategy — and they know it’s doomed — is a familiar one: Attach a pet right-wing priority onto the funding package and try to force the Democratic Senate majority and President Biden to accept it under deadline pressure. Except the House Republicans don’t have enough votes to pass the package, given the opposition of party defectors as well as Democrats. In past years, Republicans’ “poison pills” on funding bills have included proposals targeting Obamacare, abortion rights, immigrants and transgender people. This time immigrants are their target again. They are demanding a law requiring Americans to show proof of citizenship when registering to vote....

Aldi shoppers go wild for middle-aisle find scanning at tills for just 99p – it’s perfect to put away for next summer
creator: Sophie Warburton
content: ALDI shoppers are going wild for a middle-aisle find that's scanning at tills for as little as 99p. Three days ago a bargain hunter shared their news with the Extreme Couponing and Bargains UK group. Aldi claims: "This kid's animal camping chair is the perfect seat for your next camping trip". With a snapshot of the Kids Camping Chair, the bargain hunter posted: "To the person who posted about the camping chairs at £3 in Aldi... "At my store, they were still £4.99 so I left it...today I got a bargain 99p there down to I got 2 !!" However, this Kids Camping Chair is like no other, it's fox themed. Read more in Money Like a fox, the chair is orange in colour, but the backrest is shaped like a large fox face with small ears poking out of the sides. With proof of purchase, the receipt clearly shows the buyer has paid 99p for this item. This news has sent shoppers going wild, with one shopper commenting: "Where is this please." Another said: "I got the kids one today as well 99p." Most read in Money "Grab me one if you go in please", said a third person. Even an Aldi staff member shared a tip with the Facebook group: "I work in Aldi and all summer lines have been reduced to a minimum today. "Some stores may still have plenty. Kids water shoes 50p, uv top £1, paddling pools 1,99 etc." Of course, it's always important to check before making the trip that your Aldi branch has these fabulous items in stock. As typically, when these items are gone, they're gone. You can find your...

title: Wolves 1 Newcastle 2 - Report
creator: Liam Keen
content: Molineux was left stunned as Wolves conceded two late goals to throw away a lead against Newcastle and fall to their third Premier League loss in four games. It was a scrappy start to the game on Sunday afternoon until a superb team move from Wolves saw captain Mario Lemina tap home an opening goal. Wolves endured a poor opening five minutes of the second half before taking a grip on proceedings and wasted good chances, while twice hitting the post. Newcastle began to push for a way back into the game and had a slice of luck when Fabian Schar’s long range effort deflected off Craig Dawson before nestling in the net. Wolves never recovered and just five minutes later, Harvey Barnes cut in off the left flank and curled home the winner, to leave Wolves rooted in the relegation zone with one point. Analysis Gary O’Neil made one change to the team that drew with Nottingham Forest before the international break, as he started in a 4-2-3-1 formation. Andre came in for his full debut, as Toti Gomes dropped out of the squad, meaning Rayan Ait-Nouri moved back to left-back. Sam Johnstone was given the nod in goal, with Jose Sa taking his place on the bench and Dan Bentley not making the matchday squad. New signing Carlos Forbs was named among a strong attacking bench. Eddie Howe made three changes to his Newcastle side after their win over Spurs, as he played a 4-3-3 formation. Schar, Lewis Hall and Jacob Murphy all came into the team. Before the game, Wolves’ line-up would have...

title: Lommel SK wint met automatismen van vorig (succes)seizoen: “Veel nieuwe jonge spelers is een deel van dit project”
The Waddle of Worcester penguins are leaving- here's how you can see them again
content: THE Great Waddle of Worcester has come to an end with the penguins beginning to be be collected up. St Richard's Hospice staff are currently busy collecting all 40 large penguins from in and around Worcester city centre. The first penguin to be removed was the Hairy Monster, sponsored by the Worcester News, which has been at Fort Royal Park for the past two months. They will be collected four at a time before being taken to a secret location for the next few weeks. (Image: Ryan Smith) A spokesperson for St Richard's Hospice said: "The Waddle of Worcester has been fantastic, there have been thousands of trail goers who have enjoyed the route and it has really been a great celebration of creativity." The Waddle has been in the city since July. A Wild in Art event, the eight-week showcase was brought to the city by St Richard’s Hospice in its 40th year. The penguins will eventually be sold off to raise vital funds for the hospice’s care of patients living with an illness that cannot be cured and their loved ones. (Image: Ryan Smith) Although many have enjoyed the trail, several of the penguins have had to be temporarily taken off display after being damaged. Next month, Worcestershire County Cricket Club will host all the city’s penguins for a final time before they all head off to their forever homes. The outdoor events will take place between Friday, October 4 and Sunday, October 6 and again between Friday, October 11 and Sunday, October 13.
