title: Returning home
creator: Sasha Mehter
content: “For I know the plans I have for you, declares the LORD, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.” – Jeremiah 29:11 I have experienced “returning home” twice in my life. I first left Barbados in 1960 at age 19 to pursue higher education in Jamaica, Wales and England, and then seamlessly landed my first job at UWI St Augustine in Trinidad in 1968. At UWI Jamaica, I had an amazing three-year Caribbean experience followed by a diverse, wide-ranging five-year UK experience before heading back to the Caribbean to start my professional career in fun-loving Trinidad and Tobago. In 1974, at age 33, I returned home after having been away for 14 years. This was my first homecoming. Fast forward to 2013, when at the age of 72 and after a wonderful 39-year career in my homeland embracing both the work environment and an entrepreneurship wave, I went to Trinidad to pursue new personal ambitions. You Might Be Interested In Shoring up good ideas I resolve to... Wellness for life: The importance of self-care Now in 2024, at age 83, after 11 enjoyable years, I have decided to return home again and persuaded my partner, Judy, to join me. This is my second homecoming. My first return to Barbados was marked by the excitement of establishing my family, attending to children’s education, achieving financial independence, pursuing physical fitness leading to longevity, embracing spiritual awareness and emotional balance, and strengthening and sharing business...

title: Strašna tragedija: Izbio požar u dječjoj sobi, poginuli majka i dvoje djece od tri i šest godina
content: U strašnom požaru koji jee izbio u dječjoj sobi stana u Bremenu smrtno je stradala majka i dvoje djece u dobi od tri i šest godina. Kako javljaju njemački mediji, požar je preživio otac koji je prevezen u bolnicu. Vatrogasci su priopćili da je požar izbio u stanu u četvrti Ellener Feld. Spasioci koji su odmah pristigli izašli na požarište su u dječjoj sobi zatekli beživotne 35-godišnju majku i dvoje djece, javlja Fenix.de . Hitna pomoć odmah je započela s reanimacijom. “Nažalost bez uspjeha”, rekli su vatrogasci. Kako navode njemački mediji, 36-godišnji otac, koji je očito sam pokušao ugasiti vatru je s teškim ozljedama prevezen u bolnicu. Uzrok požara još je nejasan.

title: Milan Liverpool, FONSECA studia la MOSSA A SORPRESA in formazione: il tecnico può STUPIRE TUTTI
creator: Redazione Milannews24
content: Archiviata la grande vittoria di ieri sera contro il Venezia , per il Milan è già tempo di pensare alla Champions League . Martedì sera, a San Siro, i rossoneri affronteranno il Liverpool, per la prima partita della nuova Champions League. Come riportato da Tuttosport Fonseca sta meditando di inserire una sorpresa in formazione. Questa sorpresa sarebbe Tammy Abraham nuovamente titolare, con la conseguente panchina di Alvaro Morata. Nella giornata di domani il tecnico terrà la conferenza stampa di vigilia.

title: Passenger ordered to pay more than $5,000 in fuel costs after flight diverted due to bad behavior
creator: By Lilit Marcus, CNN
content: A problematic airline passenger has been hit with an unusual form of punishment – he has to pay back the airline for the cost of fuel. According to the Australian Federal Police, a then-32-year-old man from Western Australia was disruptive on a flight headed from Perth to Sydney. As a result, the plane had to turn around and go back to Perth, which meant that the pilot was forced to dump some fuel to land. Now, the passenger has been ordered to pay $8,630 AUD ($5,806 USD) back to the airline to cover the cost of the wasted fuel. The Perth Magistrate Court also fined him $6,055, meaning that his mid-air misbehavior has a total price tag of $11,861 – likely many times higher than whatever he spent on the ticket. A plane leaves Sydney Airport in Australia. “This incident should serve as a warning that criminal behavior on board can come at a heavy cost to the offender,” Shona Davis, the AFP’s Acting Superintendent, said in a statement. “It’s far simpler to obey the directions of airline staff than cause unnecessary issues, which can end up hitting you in the hip pocket.” Although the flight happened on Sept. 25, 2023, it has taken about a year for the case against the unruly passenger to work its way through the Australian legal system. Neither the man nor the airline was publicly named, nor was it specified exactly what he did to earn such a hefty penalty. The passenger pleaded guilty to one count of disorderly behavior on an aircraft and one count of failure to comply with...

title: Streaming. Comment Netflix s’est imposé en 10 ans dans le paysage culturel français
content: À sa naissance, aux États-Unis en 1997, c’est un service en ligne de location et d’achat de DVD, avant de devenir la plateforme mastodonte du streaming vidéo qu’on connaît. À son arrivée dans l’Hexagone le 15 septembre 2014, Netflix revendiquait alors « plus de 48 millions de foyers abonnés dans plus de 40 pays ». Aujourd’hui c’est « plus de 278 millions d’utilisateurs payants dans plus de 190 pays », dont plus de 10 millions de foyers abonnés en France, selon les chiffres de la plateforme. Alors, comment Netflix a su s’imposer dans l’Hexagone ? Un début hésitant « En 2014, il ne faut pas faire entrer le loup dans la bergerie », entend-on chez « certains opérateurs télécoms », narre Capucine Cousin, autrice de Netflix, Amazon, Disney & Cie, la bataille des nouveaux titans de l’audiovisuel (éditions Dunod). Car au départ, Netflix ne passe pas par les box internet, accès privilégié des Français. Même son de cloche chez les groupes audiovisuels. Ainsi Canal+ dégaine CanalPlay Infinity... ...pour lire la suite, rejoignez notre communauté d'abonnés et accédez à l'intégralité de nos articles sur le site et l'application mobile à partir de 1 € le 1er mois, sans engagement de durée {'skus': ['lbpswgpremium2']} Google : 1€ le 1er mois puis 14,99€ Culture - Loisirs Cinéma France - Monde Télévision - Médias Fil Info Alban Lenoir Gérard Depardieu Omar Sy Découvrez nos sélections d'activités et sorties pour inspirer vos week-ends.

title: Instagram: como colocar o disco de vinil com música nos stories (só leva alguns minutos)
content: O Meta trabalha continuamente para manter o Instagram entre as principais redes sociais, adicionando diferentes opções que melhorem a experiência dos usuários na plataforma. ANÚNCIO Uma das últimas a ser implementada foi a de compartilhar música com um disco de vinil girando nas histórias , uma função que está sendo ativada gradualmente para todos no app. Clique aqui para receber as notícias de ciência e tecnologia pelo WhatsApp Como adicionar música de um disco nos stories do Instagram? Há duas maneiras de usar esta animação: em um storie sobre alguma imagem ou com o storie independente. No entanto, por enquanto, está disponível apenas para alguns usuários no iOS. Se tiver um dispositivo com este sistema operacional, continue lendo para conhecer o processo de adicionar música com um disco de vinil nas histórias , de acordo com o site Xataka . Colocar um disco com música sobre uma imagem nos stories Passo 1 : abre o Instagram como sempre, pressiona o botão de criar e selecione ‘Storie’ Passo 2 : escolha uma imagem da galeria ou tire uma para continuar. Passo 3 : depois de escolher uma foto ou vídeo, a janela de edição prévia será aberta. Nela, você deve pressionar o ícone de nota musical que aparecerá na parte superior. Passo 4 : a seleção irá levá-lo ao catálogo de músicas, onde poderá procurar e escolher a música que deseja. Para selecioná-la, basta pressionar sobre o título da faixa. Passo 5 : em seguida, você irá para a seção...

title: Słaba ocena Roberta Lewandowskiego po meczu z Gironą. "Nie powinien tego zmarnować"
New book dives into the life outside of running for Canadian legend Terry Fox
creator: The Canadian Press
content: When Barbara Adhiya first learned that Terry Fox had run the length of a marathon a day during his journey across Canada, she was shocked. Like most Canadians, Adhiya had known about the icon’s 1980 mission to raise funds for cancer research through a 4,700-mile run from Newfoundland to British Columbia, but not much about Fox’s childhood, the day-to-day grind of his run and his deep connection to his supporters. The editor and writer’s new book, “Hope by Terry Fox,” published this month by ECW Press and Burman Books, explores who Fox was beyond what he called his Marathon of Hope through interviews, journal excerpts, letters and photos. “As Canadians, we adore him for very good reason, and he is our iconic hero,” Adhiya said. “But I think this book allows you to really understand the depth of who he was as a human being.” “This is hope, as Terry Fox would teach you.” Fox, of Port Coquitlam, B.C., was 18 years old when he was diagnosed with bone cancer and had to have his right leg amputated. His personal experience motivated him to raise money for cancer research, a move that took the form of the Marathon of Hope. After months of training, Fox began his cross-country run in St. John’s, N.L., garnering a frenzy of fans and media attention along the way. In her attempt to explore Fox’s journey and his background, Adhiya — a former editor at The Canadian Press, Associated Press and Reuters — conducted more than 50 interviews with people from throughout Fox’s life over the...

Neither the man nor the airline was publicly named, nor was it specified exactly what he did to earn such a hefty penalty. The passenger pleaded guilty to one count of disorderly behavior on an aircraft and one count of failure to comply with safety instructions. While charging a disruptive traveler for the cost of fuel is not a typical penalty, other kinds of fines are more common. In 2021, the U.S. Federal Aviation...

title: ИМ СЕ ИЗВИНУВАМ НА ГРАЃАНИТЕ ШТО ЗА 80 ДЕНА ВЛАДА, НЕ ГО СМЕНИВ ИМЕТО: Еве што вели премиерот за „Северна“
content: Добивај вести на Viber Во гостувањето на поткаст емисијата на Кристијан Ландов, премиерот Христијан Мицкоски, истакна дека заклетвите кога станал премиер ги давале со придавката Северна, но дека никој не може да му кажува да го користи името Македонија, бидејќи тоа е негово основно човеково право. Од граѓанин беше запрашан дали планира да го смени името повторно во Македонија, тој се извини што не го вратил името во првите 80 дена од формирањето на Владата. title: Housing funding announced as Senate battle continues
creator: AAP
content: As the federal government announces initial funding rounds for two key housing policies, two more face fierce resistance in the Senate. The first tranche of funds for the Housing Australia Future Fund and National Housing Accord programs are expected to deliver more than 13,700 new social and affordable homes nationwide. Construction on almost 40 per cent of the builds was expected to begin in the current financial year. Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said the programs would deliver social and affordable housing to those who needed it most. “I grew up in social housing. I know how important a roof over your head is and the opportunities it creates,” Mr Albanese said in a statement. Round one of the HAFF funding will unlock $9.2 billion of investment in social and affordable housing and will include more than 1200 homes for women and children escaping domestic violence and older women at risk of homelessness. Housing and Homelessness Minister Clare O’Neil said the first round was supporting more social and affordable housing than the coalition had in nine years in government. “We’re building homes for renters, homes for first-home buyers, and homes for women and children escaping domestic violence and those at risk from homelessness, because more homes means more affordable housing for everyone,” Ms O’Neil said. Less than 40 per cent of the 13,742 builds are expected to be under way this financial year, and applications for round two will open in the next six months. As the...

title: Obésité : un Néo-Aquitain sur deux est en surpoids aujourd’hui
content: Le Projet Régional de santé pour la Nouvelle-Aquitaine 2018-2028 s’intéresse à l’état de santé physique, psychique et social des Néo-Aquitains, élaboré par les trois observatoires régionaux de la santé. Ce diagnostic a été effectué selon une méthode dite « déclarative », les personnes interrogées ont directement répondu. Pour ce qui concerne la prévalence du surpoids, les chiffres sont éloquents : 53 % des habitants adultes sont en surcharge pondérale, dont 21 % en situation d’obésité. Ce chiffre, comme au plan national, ne cesse d’augmenter, particulièrement pour les femmes, les cadres et les professions intellectuelles supérieures, notamment en ce qui concerne l’obésité. Les hommes restent cependant les plus fortement concernés par le surpoids. Ouvriers, chômeurs, avec un niveau d’études inférieur au bac, agriculteurs ou vivant dans des petites communes... Le nombre d’hommes en surcharge pondérale est très élevé. Le surpoids augmente avec l’âge, d’où une prévalence élevée chez les retraités, et elle diffère selon qu’on vit en Gironde ou en Corrèze. En effet, 50 % des Girondins sont en surpoids, contre 60 % des Corréziens. Parmi les personnes sondées, trois quarts jugent leur alimentation équilibrée, 23 % admettent ne pas avoir une nourriture adaptée et 2 % ne savent pas ou ne veulent pas se positionner. La proportion de personnes considérant leur alimentation déséquilibrée a augmenté depuis 2018 et concerne plutôt les...

title: Latvijas tenisisti Deivisa kausa duelī zaudē Togo
creator: LETA
content: Latvijas vīriešu tenisa izlase svētdien Deivisa kausa pasaules otrās grupas duelī viesos zaudēja Togo. Dāvis Rolis un Rihards Neimanis dienas pirmajā spēlē - dubultspēlē - ar 6-7 (5:7), 1-6 zaudēja Isakam Padio un Tomā Setodži, kuri duelī panāca 3-0 Togo labā un nodrošināja uzvaru. Vēlāk vienspēlē Daniels Tens, kurš neatrodas pasaules rangā, ar 6-7 (5:7), 4-6 zaudēja Setodži (ATP 1240.). Līdz ar to mačsacīkstē ar 4-0 pārāki bija Togo tenisisti. Sestdien vienspēlēs Rolis ar 4-6, 4-6 piekāpās Setodži, bet divu pasaules rangā neesošu tenisistu cīņā Tens ar 5-7, 3-6 zaudēja Liovam Ažavonam. Latvijas izlases sastāvā bija Daniels Tens, Dāvis Rolis un Rihards Neimanis, bet komandas kapteinis bija Deniss Pavlovs. Latvijas izlasē šoreiz nespēlēja ATP vienspēļu rangā pārstāvētie tenisisti - Roberts Štrombahs (451.), Kārlis Ozoliņš (682.) un Mārtiņš Rocēns (1333.). Otrās grupas cīņu uzvarētājas iekļūs 2025.gada Deivisa kausa pasaules pirmās grupas "play-off" kārtā, kurā sacentīsies par iekļūšanu pirmajā grupā, bet zaudētājas 2025.gadā spēlēs pasaules otrās grupas "play-off" kārtā. Ziemā Latvijas tenisisti pirmās grupas "play-off" kārtas duelī ar 0-4 piekāpās Norvēģijai. Deivisa kauss ir galvenās tenisa sacensības vīriešu izlasēm, ko kopš 1900.gada organizē Starptautiskā Tenisa federācija (ITF). Sākotnēji tās bija sacensības starp ASV un Lielbritānijas izlasēm, bet šobrīd...

title: Condò SOPRESO: «Mi ha colpito il fatto che la Juve PERMETTE a Thiago Motta di fare QUESTO»
creator: Redazione JuventusNews24
content: Paolo Condò ha parlato ai microfoni di InterNews24 anche della Juventus . Di seguito le parole del giornalista: PAROLE – «Mi ha colpito la Juventus e il fatto che per permettere a Thiago Motta di lavorare bene fin da subito ha ’emarginato’ una lunga serie di giocatori. Alcuni anche di grande valore, deprezzandoli sul mercato e quindi alla fine rinunciando a dei soldi. Ha accettato questo ‘danno’ per fare in modo che l’allenatore potesse lavorare fin da subito con facce sorridenti e motivate. Questo è quello che più mi ha colpito. Tutti gli allenatori appena arrivano in un club in un primo momento hanno a che fare con giocatori che devono essere venduti, mugugni, incazz**ure e così via. Invece alla Juve non è successo e Motta ha potuto lavorare in serenità sin dà inizio estate». L’INTERVISTA ESCLUSIVA DI INTERNEWS24 A PAOLO CONDO’

title: Potresno! Ciklon 'Boris' donosi haos- desetine žrtava, milioni bez struje! Najkritičnije u ovim zemljama!
content: Hiljade ljudi evakuisano je danas u Češkoj Republici , Poljskoj i Donjoj Austriji , koja je proglašena za područje katastrofe i gde je u borbi protiv poplava poginuo vatrogasac a vodostaj reka u centralnoj Evropi nastavlja da raste, uključujući i Dunav. Evropa se dodatno zatvara zbog ilegalnih migranata: Nemačka od ponedeljka na šest meseci vraća kontrolu nad svih 3.800 kilometara granice, Švedska će migrantima nuditi 30.000 evra da se vrate kući, a Holanđani uvode neku vrstu vanrednog stanja kako bi vlada dobila odrešene ruke u borbi protiv imigracije, pa će sledeće nedelje zatražiti od Evropske komisije da ih izuzme od politike Unije prema azilu i migracijama. 15.09.2024 16:33 Evropska unija je izgubila svoje ekonomske prednosti zbog odbijanja ruskih energenata, što bi moglo dovesti do njenog raspada, upozorava bivši premijer Italije i bivši predsednik Evropske centralne banke, Mario Dragi, u svom izveštaju za Evropsku komisiju. 15.09.2024 13:41 Usled ciklona "Boris" , koji besni iznad centralne Evrope, neki delovi Češke Republike i Poljske gde je pukla brana, suočili su se sa najgorim poplavama za proteklih skoro 30 godina, prenosi Rojters. Desetine hiljada ljudi je bez struje, a mnogi ljudi su evakuisani iz teško pogođenih područja na područja na višoj nadmorskoj visini, preneo je BBC. Zbog poplava izazvanih obilnim kišama, hiljade ljudi evakuisano je danas u Češkoj Republici, Poljskoj i Donjoj Austriji, koja je proglašena za područje...

title: Horoskop tygodniowy 16-22 września 2024 [Baran, Byk, Bliźnięta, Rak, Lew, Panna, Waga, Skorpion, Strzelec, Koziorożec, Wodnik, Ryby]
creator: rozja
content: Horoskop dzienny - Baran Otrzymasz bardzo dobrą wiadomość, która zwali cię z nóg. Oprócz mnóstwa radości przyniesie ci ona także nowe wyzwania. Zmiany, które nadejdą w tym tygodniu, otworzą nowe perspektywy i możliwości na przyszłość. To będzie twój dowód na to, że nie warto zamykać się na świat, bo szczęście może czaić się tuż za rogiem. Horoskop dzienny - Byk Odkryjesz nową pasję, która pochłonie cię bez reszty. Nie bój się eksperymentować i próbować nowych . Dzięki hobby zyskasz nową energię i chęć do działania. To również świetna okazja, aby poznać nowych ludzi, którzy podzielają twoje zainteresowania. Horoskop dzienny - Bliźnięta Przestaniesz przejmować się drobnymi sprawami, które do tej pory cię stresowały. Zrozumiesz, że nie warto tracić energii na rzeczy, na które nie masz wpływu. Odpuścisz sobie perfekcjonizm i zyskasz więcej spokoju ducha. To dobry moment, aby skupić się na tym, co naprawdę ważne. Horoskop dzienny - Rak Zaczniesz dostrzegać pozytywne strony nawet w najtrudniejszych sytuacjach. Zmienisz podejście do problemów i zamiast skupiać się na negatywach, zaczniesz szukać rozwiązań. Twoja nowa postawa przyciągnie do ciebie więcej pozytywnej energii i pomoże ci lepiej radzić sobie z wyzwaniami. Horoskop dzienny - Lew Przygotuj się na tydzień pełen sprzątania! Pomimo wolnego weekendu i kilku dni czekają cię gruntowne porządki, które zajmą sporo czasu, ale przyniosą też...

title: Passenger ordered to pay more than $5,000 in fuel costs after flight diverted due to bad behavior
content: A problematic airline passenger has been hit with an unusual form of punishment – he has to pay back the airline for the cost of fuel. According to the Australian Federal Police, a then-32-year-old man from Western Australia was disruptive on a flight headed from Perth to Sydney. As a result, the plane had to turn around and go back to Perth, which meant that the pilot was forced to dump some fuel to land. Now, the passenger has been ordered to pay $8,630 AUD ($5,806 USD) back to the airline to cover the cost of the wasted fuel. The Perth Magistrate Court also fined him $6,055, meaning that his mid-air misbehavior has a total price tag of $11,861 – likely many times higher than whatever he spent on the ticket. A plane leaves Sydney Airport in Australia. “This incident should serve as a warning that criminal behavior on board can come at a heavy cost to the offender,” Shona Davis, the AFP’s Acting Superintendent, said in a statement. “It’s far simpler to obey the directions of airline staff than cause unnecessary issues, which can end up hitting you in the hip pocket.” Although the flight happened on Sept. 25, 2023, it has taken about a year for the case against the unruly passenger to work its way through the Australian legal system. Neither the man nor the airline was publicly named, nor was it specified exactly what he did to earn such a hefty penalty. The passenger pleaded guilty to one count of disorderly behavior on an aircraft and one count of failure to comply with...

title: Hai vợ chồng nam diễn viên Từ Thiếu Cường đột ngột qua đời
content: Ngày 15/9, Sohu đưa tin con gái Từ Dĩnh Khôn của nam diễn viên Từ Thiếu Cường thông báo ông đã qua đời hồi đầu tháng, hưởng thọ 74 tuổi. Lý do qua thời gian dài gia đình mới thông báo tin buồn vì vợ của nam diễn viên trong quá trình lo tang cho chồng cũng đã qua đời vì bệnh tim. Hai vợ chồng cùng qua đời khiến gia đình càng khó khăn. "Cảm ơn mọi người đã quan tâm, hy vọng mọi người cho gia đình thời gian để xử lý chuyện buồn", con trai Từ Vỹ Đông của nam diễn viên lên thay mặt, cảm ơn lời thăm hỏi của các đồng nghiệp, nghệ sĩ. Theo đạo diễn, diễn viên Điền Khải Văn - trưởng Hội nhà làm phim Hong Kong chia sẻ Từ Thiếu Cường kết hôn với người vợ kém 30 tuổi tại Trung Quốc Đại lục vào năm 2005. Những năm cuối đời, ngôi sao Thất hiệp ngũ nghĩa sống tại Bắc Kinh. Từ Thiếu Cường sinh năm 1950, là phản diện nổi tiếng trên màn ảnh Hong Kong. Nam diễn viên nổi tiếng với các tác phẩm như Thất hiệp ngũ nghĩa, Thiên tằm biến, Hiệp khách hành, Tùy Đường diễn nghĩa, Đại quản gia, Tinh Võ Trần Chân, Võ Đang 2, Thần điêu đại hiệp 1998, Trạng nguyên Tô Khất Nhi. Sau khi sang Trung Quốc đại lục định cư, Từ Thiếu Cường đóng vai phụ trong các phim Trường tương thủ, Tân liêu trai, Bản nạp phong vân, Địch...

title: Top five reasons why our savers save when others spend
creator: Ali and Gaby Rosenberg
content: or signup to continue reading Why do some of us find saving money easy - almost automatic - whilst others have great intentions but never quite get there? The reality is that it doesn't have to be complicated, but understanding why we save - or why we don't - can make all the difference. Our Blossom customers are getting pretty good at saving, and we wanted to understand their mindset and motivations. We ran a survey with over a thousand of our incredible savers to determine what gets them excited about saving. Whether you're just getting started on your savings journey or looking for new strategies to build wealth, their insights offer a fresh perspective on the benefits of staying on track with your savings goals: The vast majority of our customers joined Blossom because of our competitive targeted returns. Saving is usually all about delayed gratification, but 5.95% p.a. Or 7.00% p.a. targeted returns (depending on which product they chose) means they can reach their goals faster. Watching their savings grow every single day without having to lift a finger is incredibly satisfying. Internally, we call it our Blossom "dopamine hit". It helps them stay on track and feel confident that they're making progress in the short and long term. No one enjoys fees eating into their hard-earned savings, and our customers told us that the fact we don't charge sign-up, transfer, or withdrawal fees was a huge drawcard for them. It's just one less thing to worry about. Whilst we all love...

title: New book dives into the life outside of running for Canadian legend Terry Fox
creator: The Canadian Press
content: When Barbara Adhiya first learned that Terry Fox had run the length of a marathon a day during his journey across Canada, she was shocked. Like most Canadians, Adhiya had known about the icon’s 1980 mission to raise funds for cancer research through a 4,700-mile run from Newfoundland to British Columbia, but not much about Fox’s childhood, the day-to-day grind of his run and his deep connection to his supporters. The editor and writer’s new book, “Hope by Terry Fox,” published this month by ECW Press and Burman Books, explores who Fox was beyond what he called his Marathon of Hope through interviews, journal excerpts, letters and photos. “As Canadians, we adore him for very good reason, and he is our iconic hero,” Adhiya said. “But I think this book allows you to really understand the depth of who he was as a human being.” “This is hope, as Terry Fox would teach you.” Fox, of Port Coquitlam, B.C., was 18 years old when he was diagnosed with bone cancer and had to have his right leg amputated. His personal experience motivated him to raise money for cancer research, a move that took the form of the Marathon of Hope. After months of training, Fox began his cross-country run in St. John’s, N.L., garnering a frenzy of fans and media attention along the way. In her attempt to explore Fox’s journey and his background, Adhiya — a former editor at The Canadian Press, Associated Press and Reuters — conducted more than 50 interviews with people from throughout Fox’s life over the...

title: Birmanie: des habitants tentent de venir en aide aux victimes des inondations
content: Les inondations et les glissements de terrain consécutifs au typhon, qui a frappé la région le week-end dernier, ont fait au total plus de 400 morts en Asie du Sud-Est, essentiellement en Birmanie et au Vietnam, mais aussi au Laos et en Thaïlande, selon les chiffres officiels. Face à cette catastrophe, le ministre indien des Affaires étrangères, Subrahmanyam Jaishankar, a annoncé dimanche sur X que son pays avait envoyé plusieurs tonnes d'aides, incluant des rations de nourriture sèche, des vêtements et des médicaments, aussi bien en Birmanie qu'au Vietnam et au Laos. Le chef de la junte birmane, Min Aung Hlaing, avait demandé samedi de l'aide internationale, une démarche rare, le pouvoir ayant entravé par le passé l'aide humanitaire en provenance de l'étranger. Dans le centre de la Birmanie, un homme a raconté à l'AFP comment, à l'aide de cordes, il a tenté le 10 septembre de sauver des personnes prises au piège par la montée des eaux qui ont atteint quatre mètres dans la ville de Kalaw (Etat de Shan). "Le courant était très fort et certains bâtiments ont même été détruits" , a-t-il expliqué, affirmant avoir vu des meubles emportés par les flots. "Je pouvais voir au loin des familles prises au piège, debout sur les toits de leurs maisons" , se souvient cet homme qui travaille pour une ONG locale. "J'ai entendu dire qu'il y avait 40 corps à l'hôpital". A une trentaine de kilomètres de là, au lac Inle, un site très touristique, le niveau...

title: SuS Oberaden fängt sich die nächste Klatsche ein: Cobras nun Oberliga-Schlusslicht
content: Nach einer erneuten kräftigen Auswärtspleite bei der Drittligareserve der Ahlener SG belegen die Oberliga-Handballer des SuS Oberaden aktuell den letzten Platz. Ohne beide Schuchtmann-Brüder und ohne Simon Rodefeld sowie Till Stock hatte Oberadens Coach Thomas Brannekämper schon vor dem Anpfiff mit personellen Problemen zu kämpfen. Zudem meldeten sich einige Akteure erst zum Spiel nach einer Krankheit zurück. Eine kurzfristige Verlegung war nicht mehr möglich. So rückte Timo Weber in den Kader und Brannekämper zog sich selber ein Spielertrikot über. Oberliga 1 Ahlener SG II – SuS Oberaden 35:23 (19:14) „Es läuft im Moment alles gegen uns. In der ersten Halbzeit machen wir eigentlich ein ganz vernünftiges Spiel“, sagte ein enttäuschter Oberadener Trainer nach Spielschluss. In der zweiten Hälfte brach das Unheil dann aber gewaltig über die Cobras her. Nach dem Treffer von Jan Weber zum 17:14 fing sich Oberaden pausenübergreifend einen 0:8-Lauf ein, sodass nach knapp 40 Minuten die Entscheidung beim 14:25-Zwischenstand praktisch gefallen war. „Da ging dann gar nichts mehr und die Köpfe gingen nach unten“, fügte Brannekämper hinzu. Er selber stellte sich in der Schlussviertelstunde in den Abwehr-Innenblock und machte vorne drei Treffer. SuS: Wicke, Bernemann – Fehring (5), Groetken, Mosch (1), Kurr (3), Schubert (1), J.Weber (5), Webers (1), Kleigrewe (2), Brannekämper (3), T. Weber, Ferkinghoff, Wagner (2/1) Strafminuten: 8 / 16

title: Passenger ordered to pay more than $5,000 in fuel costs after flight diverted due to bad behavior
creator: By Lilit Marcus, CNN
content: According to the Australian Federal Police, a then-32-year-old man from Western Australia was disruptive on a flight headed from Perth to Sydney. As a result, the plane had to turn around and go back to Perth, which meant that the pilot was forced to dump some fuel to land. Now, the passenger has been ordered to pay $8,630 AUD ($5,806 USD) back to the airline to cover the cost of the wasted fuel. The Perth Magistrate Court also fined him $6,055, meaning that his mid-air misbehavior has a total price tag of $11,861 – likely many times higher than whatever he spent on the ticket. “This incident should serve as a warning that criminal behavior on board can come at a heavy cost to the offender,” Shona Davis, the AFP’s Acting Superintendent, said in a statement. “It’s far simpler to obey the directions of airline staff than cause unnecessary issues, which can end up hitting you in the hip pocket.” Although the flight happened on Sept. 25, 2023, it has taken about a year for the case against the unruly passenger to work its way through the Australian legal system. Neither the man nor the airline was publicly named, nor was it specified exactly what he did to earn such a hefty penalty. The passenger pleaded guilty to one count of disorderly behavior on an aircraft and one count of failure to comply with safety instructions. While charging a disruptive traveler for the cost of fuel is not a typical penalty, other kinds of fines are more common. In 2021, the U.S. Federal Aviation...

title: A barokk kor egyik legjelentősebb billentyűs szerzőjének művei is felcsendülnek Pannonhalmán
content: A barokk kor hét zeneszerzőjének művei hangzanak el szeptember 27-én a zene világnapja alkalmából a Pannonhalmi Bencés Főapátságban. A koncert a főapátság idei orgonahangverseny-sorozatának ötödik alkalma. A darabokat a Boldogasszony-kápolna 1820-ban épült és 2023-ban restaurált orgonáján Sárosi Dániel orgonaművész szólaltatja meg. A kamarakoncerten az orgonista mellett ifj. Barra Ákos játszik hegedűn. A barokk kor kompozíciói csendülnek fel A németalföldi orgonistahagyományt megteremtő Jan Pieterszoon Sweelincktől – akit német orgonistagyártónak is neveznek a jelentős karriert befutott tanítványai miatt – az a-moll toccatát hallhatja a közönség. Johann Sebastian Bachtól két darab, az a-moll hegedűverseny II. tétele és az F-dúr pastorale hangzik el. A német zeneszerzőre nagy hatást gyakorló Johann Adam Reinckentől szintén egy toccata hangzik el. Bár Reincken volt a XVII. század egyik legjelentősebb komponistája, műveiből csak kevés maradt fenn az utókor számára. Georg Philipp Telemann-nak több mint háromezer kompozíciója ismert, ezúttal a h-moll fantázia került be a koncert repertoárjába. A szvit műfaj atyja, Johann Jakob Froberger munkásságába a hangversenyen az a-moll toccata által tekinthet be a nagyérdemű. Froberger a barokk kor egyik legjelentősebb billentyűs szerzője. Életműve mérföldkő volt az európai zenetörténetben, ő volt az első komponista, aki nemcsak orgonára,...

title: Streaming. Comment Netflix s’est imposé en 10 ans dans le paysage culturel français
content: À sa naissance, aux États-Unis en 1997, c’est un service en ligne de location et d’achat de DVD, avant de devenir la plateforme mastodonte du streaming vidéo qu’on connaît. À son arrivée dans l’Hexagone le 15 septembre 2014, Netflix revendiquait alors « plus de 48 millions de foyers abonnés dans plus de 40 pays ». Aujourd’hui c’est « plus de 278 millions d’utilisateurs payants dans plus de 190 pays », dont plus de 10 millions de foyers abonnés en France, selon les chiffres de la plateforme. Alors, comment Netflix a su s’imposer dans l’Hexagone ? « En 2014, il ne faut pas faire entrer le loup dans la bergerie », entend-on chez « certains opérateurs télécoms », narre Capucine Cousin, autrice de Netflix, Amazon, Disney & Cie, la bataille des nouveaux titans de l’audiovisuel (éditions Dunod). Car au départ, Netflix ne passe pas par les box internet, accès privilégié des Français. Même son de cloche chez les groupes audiovisuels. Ainsi Canal+ dégaine CanalPlay Infinity... ...pour lire la suite, rejoignez notre communauté d'abonnés et accédez à l'intégralité de nos articles sur le site et l'application mobile à partir de 1 € le 1er mois, sans engagement de durée {'skus': ['jslswgpremium2']} Google : 1€ le 1er mois puis 14,99€ Découvrez nos sélections d'activités et sorties pour inspirer vos week-ends.

title: Der TB Uphusen schlägt sich selbst – mal wieder
content: Dieses Problem zieht sich beim TB Uphusen aktuell wie ein roter Faden durch: Die Landesliga-Fußballer produzieren in gesunder Regelmäßigkeit individuelle Fehler und machen sich das Leben damit selbst schwer. So war es auch am Sonntag im Heimspiel gegen den TuS Harsefeld. Wieder einmal passierte den Arenkampkickern ein schwerer Patzer, der sie auf die Verliererstraße brachte. Gegen den TuS verloren die Uphuser mit 0:2 (0:1) und warten nun schon seit vier Spielen auf einen Sieg. Uphusens Offensivspieler Daniel Throl – er nahm Sonntag aufgrund einer Achillessehnenreizung nur eine Zuschauerrolle ein – brachte es nach dem Schlusspfiff auf den Punkt: "Es sind wir, die zurzeit die Spiele entscheiden." Der Fehler, der für die Uphuser gegen Harsefeld schwerwiegende Folgen hatte, unterlief nach einer Viertelstunde Patrick Küsel. Der Innenverteidiger passte den Ball im Aufbauspiel nicht zu einem seiner Mitspieler, sondern unbedrängt in den Fuß von TuS-Spieler Jonathan Bondombe-Simba. Der Ex-Uphuser nahm mit der Kugel am Fuß sofort Tempo auf und gab sie weiter zu Pascal Schawaller. Der Angreifer hatte keine Probleme Uphusens Keeper Bamidele John Lagoye zu überwinden. "Wir legen uns das Ding mal wieder selbst ins Netz", kommentierte TBU-Coach Christian Ahlers-Ceglarek die Szene, die zum Führungstreffer der Gäste führte. Zehn Minuten später traf Schawaller zum zweiten Mal nach einer Bondombe-Simba-Vorlage. Dieses Mal aber aus einer Abseitsposition. Magouhi verschießt Elfmeter...

title: Tokat'ta toprak yüklü kamyon 25 metre yükseklikten uçuruma yuvarlandı
content: Olay, ilçeye bağlı Yeşilkaya köyü yaylasında meydana geldi. İddiaya göre bölgede yapımı devam eden gölet inşaatına toprak taşıyan kamyonun sürücüsü Vedat Yiğit(48), direksiyon hakimiyetini kaybederek kamyonla birlikte uçuruma yuvarlandı. Kazayı gören vatandaşların ihbarı üzerine olay yerine gelen sağlık ekipleri Yiğit'in olay yerinde hayatını kaybettiğini belirledi. Kazayla ilgili inceleme başlatıldı.

content: A problematic airline passenger has been hit with an unusual form of punishment – he has to pay back the airline for the cost of fuel. According to the Australian Federal Police, a then-32-year-old man from Western Australia was disruptive on a flight headed from Perth to Sydney. As a result, the plane had to turn around and go back to Perth, which meant that the pilot was forced to dump some fuel to land. Now, the passenger has been ordered to pay $8,630 AUD ($5,806 USD) back to the airline to cover the cost of the wasted fuel. The Perth Magistrate Court also fined him $6,055, meaning that his mid-air misbehavior has a total price tag of $11,861 – likely many times higher than whatever he spent on the ticket. A plane leaves Sydney Airport in Australia. “This incident should serve as a warning that criminal behavior on board can come at a heavy cost to the offender,” Shona Davis, the AFP’s Acting Superintendent, said in a statement. “It’s far simpler to obey the directions of airline staff than cause unnecessary issues, which can end up hitting you in the hip pocket.” Although the flight happened on Sept. 25, 2023, it has taken about a year for the case against the unruly passenger to work its way through the Australian legal system. Neither the man nor the airline was publicly named, nor was it specified exactly what he did to earn such a hefty penalty. The passenger pleaded guilty to one count of disorderly behavior on an aircraft and one count of failure to comply with...

title: Libre antenne - Angel doit subir une opération de la hanche : elle demande conseil
content: Valérie Darmon SAISON 2024 - 2025 19h30, le 15 septembre 2024 Au cœur de la nuit, les auditeurs se livrent en toute liberté aux oreilles attentives et bienveillantes de Valérie Darmon. Pas de jugements ni de tabous, une conversation franche, mais aussi des réponses aux questions que les auditeurs se posent. Un moment d'échange et de partage propice à la confidence pour repartir le cœur plus léger.

title: VDE: Oil's Bounce Warrants A Energy-Sector Refresh (Rating Upgrade)
content: BugTiger/E+ via Getty Images WTI crude oil continues to meet buyers in the low $60s per barrel. Last week, heavy selling through Tuesday resulted in the prompt-month contract dipping below $66, right down to critical support levels. As we’ve seen several times since late 2021, a rally took place in short order. Oil ended the week near $69 after briefly trading north of $70. All that drama in the commodity comes as the Energy sector has posted very poor relative strength compared to the broader market. The oil and gas space notched its worst level versus the S&P 500 of the year last week, but I see opportunity in this high yield, big free cash flow slice of the US equity market. I am upgrading shares of the Vanguard Energy Index Fund ( NYSEARCA: VDE ). I was neutral on the ETF back in the first quarter, and shares are up just 4.3% total return in the past seven months, sharply losing ground to the SPX which is up about 12% in that span. Lower oil prices is certainly a culprit, but so too are fears of ongoing weakness in China and broader supply/demand softness in both WTI and Brent oil. WTI Crude Oil Hits Critical Support Stockcharts.com Energy Sector Relative Strength Sinks to a New Low Goldman Sachs Energy Sector Sports the Highest Total Shareholder Yield JPM According to the issuer , VDE seeks to track the performance of a benchmark index that measures the investment return of stocks in the Energy sector. It holds stocks of companies involved in the exploration and...

title: Fontos mérföldkőhöz érkezett Harry herceg élete, a királyi család is üzent
content: Harry herceg vasárnap töltötte be 40. életévét, és a királyi család hivatalos közösségimédia-fiókján tette közzé jókívánságait. Az elmúlt évben még csak utalás sem történt a herceg születésnapjára, ezért a brit sajtó munkatársai mindezt úgy értékelték, hogy a királyi család és Harry kapcsolatában javulás következett be − írta meg a Deadline . 🎂 Wishing The Duke of Sussex a very happy 40th birthday today! pic.twitter.com/sAlSiV9EaZ — The Royal Family (@RoyalFamily) September 15, 2024 Harry herceg legutóbbi egy temetésre utazott az Egyesült Királyságba, de akkor sem apjával, III. Károly királlyal, sem bátyjával, Vilmos herceggel sem találkozott. Utoljára februárban beszélt az uralkodóval, amikor III. Károly bejelentette, hogy rákkal kezelik. Londoni lapértesülések szerint a hercegi pártól nem várható személyes üzenet a köszöntésre, azonban a jelenleg Skóciában pihenő király szervezhet megemlékezést Harry herceg születésnapjára. Ugyanakkor a The Times beszámolt arról, hogy a királyi családtagoknak „meg kell egyezniük egymással. Ez a patthelyzet nem mehet így tovább. Az emberek türelmetlenek lesznek, hogy senki sem próbálja ezt helyrehozni” − utalt ezzel a lap a királyi családon belüli korábbi vitákra. Kövesse az Indexet Facebookon is! Követem!

title: „Hupterror“ am Tag und in der Nacht: Parkende Autos lösen Konflikt zwischen Bürgern aus
creator: Manuela Schauer
content: An der Badstraße in Bad Kohlgrub gibt‘s Knatsch unter den Bürgern. Wegen der parkenden Autos am Straßenrand sorgt eine Gruppe für lautstarken Protest. Die schlichtenden Gespräche fruchteten nur teilweise. Anton Fend reicht’s. Und zwar gewaltig. Denn seit ein paar Wochen treibt es ihm die Zornesröte ins Gesicht. Verursacht durch einen Konflikt, der sich an der Badstraße abspielt. Der 57-Jährige verleiht der ganzen Situation einen Namen: „Das ist Hupterror.“ Von Bad Kohlgrubern gegen Bad Kohlgruber. Auslöser für den Zwist ist die Parkregelung. Während im Winter Halteverbot herrscht, dürfen im Sommer, von Mai bis Ende Oktober, Fahrzeuge an der stark frequentierten Straße Richtung Hörnle-Schwebebahn abgestellt werden. Eine Möglichkeit, die manche Anwohner nutzen – selbst, wenn sie über eine Garage verfügen. Teilweise auch, um den Verkehr etwas auszubremsen. Was einer Gruppe von Einheimischen offensichtlich ein Dorn im Auge zu sein scheint. „Sie stören sich daran, weil sie dort warten müssen, wenn Gegenverkehr kommt“, meint Bürgermeister Franz Degele (Freie Wähler). Ihre Reaktion ist kaum zu glauben: Sie hupen, immer, wenn dort ein Wagen steht. An einem Wochenende artete das Ganze förmlich aus. Im 20-Minuten-Takt, erzählt Fend, sollen die Beschuldigten die Straße rauf- und runtergefahren sein. Sie hupten entweder pro geparktem Auto oder alternativ während der gesamten Länge der Fahrzeuge. Und das auch zu unchristlichen Zeiten. Nachts um zwei oder morgens um...

title: Apple, iPhone 16 Pro'larda pil değişim fiyatını artırdı
content: Apple, iPhone 16 modellerinin satışa çıkmasıyla birlikte iPhone onarım ve servis sayfasını güncelledi. Ekran, arka cam ve arka kamera için iPhone onarım ücreti değiştirilmezken, batarya değişim fiyatları iPhone 16 Pro’lar için artırıldı. iPhone 16 ön satışta: iPhone 16 Pro Max ön sipariş nasıl verilir? 2 gün önce eklendi iPhone 16 batarya değişim fiyatı ne kadar? Apple’ın iPhone 16 batarya değişimi için alacağı ücret değişmedi. Standart ve Plus modeller için pil değişim ücreti 3.949 TL. Ancak, 16 Pro veya 16 Pro Max batarya değişim fiyatında %20’yi geçen bir artış söz konusu. iPhone 16 Pro veya iPhone 16 Pro Max pil değişim fiyatı 4.779 TL . Bu fiyatlandırma Apple mağazaları için geçerli olmakla birlikte Apple yetkili servis sağlayıcılarında değişiklik gösterebilir. iPhone 16 ekran değişim fiyat listesi iPhone 16’yı yurt dışından satın alanlar, AppleCare+ kapsamında ücretsiz pil değişiminden faydalanabiliyor. Ancak, iPhone’un pil sağlığı %80’in altına düşmüşse bu hizmet geçerli. Xiaomi'den fütüristik su tabancası Xiami ne kadar para verdiyse artık. Uzun süre kaldı reklam diyen mesajlarımızı silmişler. title: Endelig får de ønsket oppfylt: – Har alltid vært drømmen
Mike Heiter macht es sich zwischen Leylas Beinen "gemütlich"
creator: Pauline M.
content: Heiße Urlaubsgrüße von Leyla Lahouar (28) und Mike Heiter (32): Die beiden Turteltauben genießen aktuell noch ein paar Tage im Warmen und versorgen ihre Fans mit Urlaubsbildern aus Antalya. Auf dem neuesten Selfie hat es sich der Reality-TV-Star am Hotel-Pool zwischen den Beinen seiner Liebsten "gemütlich" gemacht: So betitelt Mike jedenfalls den Instagram -Post, auf dem die beiden zusammen auf einer Liege liegen und der Sonnyboy frech in die Kamera grinst. Es ist nicht das erste Mal, dass sie ein eher ungewöhnliches Pärchenbild teilen – Leyla und Mike kennt man als echte Spaßvögel! Dabei ist es ihnen egal, wie es bei der Öffentlichkeit ankommt – diesen Schnappschuss nehmen die meisten aber mit Humor: "Die Geburt eines Mike Heiters – lustig", scherzt ein Nutzer, ein weiterer springt direkt auf den Joke-Zug auf: "Leyla hat ein Riesenbaby geboren." "Verrückte Mäuse, ihr passt so gut zusammen" , schreibt ein anderer, während ein Follower Mikes Lage mit einem Zwinker-Emoji als die "Pole Position" bezeichnet. Die meisten scheinen sich einig: Der 32-Jährige und die Frankfurterin sind "definitiv ein Perfect Match." Nach einem doch etwas holprigen Start kann man sich den Love Island -Star und die ehemalige Bachelor-Kandidatin wohl gar nicht mehr ohne einander vorstellen. Die zwei lernten sich als Kandidaten des diesjährigen Dschungelcamps kennen – nachdem es bei Leyla anscheinend direkt gefunkt hatte, brauchte Mike etwas länger, um sich über seine Gefühle klar zu...

title: Gwizdy po meczu Legia - Raków. Zadecydował jeden gol
creator: Filip Modrzejewski
content: Ósma kolejka Ekstraklasy stała pod znakiem dwóch hitów - w sobotę Lech Poznań rozbił 5:0 aktualnego mistrza Polski Jagiellonię Białystok, a w niedzielne popołudnie Legia Warszawa podejmowała u siebie Raków Częstochowa. To starcie było zapowiadane jako rywalizacja trenerów: kontra jego były asystent Goncalo Feio. - Nie ma meczu przeszłości. To jest teraźniejszość. Wierzę w swoją drużynę, czujemy się dobrze i chcemy to kontynuować - odpowiadał Portugalczyk w wywiadzie przedmeczowym. Goncalo Feio przed tym spotkaniem mógł być spokojniejszy, albowiem jego Legia, mimo że stylem gry nie porywa, to do liderującego Lecha traciła tylko pięć punktów. Tylko w porównaniu do Rakowa, który przy zwycięstwie mógł jedynie zrównać się liczbą punktów ze swoim niedzielnym rywalem. 35 minut nudy na Łazienkowskiej Często hity ekstraklasy okazywały się "kitami" i "meczami dla koneserów", albowiem na murawie nie działo się zbyt wiele i podobnie było tego dnia na Łazienkowskiej w Warszawie. Spotkanie długo było bardzo zamknięte, a obie drużyny nie potrafiły sobie poradzić z defensywnymi zasiekami rywala. Długo sytuacją, która wygenerowała najwięcej emocji był faul Migouela Alfareli. Francuz za swój wślizg otrzymał żółtą kartkę, ale komentatorzy Canal+ mieli wątpliwości, czy nie zasługiwał na bardziej surową karę. Na pierwszy strzał czekaliśmy aż do 35 minut. Wtedy to Rafał Augustyniak postraszył Kacpra Trelowskiego, który był zmuszony do...

title: Palinges. Les Étoiles ont à nouveau brillé au château de Digoine
content: Sur scène et dans les yeux des spectateurs, les étoiles ont à nouveau brillé au château de Digoine, à Palinges, ce week-end. La deuxième édition des Étoiles au château a, cette année encore, tenu toutes ses promesses. Les deux représentations qui se sont déroulées samedi en soirée et dimanche en fin d’après-midi ont rassemblé plus de 2 600 spectateurs. « Les places ont été vendues en l’espace de quelques jours seulement, en mai . Il est vrai que c’est une occasion unique de pouvoir admirer des danseurs étoiles et solistes de l’Opéra de Paris. Il faut savoir que même si on en a les moyens financiers, il est très compliqué d’assister à une représentation à Paris car les places sont rares puisque les ballets ne durent que deux à trois semaines. title: Kübelpflanzen sicher durch Herbst und Winter bringen
creator: Joana Lück
content: Mit dem ersten Nachtfrost beginnt für viele tropische Kübelpflanzen die gefährlichste Zeit des Jahres. Hier erfahren Sie, wie Sie Ihre Pflanzen sicher durch den Winter bringen. Tropische sind wahre Hingucker in jedem Garten oder auf der Terrasse. Doch sobald die Temperaturen sinken, wird es für diese empfindlichen kritisch. Im Oktober wird es langsam Zeit, die Pflanzen ins Winterquartier zu bringen. Mit dem ersten Nachtfrost ist laut für die empfindlichsten Kübelpflanzen wie Engelstrompete (Brugmansia), Zylinderputzer (Callistemon), Rosen-Eibisch (Hibiscus rosa-sinensis), Kerzenstrauch (Cassia) . Diese Pflanzen gilt es nun einzuräumen und in einem idealen Winterquartier unterzubringen. Praktische Ratschläge für die Überwinterung , sollten Sie laut folgende Tipps beachten: Robustere mediterrane Arten Robustere mediterrane Arten wie Oleander und Olive halten kurze Frostperioden bis minus fünf Grad Celsius problemlos aus . Dennoch ist es ratsam, auch diese Pflanzen bei anhaltend niedrigen Temperaturen ins Winterquartier zu bringen. Das Winterquartier sollte auch für die wärmebedürftigen Kübelpflanzen so kühl wie möglich sein, damit sie nicht zu treiben beginnen. Denn so könnten sie geschwächt in die nächste Saison starten. Ideal sind Temperaturen um zehn Grad Celsius. Noch mehr spannende Garten-Themen finden Sie . Ob im Kübel oder ins Freie gepflanzt: Die Olive gehört zwar zu den etwas robusteren Arten, doch muss man auch einen Olivenbaum richtig...

title: Erster Saisonsieg: Zehn Bremer gewinnen in Mainz
creator: unbekannt
content: Dank Derrick Köhn hat Werder in Unterzahl den ersten Saisonsieg gefeiert und damit einen guten Bundesliga-Start in einen sehr guten verwandelt. Die Hanseaten gewannen zum Abschluss des dritten Spieltages 2:1 (1:1) bei Mainz 05, rückten in der Tabelle auf Rang acht vor - und verdarben dem prominenten Augenzeugen Jürgen Klopp ein wenig den Besuch an seiner alten Wirkungsstätte. Durch einen Foulelfmeter von waren die Gäste in der 8. Minute zunächst in Führung gegangen, vor 32.000 Zuschauern in der Mewa-Arena glich Jae-sung Lee noch vor der Pause aus (27.). Doch trotz des Platzverweises für Marco Friedl (60.) konnte Bremen durch Neuzugang Köhn (69.) noch zurückschlagen. Mainz fiel durch die Niederlage auf Platz 15 zurück. Die Toptorjäger der Liga Die Nullfünfer, die ebenfalls mit zwei Remis gestartet waren, verpassten es durch die erste Saisonniederlage zudem, einen Vereinsrekord einzustellen: Bei einem Punktgewinn wären sie saisonübergreifend zum zwölften Mal nacheinander ohne Niederlage geblieben, das war bislang nur im Jahr 2010 gelungen. Zugleich verloren die Rheinhessen erstmals seit Februar wieder im heimischen Stadion, dort hatten sie zuletzt neunmal nacheinander gepunktet. „Die letzte Mannschaft, die in Mainz gewinnen konnte, heißt...?“, hatte Werder-Coach Ole Werner im Vorfeld der Partie augenzwinkernd gefragt - und in Anspielung auf den 20. Spieltag der Vorsaison die Antwort mitgeliefert: „Richtig, Werder Bremen!“ Einen erneuten Bremer Sieg aber wollten...

title: New book dives into the life outside of running for Canadian legend Terry Fox
creator: The Canadian Press
content: When Barbara Adhiya first learned that Terry Fox had run the length of a marathon a day during his journey across Canada, she was shocked. Like most Canadians, Adhiya had known about the icon’s 1980 mission to raise funds for cancer research through a 4,700-mile run from Newfoundland to British Columbia, but not much about Fox’s childhood, the day-to-day grind of his run and his deep connection to his supporters. The editor and writer’s new book, “Hope by Terry Fox,” published this month by ECW Press and Burman Books, explores who Fox was beyond what he called his Marathon of Hope through interviews, journal excerpts, letters and photos. “As Canadians, we adore him for very good reason, and he is our iconic hero,” Adhiya said. “But I think this book allows you to really understand the depth of who he was as a human being.” “This is hope, as Terry Fox would teach you.” Fox, of Port Coquitlam, B.C., was 18 years old when he was diagnosed with bone cancer and had to have his right leg amputated. His personal experience motivated him to raise money for cancer research, a move that took the form of the Marathon of Hope. After months of training, Fox began his cross-country run in St. John’s, N.L., garnering a frenzy of fans and media attention along the way. In her attempt to explore Fox’s journey and his background, Adhiya — a former editor at The Canadian Press, Associated Press and Reuters — conducted more than 50 interviews with people from throughout Fox’s life over the...

title: Lyon. Un voleur de colis interpellé en flagrant délit à Lyon 9e
content: Samedi, aux alentours de 18h, un signalement a été fait à l’encontre d’un individu qui volait des colis dans des boîtes aux lettres privés, au niveau de la rue du Sergent-Michel-Berthet, dans le 9 arrondissement de Lyon. Denn so könnten sie geschwächt in die nächste Saison starten. Ideal sind Temperaturen um zehn Grad Celsius. Noch mehr spannende Garten-Themen finden Sie . Ob im Kübel oder ins Freie gepflanzt: Die Olive gehört zwar zu den etwas robusteren Arten,...

title: Doa Nabi Muhammad saat Kecil
creator: Muhammad Hafil
content: REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, MAKKAH --Abu Thalib bin Abdul Muthalib, paman yang mengasuh Rasulullah di masa kecil melaksanakan hak anak saudaranya dengan sepenuhnya dan menganggap seperti anaknya sendiri. Mengutip buku Sirah Nabawiyah karya Syaikh Shafiyyurahman Al Mubarakfur bahkan Abu Thalib lebih mendahulukan kepentingan beliau daripada anak-anaknya sendiri, mengkhususkan perhatian dan penghormatan. Hingga berumur lebih dari empat puluh tahun beliau mendapatkan kehormatan di sisi Abu Thalib, hidup di bawah penjagaannya, rela menjalin persahabatan dan bermusuhan dengan orang lain demi membela diri beliau. Ada satu kisah mukjizat sebelum Muhammad menjadi nabi dan rasul. Saat itu dia masih anak-anak tetapi doanya makbul ketika Makkah dilanda kemarau dan kekeringan, seketika hujan turun. Ibnu Asakir mentakhrij dari Julhumah bin Arfathah, dia berkata "ketika aku tiba di Makkah, orang-orang sedang dilanda musim paceklik. Orang-orang Quraisy berkata, "Wahai Abu Thalib, lembah sedang kekeringan dan kemiskinan melanda. Marilah kita berdoa meminta hujan." Maka Abu Thalib keluar bersama seorang anak kecil, yang seolah-olah wajahnya adalah matahari yang membawa mendung, yang menampakkan awan sedang berjalan pelan-pelan. Di sekitar Abu Thalib juga ada beberapa anak kecil lainnya. Dia memegang anak kecil itu dan menempelkan punggungnya ke dinding Ka'bah. Jari-jemarinya memegangi anak itu. Langit tadinya bersih dari mendung. tiba-tiba saja mendung itu datang dari segala penjuru. lalu menurunkan...

title: Svona er hægt að nota ferskar sítrónur til margra hluta
creator: Pressan
content: Sítrónusafi er tilvalinn til að fjarlægja ryð. Ef þú þarft til dæmis að fjarlægja ryð af ostaskera þarftu bara að kreista sítrónusafa í skál, þannig að safinn flæði yfir ryðblettinn. Láttu ostaskerann liggja í vökvanum í 5 til 10 mínútur og síðan þværðu ostaskerann upp í höndum. Það er hægt að nota sítrónusafa til aflita hár. Það er bara að setja sítrónusafa í úðaflösku og blanda með volgu vatni. Síðan er að sprauta þessu í hárið og setjast út í sólina í um eina klukkustund til að fá sem mest áhrif af blöndunni. Sítrónur eru fullar af vítamínum og mjög næringarríkar. Þær eru því tilvaldar til að hreinsa húðina. Safinn hreinsar húðina og fjarlægir húðorma . Það er hægt að fjarlægja kalk með sítrónusafa ef þú glímir við kalk á flísum eða blöndunartækjum. Það eina sem þarf er að nudda hálfri sítrónu á fletina þar til safinn er búinn úr henni. Sýran í safanum brýtur kalkið niður og sem bónus færðu góða lykt. En það þarf að hafa í huga að kalkið í fúgunum verður einnig fyrir áhrifum af þessu en það er hægt að koma í veg fyrir það með því að bleyta þær áður en verkið hefst. Einnig þarf að hafa í huga að það eru ekki allir fletir sem þola sýru. Sítrónusafi eyðir lykt og hentar til dæmis vel til að þrífa skurðarbretti. Stráðu smá salti á það, nuddaðu hálfri sítrónu og láttu liggja í nokkrar mínútur. Þetta fjarlægir bletti og lykt. Sítrónusafinn má ekki liggja of lengi á því þá verða áhrifin...

title: Beginn einer „neuen Ära“: Colnrader Feuerwehrhaus offiziell eingeweiht
creator: Holger Rinne
content: Beginn einer „neuen Ära“: Colnrader Feuerwehrhaus offiziell eingeweiht Lange hatten sie darauf warten müssen, nun durften die Feuerwehrleute in Colnrade endlich die Einweihung ihres neuen Feuerwehrhauses feiern. Der Weg dahin war von Problemen geprägt. Colnrade – „Der Neubau eines Feuerwehrhauses ist so ziemlich das Spannendste, was ein Feuerwehrangehöriger erleben kann“, sagte Colnrades Ortsbrandmeister Marvin Hartje am Freitagabend zu Beginn seiner Rede. Bereits im Juni hatten die Brandbekämpfer ihr neues Domizil bezogen. Nun wurde es im Rahmen einer Feierstunde offiziell an sie übergeben. Hartje begrüßte zahlreiche Ehrengäste, darunter Vertreter aus der Verwaltung, dem Gemeinderat und vor allem die Abordnungen der benachbarten Wehren wie Twistringen, Goldenstedt, Lutten, Visbek, Rechterfeld, Düngstrup und Wildeshausen. Die Goldenstedter Kameraden haben überdies sogar die Bewirtung übernommen. Bereits 2015 habe sein Vorgänger Carsten Lüllmann den Antrag für einen Ersatzbau gestellt, weil die Situation am alten Standort am Dorfgemeinschaftshaus immer schwieriger wurde und viele Vorschriften sowie Vorgaben nicht mehr erfüllt werden konnten, führte Hartje weiter aus. Obwohl niemand aus der Verwaltung oder Politik an der Notwendigkeit eines Neubaus gezweifelt hat, folgte eine fast unendliche Geschichte mit öffentlichen und nicht öffentlichen Debatten. „Heute sind wir einfach nur froh, hier stehen zu können. Mit dem Gebäude beginnt für die Kameraden der...

title: Aufsteiger HSG Lauf/Heroldsberg fehlt am Ende das Stehvermögen
creator: redaktion@pegnitz-zeitung.de (Redaktion PZ)
content: Rothenburg/Lauf - Liga-Neuling HSG Lauf/Heroldsberg präsentiert sich bei der Saisoneröffnung beim TSV Rothenburg zunächst auf Augenhöhe und liegt zur Halbzeit knapp vorn. Doch dann drehen die Gastgeber auf. Die Kulisse war schon mal regionalligawürdig und für die Spieler des Aufsteigers für eine Liga-Partie mehr als ungewohnt: Rund 420 Zuschauer erlebten in der Rothenburger Mehrzweckhalle das Eröffnungsspiel der Regionalligasaison 24/25, in dem der TSV Rothenburg die HSG Lauf/Heroldsberg empfing. Der letztlich zu Buche stehende 39:31 (16:17)-Heimsieg der Rothenburger fiel am Ende vielleicht etwas zu deutlich aus, nachdem die Gäste über weite Strecken mehr als gut mithielten, bevor sie am Ende deutlich einknickten. Der Rothenburger Neu-Trainer Andreas Trabold konnte beim Personal aus dem Vollen schöpfen, dazu sorgte das zahlreiche Rothenburger Publikum für heiße Heimspielatmosphäre. Für den ersten kleinen Dämpfer sorgte zwar HSG-Torjäger Jens Schindler, der mit dem ersten Regionalligator in der HSG-Geschichte für die Gästeführung sorgte. Doch beflügelt von der Stimmung auf den Rängen legten die Hausherren dann gleich gut los und so stand es nach vier Spielminuten 4:1 für den TSV. Doch dann kam ein Bruch ins Spiel der Tauberstädter und der Aufsteiger startete nach dem 4:2 durch Daniel Laugner in seine starke Phase. Teilweise haarsträubende Abspielfehler der Hausherren ermöglichten den Gästen zunächst durch das 6:6 (12. Minute) von Lukas Reisinger den...

title: New book dives into the life outside of running for Canadian legend Terry Fox
creator: The Canadian Press
content: When Barbara Adhiya first learned that Terry Fox had run the length of a marathon a day during his journey across Canada, she was shocked. Like most Canadians, Adhiya had known about the icon’s 1980 mission to raise funds for cancer research through a 4,700-mile run from Newfoundland to British Columbia, but not much about Fox’s childhood, the day-to-day grind of his run and his deep connection to his supporters. The editor and writer’s new book, “Hope by Terry Fox,” published this month by ECW Press and Burman Books, explores who Fox was beyond what he called his Marathon of Hope through interviews, journal excerpts, letters and photos. “As Canadians, we adore him for very good reason, and he is our iconic hero,” Adhiya said. “But I think this book allows you to really understand the depth of who he was as a human being.” “This is hope, as Terry Fox would teach you.” Fox, of Port Coquitlam, B.C., was 18 years old when he was diagnosed with bone cancer and had to have his right leg amputated. His personal experience motivated him to raise money for cancer research, a move that took the form of the Marathon of Hope. After months of training, Fox began his cross-country run in St. John’s, N.L., garnering a frenzy of fans and media attention along the way. In her attempt to explore Fox’s journey and his background, Adhiya — a former editor at The Canadian Press, Associated Press and Reuters — conducted more than 50 interviews with people from throughout Fox’s life over the...

title: Staying safe on transit: White Rock RCMP co-host safety seminar
creator: Tricia Weel
content: Have you thought about using public transit to get to work? School? A concert? Sporting event or game? Maybe you’ve thought about it, but aren’t really sure it’s safe or you wonder if there were to be a problem happen, if you would be able to get help? There are safety features on the bus and SkyTrain as well at bus stops and SkyTrain stations, and to ensure everyone knows about them and how to use them, White Rock RCMP is hosting a public transit safety seminar on Thursday evening, Sept. 26, with a special presentation from Metro Vancouver Transit Police Officers. There will be discussions and explanations on how to use transit safety features. Metro Vancouver Transit Police as well as local RCMP officers will be available to answer any questions you have, a White Rock RCMP release notes. "While interacting with community members, we were asked to host a joint safety session with Metro Vancouver Transit Police in the evening, allowing commuters and students the opportunity to attend," said White Rock RCMP Const. Chantal Sears. "We agree that this is a great opportunity to educate our residents, and we look forward to an engaging evening September 26." The safety seminar will be held at the White Rock Community Centre, 15154 Russell Avenue, at 6:30 p.m. The all-ages seminar is free to attend, no registration requirerd.

title: Passenger ordered to pay more than $5,000 in fuel costs after flight diverted due to bad behavior
creator: By Lilit Marcus, CNN
content: A problematic airline passenger has been hit with an unusual form of punishment – he has to pay back the airline for the cost of fuel. According to the Australian Federal Police, a then-32-year-old man from Western Australia was disruptive on a flight headed from Perth to Sydney. As a result, the plane had to turn around and go back to Perth, which meant that the pilot was forced to dump some fuel to land. Now, the passenger has been ordered to pay $8,630 AUD ($5,806 USD) back to the airline to cover the cost of the wasted fuel. The Perth Magistrate Court also fined him $6,055, meaning that his mid-air misbehavior has a total price tag of $11,861 – likely many times higher than whatever he spent on the ticket. A plane leaves Sydney Airport in Australia. “This incident should serve as a warning that criminal behavior on board can come at a heavy cost to the offender,” Shona Davis, the AFP’s Acting Superintendent, said in a statement. “It’s far simpler to obey the directions of airline staff than cause unnecessary issues, which can end up hitting you in the hip pocket.” Although the flight happened on Sept. 25, 2023, it has taken about a year for the case against the unruly passenger to work its way through the Australian legal system. Neither the man nor the airline was publicly named, nor was it specified exactly what he did to earn such a hefty penalty. The passenger pleaded guilty to one count of disorderly behavior on an aircraft and one count of failure to comply with...

title: بعد القبض على من قام بدفن جثة الأفريقي.. الأجهزة الأمنية بأبين توضح ملابسات دفن جثة أفريقي في منطقة الجوف بلودر
content: توصلت الأجهزة الأمنية بمحافظة أبين من قوات الأمن والحزام الأمني وبعد متابعات حثيثة وتوجيهات مباشرة من قبل مدير أمن المحافظة وحسب البلاغ العملياتي بتاريخ 13 / 9 / 2024م الذي يفيد عن وجود جثة مجهولة مدفونة في منطقة الجوف غرب مديرية لودر إلى اكتشاف ملابسات هذه الجريمة بعد القبض على الجاني المدعو/(ح ، س ، خ) . حيث جاء اكتشاف تلك الجريمة بعد نزول قوة أمنية مشتركة من قبل قوات الأمن والحزام الأمني بقيادة القائد/ بليغ دهمس والقائد شابص العود وتطويق مكان وجود الجثة حتى تم نزول فريق الأدلة الجنائية والبحث الجنائي الذي بدورهم نقلوا الجثة إلى مستشفى لودر ومنها إلى محافظة عدن وبعد البحث والتحري اتضح أن الجثة لوافد أفريقي، بعدها واصلت الأجهزة الأمنية في جمع المعلومات والرصد والتتبع حتى وصلت أيضاً على معرفة من قام بدفنه والقبض عليه يوم امس تاريخ 14/ 9/ 2024م بالقرب من مخيم النازحين على الخط الساحلي من قبل قوات طوارئ أمن لودر بقيادة القائد/ شابص العود والذي اعترف بذلك مببراً على ان المجني عليه كان يعاني من مرض وتوفي وتم دفنه بالتواصل مع اسرته، ولكن الأجهزة لم تكتفي بتلك الاعترافات حتى ظهور تقرير الأدلة الجنائية عن سبب الوفاة ومعرفة هل هناك عنصر جنائي بذلك وكذلك التواصل مع الجهات المختصة للتواصل مع أسرته لتنال أسرته كافة حقوقه ومتابعة من تسبب بوفاته ودفنه بشكل مريب بعيدا عن علم الأجهزة الأمنية وهذا جرم آخر سيحاسب عليه كل من تسبب بذلك سوى من تم القبض عليه او من سيتم ملاحقتهم بعد اعترافات من قام بدفنه . الجدير ذكره أن هذه الحادثة تعد الثانية التي كشفتها الأجهزة الأمنية بعد وجود جثة مدفونة مماثلة في نفس المنطقة لوافدة أفريقية وجدت مقتوله برصاص قبل عامين...

title: Australian energy industry report slams Greens gas plan
creator: AAP
content: A Greens’ plan to halt to investment in gas supply in Australia would “devastate the economy”, a report commissioned by the peak body for the country’s oil and gas industry says. The report by consultancy EnergyQuest on behalf of Australian Energy Producers, said “blackouts loom for millions of homes and businesses in southeastern Australia in as little as two years” if the Greens’ policy was enacted. The Greens want an immediate ban on the build of new coal, oil and gas infrastructure in what the party says will transition the economy to zero carbon energy while maintaining a safe climate. But the Greens platform on gas would lead to manufacturers closing, and long-term Queensland export contracts being cancelled, according to the report. “A halt to investment in gas supply would devastate the economy. Gas for east coast electricity could be interrupted within two years and would run out by 2029,” it said. Australian Energy Producers chief executive Samantha McCulloch said investment in new gas supply was urgently needed to meet domestic demand. “The Future Gas Strategy is clear that the Australian economy will need gas to 2050 and beyond,” Ms McCulloch said in a statement. The industry-backed report comes after the federal government this month said emissions from coal and gas could grow by 1.7 billion tonnes by 2050 if their use was extended another 15 years. Under the government’s strategy for gas, the fossil fuel will be in the energy mix beyond 2050, when Australia is...

title: Kırıkkale’de patates, domates ve soğan hasadı başladı!
content: Kırıkkale'de çiftçiler, emeklerinin karşılığını almak için toprağa düştü ve patates, domates, soğan gibi ürünlerin hasadına başladı. Kırıkkale'de yaşanan şiddetli kuraklık, bölgedeki tarım üretimine büyük zarar verdi. Patates, domates ve soğan gibi temel ürünlerde yüzde 50'ye varan verim kayıpları yaşanırken, çiftçiler, tarlalarını işleyecek işçi bulmakta büyük zorluk çekiyor. Günlük bin lirayı aşan yüksek yevmiyelere rağmen işçi bulunamaması, üreticileri gelecek yıllar için endişelendiriyor. Yağışların az olması nedeniyle tarlalarından bekledikleri verimi alamadıklarını kaydeden çiftçiler, işçi bulamamaları durumunda gelecek yıllarda ürün yetiştiremeyeceklerini ifade etti. "ÜRÜNLERİ ARACIYA DÜŞÜK FİYATTAN VERİYORUZ!" Salçalık domatesin kilosunu 2 TL'den, sofralık domatesin kilosunu ise 5 TL'den sattıklarını aktaran çiftçi Ahmet Doğan, "Soğan ve patatesi aracıya 5 liradan veriyoruz. İşçi bulmakta zorlanıyoruz, günlük ücretler 800 ila bin 300 lira arasında değişiyor. Böyle devam ederse, ileriki senelerde ekim yapamayabiliriz" diye konuştu. "5 TON ÜRÜN ALIRKEN, BU YIL 2 TON ÜRÜN ALDIK!" Mustafa Bostan ise kuraklık sebebiyle önemli ölçüde verim kaybı yaşadıklarını dile getirerek, "Normalde dekar başına 5 ton ürün alırken, bu yıl 2-3 ton civarında kaldık. Kuraklık olmasaydı verim daha yüksek olurdu, belki de zararımız daha az olurdu" ifadelerini kullandı.

title: اتفاق ویژه برای پرسپولیس در عربستان/ الاهلی - پرسپولیس در سرتاسر دنیا پخش زنده می‌شود!
content: به گزارش خبرورزشی، پرسپولیس دوشنبه شب در حالی نخستین مسابقه خود در لیگ نخبگان آسیا را انجام می‌دهد که پوشش تلویزیونی این مسابقه در نوع خود بسیار گسترده و قابل ملاحظه است. تا ساعت ۱۷ روز یکشنبه علاوه بر شبکه ورزش ایران، ۸ شبکه ماهواره‌ای متعلق به کشورهایی نظیر عربستان، قطر، امارات، ژاپن و... نیز پخش زنده بازی الاهلی - پرسپولیس را در کنداکتور خود قرار داده بودند. نکته مهم اینجاست که با توجه به پوشش ماهواره‌ای این شبکه‌ها، مسابقه مذکور تقریباً در تمام مناطق کره زمین به صورت زنده قابل مشاهده است. در مورد بازی استقلال مقابل الغرافه قطر نیز تا عصر یکشنبه علاوه بر شبکه سه ایران، پنج کانال تلویزیونی خارجی هم پخش زنده آن را در دستور کار قرار داده بودند. دیدارهایی که امیدواریم هر دو با برتری نمایندگان کشورمان به پایان برسد و قدم اول در لیگ نخبگان آسیا را مقتدرانه برداریم.

title: NON TUTTO ANDRA’ IN PORTO - DOPO IL PATTEGGIAMENTO DI TOTI, LE CONCESSIONI PORTUALI DI ALDO SPINELLI SULL’AREA EX CARBONILE E DEL TERMINAL RINFUSE SONO A RISCHIO: TRE ISPETTORI DEL MINISTERO DELLE INFRASTRUTTURE DOVRANNO VALUTARNE LA LEGITTIMITÀ – CERTO, SONO SEMPRE STATI NOMINATI DA SALVINI E DAL SUO VICE RIXI, FAN DI TOTI E DEL SUO ATTIVISMO SUL PORTO, MA SONO PUR SEMPRE ALTI DIRIGENTI DELLO STATO DI PROVATA ESPERIENZA...
content: Il sindaco nonché candidato alla Regione Marco Bucci, appena saputo della decisione di Giovanni Toti di patteggiare la pena per corruzione ha detto: “Felice che tutte le pratiche siano state fatte correttamente”. E la frase “le concessioni sono legittime” è diventata in poche ore il mantra di tutto il centro destra. In realtà, a iniziare dal rinnovo trentennale della concessione per il Terminal Rinfuse fino ad arrivare all’occupazione abusiva dell’ex Carbonile o al riempimento di calata Concenter, nessuno può al momento sostenere con assoluta certezza che siano atti legittimi. Proprio in queste ore, infatti, sta completando il suo lavoro di analisi dei dossier finiti al centro dell’inchiesta penale, la “Commissione ispettiva sulle procedure di rilascio degli atti di concessione demaniale” dell’Autorità di Sistema portuale di Genova e Savona. Tre i componenti: Salvatore Pilato, magistrato della Corte dei Conti; Patrizia Scarchilli, direttore generale al Mit per il mare; il Capitano di Vascello Giuseppe Strano, ex comandante della Capitaneria di Fiumicino. Certo, sono stati tutti scelti dal ministro delle infrastrutture Matteo Salvini e dal suo vice Edoardo Rixi i quali, delle strategie portuali di Toti e dell’ex presidente del porto Paolo Emilio Signorini sono sempre stati appassionati sostenitori (per non parlare di Aldo Spinelli che festeggiava Bucci e Salvini sul palco delle comunali 2022) ma è altrettanto vero che si tratta di tre alti dirigenti dello Stato di...

title: Hanna Howell confirma su ruptura con Peso Pluma y le envía fuerte mensaje: VIDEO
creator: Alejandra Bedoya
content: Estados Unidos.- La ruptura entre Peso Pluma y Hanna Howell ha dejado de ser un simple rumor, pues a través de un video compartido en redes sociales la modelo e influencer ha confirmado el fin de su relación y ha enviado un contundente mensaje a su ahora expareja, con quien estuvo saliendo oficialmente por alrededor de tres meses. Hace poco la joven originaria de Arkansas, Estados Unidos, llamó a atención con un misterioso mensaje en sus historias de Instagram, pues pareció indicar que su relación Hassan Emilio Kabande Laija no estaba bien, ya que escribió: “Esto que llamamos vida no siempre es fácil y el mundo puede ser cruel. Seguiré teniendo un corazón puro, real y genuino, incluso cuando la gente lo lastime”. Te puede interesar: ¿Se acabó el amor? Novia de Peso Pluma desata rumores de ruptura tras emotivo mensaje Los comentarios y especulaciones respecto al tema no se hicieron esperar, pero no fue sino hasta ahora que Howell decidió abordar la polémica, ya que con un video en TikTok confirmó su ruptura con Peso Pluma y reveló que le devolvió todos sus regalos al cantante, los cuales le hizo llegar en una caja y con una nota en la que se leía “for the next one” (para la siguiente). Howell agregó que al día siguiente le regresaron la caja de sus pertenencias, pero la nota ya no estaba. Además, se abstuvo de compartir detalles sobre el motivo de su ruptura. Encuentra el video DANDO CLIC AQUÍ. Sigue más noticias como esta en nuestra sección de...

title: WTA Hua Hin Day 1 Predictions Including Katie Volynets vs Clara Tauson
creator: Jordan Reynolds, Last Word On Sports
content: The Asian swing on the WTA Tour begins on Monday with two tournaments–one of these in Hua Hin, which is being held for a second time this year due to a vacant spot on the calendar. The entry list is strong for the event despite six players withdrawing . Seven matches are scheduled for Day 1 in Hua Hin. We at LWOT predict all the matches on the slate here and in a separate article, including Katerina Siniakova vs Arina Rodionova . WTA Hua Hin Day 1 Predictions Alycia Parks vs Laura Siegemund Head-to-head: First meeting Siegemund possesses a playing style that Parks does not enjoy facing. She is crafty and emphasizes keeping the ball in play and mixing up the paces, countering the American’s power-based game. The German’s biggest issue is that this will be her second singles match since Wimbledon over two months ago. That rustiness could be damaging, but she is still backed to overcome Parks in three sets. Prediction: Siegemund in 3 Tamara Zidansek vs Tatiana Prozorova Head-to-head: Prozorova 1-0 Zidansek This is an excellent opportunity for two players currently ranked outside the Top 200. Prozorova played outstandingly in qualifying to reach the main draw, dropping only three games in four sets. Zidansek did not have to play in the qualifying, but that could work against her in this matchup. Prozorova’s momentum from her excellent performances in the qualifiers makes her a slight favorite to progress in Hua Hin. Prediction: Prozorova in 2 Katie Volynets vs Clara Tauson...

title: FK Jedinstvo Franca: Sve je rečeno i sve je viđeno
creator: portal@dan.co.me (D.P.)
content: Tuzanima je priznat pogodak koji to nije bio, a ružna slika iz Bijelog Polja obišla je cijeli svijet. Danas se putem Fejsbuka oglasilo i Jedinstvo, a u saopštenji kluba sa sjevera Crne Gore kaže se: -Odlična igra naših momaka, odlično pripremljena utakmica od strane stručnog štaba, podrška sa tribina iskrenih ljubitelja fudbala iako je velika kiša bila, ostaće u sjenci skandalozne sudijske odluke... Sve je rečeno i sve je viđeno, ovaj snimak i ova odluka obišlli su već region... Izvinjenje sudija i priznanje greške na poluvremenu nama, ovim momcima i publici ne znači ama baš ništa... Šta mi imamo od toga? Šta je opravdanje za lose suđenje tokom cijelog meča, ofsajde, faulove i ostalo...? Oštećeni smo na pravdi Boga... a ničim to nismo zaslužili... Naravno da smo reagovali gdje treba i kako treba, iako je svaka reakcija suvišna ovdje... Još jednom čestitke našim momcima, pokazali su kako se igra i u ovakvim utakmicama i ovakvim situacijama – kaže se u saopštenju Jedinstva.

title: Rohit Shara will not leave mumbai indians in ipl 2025 appeal pragyan ojha
creator: Saurav Kumar
content: आईपीएल 2025 की मेगा नीलामी की उल्टी गिनती शुरू होने के साथ ही, भारत के पूर्व क्रिकेटर प्रज्ञान ओझा ने मुंबई इंडियंस के स्टार खिलाड़ी रोहित शर्मा के भविष्य के बारे में अपनी राय व्यक्त की है. ओझा ने सलामी बल्लेबाज से फ्रेंचाइजी के साथ बने रहने का आग्रह किया है, उन्होंने उनके महत्वपूर्ण प्रभाव और प्रशंसकों और प्रायोजकों के बीच उनकी वफादारी का हवाला दिया है. मुंबई इंडियंस (एमआई) के साथ रोहित शर्मा का भविष्य चर्चा का विषय बन गया है, क्योंकि पिछले सीजन से पहले उन्हें कप्तानी से मुक्त कर दिया गया था और उनकी जगह हार्दिक पांड्या को कप्तान बनाया गया था. तब से, शर्मा और एमआई प्रबंधन के बीच संभावित दरार के बारे में अफवाहें फैल रही हैं, जिससे अटकलें लगाई जा रही हैं कि वह एक नई टीम में शामिल होने की सोच रहे हैं. रोहित नहीं छोड़ेंगे मुंबई इंडियंस ओझा, जिन्होंने शर्मा के करियर को करीब से देखा है, उनका मानना ​​है कि क्रिकेटर का मुंबई इंडियंस के साथ जुड़ना पारस्परिक रूप से फायदेमंद रहा है. प्रज्ञान ओझा ने आईएएनएस से कहा, “मुझे लगता है कि फ्रेंचाइज क्रिकेट राज्य और अंतरराष्ट्रीय क्रिकेट से बिल्कुल अलग है, क्योंकि इसके नियम बिल्कुल अलग हैं. लेकिन व्यक्तिगत रूप से, अगर आप मुझसे पूछें, तो मैंने रोहित शर्मा को इस तरह के मुकाम तक बढ़ते देखा है. इसलिए मुझे लगता है कि अगर वह मुंबई इंडियंस के साथ बने रहते हैं, तो यह बहुत अच्छा होगा, क्योंकि रोहित शर्मा के बहुत सारे प्रशंसक और प्रायोजक हैं, क्योंकि वे उनसे जुड़े हुए हैं. लेकिन यह फ्रेंचाइज और खिलाड़ी के साथ-साथ नियमों पर भी निर्भर करता है.” प्रज्ञान ने रोहित से की खास अपील आईपीएल 2024 सीज़न में रोहित शर्मा का प्रदर्शन टीम के लिए उनके महत्व को और भी...

title: Esperanza Aguirre y la 'andalufobia' o cómo se sigue usando el acento del sur como insulto político
creator: Antonio Ruiz Valdivia
content: Antonio Ruiz Valdivia “Dice la ministra de Hacienda que lo que dise es lo que dise...” La expresidenta de la Comunidad de Madrid Esperanza Aguirre se pone a reír delante de una decena de micrófonos. Trataba de imitar el acento sevillano de la vicepresidenta, María Jesús Montero , como arma política. Buscaba ridiculizarla, sin argumentos, sólo por su forma de hablar. Cayendo en la más absoluta andalufobia, con la idea de menospreciar a los ciudadanos del sur por su manera de hablar vinculándolos con la incultura y la pobreza.
