title: Panna News: पन्ना में धवारी बांध में डूबे MBBS के 2 स्टूडेंट, डैम में फिसले दोस्त को बचाने में गई दूसरे की जान
content: पन्नाः मध्य प्रदेश के पन्ना जिले में रविवार शाम दर्दनाक हादसा हुआ है। दोस्त के घूमने गए एमबीबीएस कर रहे दो छात्रों की जलाशय में डूबने से मौत हो गई है। पुलिस थाने के प्रभारी ने घटना के बारे में यह जानकारी दी। अधिकारी ने बताया कि यह घटना जिला मुख्यालय से लगभग 40 किलोमीटर दूर अजयगढ़ कस्बे के पास धवारी बांध में हुई। अजयगढ़ निवासी कृष्णा गुप्ता (20 साल) और उमरिया निवासी अरविंद प्रजापति (19 साल) की डूबकर मौत हो गई। दोनों मृतक छात्र इंदौर में स्थित महात्मा गांधी मेमोरियल (एमजीएम) मेडिकल कॉलेज में एमबीबीएस की पढ़ाई कर रहे थे। हादरे के बारे में जानकारी देते हुए अजयगढ़ पुलिस थाना के प्रभारी रवि जादौन ने बताया कि उनके सहपाठी अभिषेक बैरवा (19 साल) को बचा लिया गया है। रेस्क्यू किया गया छात्र राजस्थान के पीपलखेड़ा का रहने वाला था। जादौन ने बताया कि बैरवा और प्रजापति अजयगढ़ में कृष्णा गुप्ता के घर मिलने आए थे। यहीं से तीनों घूमने के लिए धवारी बांध के पास गए हुए थे। हादसे की जांच जारी थानाधिकारी ने बताया कि शवों को डैम से बाहर निकलवाकर अजयगढ़ के सरकारी हॉस्पिटल में पोस्टमार्टम के लिए भिजवा दिया गया है। रवि जादौन ने बताया कि छात्रों की मौत कैसे हुई, इसका पता लगाने के लिए आगे की जांच जारी है। Panna Road Accident: पन्ना में स्वास्थ्य विभाग के वाहन के साथ सड़क हादसा, पुलिया से टकराकर पलटा, ड्राइवर की मौत, 3 घायल कैसे हुआ हादसा पुलिस सूत्रों से मिली जानकारी के अनुसार छात्रों की मौत उस समय हुई जब उनमें से एक छात्र चप्पल साफ करते समय पानी में फिसल गया। वहीं, उसको बचाने के लिए उसके साथियों ने बांध में छलांग लगा दी। हालांकि वे उसको बचाने में असफल रहे जिससे छात्रों की मौत हो गई।

title: الولايات المتحدة تدعو الهند إلى حظر شبكة RT.. ونيودلهي "تدير ظهرها"
content: وطالب المسؤولون الأمريكيون نظراءهم الهنود بإلغاء اعتمادات RT وتصنيف صحفييها بموجب "قانون البعثات الأجنبية". وأشارت صحيفة The Hindu، إلى أن وزارة الخارجية الهندية التزمت الصمت بشأن هذه المطالب، وقال مسؤولون حكوميون إن المناقشة حول العقوبات لت تمت بأي صلة بالهند. وقال السفير الهندي السابق لدى روسيا وفرنسا كانوال سيبل إن تصرفات الولايات المتحدة لتقليص ورقابة المنظمات الإعلامية الروسية أضرت "بقيم أمريكا"، حتى مع إعلان الحكومة الأمريكية أنها تدعم حرية التعبير. وأضاف سيبل: "سوف يُنظر إلى هذا باعتباره ازدواجية في المعايير من جانب دول الجنوب العالمي التي تحاول استهدافها. ومن الواضح أن الهند لن تستجيب لمثل هذه الضغوط الأمريكية". وأكدت مصادر لصحيفة The Hindu أن القضية نوقشت في اجتماع بين مسؤولين من السفارة الأمريكية ووزارة الخارجية في نيودلهي خلال الأسبوعين الماضيين. وقال كريستوفر إلمز المتحدث باسم السفارة الأمريكية في الهند: "تترك حكومة الولايات المتحدة لحكومة الهند وحكومات الدول الأخرى اتخاذ قراراتها الخاصة وإجراءات الاعتماد لهذه الكيانات"، مضيفا أن الولايات المتحدة "سترحب بجميع الدول في اتخاذ إجراءات مماثلة لما اتخذته حكومة الولايات المتحدة". ورفضت وزارة الخارجية الهندية التعليق على الطلب الأمريكي، وقال مسؤول إن الأمر "لا يتعلق" بالهند وأشار إلى أن نيودلهي لا تلتزم بالعقوبات الأحادية الجانب التي لم توافق عليها الأمم المتحدة. واتهم وزير الخارجية الأمريكي أنتوني بلينكن يوم الجمعة، قناة RT بالمشاركة في "عمليات سرية" مزعومة للتدخل في شؤون دول أخرى و"المشتريات العسكرية" ، وأعلن فرض عقوبات على ثلاثة هياكل وشخصين على خلفية الاتهامات الموجهة...

title: فردا آخرین مهلت نام نویسی در آزمون کارشناس رسمی دادگستری

title: Após debate, Kamala aumenta vantagem sobre Trump em questões econômicas
content: Uma nova pesquisa realizada após o debate entre Kamala Harris e Donald Trump na semana passada mostrou que a vice-presidente, candidata do Partido Democrata à presidência dos EUA, ampliou a vantagem sobre o adversário republicano em relação às expectativas dos eleitores sobre a gestão da economia do país. Segundo o levantamento feito pelo jornal “Financial Times” e a Universidade Michigan Ross, 44% dos eleitores registrados disseram que confiam em Kamala para administrar a economia do país, enquanto 42% preferiram Trump, que tenta retornar à Casa Branca após a derrota para Joe Biden no pleito de 2020. No mês passado, a vantagem da democrata era de um ponto percentual (42% a 41%). Kamala se saiu ainda melhor entre os eleitores que assistiram ao debate presidencial da última terça-feira, que foi assistido por 67 milhões de americanos. Dos entrevistados que disseram ter acompanhado a maior parte dos 90 minutos do encontro entre os dois candidatos, 48% disseram confiar mais na democrata para gerir a economia, contra 42% de Trump. Por outro lado, o republicano leva a melhor entre aqueles que disseram não ter assistido ao debate, realizado pela rede “ABC”. Segundo o levantamento, neste grupo, 41% acham que Trump faria um melhor trabalho na condução da economia do país, enquanto 35% disseram preferir a candidata democrata. A pesquisa mostra que Harris pode estar conseguindo se distanciar sua imagem do presidente Joe Biden, que tem a gestão da economia má...

title: Nuevo acercamiento de inmigrantes a la valla
content: Nueva tarde de tensión en el perímetro fronterizo . Otros dos grupos de inmigrantes se han acercado a la zona del vallado a primera hora de esta tarde después de duros de enfrentamientos a pedradas entre la carretera de Tánger y Castillejos. Estas entradas han intentado ser repelida por las fuerzas de seguridad. Grupos de estas personas han conseguido alejarse y adentrarse otra vez en los montes al igual que ocurrió esta mañana. Unidades de la Guardia Civil se han desplegado en la zona para evitar la entrada de estas personas que intentaban acercarse a la valla para conseguir su objetivo. La tensión se ha podido palpar a pie de frontera con un intento de entrada que al final no se ha llegado a producir por el trabajo de las fuerzas de seguridad. Una situación muy similar a la que se pudo vivir esta misma mañana , donde las fuerzas de seguridad marroquíes se emplearon a fondo en la zona de finca Berrocal. En estos momentos tanto las fuerzas de seguridad españolas como las marroquíes se encuentran activadas, al objeto de evitar la entrada de estas personas en territorio español después de una noche de autentica tensión en todo el entorno fronterizo, tras el llamamiento hecho en redes sociales para cruzar hasta Ceuta. Tanto en el lado marroquí como en el español se ha agrupado todas las fuerzas de seguridad disponibles. En el caso de España, tanto la Guardia Civil como la Policía Nacional , mientras que en Marruecos se han concentrado miembros de todas las...

title: «Bond bancari europei, industriali e real estate, ecco gli emittenti su cui puntare»
content: Servizio Servizio Contenuto basato su fatti, osservati e verificati dal reporter in modo diretto o riportati da fonti verificate e attendibili. Scopri di più La parola al gestore: M&G Investments «Gli spread si stanno avvicinando ai minimi storici e siamo posizionati in modo difensivo. Tuttavia in questi settori ci sono ancora sacche di valore» di Isabella Della Valle 15 settembre 2024 I punti chiave 3' di lettura Sul mercato obbligazionario che hanno ancora un valore potenziale sono il settore delle banche europee con più alto merito creditizio, i titoli del settore industriale e alcuni emittenti del comparto real estate. Lo spiega in maniera dettagliata Richard Ryan, gestore di M&G Investments. Quali sono i vantaggi di una strategia di credito multi asset in termini di rendimento? La strategia mira a conseguire una sovraperformance di lungo termine compresa tra il 3% e il 5% annuo rispetto alla liquidità e al lordo delle commissioni. In un contesto di mercato con prezzi così elevati, come nel caso attuale, la strategia potrebbe ottenere rendimenti leggermente inferiori rispetto al proprio obiettivo di lungo termine, ma la rotazione verso attività difensive liquide (ad esempio cash, Treasury-Bill, fondi di mercato monetario) ci permetterà di rientrare nel mercato quando se ne presenterà l’occasione. Poiché i mercati finiscono per riprezzarsi, cerchiamo di costruire il rischio nei mercati in calo laddove il prezzo e il rischio dei titoli sono disallineati....

title: הפצוע בפיגוע הדקירה בשער שכם הוא לוחם מג"ב
Florida sheriff tells parents to ‘do your job’ after students allegedly make bogus school threats
content: Fox News Flash top headlines are here. Check out what's clicking on Foxnews.com. A Florida sheriff has called out parents and students after saying his agency spent nearly $21,000 investigating dozens of hoax school threats posted on social media in less than a day. Volusia County Sheriff Mike Chitwood spoke Friday at a news conference alongside Volusia Public Schools officials, describing the situation as "absolutely out of control." Chitwood said that 54 threats were reported to the Fortify Florida app, which allows citizens to report suspicious activity to law enforcement agencies, in less than 24 hours. "That means investigators in the school district have been running around the clock to investigate these tips, which are all turning out to be false. So far, it's cost $21,000 to do these investigations," the sheriff said. GEORGIA HIGH SCHOOL SHOOTING 911 CALLS RELEASED: ‘HIGH CALL VOLUME’ Volusia County Sheriff Mike Chitwood said the investigation into the phony threats cost $21,000. (FOX35 Orlando WOFL) Fox News Digital has reached out to the sheriff's office for more information about the cost of the investigations and how they will be paid. A 13-year-old student and 14-year-old student at Heritage Middle School were arrested and charged with making written threats to kill, a felony, after allegedly posting about committing a school shooting on TikTok and Instagram. A possible third suspect is being investigated. The two students arrested and charged attended Heritage...

title: Última hora sobre Julián Muñoz: vuelve a ser ingresado tras su última entrevista
creator: CLM24
content: Según recoge Lecturas , Julián Muñoz daba una de las entrevistas más esperadas hace dos días en '¡De Viernes!'. El exalcalde de Marbella se sinceraba sobre muchos temas que han marcado su historia, como su reciente boda con Mayte Zaldívar, su noviazgo con Isabel Pantoja o su miedo a morir. Aunque era el gran protagonista, Muñoz no acudió al plató de Santi Acosta y Bea Archidona, sino que Mayte era la encargada de responder a las dudas de los colaboradores. Era entonces cuando la madre de Eloísa y Elia frenaba en seco el programa y afirmaba que Julián no estaba pasando por un buen momento de salud. "Se encuentra en una bajada. Hemos tenido una noticia que lo ha dejado un poco más bajo", comenzaba antes de añadir que "una prueba que no ha dado un buen resultado. No ha sido la que todos queríamos que fuese. No era lo mas deseado por nadie. A lo mejor es normal en el estado que está pero no era lo más deseado". Desde entonces nada se sabía del exalcalde hasta esta tarde cuando 'Fiesta' ha revelado, gracias a la información de Luis Rollán, que Muñoz había vuelto a ser ingresado en el Hospital Internacional de Marbella. Una noticia que ha caído como un jarro de agua fría después de verle reflexionar con tanta coherencia y firmeza hace unos días. Al salir a la luz esta información, Zaldívar ha hablado con una de las colaboradoras del programa de Emma García para aclarar si este giro era más grave que en otras ocasiones. " Cada ingreso es más...

title: Un vlogger român a plecat în Ucraina pentru a vedea cum se trăiește acolo. A rămas uimit de prețuri: „În România se plătește de 3 ori mai mult”
content: Un vlogger român a trăit o experiență fabuloasă, după ce avrut să vadă cum trăiesc ucrainenii. Deși țara a fost sub presiune și război,iar sărăcia a ajuns să o domine, prețurile sunt mai mici ca în România. Cosmin Avram, un vlogger cunoscut a călătorit în Ucrainapentru a doua oară și a vrut să testeze mâncarea, dar să vadă și prețurile la restauranteși supermarketuri. Se pare că românul a rămas plăcut impresionat. „Din păcate, multe magazine sunt închise, cam aceasta estesituația. Am găsit un local drăguț, așa că o să mâncăm. Aici avem sushiPhiladelphia și avocado, somonul arată foarte bine, ghimbir și wasabi. Gata, masa este completă, au venit legumele, supă,supă de pui cu ou și foarte mult mărar. Aici avem carne de vită, arată șimiroase foarte, foarte bine și celebrul suc de portocale. Avem dovlecei, ciuperci,ardei gras, vinete cu un sos pe deasupra. Andreea a mai comandat un mojito. Săavem poftă și bine ați revenit în Ucraina. Haideți să testăm carnea,Andreea o să vină mai aproape să vedem cum e făcută. Perfect. Ia vedeți.Uite, Doamne ferește și nu glumesc. E perfectă. La un preț incredibil, osă vă spunem la final” , a spus vloggerul în filmulețul publicat pe Youtube. „În România cred că se plătește de 3 ori mai mult această masă” Înainte să servească masa larestaurant, Cosmin Avram a spus că deși pare un local de lux, cu prețuriexorbitante, acestea sunt doar aparențe. „Chiar...

title: À Pinsaguel, l’association Mouv’Enfants veut déboulonner la sculpture de l’abbé Pierre
content: Arnaud Gallais, le président de l’association Mouv’Enfants, un mouvement de "survivantes et de survivants" des violences subies dans l’enfance, vient d’écrire au maire de Pinsaguel, Jean-Louis Coll, pour lui demander de rejoindre le mouvement des communes qui ont choisi "d’effacer" la mémoire de l’Abbé Pierre au nom de la lutte contre les abus sexuels. "Nous avons pris connaissance d’une sculpture et d’un buste à l’effigie de l’Abbé Pierre dans votre ville, explique Arnaud Gallais. Au regard des récentes révélations, nous voulons que cette sculpture et ce buste soient retirés". Pour les président de l’association Mouv’Enfants, il n’est plus possible de laisser en l’état les hommages fait au religieux fondateur de la communauté d’Emmaüs. "Si nous ne pouvons effacer ce qu’il a fait, il s’agit par dignité pour les victimes de ne plus honorer publiquement sa mémoire, souligne-t-il. On sait aujourd’hui que le diocèse de Grenoble et des personnes du mouvement Emmaüs avaient connaissance de ces agissements". Arnaud Gallais incite même le maire de Pinsaguel à se rapprocher de la Fondation Abbé Pierre pour les frais générés par cette opération. " Nous souhaitons que ce ne soit pas les contribuables qui payent, mais celles et ceux qui n’ont pas dénoncé ses agissements et vous pouvez compter sur notre soutien dans cette démarche", assure Arnaud Gallais. Le prochain conseil municipal de Pinsaguel devrait débattre de la question...

title: À la fête de l'Humanité, Dominique de Villepin dénonce la stratégie d'Israël face au Hamas
content: Europe 1 / Crédits photo : Bastien OHIER / Hans Lucas via AFP 19h28, le 15 septembre 2024 Invité à la fête de l'Humanité ce dimanche, l'ancien Premier ministre de Jacques Chirac, Dominique de Villepin, a remis en cause la stratégie adoptée par l'État d'Israël pour venir à bout du Hamas. "L'objectif est de faire en sorte que la question palestinienne retourne dans les oubliettes de l'Histoire", a-t-il notamment dénoncé. Le tapis rouge déroulé pour Dominique de Villepin à la fête de l'Humanité . L'ancien Premier ministre de Jacques Chirac, entre 2005 et 2007, a remis en cause la stratégie d' Israël , en guerre contre le mouvement terroriste depuis les attaques du 7 octobre 2023. "Nous sommes dans une stratégie qui donne carte blanche à Israël pour liquider le Hamas. On peut comprendre. Mais liquider le Hamas, ce n'est pas liquider les Palestiniens, ni la question palestinienne", a-t-il affirmé. >> LIRE AUSSI - À la fête de l'humanité, le Nouveau Front populaire confronté au défi d'exister et de durer Dominique de Villepin a poursuivi : "On voit bien derrière que l'objectif est de faire en sorte que la question palestinienne retourne dans les oubliettes de l'Histoire". Avant de souligner que sa "conviction", son "pari", est qu'"au contraire, jamais la question palestinienne n'a été aussi prégnante, incontournable, nécessaire à la création d'un nouvel ordre mondial."

title: Koos Moerenhout ziet ‘dominant’ Nederland maar ook keerzijde: “Dat kan je bekopen in de finale”
creator: Nick Doup
content: Koos Moerenhout kan leven met de zilveren medaille van Olav Kooij na afloop van het EK wielrennen 2024 in Belgisch Limburg. Dat heeft de bondscoach van de Nederlandse ploeg verteld na afloop van de wegwedstrijd in Hasselt. “Het is een EK, maar bijna een wereldkampioenschap voor sprinters”, legt Moerenhout uit voor de camera van WielerFlits . “Maar waar ik vooral trots op ben is de manier waarop onze mannen reden. Ze hebben geprobeerd de koers hard te maken en in handen te nemen. We hebben heel dominant en attractief gekoerst, om de koers zwaar te maken met diverse renners. Dat is gelukt”, aldus Moerenhout. “We hebben een mooie wedstrijd gezien, met helaas niet winst als gevolg, maar wel een mooie tweede plek.” “De mannen waren echt gebrand en zaten supergoed in de wedstrijd. Dan moet je een beetje geluk hebben met die kopgroep van Danny van Poppel en Mathieu van der Poel , die kansrijk leek. Alleen je krijgt niet de ruimte en dan is het parcours net te licht. Mathieu kan dat ook niet alleen, dus we hebben geprobeerd hem te ondersteunen. Dat is gelukt, maar dat we niet winnen is wel een smetje”, stelt de bonds Koos . 17:22 Lees ook EK 2024: Tim Merlier verovert Europese titel na chaotische sprint, Olav Kooij pakt zilver 17:22 77 ‘Als je niets doet, kan je evengoed verliezen’ Gevolg van de aanval van Van der Poel en Van Poppel was wel dat zij in de slotkilometers geen hoofdrol konden spelen voor sprinttroef Kooij. “Het is dubbelop. Je weet dat als je renners aanvallend laat...

Novak Đoković upozorio posle pobede nad Grčkom: „Nama je klupski tenis umro, bukvalno“
creator: Vladimir Niskanovic
content: Novak Đoković je na konferenciji za medije, posle pobede nad Grčkom i povratak Srbije u Svetsku grupu Dejvis kupa, govorio o problemima srpskog tenisa. „Početna tačka koju smo imali u zlatnoj generaciji je bila solidna, imali smo Moniku Seleš, Bobu Živojinovića. Oni su pravili značanije internacionalne rezultate. Hrvatska je tu imala veću tradiciju od nas. Imate cikluse, navikli smo u Srbiji na neke uspehe, i drago mi je da je naš uspeh kolektivni, ne treba zaboraviti Anu i Jelenu koje su bile broj 1 i insiprisale mnoge devojčice da se bave tenisom. To je pozitivna stvar, pozitivni uticaj uspešnog talasa. Viktor što je rekao je mnogo šira priča gde malo rezultata vidimo“, rekao je Đoković u dvorani „Aleksandar Nikolić“, a zatim nastavio: „Nama je klupski tenis umro. Umro, bukvalno. Partizan se 10-15 godina ne takmiči nigde, ja sam ponikao tamo, Viktor u Zvezdi... Nivo klupskog tenisa je bio izuzetno visok. Ja sam od desete do 18. godine svaki dan imao vrhunske sparinge, sa dosta boljima od mene koji su me vukli. Danas to nema. To je jedan veliki problem i nadam se da će se stvari promeniti“. On je upozorio da u Srbiji ne postoji sistem i da trenutno stanje nije održivo. „To je osnova svega, ne možete da se oslanjate na sistem, jer sistem ne postoji. Ovo sada nije održivo. Potrebno je zasukati rukave i videti šta treba da se menja. Ne možemo da živimo samo od uspeha i da se nadamo da ćemo da preživimo, a tako stvari funkcionisu otkad ja znam za...

title: رئيس الوزراء المصري من السعودية: تجاوزنا الأزمة الاقتصادية لكن هناك صعوبات وتحديات
content: وخلال لقائه بوزير الاستثمار السعودي خالد الفالح، في الرياض، قال مدبولي، إن "القاهرة لديها اهتمام ورغبة واسعة في زيادة معدلات الاستثمارات السعودية في مصر". وأضاف مدبولي: "سنقدم من أجل ذلك كل الدعم السياسي والاقتصادي المُمكن ونؤكد على اتخاذ كل القرارات التي تُسهم في حل مشكلات المستثمرين السعوديين بما يُسهم في تعزيز استثماراتهم، ودفع العمل بالمشروعات المختلفة". 1 أغسطس, 15:37 GMT بدوره، قال وزير الاستثمار السعودي، خالد الفالح، إن "مصر والسعودية توصّلتا إلى تفاهمات واسعة بين الفِرق الفنية والتنفيذية المعنية بمناقشة بنود اتفاقية تشجيع وحماية الاستثمار بين مصر والمملكة"، معربا عن أمله أن "تكون الاتفاقية بمثابة أداة ثقة وعامل تحفيز للمستثمرين لجذب رؤوس أموال لحزمة من المشروعات. وأشاد الفالح "بالجهود المبذولة من جانب الحكومة المصرية لحل مشكلات المستثمرين السعوديين العاملين في مصر"، مضيفا: "يوجد توجّه لدى الجانب السعودي لتحويل الودائع إلى استثمارات، من قِبل "صندوق الاستثمارات العامة" السعودي، خاصةً أن تجربة الصندوق للاستثمار في مصر جيدة في عدد من المشروعات". وخلال لقائه بوزير المالية السعودي محمد بن عبد الله الجدعان، أكد رئيس الوزراء المصري، "تطلع مصر لعقد المزيد من الشراكات الاستثمارية مع الجانب السعودي، خاصة مع قرب الانتهاء من بنود اتفاقية حماية وتشجيع الاستثمارات بين البلدين، التي من شأنها أن تفتح آفاقاً جديدة وواسعة لمزيد من الشراكات المثمرة بين البلدين". وفي لقاء آخر، التقى مدبولي مع وزير التجارة السعودي ماجد بن عبد الله القصبي، وقال إن مصر تجاوزت أزمتها الاقتصادية لكن لا تزال هناك صعوبات وتحديات نتيجة التطورات الإقليمية الراهنة التي تُلقي بتبعاتها على...

title: Rock’n’roll Italia ai World Skate Games 2024. Azzurri in vetta a metà competizione
content: Da Roma all’Abruzzo, da Novara a Rimini è un’Italia che vola e conquista titoli ai World Skate Games 2024, in programma fino al 22 di settembre. Sono 18 le medaglie d’oro portate a casa dal Team Azzurro in tutte le competizioni andate in scena nelle prime 9 giornate del Mondiale dei Mondiali. La manifestazione internazionale, dedicata a tutti gli sport su rotelle sta regalando emozioni indescrivibili ai tantissimi spettatori e appassionati presenti in tutte le giornate di gare. Squadra azzurra che sale in vetta alla classifica provvisoria a metà del tragitto iridato. Sono 18 le medaglie d’oro, 18 quelle d’argento e 17 quelle di bronzo. Pioggia di medaglie a Montesilvano per lo speed skating tricolore Vincenzo Maiorca è il nuovo campione del mondo nella 200 mt ad atleti contrapposti. Il siciliano domina la sua gara e scatena l'entusiasmo del pubblico con i suoi festeggiamenti. Emozionato, ha subito dedicato la vittoria a chi lo supporta ogni giorno. L'abbraccio più caloroso è arrivato dal compagno di squadra e simbolo di fair play, Duccio Marsili che ha conquistato una bellissima medaglia di bronzo. Il senese della Mens Sana riesce a centrare anche una straordinaria medaglia d’oro nella 1000 mt, regalando un grandissimo show ai tantissimi spettatori presenti a Montesilvano. Titolo mondiale che per Duccio Marsili arriva anche grazie allo splendido lavoro di squadra di Giuseppe Bramante. Una finale di altissimo livello, quella della 1000 metri, in cui Giuseppe ha lanciato...

title: Liga, i legni salvano il Real Madrid, poi ci pensano Vincius e Mbappé dal dischetto
content: SAN SEBASTIAN (SPAGNA) - Prezioso successo per il Real Madrid , che apre il suo tour de force di ben sette partite concentrate nell’arco di poco più di tre settimane con una vittoria, all’Anoeta di San Sebastian, contro la Real Sociedad . Una buona dose di sorte accompagna i blancos, che col risultato ancora sullo 0-0 vengono salvati da tre legni - due colti da Sucic , uno da Sheraldo Becker - prima di risolvere la gara con due rigori trasformati da Vincius e Mbappé . A guastare la serata di Ancelotti l’infortunio sofferto da Brahim Diaz . Blancos, almeno per una notte, a -1 dal Barça , che domani visita il Girona . Martedì sera, poi, sarà debutto in Champions con lo Stoccarda per Modric e compagni. TUTTO SULLA LIGA Centrocampo a pezzi Centrocampo ridotto ai minimi termini per Ancelotti , che privo di Tchouameni , Ceballos , Camavinga e Bellingham scommette su Valverde , Modric e Guler . Recuperato, invece, Miliato che si piazza al suo posto, nel centro della difesa, accanto a Rudiger . Davanti, Brahim Diaz è preferito all’affaticato Rodrygo , mentre Vinicius , nonostante la trasferta transoceanica per giocare col Brasile , parte regolarmente dall’inizio per dar man forte a Mbappé , che nell’ultima prima della sosta si era sbloccato con la pregevole doppietta siglata contro il Betis . Assenze di peso anche per Imanol Alguacil , orfano di Hamari Traoré , Brais Méndez e di capitan Mikel Oyarzabal , sostituito in avanti dall’ex Roma Umar Sadiq , spalleggiato da Kubo e...

title: Barcellona, poker da Champions: 4-1 al Girona!
content: GIRONA (SPAGNA) - Procede la marcia inarrestabile del Barça , che dopo il 7-0 rifilato al Valladolid che aveva preceduto la sosta, si ripresenta con un poker nel derby da Champions League con il Girona . A Montilivi, Lamine Yamal mette subito in discesa la gara con una doppietta, poi, nella ripresa, i balugrana prendono il largo con le reti di Dani Olmo e Pedri . Dell’eterno Stuani il gol dell’onore per i padroni di casa. Quinto successo in altrettante gare per i ragazzi di Hansi Flick , che ora possono concentrarsi sul debutto in Coppa Campioni col Monaco , che si disputerà giovedì prossimo nel Principato. Un giorno prima, al Parco dei Principi di Parigi, il Girona cercherà un pronto, quanto complicatissimo riscatto, nell’esordio assoluto di Champions col Psg. TUTTO SULLA LIGA Confermatissimi Squadra che vince non si modifica di una virgola e, così, Hansi Flick , conferma in pieno l’undici che, prima della sosta, aveva rifilato un esagerato 7-0 al Valladolid . Il canterano Marc Casadò , così, puntella nuovamente il centrocampo, spalleggiato da Dani Olmo e Pedri , mentre, in avanti, con un Lewandowski alla 100a in blaugrana, ci sono sempre Lamine Yamal e Raphinha . Michel , che non può contare sull’infortunato Yangel Herrera e sull’ex Oriol Romeu , escluso dalla gara per la controversa ‘clausola della paura’ che gli impedisce di giocare contro la squadra che detiene la proprietà del suo cartellino, risponde con una formazione piuttosto offensiva, che contempla Bryan...

title: В Архангельске завершился форум для сотрудников медицинских организаций
content: Участниками форума, который прошел на базе Молодежного центра Архангельской области, стали более 70 молодых сотрудников медицинских организаций со всего региона, а также из Москвы, Санкт-Петербурга, Республики Карелии, Великого Новгорода, Мурманска и других городов. Специалисты Молодежного центра Архангельской области совместно с региональным профсоюзом здравоохранения провели форум «Вместе в будущее». - В Год молодежи в Архангельской области нам важно, чтобы о возможностях, которые есть в нашей стране, узнали как можно больше молодых людей, - отметил исполняющий обязанности руководителя агентства по делам молодежи Архангельской области Юрий Марич. - Сегодня члены профсоюзов активно интересовались реализацией молодежной политики, уверен, что они нашли для себя проекты и события, которые будут полезны в профессиональном плане. За два дня форума участники обсудили вопросы кадровой политики в отношении молодежи, поработали над развитием своих лидерских качеств и навыков ведения дискуссий. А также поделились друг с другом опытом лучших практик в своих профсоюзных организациях и поработали над социальными проектами. - Этот форум - отличная возможность узнать про опыт других профсоюзных организаций в решении вопросов, которые актуальны для нас, открыть для себя новые интересные проекты, которые мы можем реализовать у себя, к тому же руководство моей больницы всегда идет на контакт и готово к обсуждению наших предложений, — поделился участник форума Денис Щелок....

title: Tvö glæsimörk skoruð í endurkomusigri Newcastle
content: Boðið var upp á mikla skemmtun frá fyrstu mínútu, hraður leikur og bæði lið fengu færi til að taka forystuna snemma. Færin voru fleiri fyrir Newcastle, sem átti meðal annars skot í stöng, en það var Wolves sem braut ísinn. Markið kom upp úr skyndisókn, Jörgen Larsen fékk bolta og mikið pláss á hægri kantinum og flengdi fyrir markið. Matheus Cunha var klókur og lét boltann fara, yfir á fjærstöngina þar sem Mario Lemina mætti og slúttaði. Eftir markið var mikill andi í Wolves liðinu, sem fékk tvö úrvalsfæri til að bæta við en tókst það ekki. Leikurinn opnaðist aftur í seinni hálfleik og bæði lið voru líkleg til að skora. Eftir fjölda marktækifæra tókst Newcastle svo að jafna leikinn á 75. mínútu. Boltinn var hreinsaður burt úr teignum, á Bruno Guimares sem lagði hann létt til hliðar á Fabian Schar, sem tók sér lítinn tíma og þrumaði í markið af um þrjátíu metra færi. Aðeins fimm mínútum síðar komst Newcastle svo yfir. Markið var engu síðra en það fyrra, Joseph Willock og Harvey Barnes á vinstri vængnum tengdu saman þríhyrninga áður en sá síðarnefndi skipti yfir á hægri fótinn og smurði boltann í fjærhornið. Wolves átti enga endurkomu í erminni á lokamínútum leiksins, sem lauk með 1-2 sigri Newcastle eftir átta mínútna uppbótartíma. Wolves er því enn án sigurs og aðeins með eitt stig. Newcastle situr í 3. sæti deildarinnar með 10 stig eftir fjórar umferðir.

title: اعتراف منابع عبری درباره حمله موشکی یمنی‌ها
creator: info@fardanews.com (fardanews)
content: موشکی که صبح امروز یکشنبه از یمن به سمت تل آویو شلیک شد، باعث به صدا درآمدن آژیرهای خطر در نزدیک به ۲۰ شهر و شهرک صهیونیستی در وسط فلسطین اشغالی شد و پس از ایجاد رعب و وحشت در میان صهیونیست‌ها، در «منطقه ای خالی از سکنه» منفجر شد؛ هر چند که سخنگوی ارتش صهیونیستی مدعی مقابله با این موشک شلیک شده از یمن و سقوط آن در منطقه‌ای غیرمسکونی در مرکز اراضی اشغالی و شرق تل آویو شد. شبکه ۱۴ تلویزیون رژیم صهیونیستی در این بار گزارش داد که تحقیقات اولیه نیروی هوایی رژیم صهیونیستی نشان می‌دهد که تمامی موشک‌های پدافندی شلیک شده توسط سامانه‌های پدافندی این رژیم به سمت موشک یمنی در ساقط کردن آن ناتوان بوده اند. منابع صهیونیستی خاطر نشان کردند که بیش از ۲۰ موشک ضدهوایی از سامانه‌های پدافندی «حیتس» و «فلاخن داوود» به سمت این موشک شلیک شده است، اما نتوانسته اند موشک یمنی شلیک شده به سمت تل آویو را ساقط کنند. این منابع تاکید کرده اند که موشک یمنی پس از عبور از سامانه‌های پدافندی رژیم صهیونیستی و حریم هوایی چندین کشور عربی و ناکامی تلاش‌ها در مقابله با آن، به تل آویو برخورد کرده است. در همین راستا، پایگاه صهیونیستی «حدشوت بزمان» اعلام کرد که شمار زیادی از موشک‌های ضدموشک به سمت موشک یمنی شلیک شده است، اما نتوانسته اند این موشک را ساقط کنند. شهرک نشینان صهیونیست هم صحنه‌های آتش سوزی در محل سقوط این موشک در شرق تل آویو را دست به دست می‌کنند. از سوی دیگر، «گادی آیزنکوت» ریس سابق ستاد مشترک ارتش صهیونیستی در واکنش به شلیک این موشک و اصابت آن به وسط فلسطین اشغالی تاکید کرد که اوضاع به شکل دراماتیک تغییر کرده است و ارتش از زخمی شدن ۹ نفر در جریان تلاش برای فرار به پناهگاه‌ها در وسط فلسطین...

title: Rugby (Fédérale 2) : Belvès a commis trop de fautes pour l’emporter
content: Pour le premier match de la saison et la réception de Clermont/Cournon, les Sangliers de Belvès espéraient se rassurer, dimanche 15 septembre. Les Périgourdins ont raté deux pénalités après onze minutes de jeu, alors que les Auvergnats ont ouvert le score à la 7e (0-3). Enfin en réussite, Chrétien ramène le score à 3-3 (22e). Les Sangliers dominent et, après plusieurs mouvements, enchaînent mais les avants meurent à un mètre de la ligne et rendent le ballon suite à un en avant. Juste après la demi-heure, les pensionnaires de Sem-Gallet passent tout de même devant grâce à une pénalité de Rodrigues (6-3, 35e). En suivant, Levy égalise (6-6, 38e). Puis, après deux minutes de jeu en seconde période, les Sangliers aplatissent un bel essai après plusieurs conservations, par Fa. Rodrigues transforme (13-6, 42e). Mais les fautes récurrentes remettent les visiteurs dans la partie, ils ont le ballon et sentent que c’est possible. Une erreur des Belvésois dans les 22 adverses les ramène dans leurs propres 22 mètres, et Aubin ajoute trois points, tout de suite suivi par Rodrigues (16-9, 49e). Clermont/Cournon joue, se nourrit des absences des locaux pour inscrire son seul essai dans cette rencontre par l’intermédiaire de Travassac (16-14, 62e). À quelques minutes de la fin, Pasquet sort, peut-être sur blessure. C’est un moment crucial de la partie. Il reste dix minutes, Belvès bénéficie d’une pénalité à 30 mètres à gauche. La pénaltouche est...

title: Cholera Outbreak: Adamawa Govt Confirms Four Death
creator: MIRIAM NNOLI
content: A suspected case of cholera outbreak in Yola, Adamawa State capital has reportedly resulted in the death of four people and the hospitalization of 36 others. The Executive Chairman of the Council, Mr Jibrin Ibrahim confirmed the development at the Infectious Disease Control Centre in Yola, on Sunday. According to him, the outbreak occurred in Alkalawa, Ajiya, and Limawa wards within the council and is believed to be due to contaminated water sources and flooding. Upon his arrival, Ibrahim reported that 20 cases were initially recorded, but the number quickly rose to 40, with four succumbing to the disease. He noted that a significant number of patients have been stabilized and are receiving medical attention from health workers. The Executive Chairman commended the swift response of the health workers, the Red Cross, and international partners in addressing the outbreak. Ibrahim urged the public to maintain a clean environment, drink potable water, and wash vegetables and fruits thoroughly before consumption to prevent further spread of the disease.

title: "Ситуация сохранит стабильность". Сергеенко об избирательной кампании и поручениях Президента
content: 15 сентября, Минск /Корр. БЕЛТА/. В эфире телеканала председатель Палаты представителей Национального собрания Республики Беларусь Игорь Сергеенко рассказал о том, какие поручения были даны Президентом Беларуси Александром Лукашенко органам власти в связи с грядущими президентскими выборами, а также оценил ситуацию в стране, сообщает БЕЛТА.

title: 2:1-Sieg in Mainz: Bremen gewinnt in Unterzahl
content: Werder Bremen hat in der Fußball-Bundesliga beim 1. FSV Mainz 05 am Sonntag (15.09.2024) eine halbe Stunde in Unterzahl gespielt und doch gewonnen. Das lag an einem Neuzugang, der beim Debüt direkt für die Entscheidung sorgte. Derrick Köhn war noch keine zwei Minuten auf dem Platz, als er in der 69. Minute nach einem Konter vor dem Mainzer Tor auftauchte und den 2:1 (1:1)-Siegtreffer erzielte. Köhn, 25, war Ende August von Galatasaray nach Bremen gewechselt. Für ihn war es das erste Bundesligaspiel und direkt das erste Tor - kann man so machen als Linksverteidiger. Zuvor hatte Mavrin Ducksch Werder Bremen mit einem Freistoß in Führung gebracht (8.), ehe Jae-sung Lee für Mainz ausglich (27.). Als Köhn das Spiel entschied, spielte Bremen nach der Roten Karte gegen Marco Friedl in Unterzahl. Am Ende durfte sich der Trainer Ole Werner trotzdem über den ersten Saisonsieg freuen. Bremens Ducksch trifft mit Glück vom Punkt In der Tabelle klettert Bremen auf Rang acht, für die Mainzer geht es runter auf Platz 15. Für sie war es die erste Heimniederlage in der Liga seit Anfang Februar - auch da hieß der Gegner Werder Bremen. Auf der Tribüne saß diesmal Jürgen Klopp. Er hat seine Trainerkarriere vor vielen Jahren in Mainz begonnen. Das Ergebnis wird ihm nicht gefallen haben. Wahrscheinlich hat ihm schon der Beginn des Spiels nicht gefallen. Nach einem Foul von Dominik Kohr an Justin Njinmah gab es Strafstoß für die Gäste aus Bremen. Eine Sache für Ducksch, er ist bei...

title: Cinco empresas tienen el monopolio de la red de cargadores de coches y encarecen la recarga
creator: Daniel Lara
content: Daniel Lara El coche eléctrico continúa sin despegar en España , y la red de cargadores suele ser uno de los protagonistas del debate. Un nuevo estudio sobre los enchufes para vehículos en España arroja datos sobre un sector poco conocido, y revela que el sistema de recarga está fuertemente concentrado en cinco empresas que controlan el 81,3% del mercado , pese a que hay más de 80 operadores trabajando en el país. Iberdrola es la empresa líder del mercado español y controla el 33% de estos puntos, con datos hasta junio de 2024, y es el principal proveedor en 37 de las 50 provincias . Junto a ella destacan Endesa (15%), Repsol (15%), Wenea (10%) y Etnic (9%). title: Air ambulance lands in north Essex with reports of 'armed officers' on scene
content: AN air ambulance has landed in Walton near the former Coastguard Station with reports of "armed police" on the scene. At about 5.45pm an air ambulance from the Essex and Hertfordshire air ambulance emergency service landed in Hall Lane, while at 6pm residents report Essex Police arrived at the scene of an incident. Response - Air ambulances from Essex Police and the Essex and Hertfordshire air ambulance emergency service, shown, have landed in Walton (Image: CCP) Clacton Crime Partnership (CCP), a radio link scheme, have reported "armed officers" as being on the scene. This is unconfirmed by Essex Police at this stage. title: The Best of the Best: Wine Tourism Awards Recognize Outstanding Experiences
content: Sunday, September 15, 2024 The winners of the inaugural Great Wine Capitals Best Of Wine Tourism Awards were announced, highlighting four standout Hawke’s Bay businesses across seven key categories. These awards honor excellence in wine tourism and showcase Hawke’s Bay as a premier global wine destination, solidifying its status as one of the Great Wine Capitals of the World . Judge Anna King Shahab , a well-known food, wine, and travel writer, praised the caliber of entries, noting the high standard of competition in each category. The judging panel also included Jesse Mulligan , a renowned radio and TV personality, and Anna Nielson , General Manager of Destination Wairarapa. The winners in each category were: These local winners will now compete at the Best Of Wine Tourism international awards in Verona, Italy, later this year. Anna King Shahab commented on the impressive standard of the entries, particularly noting the excellence in dining and accommodation, which reflected the region’s unique charm. She remarked that the warmth and attentiveness of Hawke’s Bay’s wine tourism operations left a lasting impression on both the judges and visitors. Hamish Saxton , Chief Executive of Hawke’s Bay Tourism, expressed pride in the region’s success, noting that these awards underscore Hawke’s Bay’s reputation as a top wine tourism destination. He added that the opportunity to compete on the global stage would bring further international recognition.

title: Apokaliptičan prizor: Vodena bujica u Poljskoj srušila kuću
content: Danas je oko 12 sati pukla brana na jugoistoku Poljske, kod grada Stronie Śląskie. Na društvenim mrežama pojavilo se više video snimaka vode koja juri kroz grad. Jedna od njih prikazuje urušavanje kuće u kojoj se nalazila lokalna policijska stanica. - Zgrada policijske stanice srušila se u gradu Stronie Śląskie - rekla je glasnogovornica policije Katarzyna Nowak za Polsat News. - Ovo više nije drama, ovo je tragedija - rekao je glasnogovornik meteorološkog instituta IMWM Grzegorz Walijewski. title: Trotz Überzahl und Klopp als Fan: Mainz unterliegt Bremen
content: Unter den Augen seines früheren Trainers Jürgen Klopp hat der FSV Mainz 05 gegen Werder Bremen trotz einer halbstündigen Überzahl verloren. Die Mainzer unterlagen zum Abschluss des dritten Spieltags in der Fußball-Bundesliga mit 1:2 (1:1). Für Bremen ist es der erste Liga-Sieg in dieser Saison, für die 05er die erste Niederlage. Werders Marvin Ducksch erzielte vor 32.000 Zuschauern die frühe Führung per Foulelfmeter (8. Minute). Für den FSV glich der südkoreanische Nationalspieler Jae-sung Lee (27.) aus. Den Siegtreffer für die Gäste erzielte in Unterzahl der kurz zuvor eingewechselte Derrick Köhn (69.). Zuvor sah Werder-Kapitän Marco Friedl wegen einer Notbremse die Rote Karte (60.). Vor der Partie wurde Klopp, der auf der Tribüne saß, von den Mainzer Fans gefeiert. Mit «Jürgen, Jürgen, Jürgen»-Rufen nahmen die Anhänger ihn in Empfang. Der 57-Jährige prägte bei den Rheinhessen eine Ära, war von 2001 bis 2008 ihr Chefcoach. Unter Klopp schafften die Mainzer 2004 den erstmaligen Aufstieg in die Bundesliga. Klopp sah eine Anfangsphase, in der beide Mannschaften viel Offensivdrang zeigten. Die Gäste aus Bremen hatten eine Dreifachchance zur Führung, doch erst parierte Mainz-Torwart Robin Zentner, dann klärten zwei Abwehrspieler der 05er kurz vor der Linie. Nur Augenblicke später kam Bremens Justin Njinmah nach einem Zweikampf mit Dominik Kohr im Strafraum zu Fall. Den Elfmeter verwandelte Ducksch. Der Stürmer hatte zuletzt für Wirbel gesorgt, weil er...

title: Campaign to empower mums to save youth from addiction
content: In response to the “escalating drug crisis” across the state, the Punjab Lit Foundation, in association with the district administration, held a special event to launch its ‘Mothers Against Drugs’ campaign at Bullowal village of Hoshiapur on Sunday. The campaign, spearheaded by author and former state information commissioner Khushwant Singh along with Sanna Kaushal, media adviser to the National Commission for Women (NCW), is designed to mobilise and empower Punjab mothers to take an active role in safeguarding their children from falling into the trap of drug addiction. A huge number of mothers gathered to participate in training and motivation sessions aimed at educating them on how to recognise the early warning signs of substance abuse and intervene effectively. Sanna Kaushal, director of the initiative, highlighted the programme’s statewide goals. She said the mission was to educate and empower mothers throughout Punjab to be proactive in the fight against drug addiction. “We will be organising more such events to ensure that every mother in Punjab has access to the knowledge and tools needed to protect her children. Mothers can act as the first line of defence in saving their children from drug addiction,” Kaushal said. Writer Khushwant Singh said the aim was to let this campaign grow into a mass movement across the state, making every mother in Punjab a soldier in the fight against drugs. “We have funded the project ourselves so far, but we hope others will join us....

title: Hojgaard birdies last 3 holes to win the Irish Open and hand McIlroy more heartache
creator: AP

title: Hojgaard birdies last 3 holes to win the Irish Open and hand McIlroy more heartache
creator: AP

title: Hojgaard birdies last 3 holes to win the Irish Open and hand McIlroy more heartache
creator: AP
content: NEWCASTLE, Northern Ireland (AP) — Rasmus Hojgaard birdied his last three holes Sunday for a 6-under 65 to win the Irish Open and hand Rory McIlroy another dose of disappointment before a raucous gallery at Royal County Down. McIlroy had a two-shot lead on the back nine until Hojgaard put together a stunning charge down the stretch to win for the fifth time on the European tour and deny McIlroy a victory in his home country. “Unfortunately, I’m getting used to it this year,” McIlroy said. “Hopefully, the tide is going to turn pretty soon, and I can turn all these close calls into victories.” McIlroy had a pair of bogeys on the closing four holes that allowed Hojgaard, playing two groups in front of him, to charge to victory in stunning fashion. The 23-year-old Dane got up-and-down from a bunker for birdie on the short par-4 16th, he holed a bunker shot for birdie on the 17th to take the lead, and then blasted out of the rough onto the front edge of the green for a two-putt birdie on the par-5 18th. Hojgaard, who started the final round three shots behind McIlroy, finished on 9-under 275. “I had a number today that I was trying to reach, and that was 8 (under). Obviously, coming in and finishing on 9 was gold,” he said. It was another tough ending for McIlroy, who has three wins this year but lost the U.S. Open when he missed a pair of short par putts on the last three holes at Pinehurst No. 2, and had a late charge at the Olympics derailed by a wedge that went into the...

title: Safety: Enugu prohibits unapproved medical outreaches
creator: Chuks Nweze
content: As part of efforts to ensure the safety and wellbeing of the public, the Enugu state government has announced the immediate ban on any form of unapproved medical outreaches by individuals and organisations in the state. The Commissioner for Health, Prof. Ikechukwu Obi, who made this known in a press statement issued on Friday in Enugu, directed that individuals and organizations intending to engage in medical services, including other health outreaches, to apply and obtain permit from the ministry. According to the statement, it was discovered that some of the products used for medical outreaches were either expired or nearing their expiration date, adding that this had led to health complications of beneficiaries of such outreaches. The government said it was also concerned about the qualifications of practitioners usually engaged for the job, saying any medical outreach in the state must be conducted by qualified professionals who could diagnose and prescribe the right treatments. “The Enugu State Ministry of Health has noticed with dismay that some organizations offer medical and health outreach services in the state without the approval of the ministry. “The Commissioner for Health, Prof. Ikechukwu Obi, wishes to state that, henceforth, any form of medical outreach and other health services either by public or private health institutions in the state must get a approval from the State Ministry of Health. “This is necessary to ensure that the medical services are carried...

title: Hojgaard birdies last 3 holes to win the Irish Open and hand McIlroy more heartache
creator: AP
content: NEWCASTLE, Northern Ireland (AP) — Rasmus Hojgaard birdied his last three holes Sunday for a 6-under 65 to win the Irish Open and hand Rory McIlroy another dose of disappointment before a raucous gallery at Royal County Down. McIlroy had a two-shot lead on the back nine until Hojgaard put together a stunning charge down the stretch to win for the fifth time on the European tour and deny McIlroy a victory in his home country. “Unfortunately, I’m getting used to it this year,” McIlroy said. “Hopefully, the tide is going to turn pretty soon, and I can turn all these close calls into victories.” McIlroy had a pair of bogeys on the closing four holes that allowed Hojgaard, playing two groups in front of him, to charge to victory in stunning fashion. The 23-year-old Dane got up-and-down from a bunker for birdie on the short par-4 16th, he holed a bunker shot for birdie on the 17th to take the lead, and then blasted out of the rough onto the front edge of the green for a two-putt birdie on the par-5 18th. Hojgaard, who started the final round three shots behind McIlroy, finished on 9-under 275. “I had a number today that I was trying to reach, and that was 8 (under). Obviously, coming in and finishing on 9 was gold,” he said. It was another tough ending for McIlroy, who has three wins this year but lost the U.S. Open when he missed a pair of short par putts on the last three holes at Pinehurst No. 2, and had a late charge at the Olympics derailed by a wedge that went into the...

title: Police investigating after 2 killed in shooting in Barrio Logan
content: Two people were killed in a shooting in the Barrio Logan neighborhood on Saturday night and homicide detectives are investigating the incident, San Diego police said. The shooting was reported shortly after 9:30 p.m. on Beardsley Street near National Avenue. One victim died at the scene while a second was transported to a hospital, where he or she later died, said police Officer Sarah Foster. The names of the victims were not released. No other details, including what led up to the shooting, were immediately available.

title: Българската двойка Калчев и Механджийски спечели сребърен медал на Балканското по плажен волейбол
content: Със сребърни медали се поздравиха националната двойка Димитър Калчев/Димитър Механджийски от Балканското първенство по плажен волейбол за мъже и жени, съобщиха от федерацията. Надпреварата се проведе в Кишинев (Молдова) между 13 и 15 септември. Участие взеха 12 отбора при мъжете и 9 при жените от шест държани - Молдова, Турция, Гърция, Косово, Румъния и България. Българските волейболисти, които тази година триумфираха в Националната лига по плажен волейбол, достигнаха съвсем заслужено до финала. Те преодоляха успешно трите кръга на квалификациите (с две победи и една загуба), а в четвъртфинала се наложиха над турските шампиони Юсуф Йоздемир/Батухан Куру с 2:1 (21:19, 16:21, 17:15). На полуфинал двойката трябваше да се изправи срещу представителите на домакина домакините Егор Добчис/Максим Корсаков и се наложи с 2:0 (21:17, 21:13). В битката за титлата Калчев/Механджийски спориха срещу друга турска двойка Хасан Мермер/Саджит Курт. Двубоят бе оспорван и се стигна до тайбрек, в който за съжаление родните играчи отстъпиха - 1:2 (15:21, 21:18, 9:15).

title: Draghi hat einen Plan: Brüssel will Europa mit der Schuldenunion retten
content: Laut Ex-EZB-Chef Mario Draghi braucht die EU milliardenschwere Investitionen, um im Wettbewerb mit China und den USA mitzuhalten. Das Geld soll womöglich auch aus Euro-Bonds auf Dauer kommen: Die Pläne dafür liegen offenbar schon in der Schublade. Als die Staats- und Regierungschefs im Juli 2020 zum EU-Sondergipfel in Brüssel zusammenkamen, hatte die Corona-Krise Europa voll im Griff. Brüssel hatte damals vor allem auf dem Radar, Masken und Impfstoffe zu beschaffen und mit Kontaktsperren die Inzidenzen zu senken. So ging fast unter, dass die EU-Staaten mitten in der Pandemie eine historische Zeitenwende einläuteten: Zum ersten Mal überhaupt machten sie gemeinsame Schulden für den Wiederaufbau und die Folgekosten der Corona-Krise. Die EU-Kommission wurde ermächtigt, dafür bis zu 750 Milliarden Euro über sogenannte "NextGenerationEU (NGEU)"-Bonds aufzunehmen. Geht es nach Brüssel, soll dieses Geld nun zum Grundstock einer dauerhaften Schuldenunion werden. Das könnte zum Sprengstoff für die EU werden, denn die Gemeinschaft steuert auf eine gigantische Haushaltslücke zu. Die Rückzahlungen von Zinsen und Kapital aus dem Corona-Wiederaufbaufonds drohen in den kommenden Jahren das EU-Budget zu sprengen. 30 Milliarden Euro Belastungen fallen jährlich an, etwa ein Sechstel von dem, was die EU insgesamt pro Jahr ausgibt. Um das Loch zu stopfen, will Brüssel nun die Anleihen aus der Corona-Zeit verlängern, berichtet die britische "Financial Times". "Die...

title: Promotora Leda Mara é nomeada procuradora-geral de Justiça do MPAM
content: Ela foi escolhida pelo governador Wilson Lima, após obter a maioria dos votos em eleição interna no MPAM e figurar na lista tríplice com 101 votos no total. É a segunda vez que Leda Mara assume o posto mais alto do MP do Amazonas, tendo comandado o Ministério Público anteriormente entre 2018 e 2020. A nomeação foi publicada no Diário Oficial deste domingo, na página 11. A posse da nova procuradora-geral, que sucederá o atual PGJ Alberto Rodrigues do Nascimento, acontecerá no dia 15 de novembro no Teatro Amazonas, com a presença dos membros do MPAM, autoridades e convidados. A lista tríplice do MPAM havia sido encaminhada ao governador pelo Colégio de Procuradores de Justiça no último dia 3, um dia após a eleição virtual no MPAM, que definiu, entre nove concorrentes, os três mais votados por 183 promotores e procuradores. Graduada em direito pela Universidade Federal do Amazonas (Ufam) e doutoranda em Direito Constitucional pelo Instituto Brasileiro de Ensino, Desenvolvimento e Pesquisa (IDP), a nova procuradora-geral ingressou no MPAM em fevereiro de 1996. Com grande experiência administrativa, a procuradora Leda Mara Albuquerque foi secretária-geral do MPAM e subprocuradora-geral para Assuntos Administrativos do órgão, além de integrar o Grupo de Atuação Especial de Repressão ao Crime Organizado (Gaeco) no ano de 2011, atuando em várias ações contra o crime organizado. Durante seu primeiro mandato, Leda Mara Albuquerque imprimiu importantes...

title: Wolves 1 Newcastle 2: Fabian Schar and Harvey Barnes thunderbolts secure stunning comeback win for Eddie Howe’s men
creator: Joshua Jones
content: WERE you watching Paul Mitchell? Eddie Howe and his Magpies couldn't have sent out a clearer message to their new sporting director following his recent toxic comments. Mitchell controversially questioned Howe's transfer dealings , claiming the club's transfer strategy was "not fit for purpose" - raising fears of a civil war brewing at St James' Park. Well, Howe's buys looked pretty good value for money here, in front of their watching critic - who failed to get Marc Guehi's deal over the line this summer. Meanwhile, two Howe bargains, Harvey Barnes and Nick Pope proved their worth, turning this game on its head as the Magpies made it three wins out of four. They cost Howe less than £50million for the pair and looked sensational value for money. READ MORE ON FOOTBALL Barnes produced a sensational winner ten minutes from the end as he exchanged passes with Joe Willock, then brushed aside a tame challenge from sub Matt Doherty before unleashing a 23-yarder high into the top corner. While we were still catching our breath, Wolves piled forward in search of a stoppage-time equaliser and thought they had it when Matheus Cunha sent a volley towards the far corner. However, Pope hurled himself to his left to claw the ball to safety. Both earned their bonus. title: Wolves 1 Newcastle 2: Fabian Schar and Harvey Barnes thunderbolts secure stunning comeback win for Eddie Howe’s men
creator: Joshua Jones

title: Wolves 1 Newcastle 2: Fabian Schar and Harvey Barnes thunderbolts secure stunning comeback win for Eddie Howe’s men
creator: Joshua Jones
content: FABIAN SCHAR thought he had scored the goal of the game to rescue a point for Newcastle at Wolves. But then Harvey Barnes picked out the top corner with an absolute beauty to snatch all three. Wolves' own finish was a gorgeous move, finished by Mario Lemina following Joao Gomes' sublime dummy. But the Toon came roaring back late on. Schar's strike from distance got the Magpies level on 75 minutes. And five minutes later, Barnes struck gold by arrowing beyond Sam Johnstone. Wolves nearly grabbed an injury-time equaliser but Matheus Cunha's volley was turned away by a flying Nick Pope - in between two half-hearted penalty appeals for the home side. title: عملیات ضدصهیونیستی در بیت‌المقدس/ یک افسر صهیونیست زخمی شد + فیلم
content: به گزارش به نقل از فلسطین الیوم، کانال ۱۲ تلویزیون رژیم اشغالگر از هدف قرار گرفتن یک نظامی اشغالگر در عملیات ضد صهیونیستی توسط یک فلسطینی خبر داد. بنا به اعلام رسانه‌های عبری، در این حمله یک افسر صهیونیست در این حمله زخمی شد. همچنین مجری این عملیات ضد صهیونیستی بر اثر شلیک نظامیان اشغالگر به شهادت رسید. این عملیات ضد صهیونیستی با وجود تشدید تدابیر امنیتی رژیم صهیونیستی در شهر بیت المقدس به مناسبت فرا رسیدن سالروز میلاد پیامبر اسلام (ص) به روایت اهل سنت انجام شد. نظامیان اشغالگر از شامگاه شنبه با ایجاد محدودیت گسترده و بازرسی بدنی افراد در شهر قدیمی بیت المقدس و اطراف مسجد الاقصی، محدودیت‌های فراوانی را برای فلسطینی‌ها ایجاد کرده بودند.

title: Osijek nakon šest kola došao do prve pobjede u prvenstvu
content: Podijeli : xxVladoxKosx via Guliver Nogometaši Osijeka tek su u šestom kolu HNL-a ostvarili premijernu prvenstvenu pobjedu u sezoni, u domaćem ogledu pobijedili su Slaven Belupo s 1-0 (1-0). Jedini pogodak na susretu postigao je Petar Pušić u 14. minuti, čime je Slaven Belupo ostao jedina momčad u ligi bez pobjede. Osijek je i dalje pretposljednji, a Slaven Belupo na samom dnu ljestvice. Ujednačeno je počela utakmica s po jednom prijetnjom na obje strane, nakon čega se i zatresla mreža na Opus Areni. Osječani su poveli u 14. minuti nakon akcije koju je počeo Bukvić. Njegovu ubačenu loptu glavom je spustio Jakupović, a u naletu je Pušić pucao i zabivši razveselio domaće navijače. Pet minuta kasnije organizirao je domaćin novi dobar napad, ali je završnica Matkovića bila slaba te je pucao ravno u suparničkog vratara. Potom se ozbiljnije počeo buditi Slaven Belupo koji je nakon pola sata igre imao prvu dobru šansu za izjednačenje. Caimacov je pokušao, ali nije bio precizan. Uslijedila je potom po jedna poluprilika na obje strane, a prvi dio je završio sjajnom šansom domaćeg igrača Jelenića koji je iz blizine bio neprecizan, makar je na pladnju imao pogodak za 2-0. U nastavku utakmice bolji su na travnjaku bili gostujući igrači, ali Osijek je relativno lagano odbijao napade suparnika i nije opasno živio u svom šesnaestercu. Dvije prilike, u 55. i 61. minuti, za goste je imao Nestorovski, ali daleko je ostao od potencijalnog izjednačenja....

title: מזל טוב: נטע אלחמיסטר בהריון שני!
content: הזוג הפוטוגני, הדוגמנית והמשפיענית ובעלה, שחקן הכדורגל , התחתן אי שם בשנת 2019 קצת לפני עידן הקורונה ואחרי ארבע שנות זוגיות יציבה. עשרה חודשים אחרי שהפכו להורים בפעם הראשונה, הדוגמנית נטע אלחמיסטר ושחקן הכדורגל רמי גרשון סיפרו לעולם היום (א') על הריון שני ומרגש. "I love the love our love creates", כתבה אלחמיסטר והעלתה תמונה של המשפחה הקטנה פלוס תוספת של בטן הריונית לחשבון האינסטגרם שלה. כזכור, בזמן הברית של בנם הבכור , קרתה פדיחה ושמו השגוי של בנם הופץ בזמן האירוע עצמו, על ידי אחד האורחים שנתבקש מאוחר יותר לבקש מכל אלו שעדכן, לכבד ולהסיר את הידיעה עד שההורים הטריים יאשרו.

title: דונלד טראמפ תוקף: "אני שונא את טיילור סוויפט"
content: נשיא ארצות הברית לשעבר והמועמד לנשיאות בהווה דונלד טראמפ צייץ היום (ראשון) ברשת החברתית שלו "TRUTH SOCIAL" ציוץ שבו תקף את הזמרת טיילור סוויפט שהצהירה לפני מספר ימים כי היא תומכת במועמדת הדמוקרטית וסגנית הנשיא קמלה האריס. טראמפ כתב: "אני שונא את טיילור סוויפט!". לפני כמה ימים התראיין טראמפ לרשת פוקס ניוז לאחר העימות שקיים מול סגנית הנשיא קמלה האריס, המועמדת הדמוקרטית לנשיאות ארצות הברית. בין השאר הוא הגיב להבעת התמיכה של טיילור סוויפט בהאריס. לאחר שעקץ את בן זוגה של טיילור סוויפט, טרוויס קלסי, הוסיף: "מעולם לא הייתי באמת מעריץ של טיילור סוויפט. זה היה רק ​​עניין של זמן, היא אדם מאוד ליברלי. נראה שהיא תמיד תומכת במפלגה הדמוקרטית והיא בוודאי תשלם על כך מחיר כלכלי". בפוסט שהעלתה לרשתות החברתיות כתבה סוויפט: "כמו רבים מכם, גם אני צפיתי בעימות הלילה. אם לא עשיתם זאת עדיין, זה הזמן הכי טוב לעשות את הבדיקה שלכם על הנושאים הבוערים ועל העמדות שהמועמדים נוקטים בהן סביב הנושאים שחשובים לכם ביותר. כמצביעה, אני מקפידה לקרוא לגבי כל מדיניות ותוכנית שמוצעת עבור ארצנו. אני אתן את קלוי לקמלה האריס ולטים וולץ בבחירות 2024. אצביע להאריס כי היא נלחמת עבור הזכויות שאני מאמינה בהן, ואני חושבת שהיא מנהיגה חזקה ומוכשרת". דונלד טראמפ וקמלה האריס התייצבו ברביעי לעימות נשיאותי ראשון ביניהם, כשבסקרים בארה"ב המצב ביניהם צמוד מאוד. העימות נערך 55 ימים לפני הבחירות לנשיאות, וכל אחד מהמועמדים קיווה לשכנע ציבור גדול של מתלבטים ולייצר מומנטום לקראת הישורת האחרונה של הקמפיין.

title: פיגוע דקירה בשער שכם בירושלים, המחבל נוטרל
content: פיגוע דקירה בשער שכם בירושלים, המחבל נוטרל שלומי הלר עודכן לאחרונה: 15.9.2024 / 20:19 לוחם מג''ב כבן 20 נפצע מדקירה באורח קל ופונה לבית חולים בעיר. המחבל שניסה להימלט אל תוך העיר העתיקה, נוטרל על ידי לוחמי מג"ב נוספים. שערי העיר העתיקה נסגרו, בהתאם לנוהל, בעקבות הפיגוע שתף ב וואצאפ שתף ב פייסבוק שתף ב טוויטר שתף ב אימאייל שתף ב general חשד לפיגוע בשער שכם / מערכת וואלה פיגוע דקירה ארע הערב בסמוך לשער שכם שבירושלים. לוחם מג''ב כבן 20 נפצע באורח קל לאחר שנדקר באמצעות כלי חד בפלג גופו העליון. צוות מד''א שהוזעק למקום פינה את הלוחם שנדקר במצב קל ובהכרה לטיפול רפואי בבית חולים בעיר. המחבל שניסה להימלט אל תוך העיר העתיקה, נוטרל על ידי לוחמי מג"ב נוספים. בעקבות הפיגוע, שערי העיר העתיקה נסגרו, בהתאם לנוהל, למעבר הולכי רגל ורכבים. פרמדיק מיחידת האופנועים של מד"א ישראל ויינגרטן שהגיע לזירה סיפר: "הפצוע שהיה בהכרה מלאה התהלך במקום כשהוא סובל מפצע דקירה בפלג גופו העליון. הענקנו לו טיפול רפואי ראשוני בזירה והוא יפונה בהמשך לבית החולים. המחבל נוטרל".

title: Afundamento de canoa sobrecarregada provoca a morte de 41 agricultores na Nigéria
creator: Lusa
content: Uma canoa que transportava 53 agricultores para as suas quintas, afundou-se no sábado num rio do estado de Zamfara, no norte da Nigéria, prosseguindo as buscas pelos corpos de 41 passageiros, informaram as autoridades locais. A canoa sobrelotada transportava 53 agricultores para as suas quintas no rio Gummi, quando se afundou a meio do percurso, disse um funcionário local à agência France-Presse. Num comunicado emitido este domingo, o presidente nigeriano, Bola Ahmed Tinubu, expressou a sua "compaixão" após "a morte de mais de 40 agricultores num acidente de barco". A região de Gummi foi atingida por fortes inundações há alguns dias, obrigando mais de 10 mil pessoas a fugir. Tinubu "prometeu apoio às vítimas" das "duas tragédias": o acidente de barco e as inundações. Os acidentes de barco são frequentes nas vias navegáveis mal reguladas da Nigéria, o país mais populoso de África, sobretudo durante a estação das chuvas, quando os rios e os lagos se enchem. No mês passado, 30 agricultores morreram afogados , quando o seu barco sobrelotado se afundou a caminho dos seus campos de arroz no rio Dundaye, no vizinho Estado de Sokoto, de acordo com as autoridades de emergência. Três dias antes, 15 agricultores morreram quando a sua canoa se virou no rio Gamoda, no norte do Estado de Jigawa, segundo a polícia.

title: Η Χαμάς χαιρέτισε την πυραυλική επίθεση των Χούθι
creator: Αλέξανδρος Παπαδόπουλος
content: Ανώτερος αξιωματούχος της Χαμάς χαιρέτισε σήμερα την πυραυλική επίθεση των ανταρτών Χούθι της Υεμένης στο Ισραήλ, λέγοντας ότι αυτό δείχνει ότι “ακόμη και οι δυνατότητες του Ισραήλ έχουν όρια και η πιθανότητα να αναπτυχθεί αντίσταση εναντίον της σιωνιστικής οντότητας είναι μια σοβαρή και αληθινή πιθανότητα, όχι φαντασιοπληξία”. Ο πύραυλος των Χούθι, ο οποίος έπεσε σήμερα στο κεντρικό Ισραήλ χωρίς να προκαλέσει θύματα, είναι «ένα μήνυμα προς ολόκληρη την περιοχή ότι το Ισραήλ δεν είναι μια οντότητα στο απυρόβλητο», δήλωσε ο Οσάμα Χαμντάν σε συνέντευξή του στο Γαλλικό Πρακτορείο. Ο αξιωματούχος της Χαμάς είπε επίσης ότι το κίνημά του επιθυμεί μια «κοινή παλαιστινιακή διοίκηση» της Λωρίδας της Γάζας στο τέλος του πολέμου με το Ισραήλ. «Η επόμενη κυβέρνηση στη Γάζα πρέπει να είναι μια κοινή παλαιστινιακή κυβέρνηση. Έχουμε πει ξεκάθαρα ότι η επόμενη μέρα πρέπει να είναι παλαιστινιακή», δήλωσε ο Χαμντάν . Η οργάνωση έχει άφθονους πόρους για να συνεχίσει να μάχεται κατά του Ισραήλ παρά τις απώλειες που έχει υποστεί κατά τους 11 μήνες και πλέον πολέμου στη Γάζα, είπε ο ίδιος. «Η αντίσταση έχει μεγάλη δυνατότητα να συνεχιστεί. Υπήρξαν μάρτυρες και υπήρξαν θυσίες...αλλά σε αντάλλαγμα υπήρξε η συγκέντρωση εμπειριών και η στρατολόγηση νέων γενεών στην αντίσταση». Ο Χαμντάν προσθέτει στη συνέντευξή του ότι οι ΗΠΑ δεν κάνουν αρκετά για να υποχρεώσουν...

title: Lana Deković autorica je vizualnog identiteta riječkog Vriska. Otkrila nam je što ju je inspiriralo
creator: Andrej Petrak
content: Lana Deković / Foto privatna arhiva Nakon šesnaest godina prepoznatljivoga loga kultnog riječkog sajma knjiga i festivala autora Vrisak, pankera koji vrišti, vodstvo festivala odlučilo se za promjenu imidža, a na temelju raspisanog natječaja za novi vizualni identitet, ranije ove godine je predstavljeno, prepoznatljiv logo bit će onaj studentice riječke Akademije primijenjenih umjetnosti Lane Deković, koju smo u povodu ovogodišnjeg izdanja Vriska upitali dvije-tri vezano uz novi vizualni identitet, odnosno njezinu viziju prepoznatljivoga znaka festivala. – Najveća inspiracija za novi vizualni identitet bio mi je stari identitet Vriska, koji je dizajnirao Boris Malešević. Htjela sam, naime, zadržati ključne »punk« elemente koji su davali festivalskom identitetu njegovu autentičnost i posebnost, kao i prepoznatljivu paletu boja. Glavna ideja bila je stvoriti personifikaciju samog Vriska, odnosno nešto što simbolički predstavlja glas autora, pa su zato središnji motiv sada otvorena usta koja »vrište«, dok različiti zubi predstavljaju raznolikost ljudi i njihovih priča. – Da, novi vizualni identitet se, zadržavajući prepoznatljive elemente, kao što je paleta boja, svakako nadovezuje na stari, ali istovremeno donosi nove motive koji produbljuju njegovu simboliku. Što se tiče novoga identiteta, htjela sam da bude jednako upečatljiv i snažan u prenošenju poruke kao i onaj prethodni, uz istovremeno osvježenje koje ujedno reflektira razvoj i duh samog...

title: בלתי עצירים: ימאל נוצץ וברצלונה מתחילה לחלום על אליפות
content: ברצלונה ממשיכה להיות בלתי עצירה בפתיחתה של עונת 2024/25 בליגה הספרדית. הניצחון המוחץ 1:4 על ג'ירונה הערב (ראשון) במסגרת המחזור החמישילא רק השאיר אותה מושלמת, אלא גם המשיך לבסס אותה כמועמדת לאליפות תוך תצוגה התקפית אדירה נוספת. זה היה "פסטיבל נקמה", כמו שכתבו בתקשורת הקטלאנית אחרי סגירת החשבון של בארסה עם יריבתה העירונית שהביסה אותה פעמיים 2:4 במפגשי העונה שעברה. זו פתיחת העונה הטובה ביותר של הבלאוגרנה מאז עונת 2017/18, עם 17 שערים בחמישה משחקים, כשהמאזן המושלם בשלב הזה מעודד במיוחד: ברצלונה זכתה באליפות בשש משבע העונות האחרונות שנפתחו עם חמישה ניצחונות רצופים, למעט 2013/14 שבה איבדה את התואר לאתלטיקו מדריד. האנזי פליק הצטרף לרשימה אקסקלוסיבית של שלושה מאמנים שהחלו קדנציה במועדון עם חמישה ניצחונות ו-17 שערים לפחות. קדמו לו טאטה מרטינו וארנסטו ואלוורדה, שנהנו שניהם מהשפעתו של ליאו מסי. ואם כבר הזכרנו את מסי, הרי שהכוכב הגדול של הניצחון היום היה מי שמקווה להפוך ליורשו המיוחל של מלך שערי המועדון בכל הזמנים. לאמין ימאל ניפק מפגן מסנוור נוסף של הכישרון העילאי שלו וכבש צמד שני בקריירה, הראשון במשחק חוץ בליגה, ובגיל 17 ו-64 ימים בלבד יש לו כבר 13 שערים ו-21 בישולים בשקלול משחקי הקבוצה והנבחרת. העונה סופר נער הפלא שלושה כיבושים וארבעה בישולים, שמציבים אותו רק מאחורי ארלינג הולאנד במעורבות בשערים בחמש הליגות הבכירות, כששחקנים כמו הארי קיין, חברו לקבוצה רוברט לבנדובסקי ומוחמד סלאח נמצאים מאחוריו בטבלה הזו כרגע. "חזרה מפגרת נבחרות תמיד קשה, אבל היום היינו טובים מאוד. המפתח הוא שאנחנו ישירים, כשאנחנו מחזירים לעצמנו את הכדור אנחנו חושבים רק על לכבוש", סיפר ימאל. "לאמין בדרך כלל נותן את...

title: Për herë të parë në Mal të Zi, biblotekë me zë për të nxitur arsimimin në gjuhën shqipe
creator: b b
content: Për herë të parë për komunitetin shqiptar në Malin e Zi nisi të funksionojë biblioteka me zë në gjuhën shqipe, e cila ka për qëllim promovimin e leximit dhe edukimit përmes kësaj forme, veçanërisht për ata që kanë vështirësi me shikimin. Projekti synon të ruajë dhe të promovojë gjuhën dhe kulturën shqiptare, duke inkurajuar më shumë të rinj dhe të rritur të përfshihen në botën e letërsisë. Për herë të parë për komunitetin shqiptar në Malin e Zi nisi të funksionojë biblioteka me zë në gjuhën shqipe, e cila ka për qëllim promovimin e leximit dhe edukimit përmes kësaj forme, veçanërisht për ata që kanë vështirësi me shikimin. Autorja Luljeta Avdiu Cura thotë se në këtë projekt janë përfshirë autorët shqiptarë nga Mali i Zi, për tu zgjeruar më vonë edhe me autorët tjerë nga rajoni. “Projekti Biblioteka me zë, siç e kam titulluar “Audio vepra shqip” është një projekt i rëndësishëm te shqiptarët në Malin e Zi për vet faktin se do të publikohen audio libra të krijuesve nga shqiptarët e Malit të Zi, por edhe të autorëve tjerë nga rajoni. Qëllimi i këtij projekti është të edukohen të rinjtë dhe të rejat brenda vendit por edhe i dedikohet bashkëatdhetarëve, të cilët janë duke i rritur dhe edukuar fëmijët në diasporë”, tha zonja Cura. title: Barred from sport, Afghan women seek relief in secretive exercise
content: Kabul: Most mornings after praying, 25-year-old Sanah joins several women from her neighbourhood in the Afghan capital Kabul for a walk along the main road before it fills with traffic, never jogging or getting too near to the many Taliban checkpoints. They exercise secretively, and not for competition, but for a modicum of health and peace of mind in a country where the Taliban government have stopped women from playing sports. "We cannot go near the Taliban checkpoint because they say, 'Why are you outside the house so early? Where are you going? Why do you need to exercise, you don't have to, so don't'," said Sanah, whose name has been changed -- along with all the women interviewed by AFP -- for fear of reprisal. The Taliban authorities have implemented an austere interpretation of Islamic law, with women bearing the brunt of restrictions that the United Nations has labelled "gender apartheid". In November 2022, the Ministry for the Propagation of Virtue and the Prevention of Vice announced women were barred from parks and gyms on the grounds they were not adhering to a dress code that orders them to cover up. Gyms had previously offered time slots for women, and while some informal women-only fitness clubs still exist, they are rare and low-profile. Sanah and one of her companions, Latifah, who is middle-aged, used to walk in the large, tree-lined parks in the city.The last time Latifah went to the park near her house, not long after they were permanently closed to...

title: Yamal scores twice as Barcelona beat Girona 4-1 to start league season with 5 straight wins
content: Madrid, Sep 15 (AP) With two goals in less than 10 minutes, Lamine Yamal led Barcelona to its fifth straight victory at the start of the Spanish league season. The teenager's double, plus second-half goals by Dani Olmo and Pedri, gave Barcelona a commanding 4-1 win at Catalan rival Girona on Sunday, keeping its lead over Real Madrid at four points. Madrid won at Real Sociedad on Saturday with goals from Kylian Mbappe and Vinicius Junior. Villarreal was the other team four points back after winning 2-1 at Mallorca on Saturday. Yamal's goals on Sunday were his second and third of the season. The 17-year-old Spain international opened the scoring after stealing the ball from a defender and sending a close-range shot into the net in the 30th minute. He scored again in the 37th after picking up a loose ball inside the area. Olmo's third goal since joining Barcelona this season came from a tight angle in the 47th, and Pedri sealed the easy victory with a goal from inside the area in the 64th. Cristhian Stuani scored Girona's lone goal in the 80th. The hosts were initially awarded a penalty kick for a handball inside the area just before halftime, with Barcelona leading 2-0, but the call was reversed by video review. Barcelona played with 10 men from the 87th after Ferran Torres was sent off for a hard foul on an opponent. Girona, a surprise third-place finisher last season, won both league games against Barcelona last season. Earlier Sunday, Celta Vigo beat Valladolid 3-1 at home...

title: الملك في المولد النبوي: نسأل الله الخير والطمأنينة على الأمتين
content: خبرني - هنأ جلالة الملك عبدالله الثانية الأمتين العربية والإسلامية، بمناسبة ذكرى المولد النبوي. وكتب جلالته في صفحته عبر موقع التواصل الاجتماعي اكس، "في ذكرى مولد سيد الخلق، سيدنا محمد، صلى الله عليه وسلم، نسأل الله عز وجل أن يعم الخير وتسود الطمأنينة على الأمتين العربية والإسلامية".

title: IndiGo's Mumbai-Doha flight faces tech issue long wait for passengers inside plane
content: Mumbai, Sep 15 (PTI) Passengers of an IndiGo flight from the city to Doha waited inside the aircraft for more than four hours on Sunday morning as it was delayed due to a technical issue. After a delay of nearly 18 hours, the flight took off for the Qatar capital from Mumbai airport around 9:45 pm. It was originally scheduled to depart around 4 am, sources in the know said. Passengers were inside the aircraft for more than four hours before they deplaned, the sources added. Some passengers took to social media to complain about the delay and their long wait. In the morning, IndiGo said its flight 6E 1303, operating from Mumbai to Doha, was delayed due to a technical reason. "The aircraft tried to depart for its destination a couple of times but had to finally be called off due to the extended time lag on account of various procedural delays," the airline said in a statement. While apologising for the inconvenience, IndiGo said its airport team immediately offered assistance to the affected customers and provided refreshments and necessary arrangements. On Sunday morning, a passenger on X said the flight was stuck for four hours due to a technical problem and that the immigration authority was not giving permission to offload the passengers. The airline also said passengers were being provided hotels and rebooked according to their final destination.

title: Newcastle snudde til seier tross Strand Larsen-assist: – Klin umulig å gjøre det bedre
content: Wolverhampton jakter stadig sin første seier i årets sesong, og det så lyst ut søndag da de tok ledelsen før pause. Strand Larsen viste fram muskler da han forsvarte ballen i duell med en Newcastle-forsvarer. Den norske spissen slo så ballen inn i feltet, der Lemina scoret etter et smart overhopp av João Gomes. Strand Larsen scoret sitt første Premier League-mål i kampen mot Chelsea før landslagspausen. Nordmannen gjorde i sommer overgang fra spanske Celta Vigo og har fått tillit på spissplass i sin nye engelske klubb. Like etter pause søndag fikk den norske spissen selv avsluttet mot mål, men ballen smalt i stolpen og ut. Etter at Wolverhampton hadde produsert flere sjanser, fikk Newcastle utligningen et kvarter før slutt. Midtstopper Fabian Schär hamret til fra distanse og var noe heldig da ballen gikk via hodet til Wolves-stopper Michael Dawson og i en bue over målvakten. Noen minutter senere skulle et nytt langskudd gi jubel. Harvey Barnes kom fri på 18 meter og bøyde ballen i det lengste hjørnet. – Det er klin umulig å gjøre det bedre, sa Viaplay-ekspert Lars Tjærnås. Newcastle ligger som nummer seks på tabellen, mens Wolverhampton er nummer 18 etter de første fire kampene denne sesongen. Newcastle er ett av fem lag som ikke har tapt i PL denne sesongen.
